1a1(mdo sde): @#/ /mdo la pa bzhugs so//
1b1(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ a b+hi ni Sh+k+ra ma Na sU tra/ bod skad du/ mngon par
1b2(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i mdo/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig nyid kyi dbu ni
1b3(mdo sde): rin chen 'od ldan dang / /btsun mo pad+ma kha bye ma rnyis mdangs ldan pas/ /slong ba
1b4(mdo sde): dga' mdzad sangs rgyas go 'phang brnyes gyur cing / /chos rnams ston mdzad zhi
2a1(mdo sde): ba de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig rnyed pas ngan 'gro'i 'jigs las 'das gyur
2a2(mdo sde): cing | |srid pa'i 'ching ba thams cad zad byed zhir gyur la/ /sdug bsngal mtha' med 'khor ba'i rgya
2a3(mdo sde): mtsho las brgal ba'i/ /zam pa gcig pu bde gshegs chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la yon tan
2a4(mdo sde): phul byung la gnas sbyin pa'i gnas/ /mchod pa cung zad byas kyang rgya che nyid 'gyur ba/ /bde bar gshegs
2a5(mdo sde): pas rab bsngags gang zag mchog brgyad kyis/ /rab brgyan 'phags pa'i dge 'dun de la phyag 'tshal
2b1(mdo sde): lo| |thub gsung rnam par brtags na dad pa mi skyed pa'am/ /phan pa mi 'byung gang de ci yang yod min la/ /tshig btu ba
2b2(mdo sde): dang 'dzin pa'i nus dang rnam bral ba/ /rnam par g.yengs phyir 'bras stsol 'di bdag nyung zad cig /ji ltar pad+ma kha bye'i
2b3(mdo sde): dbus gnas bung ba ni/ /'khor zhing pad+ma la ni cung zad gsog par byed/ /de bzhin thub pa'i zhal gyi pad+ma'i tshal nang nas/ /
2b4(mdo sde): rang yid rab tu dga' byed cung zad bsdu bar bya/ /thub pa'i gsung ni ma lus shin tu rtogs dka' ba/ /dad ldan mi la nyin
2b5(mdo sde): re'ang rgyas par nyer 'gro ste/ /rnam par dpyad na tshigs bcad phyed mtha'ang mi dpogs na/ /rin chen mdo brgya bsdu ba 'di ni
2b6(mdo sde): smos ci dgos/ /phyogs sgo rnams su snyan dang grags pa'i snang bas khyab/ /rab gsal zhes byas yi bdag por gyur pa na/ /
3a1(mdo sde): bsod nams stobs kyis dgra las rgyal bas rgyal phran gyis/ /btud pas nor bu'i cod pan 'od kyis zhal gtsang
3a2(mdo sde): byas| |glang po'i dbang po rgyags 'khrig 'dod chags kyis chags pa/ /'phral du bcos pa'i thabs med nyon mongs skabs gyur la/ /gzigs
3a3(mdo sde): nas 'gro ba'i chags sogs nyes pa zhi bzhed pas/ /thugs brtan thub dbang gyur par des ni smon lam btab/ /de nas brtsams te sbyin
3a4(mdo sde): dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan mi g.yo blo gros rnon po rnams/ /nyid bde'i ltos med shin tu yun ring yang dag
3a5(mdo sde): spel| |'gro la phan phyir shin tu dka' ba brgya phrag mdzad/ /thugs rje cher ldan drang srong mchog 'di tshe gzhan du/ /nyid kyis 'gro phan
3a6(mdo sde): don mdzad mi skyo ji snyed de/ /brjod pa 'di na shA ri'i bus kyang mi nus na'ang / /gang dag phyir ni cung zad yongs su brjod par bya/ /stag mo
3b1(mdo sde): shi bi'i glang po spre'u dka' thub dbang / /tshangs sogs sku tshe brgya phrag du mar dge mdzad nas/ /don kun sgrub brtson bdag nyid chen po tshe gcig thogs/ /byang chub sems dpa'
3b2(mdo sde): dga' ldan gnas su skye ba bzhes/ /der bzhugs nas ni 'gro ba kun la legs gzigs nas/ /skyabs med g.yo zhing phongs pa du mas yongs khyab la/ /thugs rje chen pos
3b3(mdo sde): thugs ni spro ba bskyed gyur te/ /gzhan gyi don mdzad thugs dam nyid kyi rgyud dgongs gyur/ /de bas 'di ni ji ltar mi yul nyer gshegs te/ /skye dang rga shi na ba'i 'jigs pa
3b4(mdo sde): gzigs nas ni/ /rab byung blo gros nges mdzad byang chub yang dag brnyes/ /de bzhin chos ston mdzad pa bshad kyi mnyan par gyis/ /de nas dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i
3b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa mang por bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa rnam pa du mar nye bar bsags pas byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par
3b6(mdo sde): mdzad pa/ nyon mongs pa'i chu bo stobs dang ldan pas shin tu chod pa rnams la thugs rjes yongs su bskul ba/ gzhan gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir rtag tu brtson par mdzad pa de thugs
3b7(mdo sde): la dgongs pa 'di lta bu mngon sum du mdzad de/ gang ngas skye ba mang por yongs su 'khor ba na rang gi sha dang / khrag dang / mgo dang / mig dang / bu dang / chung ma rnams gtong ba
4a1(mdo sde): dang | shin tu gtong bas yongs su btang ba dang / dka' ba'i tshul khrims la gnas pa dang / gzhan gyis sbyar ba'i bsnyen bkur ma yin pa sna tshogs pa bzod
4a2(mdo sde): par byas pa dang / rtag tu lhod pa med pa'i spro ba dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba la ma chags pa dang / yod pa dang / med pa'i don la rnam par dpyod pa dang
4a3(mdo sde): l dan pas gzhan gyi don la brtson pa'i blo gros kyis shin tu mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rnam pa mang pos sems la gdungs pa'i sdug phongs pa'i srog chags rnams la
4a4(mdo sde): mchog tu snying rje bskyed nas byams pa'i stobs dang / zla 'od dang / shi bi dang / glang po dang / thams cad sgrol dang / bzod par smra ba dang / spre'u'i bdag po dang / mig bzang
4a5(mdo sde): dang | sman chen po la sogs pa skyes pa'i rabs stong phrag snyed du smon lam byas shing bsags pa/ e ma'o/ /kye ma bdag gis 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa/ yongs su
4a6(mdo sde): 'dren pa med pa/ chos ma yin pa 'dod chags kyis dbang du 'gro ba/ log pa'i chos kyis yongs su khyab pa/ sems la mi bzad pa'i chags pas zil gyis non pa/ khro ba
4a7(mdo sde): mang ba/ lta ba ngan pa'i tshang tshing gis rnam par brlag pa/ phrag dog dang / ser snas kun tu bcings pa/ legs par spyod pa la 'jug pa la rgyab kyis phyogs shing nyes
4b1(mdo sde): par spyod pa la kun tu gzhol bar gyur pa rnams la bdag sangs rgyas su gyur nas sems can ma brgal ba rnams ni bsgral bar bya'o/ /ma grol ba rnams ni dgrol bar bya'o/ /
4b2(mdo sde): dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs dbyung bar bya'o/ /yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes ngas yun ring du mngon par 'dod pa
4b3(mdo sde): yin na/ de ni don de bya ba'i dus la bab pa yin gyi/ ma la/ bdag gis 'jig rten gyi gnas skabs ci zhig yin pa bltas na gdul bar nus so/ /gdul bar nus so/ /zhes de ltar
4b4(mdo sde): rnam par dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad la gzigs pa 'jug ste/ su ni 'grib/ su ni dge ba'i chos rnams kyis 'phel/ su ni gnod par gyur/ su ni nyam thag par
4b5(mdo sde): gyur| su ni sdug bsngal bar gyur/ gang la ni ngas ma 'jigs shig /ma 'jigs shig /ces mi 'jigs pa sbyin pas dbugs dbyung bar bya/ su ni ngan song la gzhol/ su ni
4b6(mdo sde): ngan song la 'bab/ su ni ngan song la bab/ su ni ngas ngan song las bton te/ mtho ris dang / thar ba'i 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba la lag nas
4b7(mdo sde): drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor dang bral ba rnams la 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug gi bdag po la gzhag par bya/ gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dag ni bskyed
5a1(mdo sde): par bya/ gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag ni yongs su smin par bya/ gang gi yongs su smin pa rnams ni rnam par grol bar bya zhes ye shes kyi gzigs pa
5a2(mdo sde): 'jug par mdzad pa na srog chags brgya stong dpag tu med pa la la ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa bskyed par 'os pa dang / la la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma smin pa yongs su smin par nus pa
5a3(mdo sde): dang | la la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa bde 'gror 'gro bar gzhol ba dang / la la 'bras bu dang po thob par gzhol ba dang / la la lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
5a4(mdo sde): phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub 'thob par gzhol ba dang / la la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa dang / la la
5a5(mdo sde): ni sngon gyi smon lam rnams nye bar bsags pas rkyen la rags las pa gang zhig ma thos pas dam pa'i chos las yongs su nyams par gyur par gzigs so/ /gzigs
5a6(mdo sde): nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ kye ma'o/ /bdag gis yun ring po nas yang dag par rtogs pa rdzogs par gyur cing nga'i ngal ba 'bras bu dang bcas par gyur to zhes dgyes
5a7(mdo sde): shing ngas bya ba ni byas so/ /ngas khur bskur bar dka' ba ni mthar phyin te/ gang nga'i yongs su dag pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa'i zhing du gyur cing gdul bya'i skye bo rnams yun ring por
5b1(mdo sde): mi thogs par pad+ma'i tshal yongs su smin cing kha bye la ma reg pa'i nyi ma shar bas rgyas par 'gyur ba lta bur gyur gyi phyi bshol mi bya'o/ /'dir gnas bzhin du'ang dngos po thams cad
5b2(mdo sde): rdzogs par bya bar nus pa ma yin pas na gzhes pa'i dus ni ma yin gyi/ ma la/ bdag mi'i 'jig rten du song la/ der phyin nas brtson 'grus kyi grogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla
5b3(mdo sde): na med pa'i ye shes rtogs par byas te/ 'di rnams skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'di rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su smin la rnam par grol bar bya zhing / skye ba dang / rga ba dang /
5b4(mdo sde): na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor ltung ba/ skyabs med pa/ yongs su skyob pa med pa'i srog
5b5(mdo sde): chags rnams dam pa'i chos bstan pa'i lag pa brkyang bas gdon par bya'o/ /thog ma med pa'i dus nas rjes su 'brel ba'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mes kun tu
5b6(mdo sde): gdungs pa rnams la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chu'i rgyun blugs pas sdug bsngal ma lus pa bsal bar bya'o zhes de lta bu'i thugs la dgongs pa nges par bskyed nas/ dzam+bu'i gling du 'jug par mdzad pa na rigs dang /
5b7(mdo sde): yul dang / dus dang / rgyud dang / bud med de/ gzigs pa rnam pa lngas gzigs par mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu
6a1(mdo sde): gang gis rigs la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa'
6a2(mdo sde): rnams rigs ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs su yin la/ de la res 'ga' ni bram ze'i rigs btsun par bkur/ res
6a3(mdo sde): 'ga' ni rgyal rigs te/ da lta na ni rgyal rigs btsun par bkur bar gzigs nas/ ma la/ bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas rigs ngan par nying mtshams sbyor
6a4(mdo sde): ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal rigs su nying mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya'o snyam mo/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i
6a5(mdo sde): dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems
6a6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams rigs la gzigs par mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis yul la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas
6a7(mdo sde): na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' yul ji lta ba zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma
6b1(mdo sde): he phun sum tshogs pa/ slong mo ba brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa/ gang du skye bo gcig btul bas skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i yul
6b2(mdo sde): gang yin pa gzigs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ dbus kyi yul 'di ni bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang / 'bras dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa/ slong
6b3(mdo sde): mo ba brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa/ gang du skye bo gcig btul bas skye bo'i tshogs chen po btul bar 'gyur ba yin gyi/ ma la/ bdag la gzhan
6b4(mdo sde): d ag byang chub sems dpas yul mtha' 'khob rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor ba
6b5(mdo sde): blang bar bya'o snyam mo/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
6b6(mdo sde): ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' yul la gzigs par mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis na dus la gzigs
6b7(mdo sde): par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus ji lta bu zhig tu dzam+bu'i gling du nying
7a1(mdo sde): mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ skye dgu'i tshe lo yar skye ba na brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len la/ mi rnams kyi tshe lo mar
7a2(mdo sde): 'grib pa na brgya thub pa man chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyu gang gis mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba
7a3(mdo sde): len par mi mdzad ce na/ mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na yid 'byung bar dka' zhing skyo bar bya bar dka' la blun zhing dbang po rtul ba dang / bag med cing / bde ba mang bas
7a4(mdo sde): bden pa rnams kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /mar 'grib pa lo brgya man chad du'ang snyigs ma lnga po 'di lta ste/ tshe'i snyigs ma dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang /
7a5(mdo sde): sems can gyi snyigs ma dang / lta ba'i snyigs ma dang / dus kyi snyigs ma shas che ba yin pas bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas snyigs ma lnga shas che ba'i dus su
7a6(mdo sde): nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las
7a7(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus la gzigs
7b1(mdo sde): pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rgyud ma gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub
7b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams rgyud ci 'dra ba zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ rigs gang zhig btsun par bkur zhing ma mes dang / pha mes zung bdun gyi bar du spyod pa la skyon med par
7b3(mdo sde): gzigs nas/ de 'di snyam du dgongs te shAkya'i rigs rgyud 'di ni btsun par bkur ba yin zhing mang pos bkur ba nas bzung ste spyod pa skyon med pa yin gyi/ ma la/ bdag la gzhan
7b4(mdo sde): d ag byang chub sems dpas rgyud ngan pa las nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i rgyud du nying mtshams
7b5(mdo sde): sbyor ba blang ngo snyam mo/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
7b6(mdo sde): chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rgyud la gzigs par mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis bud med la gzigs par
7b7(mdo sde): mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med ci 'dra ba zhig gi rum du nying mtshams
8a1(mdo sde): sbyor ba len snyam na de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bud med gang zhig gzugs bzang mo dang ldan pa/ rigs dang ldan pa/ rigs 'phel bar 'gyur ba/ khro bag
8a2(mdo sde): can ma yin pa/ phra ma can ma yin pa/ ngag rtsub pa ma yin pa/ dad pa dang ldan pa/ rang bzhin bzang ba/ bsam pa dge ba/ rgyud phun sum tshogs pa/ rigs mtho ba/ nye du'i rigs
8a3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ shes rab phun sum tshogs pa/ gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa/ mtshan nyid mi g.yo ba/ rang bzhin brtan la rgod bag can ma yin pa/ khengs pa med pa/ byams pa'i
8a4(mdo sde): sems dang ldan pa/ sdug cing yid du 'ong ba/ 'jig rten thams cad la chos dang ldan pa/ bud med thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la e ma'o bdag
8a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcu rum du 'dzin nus pa dang / rang gi don yang nyams par mi byed pa yin par gzigs
8a6(mdo sde): so| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'di ni ma mes dang / pha mes zung bdun gyi bar du spyod pa la skyon med cing gzugs dang ldan pa dang /
8a7(mdo sde): rigs dang ldan pa dang / tshul dang ldan zhes bya ba nas bud med thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ khro bag can ma yin pa dang / rigs 'phel
8b1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rum du zla ba bcur 'dzin nus pa dang / rang gi don yang mi nyams pa yin la/ 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mos sngon sangs rgyas rnams la/ kye
8b2(mdo sde): m a| bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa'ang yin pas bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ngan pa dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi rum du nying mtshams
8b3(mdo sde): sbyor ba blangs so zhes kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
8b4(mdo sde): rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' bud med rnams la gzigs par mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzigs pa lngas
8b5(mdo sde): gzigs nas dga' ldan na spyod pa'i lha'i ris rnams la gsungs pa/ grogs po dag /shes par gyis shig /nga dzam+bu'i gling du babs nas yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor ba
8b6(mdo sde): len gyi/ khyed cag las gang dag bdud rtsi don du nye bar phal cher yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po drug po/ 'di lta ste/ mnyan yod dang / sA ke ta dang / yangs pa can dang / tsam
8b7(mdo sde): pa dang / rgyal po'i khab dang / wA ra NA sir nying mtshams sbyor ba long zhig /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la
9a1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /byang chub sems dpa'/ mkhyen par mdzod cig /de ltar 'jig rten ni sdig pas gos pa/ skye dgu ni ma rungs pa'i bsam pa can/
9a2(mdo sde): dzam+bu'i gling na rtog ge ba drug dang / rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang / snyoms par 'jug pa drug gis dkrug pa lags so/ /de la rtog ge ba drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'od srung rdzogs
9a3(mdo sde): byed dang / kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang / smra 'don gyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang / mi pham skra'i lab can dang / kA t+yA'i bu nog can dang / gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'o/ /
9a4(mdo sde): rjes su sgrogs pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bram ze sgyus rgal dang / bram ze rnas rdeg dang / bram ze bzang ldan dang / bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe dang / bram ze pad+ma'i snying po dang / bram
9a5(mdo sde): ze dmar po'o/ /snyoms par 'jug pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod dang / sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur dang / kun tu rgyu rab bzang dang / bram ze'i khye'u
9a6(mdo sde): kun rgyal dang / drang srong nyon mongs med pa dang / lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can no/ /'dir ni chos mnyan pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' khyed kyi gdan dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa
9a7(mdo sde): bsham pa bgyi zhing bdag cag 'di snyam du bdag cag la dga' ldan gyi gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs pas chos bshad de/ chos de bdag cag gis thos nas ci nas
9b1(mdo sde): kyang bdag cag yun ring po'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba de lta der ltar bsgrub par bgyid par sems lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
9b2(mdo sde): dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /grogs po dag/ de'i phyir rol mo'i cha spyad thams cad brdungs shig/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis rol mo'i cha spyad thams
9b3(mdo sde): cad brdungs pa dang / byang chub sems dpas kyang dung bus te gsungs pa/ grogs po dag /'di la lhag par sgra gang che/ bcom ldan 'das/ dung gi sgra lags so/ /grogs po dag/ ji
9b4(mdo sde): ltar dung gi sgras rol mo'i cha spyad thams cad zil gyis mnan te gnas pa de bzhin du ngas kyang dzam+bu'i gling du song la rtog ge pa drug dang / rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang / snyoms par
9b5(mdo sde): 'jug pa drug zil gyis mnan nas bdud rtsi rtogs par bya ste/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par bya'o/ /mi rtag pa'i dung bud par bya'o/ /stong pa nyid kyi rnga brdung bar bya'o/ /bdag med pa'i
9b6(mdo sde): seng ge'i sgra bsgrag par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs nas tshigs su bcad de yang gsungs pa/ seng ge gcig gis gcan zan tshogs ni du ma 'joms/ /rdo rje gcig gis brag gi rtse mo du ma
9b7(mdo sde): 'jig / brgya byin gcig gis lha ma yin dbang du ma 'joms/ /nyi ma gcig gis mun pa du ma rnam par sel/ /grogs po dag /khyed cag las gang bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de yul
10a1(mdo sde): dbus kyi grong khyer chen po drug tu nying mtshams sbyor ba long zhig/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di
10a2(mdo sde): ni btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhums su nying mtshams sbyor ba len par bzhed kyi/ ma la/ de la bdag gis gzi brjid bsgrub par bya/ lhums kyang sbyang bar bya'o snyam nas lha
10a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo la gzi brjid bsgrubs shing / lhums kyang gtsang mar byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas
10a4(mdo sde): na bzhugs pa rigs dang / yul dang / dus dang / rgyud dang / bud med la gzigs pa ste/ gzigs pa lngas gzigs nas nam gyi gung la glang po cher bstan te dga' ldan gyi lha'i
10a5(mdo sde): ris nas 'phos nas yum gyi lhums su zhugs so/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos te yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe sa chen po
10a6(mdo sde): 'di shin tu g.yos par gyur/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur cing 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun gnag smag tu gyur pa/ gang
10a7(mdo sde): du nyi ma dang / zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba dag gis kyang 'od kyis snang bar mi nus pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ /der sems
10b1(mdo sde): can gang dag skyes pa de dag rang gi lag pa brkyang ba mi mthong ba las/ de rnams snang ba des gcig gis gcig mthong nas/ shes ldan dag /sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/ /
10b2(mdo sde): shes ldan dag/ sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes bya bar shes so/ /ji ltar sprin ni rgya chen legs 'dus pa/ /chu mang bsags pa rlung gis bskyod pa ltar/ /de bzhin blo ldan de
10b3(mdo sde): ni lhums 'jug pa/ /ston ka'i sprin rum zla rgyas ji bzhin no/ /gang tshe rtsal ldan mnyam med nyer gshegs la/ /de tshe 'jig rten so so'i gling bar na/ /mun gyis khebs bsal phyogs
10b4(mdo sde): kun shin tu ni/ /gsal snang byung gyur 'di 'dir chos nyid do/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te yum gyi lhums su zhugs par mdzad pa de
10b5(mdo sde): nyid kyi mtshan mo btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mos rmi lam bzhi mthong ste/ glang po che'i phru gu dkar po zhig bdag gi rum g.yas pa dral nas zhugs pa dang / steng gi nam mkha' la skyil mo
10b6(mdo sde): krung gis 'chag pa dang / seng ge'i gdan la 'dug nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po la chos ston pa dang / lha dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdag la phyag byed pa'o/ /rgyal po zas
10b7(mdo sde): gtsang mas btsun mo las de thos pa dang / mtshan mkhan rnams la rmi lam 'di ji ltar ston pa yin dris pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ mkhyen par mdzod cig /gang btsun
11a1(mdo sde): m os rmi lam du mthong ba glang po che'i phru gu dkar po zhig bdag gi rum g.yas pa dral nas zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sras bltam par
11a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /steng gi nam mkha' la 'chag go zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / mthu che bar 'gyur ro/ /seng ge'i gdan la 'dug ste chos ston to zhes bya ba ni de'ang seng ge'i gdan
11a3(mdo sde): la bzhugs te 'khor bzhi la chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdag la phyag byed do zhes bya ba nas/ gal te de rab tu byung bar gyur na lha
11a4(mdo sde): dang | lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod cing rjed la mngon par bstod par 'gyur ro/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas
11a5(mdo sde): 'phos te yum gyi lhums na zhugs pa de'i tshe/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de la mi'am/ mi ma yin pa sus kyang 'tshe bar mi 'gyur bar lha'i bu bzhi yum gyi srung mar
11a6(mdo sde): 'jog pa ni/ lag na ral gri dang / lag na mdung dang / lag na mdung thung dang / lag na mda' bo che'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lha mchog bzhi la brgya byin gyis smras pa//
11a7(mdo sde): khyed rnams song la lha mi rnams kyi ni/ /shin tu mchog gyur yum de ji ltar su'ang / /gnod mi byed par gus pas yongs su srungs/ /de rnams shin tu 'bad byas dga'
11b1(mdo sde): pa dang / /brgya byin lung ni spyi bos mnos nas su/ /rnam kun mda' mdung ral gri lag na thogs/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yum ni srung bar byed/ /g.yul du rgyal gyur lha bzhis
11b2(mdo sde): spas pa dang / /de ni nyin mtshan sna tshogs rgyan 'chang zhing / /lha mo rang khyim nang nas rnam rol pa/ /dga' ba'i tshal na spyod pa lta bur spyod/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sgyu
11b3(mdo sde): 'phrul chen mo 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skyes te/ kye ma'o/ /lha/ btson thams cad thar bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang btsun mo'i tshig mnyan nas btson thams cad thar
11b4(mdo sde): bar byas so/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma'o/ /lhas grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi dbus su dman pa dang / long pa dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa
11b5(mdo sde): dang | slong mo ba rnams la sbyin pa byin la bsod nams dag byas pa dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / sum mdo'i dbus su dman pa dang / long ba dang / bkren pa dang / sdug
11b6(mdo sde): phongs pa dang / slong mo pa rnams la sbyin pa byin/ bsod nams ni bgyi'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis btsun mo'i tshig mnyan nas grong khyer gyi shar phyogs su dman pa dang /
11b7(mdo sde): long ba dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa dang / slong mo pa rnams la ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa dang / ji ltar bslangs pa bzhin du sbyin pa ni byin/ bsod nams ni byas pa dang /
12a1(mdo sde): de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / sum mdo'i dbus su dman pa dang / long ba dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa dang / slong mo pa rnams gang
12a2(mdo sde): mngon par 'dod pa dang / ji ltar bslangs pa bzhin du sbyin pa ni byin/ bsod nams ni byas so/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas
12a3(mdo sde): 'phos te yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa na mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang / sha ma'i dri ma dang / khrag gi dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna
12a4(mdo sde): tshogs kyis ma sbags so/ /dper na/ nor bu rin po che ka shi'i ras kyis mi gos pa dang / ka shi'i ras kyang nor bu rin po ches mi gos pa de bzhin du gang gis tshe byang chub
12a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa na mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang / sha ma'i dri ma dang / khrag gi dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba gang yang
12a6(mdo sde): rung ba sna tshogs kyis ma sbags so/ /ji ltar nor bu tshon shel 'od gsal dang / /rab gtsang ka shi'i ras kyang gos pa med/ /de bzhin thub chen lhums na bzhugs pa na//
12a7(mdo sde): mngal gyi dri ma cis kyang gos pa med/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos nas yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe yum gyi lhums na
12b1(mdo sde): de thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /dper na/ nor bu bai DUR+ya zur brgyad pa bzang po/ rigs dang ldan pa/ dang ba/ gsal ba/ dri ma med pa/ tshon skud sna
12b2(mdo sde): lnga sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan la brgyus la de skyes bu mig dang ldan pas mthong na 'di ni skud pa'o/ /'di ni nor bu'o/ /skud pa 'di la
12b3(mdo sde): nor bu brgyus pa yin no zhes shes pa de bzhin du/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'phos te yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ de'i
12b4(mdo sde): yum gyi lhums na rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par lhums kyi nang na bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /ji ltar dri med nor bu bai DUR+ya/ /'od gsal lag par bzhag pa snang bltar//
12b5(mdo sde): de bzhin thub chen yum gyi lhums bzhugs pa/ /shes shing sems dpas yum ni yang dag lta/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan nas
12b6(mdo sde): 'phos nas yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ de'i yum 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dzin pas lus ngal ba'am/ lus dub par 'gyur ba med do/ /las kyi rnam
12b7(mdo sde): smin zad pas mtho ris 'phos/ /gang tshe 'di ni lhums zhugs bzhugs pa na/ /de'i yum ngal bas 'dzin par mi byed par/ /de tshe gyur pa 'dir de chos nyid do/ /chos nyid kyis
13a1(mdo sde): g ang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan gyi gnas na 'phos nas yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe yum da phan chad ji srid 'tsho'i
13a2(mdo sde): bar du brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi blangs par gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te srog gcod pa las slar ldog go /ma byin par len pa dang / mi tshangs pa spyod pa
13a3(mdo sde): dang | brdzun du smra ba dang / 'bru'i chang dang / sbyar ba'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te/ 'bru'i chang dang / sbyar ba'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i
13a4(mdo sde): gnas las slar ldog par byed do/ /srog mi gcod dang ma byin mi len dang / /rdzun mi smra dang chang la mi brkam dang / /'khrig pa'i mi tshangs spyod pa spong ba 'di/ /'di ni don grub
13a5(mdo sde): yum gyi chos nyid yin/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'phos nas yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe yum 'di lta
13a6(mdo sde): ste| skyes pa rnams la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i yid gtod pa med do/ /nyon mongs rnams la chags par mi 'gyur zhing / /de ni 'dod rgyus sems gdungs mi 'gyur la/ /de
13a7(mdo sde): yum 'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pa yi/ /skyes pa rnams la sems ni gtong pa med/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma/ bdag gis
13b1(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu btung ngo snyam nas des rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis mtshan mkhan rnams la smras pa/ ci'i phyir btsun mo 'di lta bu'i 'dod
13b2(mdo sde): pa skyes/ mtshan mkhan rnams kyis/ lha/ btsun mo la sras skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi sku brgyan pa zhig bltam par 'gyur te/ de rab tu byung nas shes bya'i rgya
13b3(mdo sde): mtsho mtha' dag 'thung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ gal te 'di la mtsho chen po'i chu ma blud na cir 'gyur/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ sras
13b4(mdo sde): yan lag ma tshang ba zhig btsas par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ nga'i ming zas gtsang zhes bya ba'i bu yan lag ma tshang bar bya'am/ de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na kun tu
13b5(mdo sde): rgyu mig dmar zhes bya ba mig 'phrul la byang ba zhig 'dug pa de rgyal pos bkug nas rgya mtsho chen po las chu myur bar khug cig ces bsgo ba dang / des de nyid na 'dug bzhin du
13b6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu drangs te de rnams la btsun mo 'thung du bcug pa dang / de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo
13b7(mdo sde): sgyu 'phrul chen mo tshul 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skyes te/ kye ma'o/ /bdag lus lum bi nI'i tshal du zhugs la shing gi rtsar yal ga'i mthar 'dug par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas
14a1(mdo sde): rgyal po zas gtsang mas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo tshul de lta bu'i 'dod pa skyes par rig nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i khyogs bshams te glang
14a2(mdo sde): po'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs te dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor
14a3(mdo sde): te| btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang lhan cig tu chas nas lum bi nI'i tshal du phyin to/ /de nas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mos lum bi nI'i tshal mthong ba na sems rtse gcig
14a4(mdo sde): par gyur pa dang / de khyogs las babs te/ shing mya ngan 'tshang me tog yang dag par rgyas pa mthong bas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ de der song nas me tog dang / 'dab
14a5(mdo sde): ma'i g.yur gyis dud pa'i yan lag la 'jus te/ bud med rgan pas bskor nas gnas so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ btsun mo sgyu
14a6(mdo sde): 'phrul chen mo sras bltam par nye bar gnas kyi/ ma la/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dang po bltam pa na blang bar bya'o/ /de nas yang bsams pa/ btsun mo sgyu
14a7(mdo sde): ' phrul chen mo ni ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa yin pas bdag gi mdun du bltam mi phod kyi thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bud med rgan mo
14b1(mdo sde): zhig gi cha byad du sprul te/ des gang gis bud med rgan mo de rnams phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rlung dang char drag po zhig sprul nas de rnams bros pa dang / bdag
14b2(mdo sde): nyid ma ma rgan mo'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i mdun du 'jug go / chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' ni mkhyen bzhin du yum gyi lhums su
14b3(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang / mkhyen bzhin du gnas pa dang / mkhyen bzhin du 'byung ba yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gang bdag skyes bu tha mal pa bzhin
14b4(mdo sde): du mngal gyi sgo nas 'byung ba ni tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyi/ ma la/ bdag gis yum gyi dku g.yas pa brtol la 'byung bar bya'o zhes de nas byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi
14b5(mdo sde): dku g.yas pa brtol te byung ba dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lag pa gnyis kyis blangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ brgya byin 'di bdag gis
14b6(mdo sde): b yang chub sems dpa' 'di blangs so zhes dregs pa skye bar 'gyur bar mkhyen nas ngo bo nyid kyi rdo rje'i snying po can gyi skur byin gyis brlabs te lhums su ni yum 'dzin pas nyon
14b7(mdo sde): mongs par ma gyur cig snyam du dgongs nas yang bar mdzad de bzhugs pa yin no/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'dzin par ma nus pa dang 'dar bar gyur to/ /byang
15a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka thong / thong / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sa la
15a2(mdo sde): bzhag go / bzhag pa tsam gyi mod la sus kyang ma bzung bar phyogs bzhir gzigs nas gom pa bdun bdun por zhing tshig tu yang gsung pa/ kau shi ka /phyogs 'di gang yin byang
15a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'/ shar phyogs lags so/ /byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /sems can thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro bar bya'o/ /phyogs 'di gang yin/ lho
15a4(mdo sde): phyogs lags so/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi yon gnas su gyur par bya'o/ /phyogs 'di gang yin/ byang phyogs lags so/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho las brgal bar bya'o/ /phyogs 'di gang
15a5(mdo sde): yin| nub phyogs lags so/ /nga'i skye ba tha ma ni 'di yin par 'gyur ro/ /skye 'chi mthar byed de ni bltams pa na/ /sa la gom pa bdun ni bzhud nas su/ /'di nga'i skye ba tha mar
15a6(mdo sde): gyur yin zhes/ /'jig rten gsum gyi bla ma gcig pus gsungs/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa yum gyi lhums nas byung ba'i de'i tshe sa chen po 'di shin
15a7(mdo sde): tu g.yos par gyur/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur cing / 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun gnag smag tu gyur pa gang du nyi ma dang /
15b1(mdo sde): slar 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba dag gis kyang 'od kyis snang bar mi nus pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ /der sems can gang dag skyes pa
15b2(mdo sde): de dag rang gi lag pa brkyang pa'ang mi mthong ba las de rnams snang ba des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas/ shes ldan dag /sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/ /shes
15b3(mdo sde): ldan dag / sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes bya bar shes so/ /gang che rnam 'dren bltams par gyur pa na/ /de tshe sa ni rir bcas shin tu g.yos/ /gang gis 'jig rten par
15b4(mdo sde): yang skad cig gis/ /snang byed 'od gsal de yang byung bar gyur/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas sa g.yos pa chen po dang / snang ba rgya chen po mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
15b5(mdo sde): la bskor ba byas te zhabs gnyis la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / mthu che ba'i bu skyes pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /chos nyid
15b6(mdo sde): kyis gang gis tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa yum gyi lhums na bltams pa na ral gri shugs nas phyung ba bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang / sha ma'i dri ma dang / khrag gi dri
15b7(mdo sde): ma dang / mi gtsang ba gzhan dang gzhan sna tshogs kyis ma gos so/ /ji ltar 'od gsal tshon shel bzang po dang / /ka shi ras gtsang phan tshun gos mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin thub de
16a1(mdo sde): lhums nas byung ba na/ /gser sbyangs me chen nang nas bton pa 'dra/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa yum gyi lhums nas bltams pa
16a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i yum mi 'dug / mi nyal te/ 'greng bzhin du rgyal rigs ma des rgyal rigs bltam par byed do/ /de ni mi 'dug nyal ba'ang ma yin te/ yan lag lnga ldan tshul khrims
16a3(mdo sde): kyis brgyan pas/ /de ni 'greng bzhin shin tu dge ba yi/ /gzhon nu de 'dir brgya byin dag gis blangs/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa yum gyi lhums
16a4(mdo sde): nas bltams pa de'i tshe de'i dbu'i steng nas lha rnams gdugs dkar po nor bu'i yu ba can dag 'dzin to/ /dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'dra'i gdugs/ /lha yi gtso bos
16a5(mdo sde): dbu yi steng nas 'dzin/ /gdub 'khrol 'od zer gyis 'bar lag pa dang / /rnga yab bzang gis 'di la g.yob par byed/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya
16a6(mdo sde): thub pa bltams pa'i mod la bar snang las chu bsil ba gcig dang / chu dron mo gcig ste/ chu gnyis kyi rgyun spyi gtsug gi steng du 'bab cing des byang chub sems dpa' khrus mdzad
16a7(mdo sde): do| |dri med rab dag bsil dang de bzhin dro'i/ /chu yis rkang gnyis gtso bo khrus mdzad de/ /rigs rgyud gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'khrungs/ /klu rnams de la'ang mchod
16b1(mdo sde): pa byed par gyur/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod la bskrun pa'i yum gyi mdun du chu mig chen po byung nas 'babs par gyur te de la de'i yum khrus chu'i bya ba
16b2(mdo sde): byed do/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo gzhon nu bltams pa na/ /lha de rnams ni shin tu yid dga' bas/ /der ni chu bzang phyung bar gyur pa la/ /de yum der ni chu yis bya ba byed/ /lha yi rol
16b3(mdo sde): mo shin tu sgra snyan rnams/ /shin tu dga' ba mchog tu rdung bar byed/ /de rnams gos dang phreng ba 'thor byed cing / /gzhan ngag rab tu 'dud cing de bzhin bstod/ /chos nyid kyis
16b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod la lhas par snang las lha'i ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / a ga ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dang /
16b5(mdo sde): tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / ta ma la'i 'dab mas 'thor ro/ /lha'i me tog man+dA ra bas kyang 'thor ro/ /lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang sgra 'byin to/ /gos dag kyang 'thor bar byed do/ /mkhas
16b6(mdo sde): pas btud pa'i sangs rgyas bltams pa na/ /dri zhim dri mchog char ni phab pa dang / /de dang des na rang spobs tshul mthun pa'i/ /rab dga'i sems kyis bstod pa rjod par byed/ /
16b7(mdo sde): 'dis ni byang chub mchog dag thob 'gyur zhing / /sdug bsngal zad pa'i 'gro phan mdzad gyur la/ /'gro ba mi shes rab rib mig ldongs la/ /sman pa mchog 'di mig ni rab stsol
17a1(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /'di ni rmongs pas mig khebs long ba yi/ /'gro ba'i sgron ma chen po nyid du 'gyur/ /lta ngan gyis brlags log pa'i lam zhugs la/ /ma 'tshol
17a2(mdo sde): drang ba'i lam ni ston par 'gyur/ /ngan 'gro'i lam ni ma lus 'gog 'gyur zhing / /lha yi gnas kyi sa ni 'byed 'gyur zhes/ /'og min par na gnas pa'i lha rnams ni/ /lha
17a3(mdo sde): yi gnas su yang yang sgrog par byed/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltams pa de nyid kyi tshe mnyan yod du rtsibs kyis 'phur tshangs byin bu btsas pa na tshangs
17a4(mdo sde): byin 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na yul gsal ba gsal ba bzhin du snang bas de bas na 'di'i ming gsal rgyal zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags
17a5(mdo sde): so| |rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po pad+ma chen po bu btsas pa na pad+ma chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma'i gzugs shar ba ltar
17a6(mdo sde): snang zhing gzugs can ma'i bu yin pas 'di'i ming gzugs can snying po zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so/ /ko'u sham bi na rgyal po dmag brgya ba bu btsas pa na
17a7(mdo sde): dmag brgya ba 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma shar ba ltar snang bar gyur pas 'di'i ming shar ba zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so/ /
17b1(mdo sde): grong khyer 'phags rgyal du rgyal po mu khyud mtha' yas bu btsas pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten sgron mas snang ba lta bur gyur pas 'di'i ming rab
17b2(mdo sde): snang zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags te/ de ni de lta ma yin no/ /'on kyang de thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin no/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub
17b3(mdo sde): pa bltams pa de nyid kyi tshe dga' bo la sogs pa shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya btsas pa dang / grags 'dzin ma la sogs pa shAkya'i gzhon nu ma lnga brgya btsas pa dang / 'dun pa la
17b4(mdo sde): sogs pa rim gro ba lnga brgya btsas pa dang / bsngags ldan la sogs pa rta lnga brgya 'brangs so/ /lha rnams kyis gter lnga'i kha'ang nye bar bstan to/ /khams kyi rgyal phran rnams
17b5(mdo sde): dang | mkhar gyi rgyal po rnams kyis rab tu btud cing thams cad kyis kyang dpya phul lo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'dod pa
17b6(mdo sde): thams cad grub pas na gzhon nu 'di'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' la thog mar mtshan btags so/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'
17b7(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa bltams pa'i mod la yab yum gyis mtshan mkhan dang / ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams la nye bar ston pa yin pas/ shes ldan dag /ci ga gzhon nu gang dag
18a1(mdo sde): dang ldan na 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te/ gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam
18a2(mdo sde): par rgyal ba/ chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag 'byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che
18a3(mdo sde): dang | glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa ni blon po rin po che'o/ /bu dpa' ba/
18a4(mdo sde): rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong 'byung ba de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par sdo ba med cing
18a5(mdo sde): 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis 'debs pa med pa/ chos dang mthun pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gal te skra dang / kha spu bregs nas gos
18a6(mdo sde): ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya
18a7(mdo sde): bar 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan nas/ lha/ mang lags te/ gzhon nu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
18b1(mdo sde): cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa ni 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te/ zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten du gdags par 'gyur
18b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ snga ma bzhin du 'di ni 'dir chos nyid yin no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rgyal pos gzhon nu bltams nas skyes bu yi/ /mtshan shes bram ze la dris de
18b3(mdo sde): tshe smras/ /rgyal bu gal te khyim na gnas gyur na/ /nges par 'di ni mi dbang dag tu 'gyur/ /brtul bar ldan zhing rgyal po gzhan rnams kyis/ /spyi la dbang ba'i 'khor los
18b4(mdo sde): bsgyur bar 'gyur/ /'di ni gling rnams kun tu mngon rgyal ba'i/ /chos kyi rgyal srid dag ni byed par 'gyur/ /rin chen gyur pa 'di ni rin chen bdun/ /mi mchog bsod nams
18b5(mdo sde): las kyis 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang gi mthu yis sa ni ma lus pa/ /'di ni lung mi gcog par spyod par 'gyur/ /gser las legs byas lte ba shin tu zlum/ /rtsibs stong ldan
18b6(mdo sde): zhing myu khyud ma nyams bzang / /dang por sa la rnam par rgyal 'gyur gang / /'khor lo de 'dis dang por thob par 'gyur/ /yan lag thams cad legs skyes sa la ni/ /rab
18b7(mdo sde): gnas gangs can rtse 'dra'i glang po'i mchog / rgyal po la 'os mkha' la 'gro ba yi/ /rin chen mchog ni gnyis pa 'dis 'thob 'gyur/ /tho rangs dus su phyogs kun ma lus
19a1(mdo sde): pa'i/ /sa rnams bskor nas slar ni ldog gyur gang / /rma bya'i mgrin 'dra spu ni yid 'ong ba'i/ /rin chen rta ni 'di yis thob par 'gyur/ /rin chen dri med
19a2(mdo sde): bai DUR+ya rang bzhin/ /kun tu dpag tshad tsam du snang byed pa/ /dri med mtshan mo ci 'dra nyin de bzhin/ /rin chen mchog ni bzhi pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig reg dri gzugs
19a3(mdo sde): dang mdangs ldan pa'i/ /bud med dam pa dregs ldan rnams kyi mchog /lha mo bzhin du yon tan kun ldan pa/ /bud med rin chen de 'dir 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang yang 'di
19a4(mdo sde): ni rgyal la mu tig dang / /gser sogs shin tu mang po 'bul ba yi/ /nor ldan mtshungs par nor mang khyim bdag ni/ /rin chen thob nas rnam par spyod par 'gyur/ /'gror
19a5(mdo sde): dang kun tu gnas dang rnam ldog dang / /ma lus dpung la mkhas par byed pa yi/ /dpal ldan bdun pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni/ /mi yi rin chen blon po zhes bya yin/ /dpal
19a6(mdo sde): zhing brtul phod yan lag mchog gzugs ldan/ /bu stong dag ni 'di la 'byung 'gyur zhing / /gang gi gzi brjid shin tu stobs che zhing / /sa bdag gzhan dag 'dud
19a7(mdo sde): par byed pa 'byung / /gal te khyim ni nyes mang gis dkrugs pa/ /rab 'bar shing ni bya yis sdong ba ltar/ /nye bar zhi phyir nags su des song na/ /de 'dir ring por mi thogs
19b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /khyod kyi sras 'di deng ni 'di 'dra ba/ /gzhon nu 'gro ba'i rin chen gcig bltams pa/ /'gro ba gnyis las gzhan du mi 'gro ba/ /de ltar sngags kyi tshig las
19b2(mdo sde): mthong ba lags/ /shes ldan dag /gang dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten gyi sgra rnam par grags
19b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po ni gang dag yin/ /lha| gzhon nu'i zhabs shin tu gnas pa lags so/ /zhabs gnyis shin tu gnas
19b4(mdo sde): pa nyid kyis sa la mnyam par 'bab ste/ lha| 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /de'i zhabs kyi mthil gyi ngos gnyis la 'khor lo rtsibs
19b5(mdo sde): stong pa lte ba dang mu khyud du bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa mchis te/ lha/ 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha| gzhon
19b6(mdo sde): nu'i sor mo ring ba dang / zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa dang / de'i phyag dang / zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa lags te/ phyag dang / zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa
19b7(mdo sde): ni| dper na/ shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin no/ /lha/ 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha| gzhon nu'i
20a1(mdo sde): phyag dang / zhabs dra bar 'brel ba lags te/ de'i phyag dang / zhabs dra bar 'brel ba ni/ dper na/ ngang pa'i rgyal po gzhon nu bzhin no/ /lha| 'di ni gzhon
20a2(mdo sde): nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu'i zhabs long mo'i tshigs mi mngon pa dang / byin pa ri dwags e na ya'i lta bu dang / sku mdud pa dang /
20a3(mdo sde): sku bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mo'i lha nga gnyis slebs shing reg pa ste/ lha| 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha|
20a4(mdo sde): gzhon nu ni 'doms kyi spa ba sbubs su nub pa lags te/ de'i 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ni/ dper na/ glang po che cang shes kyi'am/ rta cang shes byung ma thag gi bzhin no/ /
20a5(mdo sde): lha| 'di gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu'i sku ci srid par 'dom yang de srid la/ 'dom ci srid par sku'ang de srid pas shing n+ya gro
20a6(mdo sde): d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa lags te/ lha/ 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu'i ro stod kyis spu re re nas skye zhing de'i sku la spu re
20a7(mdo sde): re nas skye ba'ang mthing ga la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bar skye lags te/ lha/ 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu ni
20b1(mdo sde): mdog gser 'dra ba dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / pags pa srab cing mdog gser gyi 'dra ba lags te/ pags pa srab pa nyid kyis rdul dang / dri mas sku la mi gos pa ste/ lha/ 'di ni
20b2(mdo sde): gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha| gzhon nu'i sku ni bdun mtho ba ste/ sku bdun mtho bar 'khrungs pa ni phyag gnyis dang / zhabs gnyis dang / dpung
20b3(mdo sde): mgo gnyis dang / ltag pa lags te/ lha| 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha| gzhon nu ni thal gong rgyas pa dang / sku ro stod seng ge'i 'dra
20b4(mdo sde): ba dang | sku drang zhing kho lag che ba dang / dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang / tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba dang / tshems mnyam pa dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / mche ba shin tu dkar
20b5(mdo sde): ba dang | 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa lags te/ lha/ 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha| gzhon nu ni
20b6(mdo sde): ljags shin tu ring zhing srab pa lags te/ ljags shin tu ring ba nyid dang / srab pa nyid kyi phyir ljags zhal nas phyung bas skra mtshams nas bzung ste/ zhal gyi dkyil 'khor
20b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bar du yog par mdzad pa ste/ lha| 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha| gzhon nu ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / ka la ping+ka'i
21a1(mdo sde): skad ltar yid du 'ong ba dang / rda'i dbyangs can lags te/ lha| 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha| gzhon
21a2(mdo sde): nu'i spyan mthon mthing la ba'i rdzi ma lta bu dang / gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang / smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dung ltar dkar zhing g.yas su 'khyil ba lags te/ lha| 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen
21a3(mdo sde): po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha| 'di dag ni gang dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma lags pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du sgra
21a4(mdo sde): rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis lags so/ /bdag nyid legs bsgoms sku la ni/ /sku yi tha ma 'dzin mdzad pa'i/ /
21a5(mdo sde): thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams ni/ /de ni bdag gis brjod par bgyi/ /'di zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste/ /sa la mnyam par 'bab pa yin/ /'di zhabs phyag gi mthil la ni/
21a6(mdo sde): 'khor lo shin tu dbyibs legs skyes/ /'di zhabs rting pa yangs pa dang / /de ni sor mo ring zhing mdzes/ /phyag zhabs dra bar 'brel pa dang / /shing ba la lta bur 'jam pa
21a7(mdo sde): dang | |'di'i zhabs long bu'i tshigs mi mngon/ /byin pa e ne ya dang mtshungs/ /mi mchog sku yang ma btud par/ /phyag gis pus mo'i lha nga slebs/ /'doms kyi sba ba
21b1(mdo sde): sbubs su nub/ /n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab/ /ro stod spu ni re re nas/ /skye zhing de spu g.yas su 'khyil/ /mdog ni gser sbyangs 'dra ba dang / /kun nas 'dom gang 'od dang ldan/ /bcom
21b2(mdo sde): ldan de ni pags srab cing / /'di sku bdun ni mtho ba ste/ /bcom ldan thal gong rgyas pa dang / /sku stod seng ge 'dra ba dang / /sku drang kho lag che ba dang / /dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang //
21b3(mdo sde): bcu phrag bzhi yi tshems rnams ni/ /yongs su rdzogs shing ma tshang med/ /mnyam dang thags bzang nyid du ni/ /de yi tshems ni legs par gnas/ /rab dkar 'gram pa seng ge 'dra//
21b4(mdo sde): ro bro mchog dang ldan pa dang / /ljags ni shin tu srab pa dang / /bcom ldan tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan/ /rdzi ma ba 'dra spyan mthon mthing / /smin ma'i mtshams kyi mdzod spu ni/ /dung
21b5(mdo sde): ltar dkar zhing g.yas su 'khyil/ /mtshan bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis 'di/ /gang zhig la ni 'byung 'gyur ba/ /de ni 'gro ba gnyis 'gyur gyi/ /gsum par 'gyur ba ma lags so/ /'di
21b6(mdo sde): ni gal te khyim gnas na/ /'khor los bsgyur rgyal nyid 'gyur te/ /dran ldan bu ni mang ba dang / /gnod pa chung zhing mkhas par 'gyur/ /gal te rab byung rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /gang
21b7(mdo sde): zag mnyam pa med par 'gyur/ /bshos dang btung dang na bza' dang / /gzims cha rnams kyang snyed 'gyur la/ /'di yi 'khor ni mi phyed cing / /lus can kun gyi yid du 'ong / /lha
22a1(mdo sde): rnams rjes su 'brang ba dang / /mi rnams kyang ni de bzhin te/ /chos kyi bdag po mchog 'gyur zhing / /mi yul dag tu'ang de bzhin 'gyur/ /mnyam pa med cing
22a2(mdo sde): 'dra ba med/ /rnam 'dren mtshungs pa med par 'gyur/ /lha| 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags te/ gang dang ldan na 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan ni ma lags
22a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltams nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / de bskrun pa'i yum nongs par gyur te/ nongs ma thag
22a4(mdo sde): tu sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris gya nom par skyes so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' ma ma rnams la gtad nas/ ma ma/ khyed kyis gzhon nu 'di dus
22a5(mdo sde): dus su sku mnye byos shig / dus dus su khrus byos shig /dus dus su zas byin cig /dus dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byos shig /ma ma/ dga' ba'i lag pa
22a6(mdo sde): gnyis kyis de blangs nas dus dus su sku mnye byed/ dus dus su khrus byed/ dus dus su zas byin/ dus dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byed do/ /yang de'i tshe
22a7(mdo sde): dri shin tu yid 'ong ba'i ngo bo gang yin pa de rnams byugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas yab zas gtsang la phul ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis de blangs te dga'
22b1(mdo sde): bas pang du bzhag nas yang dang yang du rtog cing dga' ba skyed do/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa ni gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mi'i kha dog
22b2(mdo sde): las yang dag par 'das la lha'i kha dog ma thob pa/ skyes pa dang / bud med rnams kyis bltas pa na ngoms mi shes shing dga' ba 'thob ste/ dper na/ dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser la
22b3(mdo sde): mgar ba mkhas pas rgyun brdungs pa/ la ba dkar po sar pa'i steng du bzhag na shin tu gsal zhing 'bar la rnam par 'tsher ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa
22b4(mdo sde): gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mi'i kha dog las 'das shing lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa yin no/ /chos nyid kyi byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa skye bo'i tshogs
22b5(mdo sde): chen po'i snying du sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong bar 'gyur te/ yang 'di skye bo'i tshogs chen pos da phrag pa nas phrag par spo bar byed pa ni/ dper na/ ston ka'i pad+ma skye bo'i tshogs
22b6(mdo sde): chen po'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong bas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de lag pa nas lag par brgyud par byed pa bzhin te snga ma bzhin no/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'
22b7(mdo sde): bltams pa'i mod nas spyan mi 'dzum par gzugs rnams la lta ste/ de spyan mi 'dzum pa ni/ dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams bzhin no/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems
23a1(mdo sde): dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lha'i spyan des de nyin dang / mtshan du dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu
23a2(mdo sde): gzigs so/ /las bcas las byung dri med spyan gyis ni/ /gzugs chen po dang de bzhin phra rab rnams/ /nyin dang mtshan du khor yug dpag tshad gcig /mdun na gnas pa
23a3(mdo sde): bzhin du'ang gzigs par 'gyur/ /chos nyid kyi byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas gsung snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / gsung snyan pa dang / gsung yid du 'ong ba
23a4(mdo sde): yin te/ dper na/ gangs can gyi bya skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad snyan pa dang / yid du 'ong ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas gsung snyan
23a5(mdo sde): cing 'jebs pa dang / gsung snyan pa dang / gsung yid du 'ong ba yin no/ /ri bo kun 'dzin la drang srong nyon mongs med ces bya ba mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ byams
23a6(mdo sde): pa'i bdag nyid can snying rje dang ldan pa/ skye dgu la mnyes gshin pa zhig gnas te/ de la tsha bo mis byin zhes bya ba yod pa dang / de de'i tshe phug tu zhugs te bsam gtan byed
23a7(mdo sde): pa na byang chub sems dpa' bltams te/ 'jig rten thams cad snang ba rgya chen po gsal bar gyur pa'i snang ba de mthong ba dang / nyon mongs med la smras pa/ mkhan po 'dir
23b1(mdo sde): ni nyi ma thams cad dag / gcig car byung bar gyur tam ci/ /'di ltar ri ni phug bcas pa/ /'di ni 'od kyis gsal bar gyur/ /nyon mongs med kyis de la smras pa/ nyi ma'i 'od ni
23b2(mdo sde): rgyun du rno/ /bu gcig snang ba 'di dag ni/ /yan lag reg na 'od gsal bas/ /nges par thub pa de yi 'od/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od can ni/ /nges par lhums nas bltams
23b3(mdo sde): gyur la/ /bltams nas sems dpa' chen po de'i/ /'od zer gser dang 'dra ba ni/ /dri ma med pa 'di dag gis/ /'jig rten gsum ni snang byas yin/ /mis byin gyis smras pa/ mkhan
23b4(mdo sde): po bzhud/ ci re zhig 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ram/ 'on te bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs par 'gyur ba rang nyid kyis blta bar mdzod cig /drang srong nyon mongs med
23b5(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/ de ltar na ni rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim nyi 'og gi rgyal po dang / mkhar gyi rgyal po dang / tshong ba dang / tshong dpon dang / ded dpon rnams dang / bram ze dang / khyim
23b6(mdo sde): bdag brgya stong dpag tu med pas kun tu khyab nas 'dug gi/ gang gi tshe de dben par gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'gro bar bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di
23b7(mdo sde): snyam du/ kye ma'o/ /drang srong nyon mongs med rkang gis ser skya'i gzhir 'ongs na ci ma rung snyam du sems so/ /de nas drang srong nyon mongs med steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par
24a1(mdo sde): 'phags nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i pho brang sgor phyin pa dang / ji tsam na sgo srung gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma la/ lha/ dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/ drang
24a2(mdo sde): srong nyon mongs med 'dir mchis so zhes rig par byas pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang mas thos te dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / mchog tu rangs pa byung nas
24a3(mdo sde): mchog tu gus pas mchod de 'di skad ces smras so/ /drang srong chen po/ legs par 'ongs so/ /dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs/ nyon mongs med kyis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po
24a4(mdo sde): bdag ni 'dir/ /khyed sras blta ba'i phyir mchis te/ /'jig rten gtso bo rnam 'dren pa/ /thub pa de ni mthong bar 'tshal/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na ni gzhon nu
24a5(mdo sde): gnyid log gi sang kyi bar du re zhig sdod cig / nyon mongs med kyis smras pa/ rigs dang ldan pa'i rta rnams ni/ /mtshan mo'i bzhi cha nyal ba ltar/ /dgos pa don gnyer
24a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi gnyid/ /mig la yun ring mi gnas so/ /de nas gzhon nu shAkya thub pa ma ma'i par na 'dug pa drang srong nyon mongs med la byin pa dang / drang srong nyon mongs med
24a7(mdo sde): kyis lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas yud tsam brtags te smras pa/ lha/ gzhon nu 'di mtshan mkhan rnams kyis ji skad lung bstan/ rgyal po zas gtsang mas smras pa/ rin
24b1(mdo sde): po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/ /de nas drang srong nyon mongs med kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
24b2(mdo sde): sa bdag rtog pa po rnams blo 'khrul te/ /rtsod pa'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur mi 'byung / /bsod nams mchog gis chos kyi mdzod 'di ni/ /nyes las rnam par rgyal nas sangs rgyas
24b3(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /mtshan mi gsal dang ldan na mi dbang po/ /gling bzhi rnams kyi bdag po dbang phyug 'gyur/ /thub dbang mtshan ni shin tu gsal bas na/ /mi mchog sangs rgyas chos kyi
24b4(mdo sde): 'khor los bsgyur/ /de nas drang srong nyon mongs med kyis bdag nyid kyi tshe'i mtha'i nges pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par byang chub pa brtag pa la zhugs pa dang / byang chub
24b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' lo nyi shu rtsa dgu bzhes nas/ khab nas byung nas lo drug tu dka' ba spyod par 'gyur te de nas bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur bar mthong ngo / /bdag ni bar skabs der
24b6(mdo sde): 'chi ba'i dus byed par mthong nas de mig mchi mas gang ste 'dug pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas dngangs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ skyes bu bud med rnams kyis
24b7(mdo sde): mthong ba na/ /ngoms par mi 'gyur dga' ba thob 'gyur ba/ /lus bzang dge byed da ni 'dir mthong nas/ /drang srong chen po ci slad du bzhin gyur/ /gang las bdag gi gzhon nu
25a1(mdo sde): 'jigs pa'am/ /tshe zad 'gyur ba nye bar mi gnas grang / /de ni myur du legs par bdag la smos/ /khyod kyi mchi mas bdag ni 'dar bar gyur/ /drang
25a2(mdo sde): srong nyon mongs med kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gal te 'di yi steng du nam mkha' las/ /rdo rje ser drag 'phangs pa bab gyur kyang / /thub pa chen po'i sku la ba spu ni/ /
25a3(mdo sde): nyag ma gcig kyang g.yos par mi nus so/ /me chen rlung gi shugs kyis bdas pa dang / /mtshon cha rnon po shin tu mi bzad dang / /drag po'i dug dang sbrul gyi dug non yang / /
25a4(mdo sde): gzhon nu la bab skad cig 'jigs mi 'gyur/ /thugs rje nyid la gnas gyur gang lags pa/ /'jigs pas nyen pa rnams la mi 'jigs stsol/ /de ni 'jig rten kun gyi
25a5(mdo sde): 'jigs 'joms na/ /mi dbang 'di la 'jigs pa ga la 'byung / /'jig rten na ni bdag nyid che rnams kyi/ /gtsor gyur bdag nyid chen po gang zhig la/ /tshangs bcas lha
25a6(mdo sde): yang rtag tu srung byed pa/ /mi dbang de la 'jigs pa ga la 'byung / /mi dbang bdag gi rgud pa mthong nas ni/ /gang phyir zhi ba mi 'thob par du mod/ /chos kyi mchog mdzod 'di
25a7(mdo sde): dang phrad nas ni/ /don ma thob par bdag ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang dag smra ba dam pa mtshungs med pa/ /'di yi chos thos 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang / /rab tu zhi ba'i pha rol
25b1(mdo sde): 'gro de dag / skyed cing bsod nams ldan la rims nad bral/ /de nas drang srong nyon mongs med byang chub sems dpa' la reg pa'i mthus de'i rdzu 'phrul nyams so/ /nyams pa dang
25b2(mdo sde): nyon mongs med kyis smras pa/ rkang kho nas grong khyer nas phyir 'byung bar bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas thos pa dang / grong khyer thams cad rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo
25b3(mdo sde): rnams bsal nas spos dang / phye mas khyab par byed du bcug go /de nas drang srong nyon mongs med 'byor pa chen pos grong khyer nas byung ste/ rim gyis ri bo kun 'dzin du phyin pa dang /
25b4(mdo sde): mi sbyin la smras pa/ ngas gzhon nu mthong ste/ bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs par 'gyur na ngas ni de slob par mi 'gyur te/ nga ni bar skabs su dus byed par 'gyur gyi khyod ni de'i thad
25b5(mdo sde): du rab tu byung la/ nga rgyal dang / dregs pa nges par bcom par gyur pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa la spyad par bya ste/ rigs kyis dregs par mi bya/ rus kyis dregs par mi bya/
25b6(mdo sde): rigs rgyud kyis dregs par mi bya ste/ khyod kyis kyang yun ring po mi thogs par bdud rtsi 'thob par 'gyur gyi zhes smras nas yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs
25b7(mdo sde): pa tshol 'dod na/ /shar phyogs su ni khyod 'dug dang / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa/ /rnyed par dka' ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po
26a1(mdo sde): zas gtsang mas gzhon nu ma ma'i pang na 'dug pa la yang dang / yang du lta zhing nga'i bu ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni sa'i steng na su la'ang med do snyam du sems shing shin
26a2(mdo sde): tu dga' bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khrungs nas ring por ma lon par ma ma'i pang du bzhugs nas/ gser gyi gzhong bar 'bras dang / shar bsres pa'i chan
26a3(mdo sde): gsol ba na de ma mas bkag kyang ma thub par mang por gsol nas dbrog par brtsams pa dang / dbrog ma nus nas des rgyal po zas gtsang la sbran pa dang / rgyal po btsun
26a4(mdo sde): mo dang lhan cig gis dbrog par brtsams pa dang des kyang ma nus so/ /de nas rgyal po blon po rnams dang ser skya na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams la bsgo na de rnams kyis
26a5(mdo sde): kyang dbrog par ma nus so/ /de nas glang po che lnga brgya la btags pa dang / byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/ 'di rnams kyis bdag gi stobs nyams na mi rung gi /ma la
26a6(mdo sde): bdag gis mdzub mo bkug pas gser gyi gzhong pa nas bzung ngo snyam nas des mdzub mo bkug pas gser gyi gzhong pa bzung nas drangs pa dang / glang po che lnga brgya po de
26a7(mdo sde): dag kha phyir bsgyur te drangs nas de dag gis kyang gser gyi gzhong pa dbrog par ma nus so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsams pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lag pa
26b1(mdo sde): g.yon pas glang po che lnga brgya drangs pa dang sbyar na gdon mi za bar lag pa gnyis kyis ni glang po che stong thub kyi/ de bas na gzhon nu'i ming glang po che stong gi stobs can zhes gdags
26b2(mdo sde): so zhes btags so/ /grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel zhes bya ba zhig gnyug mar gnas so/ /shAkya rnams kyis kun tu spyod pa ni shAkya su'ang rung ba la khye'u 'am
26b3(mdo sde): bu mo btsas pa gang yin pa de gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du gzhug pa'i phyir 'khrid pa yin pas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag/ dengs la
26b4(mdo sde): gzhon nu gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du chug cig / de nas byang chub sems dpa' glang po che la bskyon te dpung gi tshogs dpag tu med pas yongs su bskor
26b5(mdo sde): te grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir 'jug par brtsams pa dang / grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi sgra bcu gnyis dang bral bar gyur cing byang chub sems dpa' de nang du zhugs pa na thub pa bzhin
26b6(mdo sde): du gnas par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas bsams pa/ grong khyer 'di 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i sgra dang / rta'i sgra dang / shing rta'i sgra dang / dpung bu chung gi sgra dang / dung
26b7(mdo sde): gi sgra dang / rnga bo che'i sgra dang / be de'i sgra dang / rwa dung gi sgra dang / gar gyi sgra dang / glu'i sgra dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sbyin pa ni byin/ bsod nams ni gyis/ bsnyen gnas la ni
27a1(mdo sde): nye bar gnas/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te mnos shig ces bya ba'i sgra ste sgra bcu gnyis dang bral zhing gzhon nu de nang du zhugs pa ni thub pa bzhin
27a2(mdo sde): du zhi bar gnas pas gzhon nu'i ming shAkya thub pa zhes gdags so zhes byang chub sems dpa'i ming shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar btags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gnod
27a3(mdo sde): sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi gan du khyer ba dang / gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyis byang chub sems dpa' gnas dang nye bar phyin pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang phyir byung nas lus thams
27a4(mdo sde): cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te phyag byas so/ /de mthong ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang mas smras pa/ lhas kyang rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pas 'di
27a5(mdo sde): ni lha'i yang lha yin pas gzhon nu'i ming lha'i yang lha zhes bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa'i ming lha'i yang lha zhes bya bar btags so/ /de nas de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang gis
27a6(mdo sde): dgos pa'i ched la 'dug nas don zab mo'i tshig dang / yi ge dag shes rab kyis so sor 'byed par byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa 'khor lnga brgya dang / yi
27a7(mdo sde): ge'i slob dpon srin bu go cha la yi ge slob par btang nas yi ge'i slob dpon srin bu go chas byang chub sems dpa' la yi ger bris nas phog pa dang / byang chub sems dpas
27b1(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'di ni ngas shes so/ /de nas des yi ge gnyis dang / gsum nas de bzhin du lnga brgya'i bar bris nas phog pa dang / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di dag thams cad kyang
27b2(mdo sde): ngas shes kyi gzhan dag smros shig / srin bu go chas smras pa/ 'jig rten na ni yi ge 'di tsam spyod kyi gzhan ni bdag gis ma 'tshal to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis
27b3(mdo sde): yi ge bris te srin bu go cha la byin nas gsungs pa/ yi ge 'di ming ci yin smros shig /des smras pa/ ma 'tshal to/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ 'jig rten du gnyis
27b4(mdo sde): shig byung nas mngon par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'o/ /nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas smras pa/ srin bu go cha/ byang chub sems
27b5(mdo sde): dpas ji skad gsungs pa de de bzhin te/ yi ge 'di ni 'jig rten du gnyis shig byung na mngon par 'gyur te byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'o/ /
27b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas yi ge de tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis bklags la/ nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas dbang byas pas tshangs pa'i yi ge zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de
27b7(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i mthar phyin pa dang 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas par bzang len dang / lhar bcas zhes bya ba 'phong gi slob dpon gyi gan du 'phong gi gnas su
28a1(mdo sde): gtad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gnas lnga po rgyang nas phog pa dang / sgra grag par phog pa dang / gnad du phog pa dang / mi 'chor bar phog pa
28a2(mdo sde): dang | tshabs che ba la byang bar gyur to/ /de nas bzang len dang / lhar bcas 'di snyam du sems te byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni snying rje can yin pas bslab par bya ba thams
28a3(mdo sde): cad bslab kyi/ lha sbyin 'di ni gdug pa yin pas 'jig rten thams cad du gnod par 'gyur na mi rung gi 'di la gnad du bsnun par bslab par mi bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas dus
28a4(mdo sde): gzhan zhig na lha sbyin gyis ngang pa lcags mdas bsnun pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi la bzhugs pa de'i pang bar de lhung ngo / /de nas byang chub
28a5(mdo sde): sems dpas bzung nas mda' phyung ste sman gyis byugs pas sos so/ /lha sbyin gyis smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ngang pa 'di ni ngas yongs su bzung ba yin gyi bskur cig/
28a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ ngas ches sngar yongs su bzung ste/ gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de kho na'i tshe yongs su
28a7(mdo sde): bzung ngo / /der byang chub sems dpa' la lha sbyin gnod sems dang / bzod pa ma yin pa dang / phebs pa ma yin pa byung bar gyur to/ /de nas lha sbyin la sogs pa
28b1(mdo sde): shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya byung ba dang / lha sbyin gyis ras kyis bcings nas shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya bsgyel to/ /ci tsam na byang chub sems dpa' phyogs der bzhud pa dang / lha
28b2(mdo sde): sbyin gyis smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ci la sdod/ byang chub sems dpas kyang ras bcings te shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya bsgyel to/ /de nas lha sbyin ras kyis bcings pa dang
28b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas kyang bzung ste rkang ba gyen du bstan nas gan rgyal du bsgyel ba dang / der yang byang chub sems dpa' la lha sbyin gnod sems dang / mi bzod pa dang / bag mi
28b4(mdo sde): phebs pa'i sems gnyis pa bskyed par gyur to/ /de nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya mda' gzhu thogs te phyi rol tu byung nas ta la la tshabs byed pa la zhugs pa dang / la las ni ta la
28b5(mdo sde): gcig phigs so/ /la las ni gnyis so/ /lha sbyin gyis ni gsum mo/ /byang chub sems dpas lcags mda' 'phangs pa dang / shing ta la bdun phigs pa las ji srid rlung gis bskyod
28b6(mdo sde): de thams cad 'gyel ba'i bar du rgya cher sbyar ro/ /de nas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyis 'bab chu ro hi ta ka'i 'gram na shing dge ba'i snying po zhes bya ba nyi ma gcig cing khru brgyar skye ba
28b7(mdo sde): mtshan mo ni sen mos kyang gcad du rung la nyin par ni mtshon gyis kyang gcad par mi nus ba zhig yod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma pa'i lha rnams kyis gang gis shing dge ba'i
29a1(mdo sde): snying po rtsa ba steng du bton nas ro hi ta ka'i nang du bcug pa de lta bu'i rlung dang char drag cig sprul to/ /de rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / legs par rab sang
29a2(mdo sde): kyis thos nas shing 'dir grong khyer brlag par ma gyur tam snyam nas srog chags brgya stong dpag tu med pa dang / shing dge ba'i snying po gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
29a3(mdo sde): 'khor brgya stong dpag tu med pas drangs su zin kyang ci tsam du bskyod par yang ma nus so/ /'char kas smras pa/ lha| byang chub sems dpa' sbron cig /rgyal pos smras pa/
29a4(mdo sde): kho bos gzhon nu la bka' stsol bar mi nus so/ /'char kas smras pa/ khyed rnams kyis ca co'i sgra gsang mthon po sgrogs shig /ci nas kyang ngas byang chub sems dpa'
29a5(mdo sde): gshegs par bya'o/ /de nas skye bo'i tshogs de rnams kyis sgra gsang mthon po dang chen pos ca co'i sgra bsgrags so/ /'char ka byang chub sems dpa'i thad du song ba
29a6(mdo sde): dang | byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'char ka /ca co'i sgra 'di ci zhig yin/ 'char kas rnam pa de dag rgya cher gsol to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas gsungs
29a7(mdo sde): pa| gal te de ltar na 'byin du 'dong / de nas 'char ka dang / byang chub sems dpa' chas pa dang / ci tsam na khung nas sprul gdug pa zhig byung ngo / /'char kas byang chub
29b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' zin par gyur du 'ong ngo zhes ral gri rnon pos rked pa bcad pa dang / sbrul gyi dug gi dbugs kyis 'char ka la phog ste de nag por gyur nas de'i ming yang 'char ka
29b2(mdo sde): nag po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing dge ba'i snying po gang na ba der bzhud de phyin pa dang / lha sbyin la gsungs pa/ khyod kyi stobs ci tsam pa blta yis
29b3(mdo sde): bskyod cig / lha sbyin gyis 'bad de cung zad cig bskul to/ /dga' bos ni cung zad drangs so/ /ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' stobs kyi nyams sad par mdzad cing shing dge ba'i
29b4(mdo sde): snying po phyag gis blangs te 'bab chu ro hi ta ka'i 'gram nas 'phangs te byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ shes ldan dag /shing dge ba'i snying po 'di ni bsil ba'i rang bzhin
29b5(mdo sde): yin pas mkhris pa'i nad dang / shu ba dang / phol mig byung ba la phyugs na zhi bar 'gyur gyi dum bur byos la khyer te rang rang gi khyim du zhog cig /yang yangs pa can du
29b6(mdo sde): glang po che rin po che zhig skyes pa dang / de nas yangs pa can gyi li tsa bI rnams kyis glang po che mtshan dang ldan pa zhig rnyed nas de rnams kyis bsams pa/ rgyal po zas
29b7(mdo sde): gtsang gi sras mtshan mkhan rnams kyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i mthus glang po che rin po che 'di byung gi / dong la de kho na la dbul
30a1(mdo sde): lo snyam mo/ /de rnams kyis glang po che de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas khrid de dong ba las rim gyis ser skya'i gzhir rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor glang po che'i
30a2(mdo sde): dam pa bzhag nas sdod pa dang / ma stes te gdug pa'i las can lha sbyin phyir byung ba des glang po che'i dam pa de de ltar rgyan gyis brgyan par mthong nas de des phrag dog chen po skyes
30a3(mdo sde): te| de phrag dog dang mi bzod pa skyes pas dris pa/ glang po che'i dam pa 'di su'i yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu shAkya thub pa mtshan mkhan rnams kyis 'khor los
30a4(mdo sde): bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung bstan pa de la yangs pa can gyi tshogs rnams kyis glang po rin po che 'di skyes su phul lo/ /lha sbyin lhag par mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ re zhig
30a5(mdo sde): de 'khor los bsgyur bar ma gyur par je khyed cag glang po rin po che 'bul lam zhes smras nas thal lcag gis glang po che bsad do/ /ji tsam na phyogs der dga' bo 'ongs pa
30a6(mdo sde): des de mthong nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag /glang po che bzang po 'di sus bsad/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha sbyin gyis so/ /des bsams pa/ gdon mi za bar 'di la lha
30a7(mdo sde): sbyin gyi mthu sad kyi/ ma la/ bdag gis kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o snyam nas mjug ma nas bzung ste goms pa bdun du bor ro/ /ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' shAkya
30b1(mdo sde): thub pa phyir byung ba des de gzigs nas dris pa/ glang po che 'di gang nas 'ongs/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras so/ /sus bsad/ lha sbyin gyis so/ /mgron rnams la mgron gyi
30b2(mdo sde): mchod pa bya ba yin na ma legs pa zhig byas so/ /phyogs gang du bsad/ pha gir ro/ /'dir sus drud/ dga' bos so/ /des dgongs pa/ 'dir gdon mi za bar de gnyis kyis
30b3(mdo sde): 'di la mthu sad kyi/ ma la/ ngas kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas mjug ma nas bzung ste ra ba'i khar 'phangs pa las ra ba rim pa bdun dang / 'obs rim pa
30b4(mdo sde): bdun las 'das te bor ro/ /de lhung bas gshong btod pa glang po che'i bshong / glang po che'i gshong zhes bya bar gyur to/ /'dir smras pa/ lha sbyin gyis ni glang chen dbang po bsad/ /
30b5(mdo sde): dga' bos de ni gom pa bdun du drud/ /byang chub sems dpas phyag gis bar snang la/ /rdo ba bzhin du phyi rol rgyang ring 'phangs/ /mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ gal
30b6(mdo sde): te gzhon nu lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du rab tu ma byung na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la/ bdag gis 'di la
30b7(mdo sde): ' dod pa'i yon tan lnga phal po che byin na de ltar na ni de rnams la dga' bas rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro snyam nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du gos
31a1(mdo sde): dang | rgyan gyi phung po bzhag nas smras pa/ deng khyed kyis shAkya'i bu mo rnams la rgyan dang / gos rnams byin cig /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis ser skya'i grong
31a2(mdo sde): khyer du deng gzhon nu gos dang / rgyan rnams ster bar 'gyur gyi/ shAkya'i bu mo thams cad shog cig ces dril sgrog tu bcug go /de nas shAkya'i gzhon nu ma lnga brgya 'ongs pa dang /
31a3(mdo sde): thams cad la byang chub sems dpas gos dang / rgyan rnams byin no/ /de nas shAkya dbyig pa can la grags 'dzin ma zhes bya ba'i bu mo yod pa dag /des de la smras pa/ khyed la
31a4(mdo sde): yang gzhon nu gos dang / rgyan rnams ster bar 'gyur gyi song / de nas grags 'dzin ma/ ci/ bdag la byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan su zhig khyor 'gyur snyam du bsams nas
31a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i thad du song ba dang / ci tsam na gos dang / rgyan thams cad byin zin nas ci'ang ma lus pa dang / des byang chub sems dpa'i mgul na shin tu mdzes shing
31a6(mdo sde): r in che ba'i mu tig phreng gcig lus pa mthong nas de de la dga' bas bag 'khum pa med par rang nyid kyis bkrol te rang gi mgul du btags nas byang chub sems dpa'i
31a7(mdo sde): thad nas song ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te bu mo 'di phebs shing brtan pa las na 'dis gzhon nu'i thugs dang bstun par nus kyi 'di blang bar bya'o
31b1(mdo sde): snyam du bsams nas/ grags 'dzin ma bud med kyi 'khor nyi khri dang byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mor blangs so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ song las
31b2(mdo sde): kyi mtha' ci tsam pa la ltos shig / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po zas gtsang mas bsgo ba gsan te shing rta bzang po la zhugs nas phyi rol tu gshegs te/ yab rgyal po zas
31b3(mdo sde): gtsang ma'i las kyi mtha' gzigs shing byang chub sems dpa' las kyi mtha' la zhugs pa rnams kyi gan du byon pa dang / bshol lnga brgya dang / zhing rmed cing zhing pa'i mi de rnams kyis
31b4(mdo sde): kyang gshol gnon cing 'dren pas stobs nye bar nyams pa mgo lus rdul gyis yog pa dang / rlung dang / than pas lus la gdungs pas lus rtsub cing mdog ngan pa/ rkang pa dang /
31b5(mdo sde): lag pa gas pa dang / dengs shing dri ma can gyi gos gyon pa/ rkang pa dri ma can/ ltogs pa dang / skom pas mdog ngan zhing / lkog ma dang / mkhur ba dang / mig gi logs skams
31b6(mdo sde): ba dang / glang de rnams kyang rmon pa lcags gzer rnon po can gyis lus bral bas rgyab dang / mjug ngo'i phyogs khrag gis yog pa/ ltogs pa dang / skom pas dbugs brtsegs
31b7(mdo sde): shing snying ga'i phyogs nas dbugs brtsegs pa ring du 'dren la/ gnya' shing gis mnan pa'i rma las rnag khrag 'dzag pa la sbrang bu dang / 'bu'i tshogs kyis za ba/ thong lcags
32a1(mdo sde): kyis rkang pa la rma byung zhing / kha dang / sna nas kha chu dang / sna chu 'dzag pa la sbrang ma dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu mchu ring gis yog pa rnams gzigs so/ /
32a2(mdo sde): gzigs nas kyang thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsod nams bskyed cing bsags pa'i thugs rjes kun nas bskyod pa'i thugs kyis zhing pa rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /
32a3(mdo sde): shes ldan dag /khyed su'i yin/ de rnams kyis gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lags so/ /des gsungs pa/ shes ldan dag/ khyed deng phan chad bran du mi bya/ mngag gzhug
32a4(mdo sde): par mi bya/ rang dbang can gar dga' bar 'gro bar byas/ bde ba la reg par gnas shig /rmon pa rnams kyang bkrol nas gsungs pa/ khyed cag kyang deng phan chad rtswa mchog
32a5(mdo sde): ma nyams pa za zhing chu ma rdul ma brnyogs shing dang ba dag la 'thungs shig / khyed la phyogs bzhi nas kyang rlung bsil ba ldang bar gyur cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
32a6(mdo sde): y id byung ba de nyid kyis yab shAkya zas gtsang gi zhing slas kyi mtha' la gzigs nas snum zhing sngo la 'dab ma mthug cing grib ma bzang po dang ldan pa'i dzam+bu'i shing gi
32a7(mdo sde): grib ma gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas shing dzam+bu'i grib ma la bzhugs te/ 'dod pa las dpen pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas
32b1(mdo sde): dpyod pa dang bcas shing dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba zag pa med pa dang 'dra ba'i bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs so/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'ang byang chub
32b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' spangs te mi 'gro bar shing gzhan rnams kyi drung na sdod do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ring zhig thogs te 'di ltar dro'i dus las
32b3(mdo sde): yol gyi bltar 'gro'o zhes de shing rtar zhugs nas zhing pa'i grong du song ste phan tshun du byang chub sems dpa' tshol zhing shing dzam+bu'i drung du phyin to/ /de'i tshe nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing
32b4(mdo sde): gzhan rnams kyi grib ma shar phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab/ shar phyogs su bab par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mthus shing dzam+bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems
