32b5(mdo sde): dpa'i sku mi gtong ngo / /rgyal po zas gtsang gis nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni shar phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab/ shar phyogs su bab
32b6(mdo sde): par gyur na/ shing dzam+bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/
32b7(mdo sde): 'di ltar du nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni shar phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab/ shar phyogs su bab par gyur na/ shing dzam+bu'i grib ma ni
33a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ba ngo mtshar che'o snyam mo/ /de nas dga' ba'i bsti stang byas te byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas
33a2(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ji ltar bltams tshe sa ni g.yos pa ltar/ /dzam+bu'i grib ma khyod sku mi gtong ba/ /blo chen khyod kyi ya mtshan gnyis 'di ste/ /kun gzigs khyod kyi zhabs
33a3(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas shing rtar zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na gter skyong ba skra dang / kha spu dang / sen mo ring ba
33a4(mdo sde): gter thogs te byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha/ gter 'di rnams bzhes shig/ byang chub
33a5(mdo sde): sems dpas gsungs pa/ 'di gang gi/ lha/ skyes bu gang zhig dus las 'das pa de rnams kyi lags so/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ 'di rnams kyis chog
33a6(mdo sde): gi| re zhig de rnams kyi blun po yongs su gzung ba byas nas ci zhig byas/ khyed nga la dgos pa med kyis song zhig/ tshigs su bcad pas kyang gsungs pa/ gang gis nga la
33a7(mdo sde): 'chi ba'i gtam smras pa/ /de dag kyang shi gtam du gyur pa yin/ /bdag kyang shi nas ring por mi thogs par/ /gzhan dag gi yang gtam du 'gyur bar 'ong / /de rnams kyis
33b1(mdo sde): yang sgra phyung ba/ gzhon nu/ gal te mi bzhes na bdag cag rgya mtsho chen por 'jug go /byang chub sems dpas ci bde bar zhugs shig ces gsungs pa dang / de rnams rgya mtsho chen
33b2(mdo sde): po'i nang du zhugs so/ /de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rgyu'i stobs can yin mod kyi 'on kyang rkyen bsgrub par bya
33b3(mdo sde): dgos te/ 'di ltar rgyu'i stobs chen po'ang rkyen gyi stobs la ltos so/ /snyam nas byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod kyi nang nas gshegs pa na/ lha rnams kyis mi ro rnam par sngos
33b4(mdo sde): pa dang / rnam par rnags pa dang / rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa dang / rnam par bam pa dang / rnam par zos pa zhig bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpas gzigs nas skyo ba
33b5(mdo sde): 'khrungs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' lam gzhan nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir 'jug par byas so/ /de nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi'i bud med
33b6(mdo sde): kyi tshogs skar khung dang / skar khung dra ba can dang / ba gam dag na byang chub sems dpa' la lta zhing 'dug pa dang / shAkya dus legs kyi bu mo sa 'tsho ma zhes bya ba steng gi khang bzang
33b7(mdo sde): gzhi la 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' la rtog pa na rkang pa'i mthe bos sa la brkos te khrag byung yang mtshor ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang sa 'tsho ma la gzigs pa na phyag
34a1(mdo sde): g.yas kyis mda' phye mar brlags so/ /kha lo pas lcags mda' phul ba dang de yang phye mar brlags so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du
34a2(mdo sde): sems te/ 'dis ni gzhon nu'i thugs dang bstun par nus so snyam mo/ /de nas kha lo bsgyur bas shing rta drangs pa dang / shAkya dril bu sgra'i bu mo'i ri dwags skyes zhes bya bas
34a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' shing rtar zhugs te byon pa mthong ba dang / yang steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi la 'dug nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kye ma 'di yi yum bde zhing / /
34a4(mdo sde): yab kyang shin tu bde ba yin/ /kye ma gang gi khyim thab gyur/ /bud med de yang mya ngan 'das/ /skyes mchog bsam gtan pa de yis/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra gsan nas/ /mya
34a5(mdo sde): ngan 'das pa zhi nyid du/ /mkhyen nas de la thugs dgyes gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra gsan pas ri dwags skyes la dgyes te mgul
34a6(mdo sde): nas mu tig phreng cig phog ste/ 'phangs nas shing rta de la bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs par mdzad do/ /phreng ba de'ang de'i mgul du 'khris par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal
34a7(mdo sde): po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa'i thugs dang bstun par nus so snyam nas sa 'tsho ma bud med nyi khris skor ba dang / ri dwags skyes kyang
34b1(mdo sde): bud med nyi khris skor ba byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mor blangs so/ /de ltar na grags 'dzin ma dang / sa 'tsho ma dang / ri dwags skyes la sogs pa btsun mo stong phrag drug cu byung
34b2(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ /mtshan mkhan rnams kyis gal te byang chub sems dpa' lo bdun gyi bar du rab tu ma byung na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /de
34b3(mdo sde): nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal po che zhig sbyin par bya'o snyam nas phal po che
34b4(mdo sde): byin no/ /mtshan mkhan gyis gal te byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bdun gyi bar du rab tu ma byung na gdon mi za bar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan
34b5(mdo sde): to| |de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga shin tu 'ang mang du byin te/ 'di ltar yang 'di la mngon par dga' bas rab tu 'byung
34b6(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe kha lo sgyur ba la/ kye| kha lo sgyur ba/ re
34b7(mdo sde): zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur bar shoms shig dang / der zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o zhes gsung par 'gyur bas/ de nas byang chub sems dpas kha
35a1(mdo sde): lo sgyur ba la bsgo ba/ kye/ kha lo sgyur ba/ re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang / der zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o/ /lha/
35a2(mdo sde): bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas bzhon pa bzang po myur du bshams te byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa ga na
35a3(mdo sde): ba der song nas phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha/ bcibs pa bzang po bshams lags kyi/ lha/ da de'i dus la bab par
35a4(mdo sde): dgongs su gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bzhon pa bzang por zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas
35a5(mdo sde): mi rgas 'khogs gtugs pa/ sgur po phyam dgu po ltar kyar kyor can mdun nas 'khar ba la brten cing lus 'dar zhing 'gro ba de'i skra se ba/ ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang
35a6(mdo sde): mi 'dra ba zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kha lo sgyur ba/ mi rgas 'khogs gtugs pa/ sgur po phyam dgu po ltar kyar kyor can
35a7(mdo sde): mdun nas 'khar ba la brten cing lus 'dar zhing 'gro ba de'i skra se ba/ ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba 'di ci yin/ lha/ mi 'di ni rgas pa zhes bgyi'o/ /kha lo sgyur
35b1(mdo sde): ba| rgas pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ lha/ mi 'di ring por mi thogs pa kho nar 'gum par 'gyur bas de rgas pa zhes bgyi'o/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ nga'ang rga ba'i chos dang / rga ba'i chos nyid
35b2(mdo sde): las ma 'das sam/ lha'ang rga ba'i chos dang / rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig/ pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo / /'di ltar nga pho brang du phyin
35b3(mdo sde): nas nga rga ba las ma 'das so zhes grags pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/ /kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir bsgyur nas pho brang nyid du chas te der byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa
35b4(mdo sde): pho brang gi nang du byon nas de'ang rgas pa las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/ /'dir smras pa/ dar yol rgas shing sgur la mgo skya ba/ /lag na
35b5(mdo sde): 'khar ba thogs pa'i mi gzigs nas/ /'di bdag rgas las ma 'das zhes grag ces/ /de nas mi dgyes thugs ngan dgongs par mdzad/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis kha lo
35b6(mdo sde): sgyur ba la smras pa/ kha lo sgyur ba/ ci gzhon nu yid dga' ba dang / mgu bas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ngam/ skyed mos tshal la mngon par dga' ba'am/ lha/ ma lags so/ /
35b7(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ lha/ gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshags pa ni/ mi rgas 'khogs gtugs pa sgur po phyam dgu po ltar kyar kyor can mdun nas 'khar ba la brten
36a1(mdo sde): cing lus 'dar zhing mchi la/ des skra se ba ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang bdag la 'di skad ces bka'
36a2(mdo sde): stsal to/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ mi rgas 'khogs gtugs pa sgur po phyam dgu po ltar kyar kyor can mdun nas 'khar ba la brten cing lus 'dar zhing 'gro la/ de'i skra se ba/ ji ltar
36a3(mdo sde): yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba 'di ci yin/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha/ 'di ni rgas pa zhes bgyi'o/ /des 'di skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba/
36a4(mdo sde): rgas pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha/ mi 'di ring po mi thogs pa kho nar 'gum par 'gyur bas/ lha/ de ni rgas pa zhes bgyi'o/
36a5(mdo sde): nges 'di skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba/ nga yang rga ba'i chos dang / rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha'ang rga ba'i
36a6(mdo sde): chos dang / rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so/ /des 'di skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba/ de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig /pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo / /'di ltar pho
36a7(mdo sde): brang du phyin nas nga rga ba las ma 'das so zhes grags pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/ /lha/ gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang du gshegs te/ de nas rga ba las ma 'das pa lta
36b1(mdo sde): zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze de rnams kyi tshig yang dag par
36b2(mdo sde): bden par mi 'gyur grang / gzhon nu skra dang kha spu bregs te gos dur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar 'gyur du 'ong gi/ ma la/
36b3(mdo sde): bdag gis gzhon nu la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal po che zhig byin la ci nas kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang
36b4(mdo sde): gis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal po che byin te ci nas kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar byas so/ /'dir smras pa/ kha
36b5(mdo sde): lo sgyur ba'i tshig de thos pa dang / /gzhon nu la ni yab de dogs bzhin du/ /de tshe slar dga' nags su mi 'gro'i phyir/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lngar bcas mang du byin/ /de nas chos
36b6(mdo sde): nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs par bzhed pa gyur pa de'i tshe kha lo sgyur ba la/ kye/ kha lo sgyur ba/ re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms
36b7(mdo sde): shig dang / de la nga gzhon nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o zhes gsungs par 'gyur bas/ de nas byang chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kye/ kha lo sgyur ba/
37a1(mdo sde): re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig /de la nga bzhon nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs so/ /lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes kha
37a2(mdo sde): lo sgyur bas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas bzhon pa bzang po bshams te/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gang na bder song ste phyin nas byang
37a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha/ bcibs pa bzang po bshams lags na/ lha/ /de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas byang chub
37a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bzhon pa bzang por zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas mi skya bo rbab rbab po rid pa nyam chung ba
37a5(mdo sde): dbang po nyams pa/ skye bo mang po'i mig gis lta mi phod pa zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kha lo sgyur ba/ mi skya bo rbab rbab po rid pa
37a6(mdo sde): nyam chung ba dbang po nyams pa/ skye bo mang po'i mig gis lta mi phod pa 'di ci yin/ lha/ 'di ni bro nad kyis thebs pa zhes bgyi'o/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ nad kyis thebs pa
37a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ lha/ mi 'di gang gis 'gum par 'gyur ba'i gnas de mchis te/ lha/ 'di ni bros thebs ba zhes bgyi'o/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ nga'ang nad kyi chos
37b1(mdo sde): dang | nad kyi chos nyid las ma 'das sam/ lha'ang snyun gyi chos dang / snyun gyi chos nyid las ma 'das so/ kha lo sgyur ba/ de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig /pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo /
37b2(mdo sde): 'di ltar pho brang du phyin nas nga nad las ma 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/ /kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir bsgyur nas pho brang nyid du chas te/ der byang chub sems
37b3(mdo sde): dpa' shAkya thub pa pho brang gi nang du gshegs nas bdag kyang nad las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/ /'dir smras pa/ mi ni lus rid skya bo rbab rbab
37b4(mdo sde): po| |rang dbang med pa'i nad thebs 'dir gzigs nas/ /nad las bdag ma 'das pa lta zhig ces/ /de nas mi dgyes thugs ngan dgongs par mdzad/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang
37b5(mdo sde): gis kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa/ kha lo sgyur ba/ ci gzhon nu yid dga' ba dang / mthu bas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ngam skyed mos tshal la mngon par dga' bar gyur tam/
37b6(mdo sde): lha| ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ lha| gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba na/ mi skya bo rbab rbab po ring pa nyam chung ba dbang po nyams pa/ skye bo mang po'i
37b7(mdo sde): mig gis lta mi phod pa zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang bdag la bka' stsal pa/ kha lo sgyur ba/ mi skya bo rbab rbab pa rid pa nyam chung ba dbang po nyams pa/ skye bo
38a1(mdo sde): mang po'i mig gis lta mi phod pa 'di ci yin/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha/ 'di ni bro nad kyis thebs pa zhes bgyi'o/ /des 'di skad
38a2(mdo sde): ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba/ nad kyis thebs pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /mi 'di gang gnod pa 'dis 'gum pa'i gnas mchis
38a3(mdo sde): te| lha| de ni bros thebs pa zhes bgyi'o/ /des 'di skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba/ nga yang nad kyi chos dang / nad kyi chos nyid las ma 'das sam/ de la bdag gis
38a4(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha yang snyun gyi chos dang / snyun gyi chos nyid las ma 'das so/ /des 'di skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba/ de'i phyir shing rta phyir bsgyur
38a5(mdo sde): cig| pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo / /'di ltar nga pho brang nyid du phyin nas nga nad las ma 'das zhes grags pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/ /gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang du
38a6(mdo sde): gshegs nas nga'ang nad las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ mtshan mkhan dang /
38a7(mdo sde): ltas mkhan gyi bram ze de rnams kyi tshig yang dag par bden par mi 'gyur grang zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /'dir smras pa/ de tshe dga' nas bdag ngor mi
38b1(mdo sde): gzhug phyir/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro rnams dang / /reg bya yid du 'ong ba gtso rnams kyi/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po yang byin no/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'
38b2(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa skyed mos tshal gyis gzhir gshegs par bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe/ kha lo sgyur ba la bka' stsal pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub
38b3(mdo sde): pas ras kha dog sna tshogs las byas pa'i bla bre bres pa dang / khyogs khyer ba dang / mdun nas me sgron thogs pa dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po mdun nas 'gro ba dang / bud med skra
38b4(mdo sde): bshig pa rnams du zhing rjes bzhin du 'brang ba zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kha lo sgyur ba/ ras kha dog sna tshogs las byas pa'i bla bre
38b5(mdo sde): bres pa dang / khyogs khyer ba dang / mdun nas me sgron thogs pa dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po mdun nas 'gro ba dang / bud med skra bshig pa rnams du zhing rjes bzhin du
38b6(mdo sde): 'brang ba 'di ci yin/ lha/ 'di ni gum pa zhes bgyi'o/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ shi ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ lha/ mi 'dis slan chad sdug pa'i pha ma mi mthong zhing / bu pho dang / bu
38b7(mdo sde): mo dang / bran mo dang / las bgyid pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyang ma lags la de dag gis kyang slan chad 'di mi mthong bas/ lha/ 'di ni gum pa zhes bgyi'o/ /kha
39a1(mdo sde): lo sgyur ba/ nga'ang 'chi ba'i chos dang / 'chi ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/ lha'ang 'chi ba'i chos dang / 'chi ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so/ /kha lo
39a2(mdo sde): sgyur pa/ de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig /pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo / /'di ltar nga pho brang du phyin nas nga 'chi ba las ma 'das zhes grag pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/ /kha lo
39a3(mdo sde): s gyur bas shing rta phyir bsgyur nas pho brang nyid du chas te der byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa pho brang gi nang du gshegs nas bdag kyang 'chi ba las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces
39a4(mdo sde): mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/ /'dir smras pa/ tshe zad pa yis 'du shes bral gyur cing / /sems med mi yi ro zhig gzigs nas ni/ /'chi las bdag ma 'das pa
39a5(mdo sde): lta zhig ces/ /de nas mi dgyes thugs ngan dgongs par mdzad/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /'dir
39a6(mdo sde): smras pa/ grong khyer dam pa la dpal ldan yid 'ong der/ /lha yi lhar gyur sgron ma dang mtshungs pa/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga pos kun dgyes pa/ /mig stong dga' ba'i tshal
39a7(mdo sde): na gnas pa bzhin/ /de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni rgyu'i stobs can yin mod kyi 'on kyang rkyen bsgrub par
39b1(mdo sde): bya dgos te/ 'di ltar rgyu'i stobs chen po'ang rkyen gyi stobs la ltos so snyam nas/ de rnams kyis mi skra bregs shing gos ngur smrig gyon pa/ lag pa na lhung bzed thogs pa zhig byim
39b2(mdo sde): nas khyim dang / khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro ba zhig sprul to/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal gyis gzhir gshegs par bzhed par gyur pa zhes bya ba la
39b3(mdo sde): sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas mi skra bregs shing gos ngur smrig gyon pa lag pa na lhung bzed thogs pa
39b4(mdo sde): zhig khyim nas khyim dang / khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro ba zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kha lo sgyur ba/ mi skra bregs shing lag pa na
39b5(mdo sde): lhung bzed thogs nas khyim nas khyim dang / khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro ba 'di'i gos kyang kha dog mi mtshungs te/ ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag gi dang mi 'dra ba ci yin/ lha/ de ni
39b6(mdo sde): rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi'o/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ lha/ rab tu byung ba de ni dul ba legs pa dang / yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang / don spyod pa
39b7(mdo sde): legs pa dang / chos spyod pa legs pa dang / dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang / dge legs spyod pa legs par rig nas skra dang / kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad
40a1(mdo sde): pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba ste/ lha| 'di ni rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi'o/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ de'i phyir shing rta 'di rab tu byung ba
40a2(mdo sde): gang na bde logs su sgyur cig/ lha| bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas shing rta de rab tu byung ba gang nga ba der
40a3(mdo sde): bsgyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas rab tu byung ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye| mi khyod ci'i phyir skra bregs shing lag pa na lhung bzed thogs
40a4(mdo sde): nas khyim nas khyim dang / khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro la khyod kyi gos kyang kha dog mi mtshungs te/ ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag gi dang mi 'dra ba yin/ des 'di skad
40a5(mdo sde): ces smras so/ /gzhon nu/ bdag ni rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi'o/ /kye| mi khyod ji ltar na rab tu byung ba zhes bya/ gzhon nu/ bdag gis dul ba legs pa dang / yang dag par
40a6(mdo sde): sdom pa legs pa dang / don spyod pa legs pa dang / chos spyod pa legs pa dang / dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang / dge legs spyod pa legs par rig nas skra dang / kha spu
40a7(mdo sde): bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag par kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de ltar na bdag rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o/ /kye| mi khyod kyis dul
40b1(mdo sde): ba legs pa dang / yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang / don spyod pa legs pa dang / chos spyod pa legs pa dang / dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang / dge legs spyod pa legs par
40b2(mdo sde): rig nas skra dang / kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyi ma med par rab tu byung ba legs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub
40b3(mdo sde): pas kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kha lo sgyur ba/ de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig/ pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo / /'di ltar nga pho brang nyid du phyin nas don 'di kho na bsam par
40b4(mdo sde): bya'o| |kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir bsgyur nas pho brang nyid du chas te/ der pho brang du gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa kye ma'o bdag ni skra dang / kha spu
40b5(mdo sde): bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag par kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar bya'o snyam pa'i don de nyid dgongs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis
40b6(mdo sde): kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos rmi lam rmis ba/ dbang po'i rtog lhung ba dang / shAkya rnams phyag dar gyis khengs
40b7(mdo sde): pa dang / sa ldog pa dang / dpal khyim nas byung ba dang / phyi rol na skad cig cing du zhing dgod pa la bdag nyid lta ba dang / nyi ma gang nas shar ba de nyid nas nub pa'o/ /byang chub
41a1(mdo sde): sems dpas de gsan pa dang / dgongs pa/ nga ni shAkya rnams kyi dbang po'i tog gi gnas yin pa dang / nga grong khyer nas 'byung ma dpal byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
41a2(mdo sde): rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang rmi lam rmis pa/ dpal gyi mal khri chag pa dang / pha'i rgyud chad pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpas de gsan pa dang / de de bzhin te/ da ni grags 'dzin
41a3(mdo sde): ma'i dpal gyi gnas su gyur pa dang / zas gtsang ma'i pha'i rigs rgyud kyi gnas su gyur pas nga rab tu byung na shAkya rnams kyi rigs rgyud chad par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan ma mkhan
41a4(mdo sde): rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i mdun du gal te gzhon nu zhag bdun gyi bar du rab tu ma byung na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /'di skad
41a5(mdo sde): ces kyang smras so/ /gal te de yi bzang po gzigs bzhed na/ /de slad dgung bdun bar du srungs shig dang / /mi dbang gdugs ni bdal bar gyur pa lta'i/ /rin chen sna bdun
41a6(mdo sde): 'byung bar the tshom med/ /khyod sras rin chen bdun po yis/ /dbang phyug gi ni rgyal por 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho la ni thug pa'i sa/ /chad pa med pas skyong bar 'gyur/ /'on te sa ni
41a7(mdo sde): spangs nas su/ /bsnyengs med nags su bzhud na ni/ /thams cad mkhyen pa thob gyur nas/ /'gro ba sgrol ba mdzad par 'gyur/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang zas gtsang dang /
41b1(mdo sde): zas dkar dang / bre bo zas dang / bdud rtsi zas bzhi lhan cig gcig tu tshogs nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag /mtshan mkhan dang / bltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams
41b2(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la gal te zhag bdun gyi bar du rab tu ma byung na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyi/ de lta bas na bdag cag
41b3(mdo sde): gis byang chub sems dpa' zhag bdun gyi bar du bsgrims te bsrung bar bya zhing grong khyer yang legs par bsrung bar bya'o/ /de nas de rnams kyis ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer rab rim pa
41b4(mdo sde): bdun dang / 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor nas grong khyer gyi sgo 'phar lcags las byas shing sgo 'phar rnams la dril bu shin tu sgra gsal ba btags te/ sgo phye na de'i sgras dpag
41b5(mdo sde): tshad gcig khor yug tu grag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' khang bzang gi gzhi na bud med yid 'phrog pa/ gzugs bzang ba rnams dang / gar dang / glu dang / rol mo rnams
41b6(mdo sde): kyi spyod pas bsnyen bkur byed du bcug go / skas shin tu che ba spor rung ba mi lnga brgyas bteg pa byas so/ /chibs bsngags ldan gyis phyogs ni zangs ma'i glegs bus g.yogs shing
41b7(mdo sde): gser gyi sil dkrol gyi dra ba btags pas bskor to/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi bskyes pa med par zhugs nas/ pi wang dang / gling bu dang / 'khar rnga dang /
42a1(mdo sde): sgra snyan la sogs pa rol mo'i cha byad dag nye bar len cing 'byor pa chen pos bzhugs so/ /mtshan mo ni rgyal po zas gtsang yang dpung gi tshogs
42a2(mdo sde): yan lag bzhi dang / shar sgo'i phyi rol na 'dug go/ lho phyogs na ni bre bo zas so/ /nub phyogs na ni zas dkar ro/ byang phyogs na ni bdud rtsi zas so/ /grong khyer gyi dbus kyi
42a3(mdo sde): 'dram po byed pa ni shAkya ming chen dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'o/ /de shar sgor song nas smras pa/ su zhig mel tshe byed/ su zhig mel tshe byed/ rgyal po
42a4(mdo sde): zas gtsang gis smras pa/ kho bo mel tshe byed do/ /lha| mel tshe mdzod cig/ mel tshe mdzod dang / khyod la legs par 'gyur zhes smras te tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'jig
42a5(mdo sde): rten gnyid log ro dang mtshungs/ /gnyid log bdud kyi dbang du song / /'di ni mi nyal rtag tu mkhas/ /de bas ma nyal mel tshe byos/ /lho sgor song nas smras pa/ su zhig
42a6(mdo sde): mal tshe byed/ /su zhig mel tshe byed/ bre bo zas kyis smras pa/ kho bo mel tshe byed do/ /lha| mel tshe mdzod cig/ mel tshe mdzod dang / khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes
42a7(mdo sde): smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'jig rten gnyid log ro dang mtshungs/ /gnyid log bdud kyi dbang du song / /gnyid log 'chi bdag dbang du song / /de bas ma
42b1(mdo sde): nyal mel tshe byos/ /nub sgor song nas smras pa/ su zhig mel tshe byed/ su zhig mel tshe byed/ zas dkar gyis smras pa/ kho bo mel tshe byed do/ /lha| mel tshe mdzod cig/ mel tshe
42b2(mdo sde): mdzod dang / khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gnyid log pa ni rtag tu myos/ /myos 'gyur bre bos 'thungs ba nyal/ /dgon pa nags
42b3(mdo sde): su nyal ba 'dras/ /de bas mnyal mel tshe byos/ /byang sgor song nas smras pa/ su zhig mel tshe byed/ /su zhig mel tshe byed/ bdud rtsi zas kyis smras pa/ kho bo mel tshe byed do/ /
42b4(mdo sde): lha| mel tshe mdzod cig /mel tshe mdzod dang / khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ri nyal ri sul nyal ba bzhin/ /rgya mtsho'i chur ni nyal
42b5(mdo sde): ba dang / /ljon shing rtse la nyal ba bzhin/ /de bas mnyal mel tshe byos/ /dbus kyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag tu song nas smras pa/ su zhig mel tshe byed/ su zhig mel tshe
42b6(mdo sde): byed| srung ma rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag mel tshe bgyid do/ /mel tshe byos shig /mel tshe byas dang / legs par 'gyur ro/ zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
42b7(mdo sde): chos spyod chos ma yin ma spyod/ /bden par spros shig rdzun ma smra/ /mun pa chen por 'jug par 'gyur/ /de bas ma nyal mel tshe byos/ /de nas nam nangs nas shAkya ming
43a1(mdo sde): chen gyis rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa/ lha| dgung sangs lags te/ dgung bdun la dgung gcig ni thal/ dgung drug ni lus so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang
43a2(mdo sde): gis smras pa/ lags kyi zhag drug 'das nas gzhon nu 'khor los bsgyur bar gyur na bdag cag nam mkha'i ngos la rgyu zhing gling bzhir phyi bzhin 'dong ngo / /deng shin tu dgung
43a3(mdo sde): gcig lus so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ mi dbang shAkya'i sras po thub pa 'di/ /bdag nyid chen po pha rol phyin drug rdzogs//
43a4(mdo sde): thugs rnams dgyes par mdzad pa dka' thub tshal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i nags su gshegs par bzhed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdag
43a5(mdo sde): la gzhan dag gzhon nu shAkya thub pa ni skyes pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir grags 'dzin ma dang / sa 'tsho ma dang / ri dwags skyes dang / bud med drug khri spangs nas rab tu 'byung
43a6(mdo sde): ngo zhes gzhi de las kha zer bar 'gyur du 'ong gi/ ma la/ bdag gis grags 'dzin ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o snyam nas des grags 'dzin ma dang lhan
43a7(mdo sde): cig dga' mgur spyad pa dang grags 'dzin ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ nam nangs nas byang chub sems dpa'i snyan du gsol lo snyam
43b1(mdo sde): mo| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ldan pas tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ bud med dang bdag khyim nyal ba'i/ /tha ma deng gi 'di yin te/ /
43b2(mdo sde): phyin chad khyim du bud med dang / /nga ni lhan cig mi gnas so/ /de nas bud med de rnams gar dang / glu dang / rol mos ngal zhing lci la dub nas kha nas kha chu 'dzag cing skra zhig la
43b3(mdo sde): gos dang / lag pa dag lhug par btang nas/ bla ba'i tshig byung rgyal du rdol zhing gnyid log go /byang chub sems dpas bud med de dag thams cad kha nas kha chu 'dzag cing skra zhig la
43b4(mdo sde): gos dang / lag pa dag lhug par btang nas/ bla ba'i tshig byung rgyal du rdol zhing gnyid log pa gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang btsun mo'i 'khor la dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyes so/ /
43b5(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyo ba 'khrungs pa dang tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ rlung gi shugs kyis pad+ma'i tshal ltar sa gzhi 'dir/ /lag pa dag dang rkang pa brkyang nas
43b6(mdo sde): 'gyel 'gyur te/ /skra rnams zhig cing mdoms dang rkub kyi phyogs snang ba/ shAkya'i sras kyis gzigs nas rang bzhin skyo bar 'gyur/ /tshul dang 'dra ba'i bud med na chung
43b7(mdo sde): tshogs 'di dag / dur khrod 'jigs su rung ba'i rang bzhin 'drar mthong nas/ /sems can byis pa'i spyod yul la ni deng dga' na/ /sems dang blo gros dran dang bral ba yin
44a1(mdo sde): nam ci/ /'dod pa tha chad 'dam dang mda' mdung dug me 'dra/ /rmi lam lta bu yin te tshwa chu'i ro dang mtshungs/ /'dod pa phung byed rtsod dang sdig pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /
44a2(mdo sde): mtha' ngan sprul gyi kha 'dra bdag gis spang bar bya/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzims mal chen po la gzims pa na/ mtshan mo de nyid la rmi lam lnga rmis pa/ sa chen po
44a3(mdo sde): nyid gzims mal du byas shing ri rab ri'i rgyal po dbu rten du bcug/ phyag g.yon pa shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'jug/ phyag g.yas pa nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por
44a4(mdo sde): 'jug/ zhabs gnyis rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa dang / 'greng pa zhes bya ba'i rtsa'i rigs lte ba nas byung nas nam mkha'i bar du 'phags te 'dug pa dang / bya kun nas dkar la
44a5(mdo sde): mgo nag pa rnams kyis zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas pus mo'i lha nga la thug pa'i bar du lta ba dang / bya sna tshogs phyogs bzhi nas 'ongs nas mdun du kha dog gcig tu 'dug
44a6(mdo sde): pa dang / mi gtsang ba'i ro'i steng nas bdag nyid mi gtsang bas ma gos par 'chag pa'o/ /de lta bu rmis nas kyang thugs dgyes te dgongs pa/ nga'i rmi lam 'di 'dra ba rmis pas
44a7(mdo sde): ring po mi thogs pa kho nar bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /grags 'dzin mas kyang rmi lam du mthong ba/ bdag gis so kun lhags pa dang / dung gi dpung pa
44b1(mdo sde): chag pa dang / zla bas la lhung ba dang / skar ma rnams ni du ba'o/ /grags 'dzin mas kyang rmi lam rmis pa de byang chub sems dpa' la gsol ba dang / byang chub sems dpas gsungs
44b2(mdo sde): pa| khyod kyi so ni kha nang gnas/ /zla ba 'di ni mkhar gnas kyis/ /yid kyi gdung ba bsal nas ni/ /dogs med bde bar gnyid log cig/ de nas grags 'dzin ma 'di snyam du sems
44b3(mdo sde): te| rmi lam 'jigs pa rmis pa na/ /bdag yid dogs dang bcas par 'gyur/ /deng gi mtshan mo sdug pa dang / /'dra la dag tu mi 'gyur grang / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di
44b4(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ji ltar rgyu'i stobs can yin mod kyi 'on kyang rkyen gyis bsgrub par bya dgos te/ 'di ltar rgyu'i stobs chen po'ang rkyen gyi stobs
44b5(mdo sde): la ltos so snyam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / khang bzang gi gzhi la 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /nags kyi spre'u
44b6(mdo sde): ni spyod yul rgyu 'dra zhing / /yan par 'dug pa'i rte'u dang 'dra ba'i thugs/ /gal te 'dod pa'i yon tan las bzlog na/ /de las shin tu gsal ba'i snang ba gzigs/ /blo gros bzang
44b7(mdo sde): po bzhengs shig bzhengs/ /sa ni spangs te bzhud mdzod la/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid brnyes nas ni/ /'gro ba dag ni bsgral bar mdzod/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa ni/ /kau
45a1(mdo sde): shi ka ma mthong ngam/ /nga ni ri dwags bdag po rgyas bskor ltar/ /mi ni mthu ldan gzhu mtshon ral gri thogs/ /rta glang shing rta dpung tshogs mang po yis//
45a2(mdo sde): grong khyer ser skya kun nas yongs su bskor/ /zas gtsang la sogs shAkya'i tshogs 'di dag /glang chen rta zhon legs par go bgos lus/ /mi sdug sna tshogs lag na mtshon
45a3(mdo sde): thogs te/ /khyams dang rta babs khang bzang gzhi nang gnas/ /pho brang dang ni khyim sgo dang / /de bzhin grong khyer sgo dag kyang / /bcad nas gtan pa dam bcug ste/ /de bzhin
45a4(mdo sde): kun nas bsrungs par gyur/ /ru dung pa Ta ha sgra rnga sgra yis/ /khyams dang rta babs khang bzang nang gnas shing / /glang chen rta dmag 'bad pa'i skye bo'i tshogs/ /rgyun du nga mi
45a5(mdo sde): gtang phyir srung bar byed/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ nges pa mar me mdzad kyi lung bstan dang / /sdug bsngal gyis gdungs 'jig rten 'di dang yab/ /khyod kyi sngon gyi dam bcas
45a6(mdo sde): dgongs mdzod la/ /khab dag spangs te nges par 'byung bar mdzod/ /ji ltar khyod ni bgegs med par/ /deng nyid nags su gshegs 'gyur ba/ /bdag cag tshangs sogs
45a7(mdo sde): bcas pa yi/ /lha rnams kyis ni de bzhin bgyi/ /byang chub sems dpas legs so zhes gsungs nas thugs dgyes par gyur to/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis
45b1(mdo sde): gnyid kyis myos par byas nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtsen la bsgo ba/ grogs po/ byang chub sems dpa' steng gi khang bzang nas babs kyi skas long zhig /des skabs
45b2(mdo sde): blangs pa la byang chub sems dpa' babs pa dang / de nas brgya byin gyis brnga byas ma thag tu zhabs 'bring ba 'dun pa gang na pa der gshegs na ji tsam na 'dun pa gnyid stug pos non
45b3(mdo sde): par gzigs nas ni byang chub sems dpas bsgrims te bslangs nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis gsungs pa/ 'dun pa longs kyi khyim nas myur bar ni/ /nga yi rta po rin chen
45b4(mdo sde): bsngags ldan long / /sngon gyi rgyal bas longs spyod dka' thub tshal/ /thub rnams dgyes pa mdzad par nga gshegs so/ /'dun pa gnyid log pa'i mig phye nas smras pa/ lha khyod skyed
45b5(mdo sde): mos tshal gyi dus ma bab/ /dos pa khyod dang 'ga' yang 'khon ma mchis/ /khyod la dgra bo su yang ma mchis na/ /dgung phyed khyod la bcibs pa ci zhig bgyi/ /byang chub sems
45b6(mdo sde): dpas bka' stsal pa/ 'dun pa khyod kyis lan 'ga' yang / /nga yi tshig ni ma bcag na/ /nga yi deng dus tha ma la/ /nga yi tshig 'di ma gcag cig /'dun pas gsol pa/ gzhon nu/
45b7(mdo sde): mtshan mo 'di ni 'jigs pa dang / 'jigs su rung pa mchis pas bdag bcibs pa mi len no/ /byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/ lan dang / yang lan gyis gdon mi za bar skye bo
46a1(mdo sde): sad par 'gyur gyi/ bdag nyid song la rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan sta gon bya'o snyam nas/ de nas nyid kyi pho brang gi sgo phye nas rta'i rgyal por bsngags ldan
46a2(mdo sde): bzung bar brtsams pa na mjing kyog byed la phar bros tshur bros shing 'dug tu mi btub bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i phyag bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa 'khor lo
46a3(mdo sde): dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba mnga' ba/ skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas mgo la byugs nas gsungs pa/ bsngags ldan tha ma yi ni khur long ste/ /
46a4(mdo sde): dka' thub nags su ma thogs nga skyol cig/ byang chub thob nas myur du 'gro ba kun/ /bsam gtan rnam thar char gyis tshim par bya/ /chos nyid kyis dud 'gro'ang gdams na phyi
46a5(mdo sde): lang mi byed pas rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan mi g.yo bar 'dug go / de nas byang chub sems dpa' thugs dgyes pa skyes te/ rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan bstad do/ /ji tsam na shAkya
46a6(mdo sde): ming chen 'dram po byed pa skye bo nyul zhing phyogs der phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gshegs par chas pa mthong ngo / /de nas skad 'dzer cing mig mchi mas gang bas
46a7(mdo sde): smras pa/ gzhon nu 'di ci mdzad/ ming chen/ 'gro'o/ /gzhon nu/ 'di ni rigs pa ma lags so/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ ming chen/ 'di nyid rigs pa yin te/
46b1(mdo sde): gang gi phyir ngas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba brgya stong du mas sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa des na dang ci khyim na 'dug phod
46b2(mdo sde): dam| 'di ni nges te dka' thub kyi tshal du 'gro'o/ /gang zhig 'bar ba'i khyim chen las/ /mkhas rnams myur du 'byung ba la/ /legs min smra bar mi 'os kyi/ /de ni bsngags
46b3(mdo sde): par 'os nyid yin/ /de bzhin rga nad 'chi ba yis/ /rab 'bar srid pa'i gzeb las ni/ /'byung bar 'dod gyur gang yin la/ /'dir ni mi rigs ci zhig mthong / /de ltar
46b4(mdo sde): gsung drag pos spyos pa dang / ming chen gdong las mchi ma char bzhin du 'bab cing chong 'debs pa la zhugs te/ kye hud/ deng du rgyal po zas gtsang dang / /shAkya dag ni thams
46b5(mdo sde): cad kyis/ /yang dang yang du bsams pa yi/ /re ba 'bras bu med par gyur/ deng du rgyal po zas gtsang ni/ /sras kyi mya ngan gyis gdungs pa/ /lag bsgreng bzhin du sdug bsngal zhing //
46b6(mdo sde): mi bzang sgra ni 'byin par 'gyur/ /sa mtsho grags 'dzin ri dwags skyes/ /de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor rgyas pa'ang / /don grub dang ni bral ba yis/ /shin tu sdug bsngal myong
46b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ /zhes smras nas/ de dngangs pas grags 'dzin ma bslang ste smras pa/ don grub 'di ni shes gyur gyi/ /khyim thab sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas/ /sdug bsngal
47a1(mdo sde): nyams thag du ma 'ong / /khyim thab sdug pa de zlog cig /khyed kyi khyim thab gshegs gyur 'di ni mthong dka' ste/ /khyod kyis 'di ltos khyim thab mthong ba'i
47a2(mdo sde): tha ma yin/ /kyi hud phongs pa bdag gis mtshan mo khus btab kyang / /sus kyang lan ma ster bas bdag gis ma nyes so/ /des ni de ltar khus btab kyang / /'di ltar lha rnams
47a3(mdo sde): byin brlabs kyis/ /dgon par 'o dod bos pa bzhin/ /'ga' yang sad par ma gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gang bdag gis yab la ma
47a4(mdo sde): bltas par 'gro ba ni nga'i tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no/ /snyam nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang ma gnyid kyis non
47a5(mdo sde): par gyur to/ /de nas 'di snyam du dgongs te ji ltar nga 'jig rten thams cad kyi phar gyur cing 'jig rten gyi bla ma dang / 'jig rten gyi thu bo yin mod kyi/ de ltar na'ang pha
47a6(mdo sde): dang | ma ni skyes bu'i slob dpon du gyur pa dang / lhar gyur pa dang / tshangs par gyur pa yin zhing shin tu phan pa byed pa yin no snyam du dgongs nas yang phyi zhabs gnyis la
47a7(mdo sde): btud de bskor ba lan gsum mdzad nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bdag kyang yid la brtser ldan zhing / /bdag kyang nye du rnams la dga'/ /'on kyang 'khor ba rang
47b1(mdo sde): bzhin ngan/ /'di mthong nas ni mchi ba lags/ /gal te rga nad 'chi ba dang / /sdug pa'i gnyen bral las byung ba'i/ /gnod byed sdug bsngal ma mchis na/ /khyod ni spong bar su zhig
47b2(mdo sde): byed| |gang phyir mi 'dod bzhin du ni/ /rab che gnyen gyi dkyil 'khor dang / /mdza' bshes chung ma dbang phyug rnams/ /yun mi ring bar 'khor bar 'gyur/ /de bas ma chags
47b3(mdo sde): yid kyis ni/ /'khor ba las ni rnam grol phyir/ /brtser ldan nye du spangs nas ni/ /skye bo med nags bsten pa lags/ /lus can 'du ba nges par ni/ /mthar ni 'bral 'gyur nyid
47b4(mdo sde): lags pas/ /bdag ni rjes su dgongs nas ni/ /rmongs pas thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ ces gsungs nas chas so/ /de nas ming chen gyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma bslang ste
47b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ don grub 'di ni bzhud lags kyi/ /sa bdag de ni zlog par mdzod/ /sras kyi mya ngan gyis thebs nas/ /sdug bsngal gyis gdungs bshums 'gyur mchi/ /ma stes te
47b6(mdo sde): de'ang gnyid ma sad do/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu myu gu dang / mang ku ra dang / 'od zer can dang / lo ma gyon pa ste bzhi la smras pa/ grogs po dag /khyed
47b7(mdo sde): rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' gdeg par nus sam/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shin tu'ang nus lags so/ /khyed rnams la stobs ci tsam yod/ myu gus smras pa/ bdag
48a1(mdo sde): gis ni sa la ri ji snyed yod pa phrag pa gcig tu thogs te nyam nga ba chung ngus 'gro nus pa de tsam gyi stobs yod do/ /mang ku ras smras pa/ bdag gis kyang
48a2(mdo sde): sa la chu ji snyed yod pa de thams cad phrag pa gcig tu thogs nas 'gro nus so/ /'od zer can gyis smras pa/ bdag gis kyang sa la rdul ji snyed yod pa de thams cad phrag
48a3(mdo sde): par thogs te nyam nga ba chung dus 'gro nus so/ /lo ma gyon pas smras pa/ bdag gis kyang sa la rtswa dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma ji snyed pa de thams cad phrag pa gcig tu
48a4(mdo sde): thogs te nyam nga ba chung ngus 'gro nus so/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po dag/ stobs 'di dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' gdeg par nus kyi/ de nas myu gu dang /
48a5(mdo sde): mang ku ra dang / 'od zer can dang / lo ma gyon pa ste bzhis chibs rin po che bsngags ldan khyer te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin nas smras pa/
48a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ci la bzhugs/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te 'di rnams ni bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' bteg ste/ bar
48a7(mdo sde): snang la khyer ro zhes dregs pa skye bar 'gyur ro snyam nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i skur byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de rnams kyis bsgul bar yang ma nus nas ngo
48b1(mdo sde): mtshar skyes te gsol pa/ gzhon nu/ bdag cag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la stobs 'di 'dra ba mnga' bar ma 'tshal to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'chi bas rin po che
48b2(mdo sde): bsngags ldan la bcibs te 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus chibs rin po che bsngags ldan dang / 'dun pa steng
48b3(mdo sde): gi nam mkha' la 'phags so/ /de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyang lha brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song
48b4(mdo sde): ste phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bskor cing dong ste/ g.yas phyogs nas gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang spyod lam zhi ba dang / g.yon phyogs nas 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams
48b5(mdo sde): kyis rgyal mtshan dang / bdan bsgrengs nas lha'i rol mo'i khyad par sna tshogs dang / mdun nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa rang rang gi spyod lam gyis dong ngo / /nam mkha'i
48b6(mdo sde): ngos la gnas pa'i lha brgya stong du mas ni byang chub sems dpa'i steng nas lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po rnams kyis gtor ro/ /a ga ru'i phye
48b7(mdo sde): ma dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / tam la'i 'dab ma'i phye ma dang / lha'i me tog man+dA ra bas kyang gtor to/ /lha'i rol mo'i cha spyad sna tshogs kyang brdungs so/ /gos rnams kyang gtor
49a1(mdo sde): ro| |'dir smras pa/ mkha' la lha rnams gzha'i sgra chen 'byin byed la/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis gos kyi g.yab mo 'debs byed cing / /kha cig byang chub sems
49a2(mdo sde): dpa' la ni bstod byed de/ /nam mkha' la ni rol mo brgya phrag sgyur bar byed/ /kha cig dag ni sgo rnams 'byed byed cing / /me tog man+dA ra bas 'thor bar byed/ /kha cig dag ni
49a3(mdo sde): bcibs pa'i rkang 'dzin cing / /bde bar gshegs la rtog cing rjes bzhin 'brang / /kha cig dag kyang g.yas nas rjes bzhin 'brang / /g.yon nas 'gro ba dag kyang rjes bzhin
49a4(mdo sde): 'brang / /brgya byin de bzhin tshangs par bcas pa dang / /lus ngan bdag nyid shul ni mtshon par byed/ /zla ba nya ba rgyu skar tshogs kyis ltar/ /bdag nyid chen po lha tshogs mdun
49a5(mdo sde): bdar nas/ /dka' thub nags ni thub rnams dgyes byed pa/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i nags su thugs dgyes gshegs/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas bsngags ldan la dbugs
49a6(mdo sde): dbyung ba'i phyir gsungs pa/ ma skyo ma skyo stobs ni gzung bar bgyis/ /'gro don ngal ba gcig ni de ring long / /mi ring byang chub thob nas 'gro ba rnams/ /bsam gtan rnam
49a7(mdo sde): thar gyis tshim byed por bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpag tshad bcu gnyis su zhugs nas nang bar grong khyer dpe med du byon to/ /de nas lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'
49b1(mdo sde): byung nas 'di slar yang rang gi grong khyer du 'jug par mi 'gyur ram snyam pa la sku thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs su glang po che'i lta stangs kyis gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan
49b2(mdo sde): pa yi| |lam gyi mchog ni ma thob par/ /grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir ni slar/ /nga ni 'jug par mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la bskor ba lan gsum
49b3(mdo sde): byas nas rang gi gnas su song ngo / /byang chub sems dpas chibs las babs te rgyan bkrol nas 'dun pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'dun pa/ rgyan dang / rta khyer la slar song zhig/ 'dir
49b4(mdo sde): smras pa/ kha lo sgyur khyod nga yi rta 'di dang / /rgyan 'di rnams kyang gnyen pa dag la byin/ /nga ni 'dod pa rgya chen spangs nas su/ /da ltar 'di nyid du ni rab 'byung bya/ /'dod pa 'di ni spu
49b5(mdo sde): gri'i so 'dra zhing / /me 'obs 'bar dang mtshungs shing mtha' ngan pa/ /'jig rten phan phyir snying rjes nga spangs te/ /dgon par song nas khyim du phyir mi ldog /de nas mdun pa gdong
49b6(mdo sde): pa mchi mchar bzhin 'bab pas byang chub sems dpa' la gsol pa/ seng ge stag gis gtams pa dang / /phyugs rdzis gtams pa'i nags tshal du/ /'ba' zhig sku gnyen dang
49b7(mdo sde): bral bas/ /'phags pa ji ltar spyod par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ skye dgu 'di ni skye na gcig pu skye/ /de bzhin 'chi na'ang gcig pu 'chi bar 'gyur/ /'di ni gcig
50a1(mdo sde): pus sdug bsngal myong 'gyur gyi/ /'khor ba la ni grogs yod ma yin no/ /'dun pas gsol pa/ kyi hud gzhon nus sdug bsngal ma gzigs te/ /zhabs
50a2(mdo sde): 'jam glang chen rta la chibs goms pa/ /sa gzhi rtswa dang rdo bas gtams rtsub par/ /ji ltar zhabs kyis gshegs shing nags su rgyu/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ 'chi
50a3(mdo sde): bdag 'jigs pa de ni lan 'ga' yang / /skyed la med min bde bar goms la min/ /mgon bcas la min rigs btsun la ma yin/ /dpa' dang btsun min skye bo dga' la
50a4(mdo sde): min| |rga bas 'chi bdag 'jigs pa dag / bskyed nas 'ong bar 'gyur zhes grag /don ma byas shing ma brtsams par/ /'chi bar yang ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'dun pas
50a5(mdo sde): gsol pa/ rgyal po bgres po ni sras kyi mya ngan gyis 'grongs par 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir 'dun pa'i tshig thugs
50a6(mdo sde): la ma bab bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas ut+pa la sngon po 'dra ba'i ral gri shubs nas byung nas gtsug phud bregs te/ steng gi nam mkha' la bor ba dang / lha rnams kyi
50a7(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin gyis blangs nas bkur sti chen po byas te sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du khyer nas gtsug phud kyi mchod pa chen po btsugs so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po
50b1(mdo sde): brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te gzhon nu ni rgyal rigs kyi mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'di bzlog par mi nus so snyam nas dga' bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas 'dun pa la gsungs
50b2(mdo sde): pa| khyod kyis bsngags ldan pho brang gi nang du ma bkri zhig / de skad ces gsungs pa dang / 'dun pa skad 'dzer cing mig mchi mas gang nas rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan khrid de yang dang / yang du
50b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la lta zhing song ste/ ser skya'i gzhir phyin pa dang der ca co skyes te ji tsam na rgyal po zas gtsang ma la smras pa/ lha/ gzhon nu byon gyi dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/
50b4(mdo sde): grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir yang sgra gsang chen po bsgrags so/ /rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan pho brang gi nang du zhugs pa dang / btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad kyis bsngags ldan gyi mgul
50b5(mdo sde): du 'jus te ngu bar brtsams so/ /bsngags ldan yang dbugs khong du song ste de nyid du dus byas so/ /shi nas de sgra gcan gyi bram ze las drug la brtson pa zhig gi rigs su nying mtshams
50b6(mdo sde): sbyor ba blangs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rim gyis drang srong ngan spong gi bsti gnas su gshegs pa dang / de'i tshe drang srong ngan spong gi bu lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems
50b7(mdo sde): khong du chud cing 'dug pa de lta bu de byang chub sems dpas gzigs nas gsungs pa/ drang srong chen po/ ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug/
51a1(mdo sde): des gsol pa/ bdag gi bsti gnas 'di na shing ta la rnams gser gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu chags pa las de rnams snga mkho bzhin du ma
51a2(mdo sde): gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ drang srong chen po/ gang gi mthus bsti gnas 'di na shing ta la rnams gser gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bur ldan pa de rga ba
51a3(mdo sde): dang | na ba dang / 'chi ba yang dag par mthong nas yid byung ste dka' thub kyi nags su gnas pas so/ /gal te des rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba yang dag par mthong nas yid
51a4(mdo sde): byung ste dka' thub kyi nags su gnas par ma gyur na skyed mos tshal 'di de'i yin pa zhig / de skad ces gsungs pa dang / drang srong ngan spong gi bus byang chub sems dpa' la
51a5(mdo sde): brtag par brtsams so/ /de nas gzugs bzang zhing zhi ba'i cha byad du mthong nas yun ring du brtags te ngo mtshar skyes nas gsol pa/ kye/ rab tu byung ba de khyod kho na ma lags
51a6(mdo sde): grang | byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ drang srong chen po/ de ltar nges so/ /de nas ngan spong gi bu ya mtshan skyes pa'i mig bgrad de bltas nas byang chub sems dpa' thog
51a7(mdo sde): mar gdan la spyan drangs te/ me tog dang / 'bras bu bstabs so/ /grong khyer dpe med na khyim bdag phyug pa dang / nor mang la longs spyod che ba zhes bya ba nas de la khye'u bcu
51b1(mdo sde): btsas so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de dag thams cad kyang rab tu byung nas rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas so/ /ji tsam na bdag nyid chen po de rnams la ma rgan mos sha na'i gos
51b2(mdo sde): dag cig byin pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ yum| mkhyen par mdzod cig /rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba rga ba dang / na ba dang / shi ba
51b3(mdo sde): mthong nas kun tu skyo ba'i yid kyis nags su song nas de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bas na bdag cag rnams
51b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gnas par mi nus pas na bdag cag yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /sha na'i gos 'di zas gtsang ma'i sras la khyod kyis phul cig /bdag nyid chen po de ni
51b5(mdo sde): bla na med pa'i ye shes thugs su chud par 'gyur la khyed kyis kyang 'bras bu chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog
51b6(mdo sde): 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /rgan mo des kyang 'chi kar gos de dag bu mo la gtad
51b7(mdo sde): nas ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras so/ /de'i bu mo yang nad kyis thebs te 'chi bar shes nas des kyang shing drung zhig tu bzhag nas shing de la gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa de la khyod kyis
52a1(mdo sde): 'di dag rgyal po zas gtsang gis sras la phul cig ces gsol ba btab bo/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas
52a2(mdo sde): das de dag shes nas blangs te/ de nas rngon pa rgas khogs pa lta bu zhig tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas de dag bgos te/ lag pa la mda' gzhu thogs nas byang chub sems
52a3(mdo sde): dpa' gshegs pa'i lam kar bsdad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang rim gyis lam der byon nas rngon pa lag na mda' gzhu thogs shing gos dur smrig gyon pa zhig gzigs
52a4(mdo sde): so| |gzigs nas kyang mi de la gsungs pa/ kye nang rje/ sha na'i gos 'o ni dag ni rab tu byung ba la 'tsham pa yin gyi/ ka shi ka'i ras phran 'di dag khyer la 'o ni dag nga la byin
52a5(mdo sde): cig| des gsol pa/ gzhon nu/ bdag la gzhan dag khyod kyis rgyal bu gzhon nu bkrongs nas ka shi ka'i ras phran gyi gos 'di dag blangs so zhes gzhi des/ g.yar
52a6(mdo sde): 'chi bar 'gyur lags pas bdag 'di dag mi 'bul lo/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ kye nang rje/ nga ni mthu ji lta bu dang ldan pa 'jig rten thams cad kyis shes te/
52a7(mdo sde): su zhig gis nga bkrongs par nus/ khyod kyis nga bkrongs par su zhig yid ches kyi bag tsha ba med par byin cig /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems
52b1(mdo sde): dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas sha na'i gos dag phul te ka shi ka'i ras phran rnams blangs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sku dang / sha na'i gos dag 'tsham par ma gyur pa dang / de
52b2(mdo sde): 'di snyam du dgongs te/ kye ma'o/ /sha na'i gos rnams bdag gi sku dang 'tsham par gyur cig snyam nas tshig smras ma thag tu sha na'i gos de dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
52b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus byang chub sems dpa'i sku dang 'tsham par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/
52b4(mdo sde): da ni bdag rab tu byung zin gyis 'gro ba rnams rjes su gzung bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang rgyal po'i khab tu byon to/ /
52b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas de dang / de rnams la mkhas pa yin pas des shing ka ra wa'i ra'i lo ma las lhung bzed byas nas spyod lam zhi bas rgyal
52b6(mdo sde): po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi na 'dug pa des 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang / lta ba dang / rnam par lta
52b7(mdo sde): ba dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / chos gos snam sbyar dang / lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pas bsod snyoms spyod pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal po'i
53a1(mdo sde): khab na rab tu byung ba ji snyed cig gnas pa la rab tu byung ba 'di'i spyod lam de lta bu ni 'ga' yang med do snyam mo/ /'dir smras pa/ ji ltar mig can 'gro ba
53a2(mdo sde): ltar| |rab tu byung ba bsgrags par byas/ /'dis ni brtag par mdzad nas su/ /rab tu byung ba yang dag bzhed/ /khyim gnas 'di ni sdug bsngal te/ /'di ni rdul gyi gnas
53a3(mdo sde): yin zhing / /rab tu byung ba bar snang ltar/ /mkhyen nas de tshe rab tu byung / /rab tu byung nas sku yis ni/ /sdig pa'i las ni spangs pa dang / /gsung gi sdig pa spangs nas
53a4(mdo sde): ni| |'tsho ba kun nas dag par mdzad/ /de nas ma ga d+ha yi ni/ /grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs nas/ /mgon po shes bzhin dran ldan pa/ /bsod snyoms phyir ni
53a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa der/ /bzo sbyangs ma ga d+ha yi ba dag /khang bzang 'di na 'dug pas mthong / /mthong nas sems dang de nas ni/ /blon po rnams la 'di skad smras/ /mtshan
53a6(mdo sde): mchog gis ni rgyas gyur cing / /kho lag phun sum tshogs pa dang / /gnya' shing gang du lta ba yi/ /'di la she ldan dag ltos shig /spyan mi 'deg la yid gzhungs
53a7(mdo sde): shing / /dman pa'i rigs las ma 'khrungs 'di/ /gang du gnas par gshegs 'gyur ba/ /rgyal pos pho nya rjes bzhin btang / /de nas pho nya la bsgo ba/ /dge slong
53b1(mdo sde): de ni gar 'gro zhing / /gang du gnas ni btab pa yi/ /rjes bzhin du ni 'brang bar bgyi/ /de ni bsod snyoms gshegs pa na/ /sgo drug legs par bsdams nas ni/ /shes bzhin
53b2(mdo sde): dran dang ldan pa yis/ /lhung bzed myur de gang bar mdzad/ /bsod snyoms spyad pa byas nas kyang / /thub pa grong khyer phyir byung nas/ /skya bseng la ni mngon gshegs te/ /de la
53b3(mdo sde): gnas ni btab par 'gyur/ /gnas btab pa ni shes nas kyang / /pho nya gcig gis bsdad byas nas/ /gzhan ni myur du slar log ste/ /rgyal po la ni tshig smras pa/ /rgyal po chen
53b4(mdo sde): po dge slong de/ /seng ge'am stag gi phru gu dag/ ris sul dag na gnas pa ltar/ /skya bseng gi ni steng na gnas/ /pho nya rnams kyi tshig thos nas/ /sa bdag shing rtar zhugs
53b5(mdo sde): nas ni/ /de ni blon pos yongs bskor nas/ /myur ba kho nar dong bar gyur/ /bzhon pas bgrod pa'i sar zhon te/ /de ni bzhon pa la babs nas/ /rkang gis nye bar song nas ni/ /
53b6(mdo sde): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthong / /rgyal po 'dug nas dgyes pa dang / /mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam gsol nas/ /de ni ma khengs mi brlang bar/ /don 'di dag ni rab smras so/ /
53b7(mdo sde): dge slong lang tsho dang po la/ /bab par yang dag gnas gyur cing / /'di 'dra gzi brjid ldan pa la/ /bsod snyoms spyod par mdzes ma lags/ /khang pa nyams dga' dag dang ni/ /
54a1(mdo sde): bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /longs spyod mchog ni khyod gsol na/ /nyid kyi gdung ni zhu yi gsungs/ /rgyal po gangs ri nye ba na/ /yul gyi ljongs
54a2(mdo sde): ni nor dag dang / /'bru dag gis ni gang gyur pa/ /ko sa la zhes grags pa yod/ /bur ma shing pa nyi ma'i rus/ /shAkya dag ni de na gnas/ /rgyal po nga ni rgyal rigs te/ /nga ni
54a3(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i don mi gnyer/ /sa 'di ri dang bcas shing rgya mtshor bcas/ /rin chen kun dang ldan pa 'byor gyur kyang / /mi ni nam yang ngoms par mi 'gyur te/ /so ga tsha dus
54a4(mdo sde): shing gi me bzhin no/ /'dod pa rnams ni sha kho na 'brel ces gsungs/ /mi dbang rgal bar dka' zhing 'dam rdza ba 'dra/ /sdug bsngal dang ni mya ngan 'jigs pa yi/ /rtswa ba'i
54a5(mdo sde): gtso ste blo ngan rnams kyis bsten/ /rgyal po ngas ni byung ma thag tu yang / /'dod pa rnams la mi dga'i blo bskyed na/ /'jigs byed chos kyi dgra bor gyur pa dag /bor ba de ko
54a6(mdo sde): slar yang ci ltar blang / /rtsed mo sna tshogs yangs par gyur pa yi/ /lhun po gangs can rlung gis bskyod srid kyi/ /nga yi blo ni thar pa la rten pa/ /'dod pa'i shugs kyis bskyod
54a7(mdo sde): par mi nus so/ /'jig rten 'di ni 'dod par bying gyur nas/ /'khor ba'i 'khor los yongs su 'khyam pa la/ /mi dbang nga skyabs yin te gzhan med pas/ /'jigs pa che
54b1(mdo sde): las de ni thar bar bya/ /'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs mkhyen/ /mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba gzigs/ /spang phyir gang du nga yi yid/ /dga' ba dag tu 'gro bar bya/ /rgyal po gzugs
54b2(mdo sde): can snying pos gsol ba/ kye rab tu byung ba brtul zhugs 'dis ci zhig don du gnyer/ /des gsungs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/ /rgyal pos gsol
54b3(mdo sde): pa| kye rab tu byung ba gang gi tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag la'ang dgongs shig/ byang chub
54b4(mdo sde): sems dpas gsungs pa/ de bzhin du bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs nas rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri dang ha cang yang mi ring bar drang srong rnams kyi bsti gnas
54b5(mdo sde): der gshegs so/ /de nas spyod pa dang gnas pas bsam gtan la brtson par gnas te/ de rnams gang gi tshe rkang pa gcig gis nyin thun gcig 'greng ba de'i tshe byang chub sems
54b6(mdo sde): dpa' thun gnyis su bzhugs so/ /gal te de rnams gdung ba lnga'i sbyor bas nyin thun gcig 'dug pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas kyang sbyor ba des thun gnyis su bzhugs
54b7(mdo sde): so| |de nas de rnams ya mtshan skyes nas dge sbyong 'di ni chen po zhig go / zhes smras pa/ dge sbyong chen po/ dge sbyong chen po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpas
55a1(mdo sde): de rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /khyed bzhugs pa 'dis ci zhig don du gnyer/ de na kha cig gis gsol pa/ brgya byin nyid do/ /kha cig gis gsol pa/
55a2(mdo sde): bdag cag ni tshangs pa nyid do/ /kha cig gis gsol pa/ bdag cag ni bdud nyid do/ /byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/ drang srong 'di dag ni slar yang ltung ba lam log par
55a3(mdo sde): zhugs pa'o/ /lam 'di ni shes par nus pa ma yin/ mthong bar nus pa ma yin/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par nus pa ma yin no/ /de nas byang chub
55a4(mdo sde): sems dpas lam de nyid nus pa med par mkhyen nas/ sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang / sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur la 'di skad ces
55a5(mdo sde): gsungs so/ /ring 'phur/ gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na khyod kyi drung du kho bo tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma/ bdag la mi bde ba med kyi ci
55a6(mdo sde): bde ba kho nar bzhugs shig / byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ ring 'phur khyod kyis chos ji snyed cig rang gi mngon par shes pas rtogs par gyur /des gsol pa|
55a7(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma/ ci'ang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar du'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur dad pa de la ni nga yang
55b1(mdo sde): dad la/ sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur la brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab yod pa ltar bdag la'ang brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
55b2(mdo sde): dang | shes rab yod pas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur gyis ci'ang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi chos de snyed mngon sum du byas te/ ci'i phyir bdag gis kyang chos 'di dag mngon
55b3(mdo sde): sum du mi bya snyam nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpas chos de rnams kho na ma thob pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dang / ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / mngon sum du ma byas
55b4(mdo sde): pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir dang / gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtod par gnas te/ gcig pu bden pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag
55b5(mdo sde): nyid gtod par gnas pa na ring po mi thogs pa kho nar chos de dag mngon sum du mdzad par gyur to/ /chos de mngon sum du mdzad nas yang sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur gang
55b6(mdo sde): na ba der gshegs te byon nas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /ring 'phur khyod kyis ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di dag rang gi
55b7(mdo sde): mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas sam/ des 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma/ mad de/ bdag gis ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi chos de dag
56a1(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas so/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ring 'phur/ bdag gis kyang ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi chos de dag rang gi
56a2(mdo sde): mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma/ de ltar na khyod kyi ji tsam pa bdag gi'ang de tsam la/ bdag gi ji tsam pa khyod kyi yang de tsam pas don 'di
56a3(mdo sde): la'o skol mtshungs shing mnyam ste 'dra bar thos kyi tshur spyon/ 'o skol gnyis kas 'khor 'di yongs su drang par bgyi'o/ /de nas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur byang chub sems
56a4(mdo sde): dpa'i thog ma'i slob dpon nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' la rjed pa'i dam pas rjed cing mchod pa'i dam pas mchod do/ /de'i rtogs pa dag la'ang dga' ba dang / mgu bar gyur
56a5(mdo sde): to| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ lam 'di ni shes par nus pa ma yin/ mthong par nus pa ma yin/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang
56a6(mdo sde): chub par nus pa ma yin no snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas lam de nus pa med par rig nas/ rang byed kyi bu lhag spyod gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas rangs
56a7(mdo sde): byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /lhag spyod/ gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na khyod kyi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /des gsol pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gau
56b1(mdo sde): ta ma| bdag la mi bde ba med kyi khyod ci bde ba kho nar bzhugs shig / khyod kyis chos ji snyed cig mngon sum du byas/ tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
56b2(mdo sde): mched kyi bar du'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod dad pa la ni bdag kyang dad la/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod brtson 'grus dang /
56b3(mdo sde): dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab yod pa lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab ni bdag la yod na rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyis 'du shes
56b4(mdo sde): med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di snyed cig mngon sum du byas nas bdag gis kyang chos 'di dag ci'i phyir mngon sum du mi bya snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems
56b5(mdo sde): dpas chos de rnams kho na ma thob pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dang / ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir gcig pu dben pa/
56b6(mdo sde): bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtod par gnas te/ gcig pu dben par bag yod par bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na ring po ma thogs pa kho nar chos de mngon
56b7(mdo sde): sum du mdzad par gyur to/ /chos de mngon sum du mdzad nas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang / rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces gsungs
57a1(mdo sde): so| |lhag spyod/ khyod kyis 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar du chos 'di dag rang gis mngon sum du byas sam/ tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma/
57a2(mdo sde): mad lags te/ bdag gis 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di dag mngon sum du bgyis so/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ tshe dang ldan
57a3(mdo sde): pa lhag spyod/ bdag gis kyang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di dag rang gi mngon sum du byas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma/ de ltar na khyod kyi
57a4(mdo sde): ji tsam pa bdag gi'ang de tsam la/ bdag gi ci tsam pa khyod kyi yang de tsam pas don 'di la 'o skol mtshungs shing mnyam ste 'dra bar thos kyi tshur spyon/ 'o skol gnyis
57a5(mdo sde): kas tshogs 'di yongs su drang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma'i slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' la rjed pa dam pas
57a6(mdo sde): rjed cing mchod pa'i dam pas mchod do/ /de'i shes pa rnams la yang dga' ba dang / mgu bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du dgongs te/ lam 'di
57a7(mdo sde): ni shes par nus pa ma yin/ mthong par nus pa ma yin/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin no snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems
57b1(mdo sde): dpas lam de yang nus pa med par rig nas gshegs so/ /de nas rgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur gyi 'khor gsum dang / rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyi 'khor gnyis te drang srong lnga
57b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su 'brangs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lnga po dang lhan cig gang+gA'i lho phyogs na lteng rgyas 'od srung gi sde'i grong rdal ga na ba der rgyu zhing
57b3(mdo sde): gshegs te byon nas de phan tshun 'chag pa na phyogs dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa/ nags tshang tshing mdzes pa/ chu klung nai rany+dza nA bsil bar 'bab pa/ gse gu can 'jug ngogs
57b4(mdo sde): bde zhing mtha' rgya che la gsing ma sngon po dang / shing sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ kye
57b5(mdo sde): ma'o| |sa phyogs 'di ni dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa nags tshang tshing mdzes pa/ chu klung nai rany+dza nA bsil bar 'bab pa/ gse gu can 'jug dogs bde zhing mtha' rgya che la gsing
57b6(mdo sde): ma sngon po dang / shing sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa zhig ste/ kye ma spong ba don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bus nags khrod 'dir brten na spong ba bya bar nus
57b7(mdo sde): so| |bdag spong ba don du gnyer ba yin pas/ ma la bdag gis kyang nags khrod 'dir rten la spang bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nags khrod du zhugs te shing
58a1(mdo sde): gi drung du bzhugs nas/ tshems la tshems gtad/ ljags rkan la bcar nas/ thugs kyis thugs mngon du bzung / mngon du bsngams/ shin tu mngon
58a2(mdo sde): du bsngams so/ /de thugs kyis thugs mngon du bzung / mngon du bsngams/ shin tu mngon du bsdams pas/ ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas rdul byung bar gyur te/ dper na/
58a3(mdo sde): mi stobs dang ldan pas mi stobs shin tu chung ba zhig phyi nag log tu bcings/ mngon du bsngams/ shin tu mngon du bsngams na de'i ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas rdul
58a4(mdo sde): byung ba de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' tshems la tshems gtad/ ljags rkan la bcar te/ thugs kyis thugs mngon du bzung / mngon du bsngams/ shin tu
58a5(mdo sde): mngon du bsngams pa la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la
58a6(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/ /des rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/ des rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag
58a7(mdo sde): la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ zhal dang / shangs nas dbugs rdub pa dang / 'byung ba bgags so/ /de'i zhal dang / shangs nas dbugs rdub pa dang / 'byung ba 'gags pa
58b1(mdo sde): dang | rlung thams cad spyi bo'i nang du song nas de'i dbu la dbu'i tsher ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes so/ /dper na/ mi stobs dang ldan pas mi stobs shin tu chung pa'i spyi bor lcags
58b2(mdo sde): kyi phur pa rnon po btab na/ de'i mgo la mgo'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skye ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa
58b3(mdo sde): na| dbu la dbu'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/ sku ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/ rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa
58b4(mdo sde): nye bar bzhag pa yin te/ sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sdug bsngal drag po mi bzad pa rtsub pa ba tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta
58b5(mdo sde): bu nyams su myong ba'ang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongs su gtugs te mi gnas so/ /de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis lhag par rnam par
58b6(mdo sde): bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/ /des lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/ de rnam
58b7(mdo sde): bar bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ zhal dang / shangs nas dbugs rdub pa dang / 'byung ba bgags so/ /de'i zhal dang / shangs nas dbugs rdub pa
59a1(mdo sde): dang | 'byung ba 'gags pas rlung thams cad snyan gnyis kyi bu ga nas rgyus par gyur to/ /dper na/ mgar bas sbud pa bus na rlung thams cad kyi rgyun gra
59a2(mdo sde): gnyis kyi bu ga nas rgyu ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ rlung thams cad kyi rgyun snyan gnyis kyi bu ga
59a3(mdo sde): nas rgyus par gyur kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs
59a4(mdo sde): te| ma la bdag gis lhag par yang rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/ /des lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la
59a5(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/ de rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rdub pa dang 'byung ba bgags
59a6(mdo sde): so| |de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rdub pa dang 'byung ba bgags pas phyal gyi nang thams cad rgyas par gyur/ shin tu rgyas par gyur te/ dper na/ mgar ba mkhas
59a7(mdo sde): pa'i spud pa bus na gang bar gyur/ shin tu gang bar gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa
59b1(mdo sde): na phyal gyi nang thams cad rgyas par gyur/ shin tu rgyas par gyur kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas byang
59b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/ /des lhag par rnam par bam pa'i
59b3(mdo sde): bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/ de rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ zhal dang / shangs nas dbugs rdub pa dang /
59b4(mdo sde): 'byung ba bgags so/ /de'i zhal dang / shangs nas dbugs rdub pa dang / 'byung ba bgags pa dang / de'i tshe dbu la dbu'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes so/ /dper na/ mi stobs
59b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pas mi stobs shin tu chung ba'i mgo phreng bas yang nas yang du bcings na/ de'i mgo la mgo'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skye ba de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems
59b6(mdo sde): dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ dbu la dbu'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa
59b7(mdo sde): yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par
60a1(mdo sde): 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/ /de lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/ des rnam par bam pa'i bsam
60a2(mdo sde): gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na zhal dang / shangs nas dbugs rdub pa dang / 'byung ba bgags so/ /de'i zhal dang / shangs nas dbugs rdub pa dang / 'byung ba bgags pa
60a3(mdo sde): dang | de'i tshe khong du khong gi tshor ba mi bzad pa skyes so/ /dper na/ ba lang gi bshan pa mkhas pa'am/ ba lang gi bshan pa'i slob ma mkhas pas ba lang bsad pa'i
60a4(mdo sde): g ri rnon pos ba lang gi lto dral na de'i khong gi tshor ba shin tu mi zad pa skye ba de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms
60a5(mdo sde): par zhugs pa na khong du khong gi tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /
60a6(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis rnam par bsam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/ /de lhag
60a7(mdo sde): par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/ des rnam par bsam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na zhal dang /
60b1(mdo sde): shangs nas dbugs rdub pa dang / 'byung ba ba gags so/ /de'i zhal dang / shangs nas dbugs rdub pa dang / 'byung ba bgags pa de'i tshe sku la sku'i gdung ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes
60b2(mdo sde): so| |dper na/ mi shin tu stobs dang ldan pa gnyis kyis mi stobs shin tu chung ba zhig phyin log du bzung ste me dong gi nang du dpyangs na/ de'i lus la lus kyi gdung ba shin
60b3(mdo sde): t u mi bzad pa skye ba de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na sku la sku'i gdung ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes kyang
60b4(mdo sde): de zhum pa ma yin gyi/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis thams
60b5(mdo sde): cad kyi thams cad du zas mi bza' ba bsgrub par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas lha rab tu mang po'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i thugs shes nas byang chub sems dpa' gang na bder
60b6(mdo sde): dong ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po/ gal te khyod mi'i kha zas kyis 'dzem par mdzad/ ngo tsha bar mdzad/ smon par mdzad na/ bdag
60b7(mdo sde): cag gis khyod kyi ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas lha'i mdangs bsgrub par bgyi'i khyod kyis bdag gir mdzod cig / de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/
61a1(mdo sde): gal te bdag gis mi'i kha zas mi bza' bar dam bcas la bdag gi ba spu'i khung bu thams cad du lha rnams kyis lha'i mdangs bsgrubs nas da
61a2(mdo sde): bdag gir byed pa ni bdag gi rdzun yin la/ bdag gi rdzun gang yin pa de ni bdag gi log pa yin no/ /bdag gi log pa gang yin pa de'i rkyen gyis na 'di na sems can kha
61a3(mdo sde): cig lus zhig ste shi nas ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes par 'gyur gyi/ mal bdag gis lha rnams kyi tshig ni thams cad kyi
61a4(mdo sde): thams cad du spangs la/ kha zas nyung ba dang / cung zad chang chung bza' ba'am/ yang na mon sran sde'u yi khu ba'am/ 'on te rgya sran gyi khu ba'am/ yang na ha re nu ka'i 'bras
61a5(mdo sde): bu'i khu ba btung ngo snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas de'i tshe lha rnams kyi tshig thams cad kyi thams cad du spangs nas zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / cung
61a6(mdo sde): zad dang / chang chung gsol ba'am/ yang na mon sran sde'u yi khu ba'am/ 'on te rgya sran gyi khu ba'am/ yang na ha re nu ka'i 'bras bu'i khu ba gsol lo/ /de nas byang
61a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / cung zad dang / chang chung gsol ba na/ yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad kun tu zhum ste/ skam zhing
61b1(mdo sde): sku dbal chung bar gyur to/ /dper na/ ldum bu i si ta'i sdong bu dang / ka li ka'i sdong bu 'jum/ kun tu 'jum pas sha chung zhing bskams par gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub
61b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / cung zad dang / chang chung gsol ba na/ yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad zhum/ kun tu zhum ste/ skem zhing sku dbal chung bar
61b3(mdo sde): gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / cung zad dag chang chung gsol ba na/ dbu la dbu'i pags pa rnyings/ kun tu rnyings te/ 'khums
61b4(mdo sde): shing 'bar 'bur du gyur to/ /dper na/ ku ba rtsa ba nas bcad na rnyis/ kun tu rnyis pas 'khums la 'bar 'bur du gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung
61b5(mdo sde): ba dang | chung ba dang / cung zad dang / chang chung gsol ba na/ dbu la dbu'i pags pa rnyis/ kun tu rnyes te/ 'khums shing 'bar 'bur du gyur kyang de zhum pa ma yin te/ brtson
61b6(mdo sde): 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / cung zad dang /
61b7(mdo sde): chang chung gsol ba na/ spyan gnyis kyi spyan gyi 'bras bu phug tu song zhing shin tu phug tu song ste zab pa shin tu zab par ring du song bas phyung ba lta bur snang ngo / /dper na/ khron
62a1(mdo sde): pa zab mo'i chur skar ma'i gzugs brnyan phug tu song zhing shin tu phug tu song ste/ zab pa shin tu zab par ring du song bar gtam du bya ba de bzhin du de'i tshe
62a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / cung zad dang / chang chung gsol ba na/ spyan gnyis kyi spyan gyi 'bras bu phug tu song / shin tu phug tu song ste/ zab pa shin
62a3(mdo sde): tu zab par ring du song bas phyung ba lta bur snang yang de zhum pa ma yin gyi/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
62a4(mdo sde): zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / cung zad dang / chang chung gsol ba na/ de'i tshe rtsib ma'i bar mtho dman can du gyur te/ dper na/ rtswa khang lo gnyis sam/ gsum lon pa'i
62a5(mdo sde): phyam dgu po mtho dman du gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba dang / cung zad dang / chang chung gsol ba na/ rtsib ma'i bar mtho dman can
62a6(mdo sde): du gyur kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams ni snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang / chung ba
62a7(mdo sde): dang | cung zad dang / chang chung gsol ba na/ sgal pa'i tshigs 'di lta ste/ skra'i lan bu lta bur gyur to/ /mjug do ni/ 'di lta ste/ rnga mo'i rkang pa lta bur
62b1(mdo sde): gyur to/ /de lan 'ga' ldang bar 'dod na kha sbub tu 'gyel la/ lan 'ga' 'dug par 'dod na gan rkyal du 'gyel lo/ /de ro stod la brten nas ro smad 'jog
62b2(mdo sde): par byed/ ro smad la brten nas ro stod 'jog par byed do/ /de phyag gnyis kyis sku la byugs te/ de'i phyag gnyis kyis sku la byugs/ yongs su byugs pa de'i
62b3(mdo sde): tshe ba spu rnams drung rul bas sa la lhags par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la/ bdag gis til 'bru gcig gis
62b4(mdo sde): zas bza' bar bya'o zhes te des til 'bru gcig gi zas gsol to/ /de til 'bru gcig gi zas gsol ba na yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad
62b5(mdo sde): zhum kun du zhum ste skem zhing sku dbal chung bar gyur to/ /til 'bru gcig gis ji lta bar 'bras bu gcig dang / sran go la 'bru gcig dang / rgya
62b6(mdo sde): sran 'bru gcig dang / mon sran gre'u 'bru gcig dang / mon sran sde'u 'bru gcig dang / rtsa'i gding ba la mnal bar mdzad do/ /rgyal po zas
62b7(mdo sde): gtsang gis dka' ba la spyod pa'i gnas skabs de thos nas nyi ma re re zhing rtog pa nyis brgya lnga bcu gtong bar byed do/ /rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis
63a1(mdo sde): kyang nyis brgya lnga bcu'o/ /de dag nyi ma re re zhing de gnyis la myur ba myur bar gtam skyel bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di 'dra ba'i dka' ba
63a2(mdo sde): spyod de/ /til 'bru gcig dang / 'bras 'bru gcig dang / sran gol 'bru gcig dang / rgya sran 'bru gcig dang / mon sren gre'u 'bru gcig dang / mon sran sde'u 'bru gcig gi
63a3(mdo sde): zas gsol zhing rtswa'i gding ba la mnal to zhes smra'o/ /de rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas bu'i mya ngan gyis non pas lhag par dang kan zhing mig mchims pa rnams te gdungs
63a4(mdo sde): nas btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas par rtswa'i gding ba la nyal bar byed do/ /grags 'dzin mas kyang de thos pa dang / khyim thab kyi mya ngan gyis mnon to/ /til 'bru gcig za ba
63a5(mdo sde): dang | de'i rum mi bde ba de nyid du zhu bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ lam 'di'ang shes par nus pa ma yin/ mthong bar nus pa ma yin/
