63a6(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin no snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis kha zas shin tu ngan
63a7(mdo sde): pa bza' bar bya'o snyam ste des kha zas shin tu ngan pa gsol bar mdzad do/ /de la zas phal pa ni 'di yin te/ be'u byung nas ring po ma lon pa'i 'o ma 'thung ba gang yin pa de
63b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi gcin dang / lci ba yin no/ /de ji srid de'i sku las mdangs de yal bar ma gyur pa de srid du zas gnyis pa mi gsol to/ /yal nas kha zas phyi ma gsol bar mdzad do/ /dur khrod
63b2(mdo sde): chen por gshegs nas kyang mi ro dbu rten du bcug/ zhabs la zhabs bzhag ste/ snang ba'i 'du shes dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang ldan pa'i 'du shes yid la mdzad pas glo
63b3(mdo sde): g.yas bas mnal bar mdzad do/ /de'i tshe grong khyer gyi gzhon nu rnams dang / grong khyer gyi gzhon nu ma rnams lhags nas shing bus de'i snyan gnyis kyi bu gar 'dzugs par byed/ rna
63b4(mdo sde): ba gnyis ka nas 'dren par byed cing 'di skad ces/ kye phyag dar khrod kyi sha za ba la ltos/ kye phyag dar khrod kyi sha za ba la ltos zhes smra bar yang byed do/ /de'i tshe phyag dar dang / bong
63b5(mdo sde): rdog dang / gseg mas kyang 'thor bar byed do/ /'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni grong khyer gyi gzhon nu rnams sam/ grong khyer gyi gzhon nu ma de rnams la ngan sems skyed pa'am/
63b6(mdo sde): sdig pa'i tshig dbyung bar mi dgongs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dka' thub chen po la dka' ba spyod pas na/ dge sbyong chen po/ dge sbyong chen po zhes mtshan du gyur te/ de ltar la
63b7(mdo sde): drug gi bar du dka' thub spyad par mdzad do/ /de nas lha gsum zhig byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der lhags te/ de nas lha gcig gis 'di skad ces smras so/ dge sbyong gau ta
64a1(mdo sde): ma ni nag po zhig go / gnyis pas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di ni nag po ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang sngo bsangs zhig go /gsum pas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di
64a2(mdo sde): ni nag po'ang ma yin/ /sngo bsangs kyang ma yin gyi dmar smug zhig go /byang chub sems dpa'i sku mdog bzang por snang ba ni thams cad kyi thams cad du nub par gyur to/ /de
64a3(mdo sde): nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa'i dpe gsum zhig gnas pa 'di lta ste/ shing rlon pa chu can zhig chu nas phyung ste/ nye bar skam la bzhag pa dang / de
64a4(mdo sde): nas mi me don du gnyer ba/ me tshol ba zhig 'dir 'ongs nas des de la gtsub stan byas te/ gtsub shing bzhag nas gtsubs na 'di ltar shing de rlon pa chu can yin pa'i phyir
64a5(mdo sde): me 'byung ba dang / 'bar du mi btub pa de bzhin du dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze kha cig 'dod pa rnams la lus dang / sems kyis thag srid bar mi gnas kyi de rnams kyi 'dod pa
64a6(mdo sde): la 'dun pa dang / 'dod pa la chags pa dang / 'dod pa la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa la zhen pa dang / 'dod pa la 'chums pa dang / 'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa gang yin pa
64a7(mdo sde): de ni de rnams kyi sems yongs su gtugs te/ gnas pa ma yin pas lus dang / sems kyi thag sring bar mi gnas pa rnams kyi ni de dang 'dra'o/ /de rnams bdag nyid
64b1(mdo sde): gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong mod kyi 'on kyang de rnams kyis shes par nus pa ma yin/ mthong bar nus pa ma yin/
64b2(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin te/ de la 'di ni de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa'i dpe snang ba dang po yin no/ /dper na/ shing
64b3(mdo sde): rlon pa chu can zhig chu nas phyung ste nye bar skam la bzhag pa dang / de nas mi me don du gnyer ba me tshol ba zhig 'ongs nas de la des gtsub stan byas te gtsub shing gzhag nas
64b4(mdo sde): gtsubs nas 'di ltar shing de rlon pa chu can yin pa'i phyir me 'byung ba dang / 'bar du mi btub pa de bzhin du dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze kha cig 'dod pa rnams la lus kyis spong bar gnas
64b5(mdo sde): kyi sems kyis ma yin pa de rnams kyis 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang / 'dod pa la chags pa dang / 'dod pa la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa la zhen pa dang / 'dod pa la 'chums pa dang /
64b6(mdo sde): 'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa gang yin pa de rnams kyi sems yongs su gtugs te gnas pa yin no/ /de rnams bdag nyid la gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid
64b7(mdo sde): du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams su myong mod kyi/ 'on kyang de rnams shes par nus pa ma yin/ mthong bar nus pa ma yin/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub
65a1(mdo sde): par nus pa ma yin te/ de la 'di ni de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa'i dpe snang ba gnyis pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/ shing skam khong stong
65a2(mdo sde): chu med pa zhig chu dang / thag ring por skam la bzhag pa dang / de nas mi me don du gnyer ba me tshol ba zhig 'ongs nas de de gtsub stan byas te/ gtsub shing bzhag nas gtsubs
65a3(mdo sde): na yang 'di ltar shing de skam zhing khong stong yin pa'i phyir me 'byung ba dang / 'bar du btub pa de bzhin du dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze kha cig 'dod pa rnams la lus dang / sems kyis thag
65a4(mdo sde): sring bar gnas pa de rnams kyi 'dod pa rnams la 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang / 'dod pa la chags pa dang / 'dod pa la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa la zhen pa dang / 'dod pa la
65a5(mdo sde): 'chums pa dang / 'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa gang yin pa de ni de rnams kyi sems yongs su gtugs te de mi gnas pa yin no/ /de rnams bdag nyid la gnod pa'i sdug
65a6(mdo sde): bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyams myong mod kyi 'on kyang de rnams kyis shes par nus/ mthong bar nus/ bla na med pa yang dag par
65a7(mdo sde): rdzogs par byang chub par nus te/ de la 'di ni de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa'i dpe snang ba gsum pa yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam
65b1(mdo sde): du dgongs te/ gang su dag sdug bsngal spong bar brtson par gnas pa de thams cad ni 'di tsam du zad de/ de las lhag pa'ang med/ de'i gong na lam 'di'ang shes par nus pa ma yin/
65b2(mdo sde): mthong bar nus pa ma yin/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te shes par nus pa dang / mthong
65b3(mdo sde): bar nus pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa'i lam de gang yin snyam na/ de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdag yab shAkya zas gtsang gi khyim na gnas
65b4(mdo sde): pa'i tshe zhing las kyi mtha'i drung du song nas shing dzam+bu'i grib ma la 'dug ste 'dod pa las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas
65b5(mdo sde): shing dben pa la skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrub ste gnas pa de mngon par dran te/ de ni lam yin/ de ni bsgrub pa yin/ shes par nus pa
65b6(mdo sde): yin| mthong bar nus pa yin/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa yin na/ de la bdag gis bskyed du yang 'di ltar rid cing nyams chung la zhan pas
65b7(mdo sde): sla ba ma yin te/ ma la bdag gis ci bder dbugs rdub pa dang / ci bder dbugs dbyung ba dang / ci bder 'bras chan dang / zan dron gyi kha zas rags pa bza' zhing lus
66a1(mdo sde): mar sar dang / til mar gyis byugs la chu 'jam pos lus bkru bar bya'o snyam ste/ de ci bder dbugs rdub pa dang / ci bder dbugs 'byung ba dang /
66a2(mdo sde): ci bder 'bras chan dang / zan dron gyi zhal zas rags pa gsol zhing sku til mar dang / mar sar gyis byugs nas chu 'jam pos sku 'khru bar mdzad do/ /de nas rim gro pa de
66a3(mdo sde): rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag /dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di ni sdom pa lhod pa/ bya ba mang ba/ mang pos 'tsho ba/ spong ba nyams par gyur pa yin te/ 'di da ltar
66a4(mdo sde): 'bras chan dang / zan dron gyi kha zas mang du za la lus zhun mar dang / til mar gyi byugs nas chu 'jam pos lus khrus byed de/ 'dis da ni cung zad kyang thob par mi nus so
66a5(mdo sde): snyam du bsams nas byang chub sems dpa' bor te dong ba las/ rim gyis wA ra NA sir phyin nas drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na gnas so/ /de nas byang chub sems
66a6(mdo sde): dpa'i rim gyis lus kyi stobs dang / mthu dang / brtson 'grus yang dag par bskyed nas rim gyis sde can gyi grong khyer du gshegs so/ /de ni grong khyer sde can zhes bya
66a7(mdo sde): ba na nai rany+dza nA'i chu bo'i 'gram na bzhugs pa dang / bram ze lha zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi grogs bshes su gyur pa de sde can gyi grong khyer na gnas pa dang /
66b1(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyod pa mdzad pa mthong nas/ grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma gnyis la smras pa/ khyed gnyis kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i
66b2(mdo sde): sras mtshan mkhan gyis gal te rab tu byung bar ma gyur na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de thos sam/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bdag cag
66b3(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang gal te de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na bdag cag de'i btsun mor gyur cig ces smon lam btab lags so/ /bram ze lhas smras pa/ bdag nyid
66b4(mdo sde): chen po de ni dka' thub kyis lus gdungs pas spong ba las bzhengs na khyed gnyis kyis de la thog ma kho nar bsod snyoms phul cig dang / de khyed cag gnyis kyi yun ring
66b5(mdo sde): po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i don du 'gyur ro/ /de nas bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs mas thos pa dang / ba stong pa zhes so/ /bzhos nas kyang ba lnga brgya la blud do/ /ba lnga
66b6(mdo sde): brgya bzhos nas nyis brgya lnga bcu la blud do/ /nyis brgya lnga bcu bzhos nas kyang brgya la blud do/ /brgya bzhos nas lnga bcu la blud do/ /lnga bcu bzhos nas nyi shu la blud do/ /
66b7(mdo sde): nyi shu bzhos te ma spar nas shel las byas pa'i snod kyi nang du blugs nas 'o thug bskol bar brtsams pa na/ bram ze rnams kyis bsams pa/ 'dir nges par bag ma len
67a1(mdo sde): tam| bag ma gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas bram ze mang po 'dus par gyur pa dang / 'o thug stong du bsgres pa bskol ba na bum pa bzang po dang / dpal
67a2(mdo sde): be'u dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba'i mtshan ma dag byung ba snang ba dang / kun tu rgyu nye 'gro zhes bya bas mthong nas bsams pa/ 'o ma'i thug pa 'di sus 'thungs pa des ni
67a3(mdo sde): bla na med pa'i ye shes 'thob par 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag gis bslang ngo snyam mo/ /de nas brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni dka' thub kyis
67a4(mdo sde): sku lus nyam chung zhing sku la sbrebs pa dang / skyems pas nyen pa yin la byang chub sems dpa' 'o thug gsol na bla na med pa'i ye shes thugs su chud par 'gyur
67a5(mdo sde): na| bram ze 'di dag ni rang bzhin gyis brkam pa dag 'dir 'dus par gyur pas gal te byang chub sems dpa' la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ ri spos kyi ngad
67a6(mdo sde): ldang nas lha'i sman blangs te/ de shin tu gzugs bzang ba'i bram ze zhig tu mngon par sprul nas 'o thug de skol ba'i steng du 'dug ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis der
67a7(mdo sde): sman mthu ba skyed pa zhes bya ba blugs so/ /de nas dga' mo dang / dga' stobs mas 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar ba stong du bsgres pa bskol nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di
67b1(mdo sde): skad ces smras so/ /khyod nyid rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sras de yin nam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ de ni nga'i mkhan po yin te/ nga ni de'i slob ma yin no/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
67b2(mdo sde): gyis 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar ba stong du bsgres pa blangs so/ /blangs nas kyang dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma gnyis la smras pa/ sbyin pa 'dis khyed gnyis ci zhig don du gnyer/
67b3(mdo sde): gang gi don du yon bsngo bar bya/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ gsol ba phul ba'i bsod nams ci mchis pas/ /grags dang ldan pa don rnams kun grub pa/ /mi yi mchog gyur blo
67b4(mdo sde): mchog ldan pa de'i/ /don kun myur du shin tu grub gyur cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chu klung nai rany+dza nA ra zhugs nas sku khrus mdzad de/ rgal bar bzhed pa dang / sku
67b5(mdo sde): nyam chung ba nyid kyis rgal bar ma spyod pa na lha rnams kyis a rdzu na'i yal ga btud pa dang / de la 'jus nas byang chub sems dpa' rgal bar mdzad de chos gos mnabs nas
67b6(mdo sde): chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram na bzhugs so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' bde bar bzhugs par rig nas 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar ba stong du bsgres
67b7(mdo sde): ba yol gor blugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' la bstabs so/ /byang chub sems dpas kyang gsol nas yon bsngo bar mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chu klung nai rany+dza
68a1(mdo sde): na'i 'gram na phan tshun du bzhugs pa'i sa btsal ba dang / ci tsam na ri brag chen po me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa zhig gzigs nas de de la
68a2(mdo sde): 'dzegs te phyogs dben zhing gsal ba'i phyogs su skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/ /bzhugs ma thag tu ri de nyid du rnyil to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs
68a3(mdo sde): te| 'dir rgyu ci zhig yod na ri rnyil bar gyur/ ci nga 'od ba la lha rnams mngon par mi dga'am/ 'on te bgegs 'ga' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mo/ /lha rnams kyis byang
68a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i thugs shes nas gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sa thams cad kyis gzung bar rngo mi thog pa ni gnyis te/ dge ba'i rtse ba chad pa gang lags pa dang / dge
68a5(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa gang lags pa ste/ khyod ni dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa lags so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas ma lags te/ 'on kyang mdun du bzhud cig
68a6(mdo sde): dang | de na rdo rje'i gdan mchis te/ der ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bzhugs nas bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par
68a7(mdo sde): gyur cing thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ltas lam bstan pa bzhin gshegs pa na de'i zhabs bzhag sar pad+ma dag byung bar gyur to/ /rgya mtsho chen po bzhi
68b1(mdo sde): las kyang chu bab nas pad+ma'i rdzing dag byung bar gyur to/ /gom pa bor nas mnan pa nas chen po 'di 'khar ba'i snod bzhin du sgra 'byin par brtsams so/ /bya tsa sha dang / ri dwags dag
68b2(mdo sde): gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la skor ba byed do/ /rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang dal bu dal bus rlung gtong bar byed do/ /char pa 'bebs pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang
68b3(mdo sde): char pa cung zad 'babs par byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga la 'di 'dra ba'i mtshan ma bzang po byung bar gyur pas deng nyid bdag gis bla na med
68b4(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram na klu'i rgyal po dus can zhes bya ba long ba zhig gnas te/ der de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i
68b5(mdo sde): gnas zhig byung bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas byung ba na mig thob par 'gyur la/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na slar long par 'gyur ro/ /de sa'i sgra grags pas gnas nas
68b6(mdo sde): byung ba dang / rgyang ring po kho na nas byang chub sems dpa' sku skyes bu'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan la/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras pa/ 'od 'dom gang
68b7(mdo sde): gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od zer dang / rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' la tshigs su bcad
69a1(mdo sde): pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod par brtsams pa/ dga' ba'i dbyangs kyis kun gang ba'i/ /sa yi sgra ni thos nas kyang / /klu yi gnas nas byung nas su/ /phyogs
69a2(mdo sde): kun tu yang lta bar byed/ /brang gis 'gro ba'i gtso bo ste/ /klu yi rgyal po mthu chen gyis/ /nai rany+dza nA'i ngogs su ni/ /'jig rten 'dren pa gshegs pa mthong / /sangs rgyas
69a3(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i mthu yis ni/ /klu yis mig ni thob gyur te/ /sems ni dga' zhing yid mgu nas/ /des ni 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag gis sngon ni mthong ba yin/ /sangs rgyas
69a4(mdo sde): mthu chen de rnams dang / /thub pa khyod ni mthong gyur na/ /de dang tha dad dbyer ma mchis/ /thub pa ji ltar thog mar ni/ /g.yas pa'i zhabs ni 'degs pa lags/ /khyod ni
69a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas deng gyur nas/ /'jig rten gyi ni yon gnas 'gyur/ /ji ltar chos gos mnabs pa dang / /nai rany+dza nA'i chu bsil la/ /ji lta bur ni 'jug pa las/ /de ring khyod ni
69a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /ji ltar rab brtan 'gros su gshegs pa dang / /ba lang khyu mchog 'gying ba ltar gshegs pas/ /skyes bu khyu mchog chos 'dzin rnams kyi mchog /deng
69a7(mdo sde): 'dir khyod ni sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar mkha' la tsa sha brgya phrag gis/ /khyod sku rgya chen rgya chen mdzad de la/ /lding zhing skor bar bgyid par gyur pa las/ /mi
69b1(mdo sde): mchog deng ni sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar dri zhim rlung ni ldang ba dang / /ri dwags bya yi tshogs kyang mi skrag la/ /ljon shing rlung gis g.yos par ma gyur pas/ /mi mchog
69b2(mdo sde): deng ni sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar btsun pa khyod kyi zhal gyi 'od/ /dri med gser 'od 'bar ba 'dra ba de/ /rnam par mdzes shing kha dog ldan pas na/ /mi mchog deng ni
69b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' klu'i rgyal po dus can gyis yang dag par bstod nas rdo rje'i gdan logs su gshegs so/ /de nas byang chub sems
69b4(mdo sde): dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te rtswa'i gding ba la 'dug par bya'o snyam pa dang / de la rtswa'i dgos pa byung bar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dgongs pa
69b5(mdo sde): s hes nas ri sbos kyi ngad ldang las shing bal gyi 'dab ma ltar reg na bde ba'i rtswa khur cig blangs nas rtswa 'tshong bkra shis kyi cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul te byang chub
69b6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i spyan snga na sdod do/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ bzhin bzang / rtswa 'o ni dag nga la phul cig /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i
69b7(mdo sde): zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas gus pa dang bcas pas phul lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtswa 'tshong bkra shis las rtswa bzhes te lha dang / mi rnams kyi yid sdud par byed pa'i spyod
70a1(mdo sde): l am gyis 'gro ba rnams dad par mdzad cing lha rnams kyis bstan pa'i lam nas byang chub kyi snying po gang na ba der gshegs te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
70a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor lo'i lte ba lta bu'i rdo rje'i gdan la brtan zhing nges pas nyid kyis rtswa rnams ma 'khrugs pa dang / stug srab med par bkram nas thugs bskyed
70a3(mdo sde): cing tshig tu yang gsung pa/ ji srid sdug bsngal kun gyi mtha'i/ /zag zad yang dag ma thob pa/ /de srid srog ni mthar gyur kyang / /skyil krung 'di ni gzhig mi bya/ /zhes gsungs
70a4(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gdan la 'dzegs te brang gis 'gro'i rgyal po gnyid log pa'i lus bskyil ba lta bu'i skyil mo krung bcas nas sku drangs por ba srang / dran
70a5(mdo sde): pa mngon du bzhag nas bzhugs so/ /bzhugs pa'i mod kho na la bdud sdig can gyi gnas g.yos par gyur to/ /de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ ci'i phyir nga'i
70a6(mdo sde): gnas g.yos snyam pa dang / ci tsam na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ shAkya zas gtsang gi bu
70a7(mdo sde): r do rje'i gdan la 'dug gi ji tsam bdag gi yul las ma 'das kyi bar du de la bgegs bya'o snyam du bsams nas phrin yig skyel pa skra gyen du 'greng la sha na'i smad g.yog
70b1(mdo sde): bkos pa zhig gi kha dog tu mngon par sprul nas byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin nas rtabs par smras pa/ grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi ni lha sbyin gyis mnan/ pho brang ni
70b2(mdo sde): bcom/ shAkya rnams ni kha btag na/ khyod ci'i phyir gnas btab ste 'dug/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' la sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa gsum skyes pa/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod
70b3(mdo sde): pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o/ /de la 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni/ grags 'dzin ma dang / ri dwags
70b4(mdo sde): skyes dang / sa 'tsho ma la'o/ /gnod sems rnam par rtog pa ni/ lha sbyin la'o/ /rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni/ de'i rjes su 'tsho ba'i shAkya rnams la'o/ /de nas byang chub
70b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ci'i phyir bdag la sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa gsum skyes snyam na/ ji tsam na bdud sdig can/ 'di lta ste/ dkrug pa'i las kyi phyir
70b6(mdo sde): nye bar 'ongs pa gzigs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa gsum skyes te/ 'di lta ste/ nges par 'byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems med
70b7(mdo sde): pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o/ /yang bdud kyis smras pa/ khyod ci'i phyir byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug/ byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal
71a1(mdo sde): pa| bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /bdud kyis smras pa/ khyod kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes ga la thob/ byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal
71a2(mdo sde): p a| sdig can khyod kyis re zhig mchod sbyin gcig byas pas kyang 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par gyur na nges bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du mchod sbyin bye ba
71a3(mdo sde): khrag khrig brgya stong du ma byas shing sems can rnams kyi phyir mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / sha dang / khrag dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / dbyig dang / gser
71a4(mdo sde): la sogs pa yongs su btang nas bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ ngas bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par mi 'gyur ba de srid re skan/ de skad
71a5(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bdud kyis smras pa/ re zhig ji ltar bdag gis mchod sbyin gcig gis 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug thob par gyur pa'i bdag gi dbang ni
71a6(mdo sde): khyod yin na/ ji ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma byas shing sems
71a7(mdo sde): can rnams kyi phyir mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / sha dang / khrag dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / dbyig dang / gser la sogs pa yongs su btang bar
71b1(mdo sde): khyod la dpang su yod/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag 'khor lo dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil pa dang / dra bas 'brel ba dang / bsod nams
71b2(mdo sde): brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa/ skrag pa rnams la dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas sa la reg par mdzad nas/ ngas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya
71b3(mdo sde): stong phrag du ma byas shing sems can rnams kyi phyir mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / sha dang / khrag dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / dbyig dang / gser la sogs pa
71b4(mdo sde): yongs su btang ba'i nga'i dbang ni sa 'di yin no/ /de nas sa'i lhas sa brtol nas thal mo sbyar te skad phyung ba/ sdig can/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin yin
71b5(mdo sde): no zhes de skad ces smras pa dang / bdud sdig can cang mi smra bar gyur te zhum zhum por gyur/ bag 'khums par gyur/ spyi bo smad nas spobs pa med la sems khong du chud cing
71b6(mdo sde): 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis zas gtsang gi bu la de ltar byas kyang glags ma rnyed kyi/ mal 'di la bdag gis yang bgegs
71b7(mdo sde): shig bya'o snyam nas/ dpung mchog dang ldan pa bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug po glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / ra dang / ri dwags dang / ma he dang / phag dang / khyi dang / 'ug
72a1(mdo sde): pa dang / ne'u le dang / spre'u dang / wa la sogs pa 'dra ba/ ral gri dang / mda' bo che dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / 'khor lo dang / mdung thung dang /
72a2(mdo sde): gzhu dang / zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / lcags kyi dbyug pa la sogs te mtshon cha rnams 'phyar ba 'jigs su rung ba rnams dang lhan cig byang chub sems dpa' kun nas
72a3(mdo sde): yongs su bskor nas gnas shing bdud sdig can rang nyid gzhu rna drung du bkang nas 'dug go / de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzugs rnam pa du ma can/ mtshon cha rnam pa sna
72a4(mdo sde): tshogs mang po dang chas pa de rnams gzigs nas dgongs pa re zhig skyes pa/ phal pa zhig dang lhan cig 'thab par rtsom na'ang / de'i gnyen po'i phyogs la sbyor bar
72a5(mdo sde): byed na 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug 'di la lta smos kyang ci dgos kyi/ ma la bdag gis gnyen po'i phyogs la sbyar bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas de zhi bar 'gyur ba'i
72a6(mdo sde): thabs la dgongs par brtsams so/ /bdud kyang 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i steng nas 'khor lo dang / mdung thung dang / mda'
72a7(mdo sde): po che dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / mda' la sogs te mtshon cha rnams dbab par brtsams so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' shel las byas pa'i gzhal yas khang
72b1(mdo sde): mngon par sprul pa dang / mtshon cha thams cad gzhal yas khang de'i steng du 'bab pa dang / gzhal yas khang gi sgras bdud kyi sde thams cad skrag nas kun tu 'byer bar gyur to/ /de
72b2(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' nam gyi thun dang po la rtag tu bya ba dang / 'grus skyong dang ldan zhing byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos rnams la bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su
72b3(mdo sde): brtson pas bzhugs so/ /de nam gyi thun dang po la rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na de rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam
72b4(mdo sde): pa du ma nyams su myong bar mdzad de/ gcig tu gyur cing mang por gyur la/ mang por gyur cing gcig tu 'gyur ba dang / snang bar gyur cing mi snang bar gyur pa ye shes
72b5(mdo sde): gzigs pas nyams su myong bar mdzad do/ /skus rtsig pa dang / ri dang / ra ba la'ang thad kar gshegs par mdzad de/ dper na/ nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no/ /sa la'ang
72b6(mdo sde): steng du 'byung ba dang / byi'u zul mdzad de/ dper na/ chu la bya ba bzhin no/ /chu'i rgyun la'ang mi nyams par gshegs te/ dper na/ sa la bya ba bzhin no/ /nam mkha'
72b7(mdo sde): la skyil mo krung gis gshegs par mdzad de/ dper na/ 'dab chags bya bzhin no/ /nyi ma dang / zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar gzi brjid che ba la'ang
73a1(mdo sde): phyag gis nom zhing nyug par mdzad de/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du skus dbang sgyur bar mdzad do/ /de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/
73a2(mdo sde): bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas/ ma la bdag gis rgyad ring po kho nar 'dug la sgra dbyung bar bya'o snyam nas des 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug dang / 'jigs pa chen
73a3(mdo sde): po 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra phyung ngo / /byang chub sems dpas kyang de bsgrib pa'i phyir dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi bar du shing ka dam pa'i tshal sprul pas des na sgra de rdugs pas
73a4(mdo sde): mi grag go / de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la bdag gis lha'i rna ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la sems mngon du bzhag
73a5(mdo sde): nas des na lha dang mi rnams kyi sgra gang dang / gang dag thos par 'dod pa de dag mnyan par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/ lha'i rna ba shes par mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes
73a6(mdo sde): pa la dgongs pa bzhag pa na de'i lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas sgra gnyis po mi rnams kyi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyi dang / gang dag ring ba dang / gang dag nye
73a7(mdo sde): ba'ang gsan to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdud kyi 'khor 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug las bdag la su dag ni gnod par sems/ su dag
73b1(mdo sde): ni ma yin zhes de dag ji ltar shes par bya snyam pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa
73b2(mdo sde): yin no snyam nas de nam gyi gung thun la sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na de'i thugs kyis sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi rnam par rtog pa dang /
73b3(mdo sde): rnam par dpyod pa'i yid ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i
73b4(mdo sde): sems so zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems so zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /zhe sdang dang
73b5(mdo sde): bcas pa dang / zhe sdang dang bral ba dang / gti mug dang bcas pa dang / gti mug dang bral ba dang / bsdus pa dang / rnam par g.yengs pa dang / zhum pa dang / rab tu 'dzin pa dang /
73b6(mdo sde): rgod pa dang / mi rgod pa dang / nye bar ma zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa dang / ma bsgoms pa dang / bsgoms pa dang / sems
73b7(mdo sde): rnam par ma grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sems la shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sems zhes yang dag pa ji
74a1(mdo sde): lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdud kyi mngag gzhug pa 'di rnams las su dag tshe rabs gzhan
74a2(mdo sde): na mar 'brel ba'am/ phar 'brel ba'am/ su dag gshed ma'am/ phyir rgol ba'am/ dgrar gyur pa de dag ji ltar shes par bya snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di
74a3(mdo sde): snyam du dgongs te/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa mngon sum du byas pa'i mngon par shes pas yin no snyam nas de nam gyi gung thun la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i
74a4(mdo sde): shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na des sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dgongs te/ 'di lta ste/ skye ba gcig dang / gnyis
74a5(mdo sde): dang | gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / drug dang / bdun dang / brgyad dang / dgu dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu dang / skye ba brgya dang /
74a6(mdo sde): skye ba stong dang / skye ba brgya stong dang / skye ba brgya phrag du ma dang / skye ba stong phrag du ma dang / skye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa dang / 'chags pa'i bskal
74a7(mdo sde): pa dang / 'jig pa dang / chags pa'i bskal pa dang / 'jigs pa'i bskal pa du ma dang / 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma dang / 'jig pa dang / 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma rjes
74b1(mdo sde): su dgongs te/ bdag sngon sems can 'di dag gi nang na gnas pa na ming ni 'di zhes bya/ rigs ni 'di zhes bya/ rus ni 'di zhes bya/ zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/ bde ba dang /
74b2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig nyams su myong / tshe ni 'di srid cig lon/ yun ni 'di srid cig 'dug 'dug/ tshe 'di srid cig lon te gnas de nas bdag shi 'phos te che ge mo zhig
74b3(mdo sde): du skyes so/ /de nas kyang shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so/ /de nas kyang shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so zhes rnam par dang bcas pa/ yul phyogs dang bcas par sngon gyi gnas
74b4(mdo sde): rnam pa du ma rjes su dgongs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdud kyi mngag gzhug 'di rnams las su dag ni ngan song du 'gro/ su dag ni ngan song du
74b5(mdo sde): mi 'gro ba de dag ji ltar shes par bya snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pas yin
74b6(mdo sde): no snyam ste/ de nam gyi thun tha mal 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na de'i lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi rnams
74b7(mdo sde): kyi las 'das pas gzigs na sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dang / kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / dman pa dang / gya nom pa dang / bde 'gro dang / nga
75a1(mdo sde): 'gror 'gro ba'i sems can rnams la ji lta ba bzhin gyi rjes su 'gro ba/ ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/ shes ldan dag /sems can 'di zhes bya ba 'di
75a2(mdo sde): dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag gi dang / yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang / ldan te/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa log par lta ba ste/ log par lta ba'i
75a3(mdo sde): chos dang las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus rgyu de rnams dang / rkyen des lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar
75a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /shes ldan dag/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gi dang / yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan te/ 'phags pa rnams la
75a5(mdo sde): skur pa mi 'debs shing yang dag par lta ba ste/ yang dag par lta ba'i chos dang las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus rgyu de dang / rkyen des lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro
75a6(mdo sde): mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha dang mi rnams su skye par 'gyur ro zhes rab tu mkhyen to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs te rtag tu bya ba dang / 'grus
75a7(mdo sde): skyong dang ldan zhing byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos rnams la sgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su mthun pas bzhugs te/ de nam gyi thun tha ma la zag pa zad pa'i shes
75b1(mdo sde): pa mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na/ des 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /'di ni sdug bsngal
75b2(mdo sde): kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /de de ltar shes shing de
75b3(mdo sde): ltar mthong na 'dod pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur zhing / srid pa'i zag pa dang / ma rig pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par grol
75b4(mdo sde): na bdag gis skye ba ni zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa la bsten to/ /bya ba byas so/ /'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes de nyid du yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
75b5(mdo sde): m ngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes thugs su chud par gyur cing de ltar bcom ldan 'das nam gyi thun tha ma la bdud 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug dang bcas pa las
75b6(mdo sde): byams pa'i mtshon gyis mngon par rgyal te bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes so/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyi lag pa nas gzhu shor ba dang / rgyal mtshan rtse mo thur du lta ba dang /
75b7(mdo sde): gnas g.yos par gyur to/ /de nas bdud sdig can 'byung po'i 'khor bye ba phrag gsum cu rtsa drug dang bcas par sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la yid la bcags te de nyid du mi snang
76a1(mdo sde): bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ste/ sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la pham par gyur pas sems pa la zhugs te mdas sa la 'dre zhing gnas par gyur
76a2(mdo sde): to| |de nas bdud kyi bu mo sred ma dang / dga' byed ma dang / dga' spyod ma zhes bya ba bdud gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab khyod
76a3(mdo sde): ci phyir thugs mi dgyes/ /ci yi phyir na 'di ltar bzhugs/ /gang gis khyod la gnod byed pa'i/ /skyes bu gang la rjes su sems/ /gsungs shig de ni 'dod chags kyi/ /zhags
76a4(mdo sde): pas nags nas glang po bzhin/ /bcings nas bdag cag 'tshal te mchi/ /de ni khyod kyi dbang du gyur/ /bdud kyis smras pa/ skyes bu 'dod chags rab bral te/ /chags
76a5(mdo sde): pas legs par dgug mi nus/ /bdud kyi yul 'das de yi phyir/ /nga ni shin tu mya ngan byed/ /de nas sred ma dang / dga' byed ma dang / dga' spyod ma ste/ bdud kyi bu mo
76a6(mdo sde): gsum po sprin las byung ba'i glog bzhin du gzi brjid rab tu 'bar zhing rang gi gnas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan
76a7(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la bdud sdig can gyi bu mo gsum gyis 'di skad
76b1(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ /kye dge sbyong khyod kyi zhabs la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi ri ma gro bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang sred pa yang dag par zad cing
76b2(mdo sde): rnam par grol la thugs yang dag par shin tu rnam par grol ba bla na med pa brnyes pas de la dgongs par ma mdzad do/ /lan gnyis lan gsum du'ang bcom ldan 'das la bdud kyi
76b3(mdo sde): bu mo gsum gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye dge sbyong khyod kyi zhabs la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi rim gro bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lan
76b4(mdo sde): g nyis lan gsum du'ang ci nas kyang sred pa yang dag par zad cing rnam par grol la thugs yang dag par shin tu rnam par grol ba bla na med pa brnyes pas de la dgongs par ma
76b5(mdo sde): mdzad do/ /de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum phyogs gcig tu song ste phan tshun smra zhing kun tu bgros pa/ shes ldan spun zla dag/ skyes pa rnams kyis bud med la sred pa ni tha dad
76b6(mdo sde): pa yin pas/ ma la bdag cag gis gzhon nu ma mdog mdangs brgya phrag dang / gos dang / kha dog brgya phrag dang bcas par mngon par sprul zhing bu btsas ma myong ba dang /
76b7(mdo sde): lan gcig btsas pa dang / lan gnyis dang / gsum dang / lan bzhi btsas par mngon par sprul zhing bud med par ma'i tshul brgya phrag tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul la
77a1(mdo sde): dge sbyong gau ta ma gang na ba der nye bar 'gro bar bya'o/ /phyin nas kyang dge spyong gau ta ma la 'di skad ces dge sbyong khyod kyi zhabs la bsnyen bkur byed
77a2(mdo sde): cing bde bar gshegs pa khyod la rim gro pa bgyid do/ /zhes smra bar bya'o/ /de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum po gzhon nu'i mdog brgya stong du mar bdag nyid mngon par sprul cing
77a3(mdo sde): gos kha dog brgya phrag dang bcas pa nas ji srid du bud med par ma'i tshul brgya phrag tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/
77a4(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye dge
77a5(mdo sde): sbyong khyod kyi zhabs la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi rim gro ba bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang sred pa yang dag par zad cing rnam par
77a6(mdo sde): grol la thugs yang dag par shin tu rnam par grol ba bla na med pa brnyes pas de la dgongs par ma mdzad do/ /lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das la bdud kyi bu
77a7(mdo sde): mo gsum gyis de skad gsol kyang / lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dgongs par ma mdzad do/ /de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum phyogs gcig tu
77b1(mdo sde): song nas phan tshun 'di skad ces smra ste/ spun zla dag/ 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i skyes bu dag 'di lta bu'i thabs mang pos nye bar bsten cing gnas na de'i sems g.yengs par
77b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'am/ snying 'gas par 'gyur ba'am/ kha nas khrag dron po skyug par 'gyur ba'i gnas de ni yod na dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di ni 'u bu cag la/ sems gtod par mi byed kyi/
77b3(mdo sde): skyes pa rnams kyis bud med la sred pa ni tha dad pa yin gyi/ ma la bdag cag bud med rgan mo'i tshul brgya phrag tu mngon par sprul la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i gan du 'gro na de lta na ni
77b4(mdo sde): d ge sbyong gau ta ma bdag cag rnams la 'dun pa skyed pa'ang srid par 'gyur gyi zhes smras te bdud kyi bu mo gsum po bud med rgan mo'i tshul brgya phrag tu bdag nyid mngon par
77b5(mdo sde): sprul nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ snga ma bzhin du bsnyen bkur bgyid pa'i bar du gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang sred pa yang dag par zad cing
77b6(mdo sde): rnam par grol la thugs yang dag par shin tu rnam par grol ba bla na med pa brnyes pas de la dgongs par ma mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ 'di dag ni
77b7(mdo sde): rang nyid kyis rgan mo'i dngos por byas pa yin gyi/ ma la ngas kyang 'di rnams nyid kun tu skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir rgan pa 'di nyid du byin gyis brlab par bya'o snyam nas bcom ldan
78a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bdud kyis bu mo rgan mor byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum po rgan pa de mi snang bar bya bar 'dod kyang mi snang bar bya bar mi
78a2(mdo sde): nus so/ /de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum po bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs shing gzugs kyis ngo tsha ba bzhin du rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa/ sgur po phyam dgu po ltar kyang kyor
78a3(mdo sde): can mdun nas 'khar ba la rten cing lus 'dar bzhin du bdud sdig can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /skyes bu 'dod chags
78a4(mdo sde): rab bral te/ /chags pas legs par dgug mi nus/ /bdud kyi yul 'das de yi phyir/ /nga ni shin tu mya ngan byed/ /ces bdag cag rnams la gsung ba ni yab med do/ /gang
78a5(mdo sde): zhig gzhan sems rmongs byed pa/ /bdag cag gis ni ma byas pa'i/ /rnam pa de ni yod min na/ /de lta na yang dbang ma gyur/ /tha mar gzugs ni 'di 'dra ba/ /byas nas de gan
78a6(mdo sde): nyer song na/ /ji ltar rgan pa nyid gnas pa/ /de ltar de yis byin gyis brlabs/ /de bas yab kyis bdag cag rnams/ /rgas pa 'di ni mi snang mdzod/ /bdud kyis smras pa/ khyed
78a7(mdo sde): rnams gzugs kyis dregs nas ni/ /sprin gyi tshogs las glog bzhin du/ /gzi brjid rab tu 'bar ba dang / /spro ba'i nga rgyal gnas pas song / /dpa' chen de gan phyin pa
78b1(mdo sde): dang | |rlung gis shing bal bzhin du brlag/ gang zhig chags kun mthar 'byin pa'i/ /sangs rgyas la 'dir gnod byed pa/ /ri bo sen mos rko ba dang / /so yis lcags ni 'cha' ba
78b2(mdo sde): dang | |pad+ma gzhon nu'i sdong bu yis/ /ri bo gzhig par 'dod pa yin/ /gang zhig chags kun mthar 'byin pa'i/ /sangs rgyas la 'dir gnod byar 'dod/ /rgya mtsho brkos par gyur
78b3(mdo sde): nas ni/ /zab pa'i gting tshol 'dod pa yin/ /gang zhig chags kun mthar 'byin pa'i/ /sangs rgyas la 'dir gnod byar 'dod/ /rlung ni zhags pas 'ching ba dang / /zla ba mkha'
78b4(mdo sde): las dbab pa dang / /rgya mtsho lag pas 'chu ba dang / /gangs can la ni rgal ba dang / /snang zhing sreg bcas 'bar ba yi/ /me la 'khyud par 'dod pa yin/ /gang zhig dka' ba byed
78b5(mdo sde): 'dod pa/ /de ni 'di ltar 'gyur ba yin/ /ji srid thub pa de nyid la/ /skyabs su 'gro bar gyis shig dang / /de nyid rgas pa'i gzugs 'di ni/ /don gzhan du byed par 'gyur/ /de ni
78b6(mdo sde): thugs rje cher ldan pas/ /nges par khyed kyi sal bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer
78b7(mdo sde): bcas pa'i skyed gu rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na khyed rnams kyi rga ba'i dngos po mi snang bar byed pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
79a1(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid las gzhan dag gang yang ma mthong ste/ khyed rnams song la bcom ldan 'das de nyid
79a2(mdo sde): mnyes par gyis shig / de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs
79a3(mdo sde): gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis
79a4(mdo sde): byis pa ji lta ba dang / rmongs pa ji lta ba dang / mi gsal ba ji lta ba dang / thabs mi mkhas pa ji lta bar ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
79a5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par bgyi ba mnyes par ma bgyis pa ni nongs lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ nongs pa gzung du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa/ bzod par mdzad
79a6(mdo sde): du gsol| bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gi rgas pa'i dngos po mi snang bar mdzad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag cag gi rgas pa'i dngos po mi snang bar mdzad
79a7(mdo sde): du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams rgas pa'i dngos po mi snang bar mdzad do/ /de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum po rang gi gzugs nyid rnyed nas bcom
79b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo pos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur pa dang / de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang la rang gi skyes bu rnams
79b2(mdo sde): kyis| lha/ dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/ gzhon nus bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes so/ /de thos pa dang nyi ma de nyid la grags 'dzin ma la'ang khye'u zhig btsas so/ /bdud rtsi zas
79b3(mdo sde): la'ang khye'u zhig btsas so/ /de nyid kyi nyin mo zla ba'ang sgra gcan gyis zin to/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis phun sum tshogs pa de mthong nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang /
79b4(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ba dang / rangs pa rgya chen po dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur to/ /de nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams bsal nas tsan+dan gyi chus
79b5(mdo sde): chag chag btab/ shin tu dri zhim pa'i pog por nye bar bshams/ dar gyi chun 'phyang mang por dpyangs/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ni bsgreng / me tog sna tshogs kyis dga' dga'
79b6(mdo sde): ltar bkram nas grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi dang / sum mdo rnams su'ang sbyin gtong gi khang pa brtsigs so/ /de nas grong khyer gyi shar sgor dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang / spyod pa pa
79b7(mdo sde): dang | kun tu rgyu dang / ngan pa dang / mgon med pa dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa dang / slong mo pa rnams la'ang sbyin pa dag gtong ngo / /lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / dbus kyi
80a1(mdo sde): sum mdo rnams su'ang sbyin pa dag gtong / bsod nams dag byed do/ /grags 'dzin ma'i bu'i ming 'dogs par byed de/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi skye
80a2(mdo sde): pos smras pa/ 'di btsas pa na zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin pas de bas na khye'u'i ming sgra gcan zin zhes gdags so zhes btags so/ /bdud rtsi zas kyi yang de bzhin du sbyin pa
80a3(mdo sde): dag btang / bsod nams dag byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes bu'i ming 'dogs par byed do/ /nye du dag gis smras pa/ gang gi tshe 'di btsas pa na grong khyer thams
80a4(mdo sde): cad dga' bar gyur pas de'i phyir khye'u'i ming kun dga' bor gdags so zhes btags so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ grags 'dzin ma'i bu gang yin pa 'di ni
80a5(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa'i bu ma yin no zhes smras pa grags 'dzin mas thos nas yi chad par gyur to/ /de nas des byang chub sems dpa'i phang tshad kyi pha pong la bskyon nas rol pa'i rdzing
80a6(mdo sde): 'gram du 'dug ste bden pa gsol ba btab pa/ gal te 'di byang chub sems dpa' las skyes pa yin na de bzhin du rdzing 'dir pha pong dang lhan cig 'phyo bar gyur cig/ ji ste
80a7(mdo sde): ma yin na bying bar gyur cig ces smras nas chur por ba dang / de shing bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du pha bong dang lhan cig 'phyo bar gyur to/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis ya mtshan du
80b1(mdo sde): gyur pa de thos nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor te/ byang chub sems dpa' rol pa'i rdzing 'gram du dong na/ ji tsam na sgra gcan 'dzin bzang po byang chub sems dpa'i phang tshad kyi
80b2(mdo sde): ri bong la zhon nas shing bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du chu na 'phyo ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / rangs pa rgya chen po dang / yid bde ba skyes te/
80b3(mdo sde): de ma thag tu rdzing der zhugs nas gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po pang du blangs nas langs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi 'khor 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug
80b4(mdo sde): byams pa'i mtshon gyis mngon par btul nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa de'i tshes chen po 'di shin tu g.yos par gyur to/ /'jig rten 'di thams cad kyang snang ba rgya chen pos
80b5(mdo sde): gsal bar gyur te/ 'di ltar 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa nyi ma dang / zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba'i snang bas
80b6(mdo sde): snang ba nyams su ma myong ba gang yin pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur nas/ der sems can gang dag skyes pa de rnams kyis snang ba des sems can gcig gis
80b7(mdo sde): gcig mthong nas/ zhes ldan dag/ sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta zhig/ shes ldan dag/ sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta zhig ces ngo shes par gyur
81a1(mdo sde): to| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs nas skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'da' bar mdzad do/ /de nas tshangs
81a2(mdo sde): ris kyi lha gnyis shig tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na 'dug pa 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram byang chub kyi shing drung
81a3(mdo sde): na bzhugs te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs te skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'da' bar mdzad na de
81a4(mdo sde): la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul gyi/ ma la bdag cag der song la tshigs su bcad pa re res mngon par bstod do/ /de nas tshangs ris kyi lha de gnyis kyis/ 'di lta ste/
81a5(mdo sde): skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i dpung pa bskum ste brkyang ba'am/ brkyangs ste bskum pa tsam gyis tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis kyis tshangs ris kyi 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur
81a6(mdo sde): te| bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis las gcig gis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ ded dpon g.yul las
81a7(mdo sde): rnam par rgyal ba phe/ /sdig pa mi mnga' bzhengs shig 'jig rten gzigs/ /rin chen chos ni 'tshal bar 'gyur mchis kyi/ /bde gshegs chos kyi mchog ni bshad du
81b1(mdo sde): gsol/ /gcig shos kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de gsol/ /nga rgyal bcom zhing g.yul las rnam rgyal ba/ /sdig pa mi mnga' bzhengs shig 'jig rten gzigs/ /bco lnga lon pa'i
81b2(mdo sde): dgung zla nya ba ltar/ /khyod kyi thugs ni shin tu rnam dag lags/ /zhes gsol nas tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las
81b3(mdo sde): bzhengs nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten 'dod pa'i bde gang dang / /lha yul byung ba de gang yin pa/ /sred pa zad pa'i bde de la/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod
81b4(mdo sde): do| |khur khyer ba ni sdug bsngal te/ /khur bor ba ni bde ba yin/ /khur ni lci ba rnam bor nas/ /gzhan dag blang bar mi bya'o/ /sred pa thams cad rnam spangs shing / /'dus byas
81b5(mdo sde): thams cad zad nas ni/ /dngos po thams cad yongs shes na/ /slar yang srid par mi 'ong ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams par grol ba'i dga' ba dang / bde ba sku nyams su
81b6(mdo sde): bstar ba las skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par mdzad pa na de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul lo/ /de'i tshe tshong pa ga gon dang / bzang po gnyis shing rta lnga brgya
81b7(mdo sde): tsam dang lhan cig dong ba na lam de nyid du zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas tshong pa ga gon dang / bzang po'i sngon gyi grogs po dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / mdza' bshes su gyur
82a1(mdo sde): pa'i lha zhig yod pa 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs te mngon
82a2(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang / bde ba sku nyams su bstar nas skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par mdzad pa na
82a3(mdo sde): de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul gyi de la tshong pa ga gon dang / bzang po gnyis kyis der thog mar bsod snyoms 'bul du bcug na/ de ni tshong pa ga gon dang / bzang po de
82a4(mdo sde): gnyis kyi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag rang gis/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms 'bul du gzhug pa'i phyir brtson par
82a5(mdo sde): bya'o snyam nas/ de na lha des shing rta dang / tshong pa thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar byas nas tshong pa ga gon dang / bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshong pa/ tshong
82a6(mdo sde): pa dag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di lteng rgyas na chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon
82a7(mdo sde): par rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang / bde ba sku snyams su bstar ba na skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par mdzad de/ de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul gyi/ de
82b1(mdo sde): la khyed kyis der thog mar bsod snyoms phul na de ni khyed kyi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro zhes smras nas lha de de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshong pa
82b2(mdo sde): ga gon dang / bzang po gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin la/ chos bshad pa'ang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir 'di ltar lhas kyang
82b3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de la bsod snyoms dbul ba'i phyir brtson par byed do snyam nas nang par sngar langs te sbrang rtsi dang / 'da' gu mang du khyer nas bcom ldan 'das gang
82b4(mdo sde): na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshong pa ga gon dang / bzang
82b5(mdo sde): pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du 'dir bdag cag gis sbrang rtsi dang / 'da' gu mang du 'tshal te mchis kyi bcom ldan
82b6(mdo sde): 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste 'di bzhes su gsol lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te bdag gis phyag gis bsod snyoms bzhes na/ dper
82b7(mdo sde): na| mu stegs can bzhin du 'gyur bas de ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyi/ ma la/ bdag gis sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis srog chags rnams la phan
83a1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir bsod snyoms gang du bzhes pa bsam par bya'o snyam pa na/ bcom ldan 'das la lha rnam kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa/ sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs
83a2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis srog chags rnams la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du lhung bzed du bsod snyoms bzhes lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dgongs shing ye
83a3(mdo sde): shes gzigs pa bskyed na/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis srog chags rnams la phan pa'i phyir bsod snyoms lhung bzed du bzhes par gyur nas/ de
83a4(mdo sde): na bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed kyi dgongs pa byung ngo / /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed kyi dgongs pa 'byung bar rig nas ri brag can
83a5(mdo sde): z hig la rdo ba las byas pa'i lhung bzed mi ma yin pas byas shing mi ma yin pas zin par byas la gsal ba gtsang ba dri mi zhim pa med pa bzhi khyer te bcom ldan 'das
83a6(mdo sde): gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po chen po
83a7(mdo sde): bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed kyi mkho ba byung bar bdag cag gis 'tshal nas ri brag can zhig la rdo
83b1(mdo sde): las rdo'i lhung bzed mi ma lags pas bgyis pa gsal ba gtsang ba dri nga ba ma mchis pa bzhi 'dir 'tshal te mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste bzhes su
83b2(mdo sde): gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te bdag gis rgyal po chen po gcig las lhung bzed gcig bzhes na gsum gyi sems mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /
83b3(mdo sde): gal te gnyis las na ni gnyis kyi sems mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te gsum las na ni gcig gi sems mi dga' bar 'gyur gyi/ ma la/ bdag gis rgyal po chen po bzhi las
83b4(mdo sde): lhung bzed bzhi bzhes la lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlab par bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi las lhung bzed bzhi bzhes te/ lhung bzed
83b5(mdo sde): gcig tu byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang / bzang po las srog chags rnams la phan pa'i phyir bsod snyoms bzhes so/ /de nas bcom
83b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang / bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshong pa dag /khyed tshur sangs rgyas la skyabs su deng zhig/ chos la skyabs su deng zhig/ /ma 'ongs
83b7(mdo sde): pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dge 'dun zhes bya ba gang yin pa de la yang skyabs su deng zhig / btsun pa/ bdag cag sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/ /chos la skyabs su mchi'o//
84a1(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dge 'dun gang lags pa de la'ang skyabs su mchi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang / bzang
84a2(mdo sde): po'i sbyin pa de la rjes su yi rang ba mdzad de/ gang gi don du sbyin pa btang / /de yi don du 'gyur ba ste/ /bde ba'i don du sbyin btang na/ /de ni bde bar 'gyur ba yin/ /bsod nams rnam
84a3(mdo sde): smin bde ba dang / /bsam pa yang ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /myur du zhi ba dam pa yi/ /mya ngan 'das pa rtogs par 'gyur/ /pha rol las byung gnod pa ni/ /lha dang bdud kyi ris dag
84a4(mdo sde): gis| |bsod nams kho na byed pa na/ /bar chad bya bar mi nus so/ /gal te 'phags pa'i shes rab phyir/ /gtong ldan de ni 'bad byed na/ /sdug bsngal tha mar byed pa dag/ rnam
84a5(mdo sde): par mthong zhes reg par 'gyur/ /de nas tshong pa ga gon dang / bzang po bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das
84a6(mdo sde): kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang / bzang po las bsod snyoms bzhes
84a7(mdo sde): nas chu klung nai rany+dza nA gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas chu klung nai rany+dza na'i 'gram du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad do/ /de na sbrang rtsi'ang rlung slong la 'de gu'ang rlung
84b1(mdo sde): slong ba des na bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyun gyis thebs so/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyun gyis thebs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
84b2(mdo sde): der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba'i dus la bab lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ yongs
84b3(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ 'di lta ste/ dkrug pa'i las kyi phyir bdud sdig can 'di nye bar 'ongs so snyam
84b4(mdo sde): du dgongs nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sdig can/ ji srid pa'i nyan thos mkhas pa/ gsal ba yid gzhungs ba/ pha rol gyi rtsod pa byung zhing byung ba rnams
84b5(mdo sde): chos pa bzhin gyis tshar gcod nus pa/ rang gi smra ba gsal bar byed nus pa/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams byung bar ma gyur pa dang / nga'i
84b6(mdo sde): tshangs par spyod pa rgya chen po skye bo mang po dang / lha dang / mi'i bar la rgya cher yang dag par legs par rab tu ma bstan gyi bar du nga yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/ /de nas
84b7(mdo sde): bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o snyam du bsams nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la 'gyod pas de nyid du mi
85a1(mdo sde): snang bar gyur to/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyun gyis thebs par rig nas shing dzam+bu zhes bya bas dzam+bu'i gling
85a2(mdo sde): du gdags pa gang yin pa de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na a ru ra chen po'i tshal yod de/ de nas kha dog dang / dri dang / ro dang ldan pa'i a ru ra blangs nas bcom ldan 'das
85a3(mdo sde): gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha rnams kyi dbang
85a4(mdo sde): po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bser ma'i snyun nad kyi snyun gyis thebs par bdag gis 'tshal nas shing dzam+bu
85a5(mdo sde): zhes bya bas dzam+bu'i gling du gdags pa gang lags pa de dang ha cang mi ring ba na a ru ra chen po'i tshal mchis te/ de nas bdag gis kha dog dang / dri dang / ro dang ldan pa'i a
85a6(mdo sde): ru ra 'dir 'tshal te mchis kyi de bcom ldan 'das gsol cig / bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsol pa dang / bser ma dang mthun par 'gyur zhing bser ma'i snyun nye
85a7(mdo sde): bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsol pa dang / rlung dang mthun par gyur nas rlung nad kyi snyun nye bar zhi bar gyur to/ /de na bcom ldan 'das shin tu
85b1(mdo sde): bzod cing lhag par 'tsho bar gyur to/ /de na bcom ldan 'das ji tsam dgyes kyi bar du byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas gang na ba der gshegs
85b2(mdo sde): te byon nas shing gi drung du brten te skyil mo krung bcas nas/ sku drang por bsrang ste/ dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi
85b3(mdo sde): gnas su zhag bdun du dus ma yin pa'i sprin chags par gyur to/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gis zhag bdun du dus ma yin pa'i sprin chags par rig nas gnas nas mngon
85b4(mdo sde): par 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das zhag bdun po 'di la bser bar 'gyur du 'ong / tsha ba dang / sbrang ma dang / sha sbrang dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sprul gyi reg pas
85b5(mdo sde): sku la gnod par 'gyur du 'ong zhes lus kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la lan bdun du dkris te steng du mgo'i gdengs ka chen po byas nas 'dug go / de nas klu'i rgyal po
85b6(mdo sde): btang bzung gis zhag bdun gyi dus ma yin pa'i sprin chags pa med par rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las lus phral te/ dpung rgyan dang / rna rgyan dang / phreng ba dang /
85b7(mdo sde): rgyan sna tshogs dang / byug pas byugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
86a1(mdo sde): 'das/ dgung bdun po 'di la bser bar ma gyur tam/ tsha ba dang / sbrang ma dang / sha sbrang dang / bser ma dang / gdugs dang / sdig sbrul gyi gnod pas
86a2(mdo sde): sku la reg par ma gyur tam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ bden pa'i dga' bar bde ba yin/ /chos thos pa la lta ba dang / /srog
86a3(mdo sde): chags rnams la sdom pa yis/ /'jig rten 'tshe ba med pa bde/ /'jig rten 'dod chags bral ba dang / /'dod pa rnams la rgal ba de/ /nga'o nga rgyal thul pa gang / /de
86a4(mdo sde): nyid bde ba'i dam pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas na bzhugs nas/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der
86a5(mdo sde): gshegs te byon pa dang / rtswa'i gdings ba bshams pa nyid la skyil mo krung bcas/ sku drang por bsrang nas/ dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas bzhugs te/ skyil
86a6(mdo sde): mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par mdzad cing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis po lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa 'di
86a7(mdo sde): nyid la gzigs par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ 'di yod pas 'di yod/ 'di skyes pas 'di skye ba/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam
86b1(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang / gzugs/ ming dang / gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis
86b2(mdo sde): sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi
86b3(mdo sde): bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ 'di med na 'di med la/ 'di 'gags
86b4(mdo sde): pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag /'du byed 'gags pas rnams par shes pa 'gag /rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang /
86b5(mdo sde): gzugs 'gag /ming dang / gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag / skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gags/ /reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag /tshor ba 'gags
86b6(mdo sde): pas sred pa 'gag / sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag /len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag /srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag /skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang /
86b7(mdo sde): smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag
87a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag bdun po de nyid 'das par mdzad nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka'
87a2(mdo sde): stsal pa/ gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i/ /brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin/ /gang tshe chos rnams rgyu dang bcas shes pa/ /de nas de yi som nyi
87a3(mdo sde): thams cad 'bral/ /gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i/ /brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin/ /gang tshe sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas shes pa/ /de nas de yi
87a4(mdo sde): som nyi thams cad 'bral/ /gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i/ /brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin/ /gang tshe tsher bzad pa thob gyur pa/ /de nas de
87a5(mdo sde): yi som nyi thams cad 'bral/ /gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i/ /brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin/ /gang tshe skyen rnams zad pa thob nas ni/ /de
87a6(mdo sde): nas de yi som nyi thams cad 'bral/ /gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i/ /brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin/ /gang tshe zag pa zad pa thob gyur nas/ /
87a7(mdo sde): de nas de yi som nyi thams cad 'bral/ /gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i/ /brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin/ /'jig rten kun tu snang bar 'dug pa
87b1(mdo sde): ni| |ji ltar bar snang nyi ma shar ba bzhin/ /gang tshe chos de dag ni skyed byed pa'i/ /brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin/ /bdud kyi sde rnams rnam par bcom gnas te/ /
87b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kun tu sbyor las rnam par grol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdag gis chos zab mo zab par snang ba/ mthong bar dka' zhing khong du chud par
87b3(mdo sde): dka' ba/ rtog ge pa rnams kyi rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ zhi ba mo/ mdzangs pa'i mkhas pa dang / rig pas rnam par shes pa bya ba rtogs te/ de bdag gi gzhan la smras
87b4(mdo sde): kyang gzhan gyis de mi shes pas des bdag dub par 'gyur/ ngal bar 'gyur/ sems la spro ba med pa kho nar 'gyur bar zad pas/ ma la/ bdag gcig pu dgon pa'i nags
87b5(mdo sde): stug por mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par gnas par bya'o snyam ste/ de na bcom ldan 'das thugs las chung dus bzhugs pa la thugs
87b6(mdo sde): gzhol bar mdzad cing chos 'chad pa la ma yin no/ /de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o 'jig rten 'di ma rung ngo / /kye ma'i 'jig rten 'di
87b7(mdo sde): ma rung ste/ gang gi phyir de ltar brgya lam na/ lan 'ga' de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba ni/ dper na/ u
88a1(mdo sde): d um wa ra'i me tog bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de da ltar thugs las chung dus bzhugs pa la thugs gzhol bar mdzad cing chos 'chad pa lam yan
88a2(mdo sde): pas/ ma la/ bdag der song la gsol ba gdab bo snyam mo/ /de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos/ dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i dpung pa bskums nas brkyang
88a3(mdo sde): pa'am/ brkyangs nas bskum pa tsam gyis tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas
88a4(mdo sde): tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ ma ga d+har ni sngon chad chos byung ba/ /dag pa ma lags dri mar bcas par rtogs/ /bdud rtsi chos kyi
88a5(mdo sde): sgo ni phye mdzod la/ /dri ma med pas rtogs pa bshad par mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa ngas ni tshegs chen
88a6(mdo sde): gyis| |skyon rnams bcom nas rtogs gyur pa/ /srid dang chags pas dkris rnams kyis/ /chos 'di legs par rtogs mi 'gyur/ /rgyun las bzlog phyogs 'gro ba'i
88a7(mdo sde): lam| |zab cing shin tu mthong dka' ba/ /mun pa'i phung pos bsgribs pa yi/ /'dod chags zhen pas mthong mi 'gyur/ /btsun pa/ 'jig rten du skyes shing 'jig rten du
88b1(mdo sde): rgas pa'i sems can rnams la dbang po rnon po dang / dbang po 'bring po dang / dbang po rtul po dang / drang sla ba dang / gdul sla ba dang / nyon mongs pa chung ba dang / rdul chung ba'i rigs
88b2(mdo sde): mchis te de dag gis dam pa'i chos ma thos na nyams par 'gyur lags so/ /btsun pa/ dper na/ ut+pa la'am/ pad+ma 'am/ ku mu da'am/ pad+ma dkar po dag chab nas skyes shing chab
88b3(mdo sde): nas chen por gyur te/ chab nas 'phags te kha cig ni chab dang mnyam/ kha cig ni chab kyi nang du nub cing mchis pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa/ 'jig rten du skyes shing 'jig rten du
88b4(mdo sde): rgas pa'i sems can rnams la'ang dbang po rnon po dang / dbang po 'bring po dang / dbang po rtul po dang / drang sla ba dang / gdul sla ba dang / nyon mongs pa chung ba dang / rdul chung ba'i
88b5(mdo sde): rigs mchis te/ de dag gis dam pa'i chos ma thos na yongs su nyams par 'gyur bas chos rin po che 'tshal bar 'gyur ba mchis kyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos bshad du gsol/
88b6(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa/ chos bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la/ nga nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la blta bar bya'o snyam
88b7(mdo sde): nas| de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa dang /
89a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten du skyes shing 'jig rten du rgas pa'i sems can rnams la dbang po rnon po dang / dbang po 'bring po dang / dbang po rtul po dang / drang sla ba dang /
89a2(mdo sde): gdul sla ba dang / nyon mongs pa chung ba dang / rdul chung ba'i rang bzhin yod do/ /de dag dam pa'i chos ma thos na yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar gzigs so/ /gzigs nas
89a3(mdo sde): kyang sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po gzhol bar 'gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ bdud rtsi sgo mo dag ni dbye bar bya/ /
89a4(mdo sde): nyan pa mu 'dod so ma nyi sol cig dang / /tshangs pa mi rnams la ni gya nom chos/ /klan ka mi btsal mdo tsam bshad par bya/ /de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po 'di snyam
89a5(mdo sde): du sems te/ kye bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad par 'gyur ro/ /e ma bde bar gshegs pas chos bstan par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba
89a6(mdo sde): dang | mchog tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba rgya chen po dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
89a7(mdo sde): gsum bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te ngas su la thog mar chos bshad par bya snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan
89b1(mdo sde): 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la/ ngas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur de la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/ de ni nga'i thog ma'i slob dpon kho na yin bzhin du rjed pa'i dam pas rjed cing mchod
89b2(mdo sde): pa'i dam pas mchod la rtogs pa dam pa dag la'ang yi rangs shing dad par gyur pa yin no snyam mo/ /bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa/ sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu gum nas
89b3(mdo sde): dgung bdun lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dgongs pa la zhugs ta ye shes gzigs pa bskyed na sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur shi nas zhag bdun lon no/ /de nas bcom ldan
89b4(mdo sde): 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ e ma'o sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur shi ba de ni te bor ma stes so/ /e ma'o sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur shi ba de ni shin tu te bor ma stes te/ chos
89b5(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i 'di ma thos so/ /gal te 'das chos 'dul ba 'di thos na shes par 'gyur ba zhig snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la /ngas thog mar su zhig la
89b6(mdo sde): chos bshad snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la/ ngas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod de la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/ de ni nga'i thog ma'i slob dpon kho
89b7(mdo sde): na yin bzhin du rjed pa'i dam pas rjed cing mchod pa'i dam pas mchod la rtogs pa dam pa dag la'ang yi rangs shing dad par gyur to snyam mo/ /bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyis gsol pa/
90a1(mdo sde): btsun pa/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod mdang sum srod la gum lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa la zhugs te ye shes gzigs pa
90a2(mdo sde): bskyed na rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod srod la shi bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ e ma'o rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod shi ba de ni te bor ma stes
90a3(mdo sde): so| |e ma'o rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod shi ba de ni shin tu tre bor ma stes te/ chos 'dul ba 'di ma thos so/ /gal te des chos 'dul ba 'di thos na shes par 'gyur ba
90a4(mdo sde): zhig snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la/ ngas thog mar su zhig la chos bshad snyam mo/ /de nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la/ ngas lnga sde'i
90a5(mdo sde): dge slong de rnams la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/ de dag gis nga sngon sdug bsngal spong ba'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su brtson par gnas pa dang / bla ma dang / gus pa dang /
90a6(mdo sde): sdug pa dang bcas pas gnas pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ lnga sde'i dge slong rnams da lta gang na 'dug snyam nas bcom ldan
90a7(mdo sde): 'das kyi lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi rnams kyi las 'das pas lnga sde'i dge slong rnams wA ra NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi gnas na 'khod pa gzigs so/ /gzigs
90b1(mdo sde): nas kyang ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas wA ra NA si'i ka shi'i grong rdal gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so/ /de'i tshe kun tu 'tsho nyer 'gro lam de nyid du
90b2(mdo sde): lam du zhugs par gyur te/ kun tu 'tsho nyer 'gros bcom ldan 'das lam nas gshegs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong gau ta ma/ khyod kyi dbang
90b3(mdo sde): po rnams ni dang / bzhin gyi mdog ni yongs su dag /pags pa'i mdog ni bsal na/ tshe dang ldan pa gau tam/ khyod kyi ston pa ni gang / khyod su las brten te rab tu byung / khyod
90b4(mdo sde): su'i chos la dga'/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga dang 'dra ba yod min pas/ /nga la slob dpon 'ga' med de/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas
90b5(mdo sde): nga gcig pu/ /yang dag byang chub dam pa thob/ /thams cad zil mnan 'jig rten kun mkhyen la/ /'di ni chos kun gyis ni nga ma gos/ /thams cad spangs shing sred bral rnam
90b6(mdo sde): grol te/ /rang gis mngon par shes nas su la rten/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha mi'i ston pa po/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs ni kun ldan pas/ /nyid kyis byang chub rtogs
90b7(mdo sde): nas rab gsungs pa/ /mi nyams mtshungs pa med na su la rten/ /nga ni 'jig rten dgra bcom ste/ /'jig rten bla med nga yin pas/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ /nga ni rgyal
91a1(mdo sde): ba bdud zil gnon/ /tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma/ rgyal ba zhes gsung ngam/ gang gis zag pa zad thob pa/ /rgyal ba nga 'drar shes par bya/ /sdig
91a2(mdo sde): pa'i chos ni ngas bcom pas/ /de bas nyer 'gro nga rgyal ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gau tam/ gang du bzhud/ wA ra NA sir gshegs nas ni/ /ngas ni chos kyi rnga brdung zhing / /
91a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten ma bskor gang yin pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /'jig rten chags pa las brgal ba'i/ /kun mkhyen sangs rgyas zhi gyur pa/ /'jig rten bsgral ba ma
91a4(mdo sde): byas par/ /skyes bu dam pa grags mi srid/ /tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma rgyal ba legs so zhes gsol nas/ kun tu 'tsho nyer 'gro lam nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das
91a5(mdo sde): yul ka shi'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na wA ra NA sir byon to/ /de'i tshe lnga sde'i dge slong rnams wA ra NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na 'khod do/ /lnga sde'i dge slong
91a6(mdo sde): rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po kho nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang phan tshun nas ched du bsams te legs par 'dug nas khrims su bcas pa/ shes ldan dag /
91a7(mdo sde): dge sbyong gau tam/ mi brtan pa/ bya ba mang ba/ mang pos 'tsho ba/ spong ba nyams pa deng 'bras chan dang / zan dron gyi kha zas la mang du za zhing lus mar sar dang / til mar gyis byugs
91b1(mdo sde): nas chu 'jam pos lus khrus byed cing 'ong gi / de bdag cag gi drung du 'ongs pa dang de la smra bar mi bya/ phyag mi bya/ ldang bar mi bya/ langs te stan bstab par mi bya'o/ /gzhan du na stan nar
91b2(mdo sde): ma kho nar bting ba la tshig 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma stan yod kyi ji ste 'dod na 'dug cing ces brjod par bya'o zhes bcas so/ /bcom ldan 'das ji lta ji ltar lnga sde'i dge
91b3(mdo sde): slong rnams la gzigs pa'i phyir nye bar gshegs pa de lta de ltar lnga sde'i dge slong rnams bcom ldan 'das gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / bkur stim bzod nas stan las langs
91b4(mdo sde): te kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan shom mo/ /kha cig ni zhabs bkru ba'i chu dang / zhabs kyi rten dag mtha' gcig tu 'jog par byed do/ /kha cig ni bsu ste/ na bza'
91b5(mdo sde): chos gos dag blangs nas/ 'di skad ces/ shes ldan gau tam/ tshur spyon/ shes ldan gau tam/ byon pa legs so/ /shes ldan gau tam/ gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig ces zer
91b6(mdo sde): ro| |de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ kye ma skyes bu blun po 'di rnams kyis khrims bcas nas rang gis bshig go snyam du mkhyen nas gdan bshams pa nyid la
91b7(mdo sde): bzhugs so/ /de nas lnga sde'i dge slong rnams lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan nas brjod/ gdung nas rjod/ tshe dang ldan pas rjod pas kun tu rjod par byed do/ /de nas
92a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyed lhag par yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nas rjod pa dang /
92a2(mdo sde): gdung nas rjod pa dang / tshe dang ldan pas rjod pas kun tu ma rjod cig /khyed la yun ring por gnod pa dang / phan pa ma yin pa dang / sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir
92a3(mdo sde): zhe na| dge slong dag / gang la la lhag par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nas rjod pa dang / gdung nas rjod pa dang / tshe dang
92a4(mdo sde): ldan pas rjod pa'i kun tu rjod pa de ni skyes bu blun po de la yun ring por gnod pa dang / phan pa ma yin pa dang / sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol
92a5(mdo sde): to| |tshe dang ldan pa gau tam/ khyod kyi re zhig sngon gyi tshul dang / spyod pa dang / dka' bar spyad pa des mi'i chos bla ma 'phags pa'i khyad par thob par nus sam| shes pa'am/
92a6(mdo sde): mthong ba dang / reg par gnas pa cung zad kyang ma thob na da ltar khyod mi rtan zhing bya ba mang la mang pos 'tsho zhing spong ba nyams pas da khyod 'bras chan dang / zan dron gyi kha zas
92a7(mdo sde): la mang du za zhing lus mar sar dang / til mar gyis byugs nas chu 'jam pos lus khrus byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dge slong khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal mdog
92b1(mdo sde): dang dbang po rnams gsal ba sngon las tha dad du bya ba gzhan lta mthong ngam/ de rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /tshe dang ldan pa gau tam/ de de bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
92b2(mdo sde): kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /rab tu byung nas ni mtha' 'di gnyis la bsten par mi bya/ bsnyen par mi bya/ bsnyen bkur mi bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/
92b3(mdo sde): 'dod pa rnams la 'dod pa'i sa bon nams kyi rjes su brtson pa/ dman pa ngan pa/ tha chad ma rabs gang yin pa dang / bdag nyid dub pa la rjes su brtson pa/ sdug bsngal ba 'phags
92b4(mdo sde): pa'i ma yin pa gnod pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa pa'o/ /khyed kyis mtha' 'di gnyis la mi rten par dbu ma'i lam mig byed pa/ ye shes byed pa/ nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba/ mngon
92b5(mdo sde): par shes pa dang / rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba yod de/ dbu ma'i lam gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'di lta ste/ yang
92b6(mdo sde): dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i
92b7(mdo sde): dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la shes par bya ba 'dis shes par mdzad spyod pas bcom ldan 'das lnga sde'i dge
93a1(mdo sde): slong rnams las gnyis la snga dro gdams ngag 'bogs pa na/ gsum grong khyer du bsod snyoms la 'jug ste/ gsum gyis bsgrubs pa gang yin
93a2(mdo sde): pa des drug car 'tsho bar byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das lnga sde'i rnams kyis dge slong gsum la phyi dro gdams ngag 'bogs pa na/ gnyis grong khyer du bsod snyoms la 'jug
93a3(mdo sde): ste/ gnyis kyis bsgrubs pa gang yin pa des lnga sde 'tsho bar byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni snga dro'i dus kho nar gsol ba yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i
93a4(mdo sde): dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa na mig
93a5(mdo sde): skyes so/ /shes pa dang / rig pa dang / blo dang / rtogs pa skyes so/ /dge slong dag /nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni sdug

94a1(mdo sde): pa na mig skyes so/ /shes pa dang / rig pa dang / blo dang / rtogs bskyes so/ /dge slong dag /nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'gog

94a5(mdo sde): de ltar lan gsum bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i mig ma skyes/ shes pa ma yin/ rig pa ma yin/ blo ma yin/ rtogs pa ma skyes pa de srid du lha dang bcas pa'i
94a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten bdud dang / tshangs pa dang bcas/ dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mir bcas pa 'di las grol ba dang / nges par 'byung ba dang mi ldan pa dang /
