94b1(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar ma shes so/ /dge slong dag /ngas gang nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di rnams la de ltar lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu
94b2(mdo sde): gnyis su bskor ba'i mig skyes shing shes pa dang / rig pa dang / blo dang / rtogs pa skyes pa de nas nga lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang / tshangs pa dang bcas/ dge sbyong
94b3(mdo sde): dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skyes dgu dang / lha dang / mir bcas pa 'di las grol ba dang / nges par byung ba dang ldan pa dang / rab tu grol ba dang / phyin ci log dang bral ba'i sems kyis
94b4(mdo sde): mang du gnas par gyur cig / dge slong dag /ngas de nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar shes so/ /chos kyi rnam
94b5(mdo sde): grangs de bka' stsal pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+ya dang / lha brgyad khri chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
94b6(mdo sde): ldan pa kauN+Di n+ya la bka' stsal pa/ kauN+Di n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ kun 'tshal lags so/ /kauN+Di n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/ kun shes sam /

95a1(mdo sde): btags so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+yas chos kun shes so zhes sa bla'i gnod sbyin rnams sgra sgrogs par byed de/ grogs po dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis

95a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir bskor bas lha'i rigs mngon par 'phel zhing lha ma yin gyi ris yongs su nyams so zhes dbyangs bsgrags so/ /sa bla'i gnod sbyin

95a6(mdo sde): dang | gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams nas skad cig de dang / thang cig de dang / yud tsam de dang / skad cig dang / thang gcig dang / yud tsam de la tshangs pa'i 'jig
95a7(mdo sde): rten gyi bar du sgra grags so/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang sgra sgrogs par byed de/ grogs po dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis wA ra NA sir drang srong smra ba'i ri dwags kyi nags su
95b1(mdo sde): lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan pa dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang / mthun
95b2(mdo sde): par 'ga' tsam yang ma bskor ba/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir

96a1(mdo sde): ba dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa sdug bsngal ba dang / gang 'dod pa btsal te ma rnyed pa de'ang sdug bsngal ba dang / mdor na nye bar len pa'i phung po

98b1(mdo sde): po che'i lha ma brgya stong ri ba zung gcig gyon nas nyal khang gi sgo ga na ba der song ste phyin nas/ grogs po/ bdag ni gtses so/ /grogs po/ bdag ni nyams so zhes skad ngan phyung ba dang /

99a3(mdo sde): chu gnod pa can brgal te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas bcom

99a7(mdo sde): kyi gtam dang / mtho ris kyi gtam dang / 'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / nges par byung ba dang / rab
99b1(mdo sde): tu dben pa'i rjes su bsgrags pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams rgya cher bshad do/ /gang gi tshe de bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i sems dang / dge ba'i sems dang /

99b3(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyis yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam ste rgya
99b4(mdo sde): cher bshad do/ /dper na/ gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na tshon rtsi legs par 'jen du btubs pa de bzhin du rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa

99b6(mdo sde): grags pa chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tshom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog
99b7(mdo sde): pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na
100a1(mdo sde): ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /
100a2(mdo sde): bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis lags kyi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang
100a3(mdo sde): bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /bran mo zhig de nyid kyi mtshan mo gnyid log pa las sad na/ gzhon nu grags pa mal chen po na mi snang bar mthong ngo / /
100a4(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /jo bo/ mkhyen par mdzod cig /gzhon nu
100a5(mdo sde): grags pa ni rang gi mal chen po na mi gda' lags so/ /de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu nor gyi phyir chom rkun nam/ g.yon can rnams
100a6(mdo sde): k yis phyi rol tu khrid par ma gyur grang snyam du sems shing phyogs bzhir pho nya rta pa dag bkye nas rang nyid mi lag na sgron ma thogs pa rnams dang lhan cig tu 'bab chu gnod pa
100a7(mdo sde): can gang na ba de logs su song ba dang / khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri bzung gcig phud pa mthong ngo / /mthong
100b1(mdo sde): nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu ni nor gyi phyir chom rkun nam/ g.yon can rnams kyis phyi rol tu khrid kyi/ 'di ltar 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham
100b2(mdo sde): brgya stong ri ba zung gcig phud pa las na gzhon nu 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi ngogs 'di nyid las brgal bar ma gyur grang / 'di ltar 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i
100b3(mdo sde): lham brgya stong ri bzung gcig bor ro snyam du bsams nas 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi ngogs de nyid las brgal te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis
100b4(mdo sde): khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo rgyang ring po nas gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te ci nas kyang ngas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du byas pas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos
100b5(mdo sde): gzhon nu grags pa stan 'di nyid la 'dug bzhin du mi mthong ba de lta bu zhig bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad
100b6(mdo sde): pas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos gzhon nu grags pa stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du mi mthong ba de lta bu mdzad do/ /de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
100b7(mdo sde): song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ cig gzhon nu grags pa gzigs sam/ khyim bdag de'i phyir 'dug cig dang / stan 'di kho na la
101a1(mdo sde): gzhon nu grags pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do/ /de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo 'di snyam du sems te/ gdon mi
101a2(mdo sde): za bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu grags pa gzigs par gyur te 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces khyim bdag de'i phyir 'dug cig dang / stan 'di kho na la gzhon
101a3(mdo sde): nu grags pa 'dug pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do zhes bka' stsal to snyam du rig nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba
101a4(mdo sde): rgya chen po dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / khyim
101a5(mdo sde): bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan pa la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa
101a6(mdo sde): na khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa grags pa yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan bzhin du lan
101a7(mdo sde): pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de slar brtul nas de'i tshe tshigs su
101b1(mdo sde): bcad pas bka' stsal pa/ rgyan gyis brgyan bzhin du ni chos spyad de/ /dul zhing yang dag sdom pa tshangs spyod la/ /'byung po kun la chad pa spangs pa ni/ /de ni bram ze dge sbyong
101b2(mdo sde): dge slong yin/ /de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa drug dang / bdun pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/ /khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos gzhon nu grags pa bstan de nyid la 'dug pa mthong ngo //
101b3(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang gzhon nu grags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu tshur shog /khyod kyi ma lus ngal zhing lus dub pas smre sngags 'don gyi khyim du 'dong / de nas bcom ldan 'das
101b4(mdo sde): kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khyim bdag ji snyam du sems/ gang gis mi slob pa'i shes pa dang / mi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden ba bzhi
101b5(mdo sde): po| 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs pa de ji ga khyim pa khyim na gnas pa'am/ gsog 'jog gi longs spyod kyis 'dod pa la
101b6(mdo sde): longs spyod par 'gyur ram/ btsun pa/ ma lags so/ /khyim bdag /ji ltar khyod kyis slob pa'i shes pa dang / slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po/ 'di lta ste/ sdug
101b7(mdo sde): bsngal dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs pa de bzhin du gzhon nu grags pas mi slob pa'i ye shes dang / mi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden
102a1(mdo sde): pa bzhi po/ 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs so/ /btsun pa/ gzhon nu grags pas gang gis na mi slob
102a2(mdo sde): pa'i shes pa dang / mi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po/ 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs pa ni rnyed pa
102a3(mdo sde): legs par rnyed lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ slad bzhin du 'brang ba'i dge sbyong grags pa dang / thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste rigs kyi gtso bo gang na bder gshegs na
102a4(mdo sde): legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la cang mi gsungs pas gnang ngo / /de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung
102a5(mdo sde): bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid gyi mtshan
102a6(mdo sde): 'das nas snga dro na bza' sham thabs man pas/ ldang bzed dang / chos gos bsnams te phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa grags pa dang / khyim bdag rigs kyi
102a7(mdo sde): gtso bo'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs so/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis bcom ldan 'das la yang dang / yang du bsu ba'i phyir bar sgo na sdod do/ /
102b1(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chud ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces
102b2(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshur spyon/ bcom ldan 'das/ byon pa legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs su gsol zhes gsol nas bcom ldan
102b3(mdo sde): 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs
102b4(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan
102b5(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dzin du bcug / yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam
102b6(mdo sde): gleng ba gang yin pa/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i gtam dang / tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / mtho ris kyi gtam dang / 'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang / kun nas nyon
102b7(mdo sde): mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / nges par 'byung ba dang / rab tu dben pa'i rjes su bsngags pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams rgya cher bshad do/ /gang gi
103a1(mdo sde): tshe de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i sems dang / mgu ba'i sems dang / sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang / skal ba dang ldan pa dang /
103a2(mdo sde): yang dag phul gyi chos bshad na shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags
103a3(mdo sde): pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam rgya cher bshad do/ /dper na/ gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na tshon
103a4(mdo sde): rtsi legs par 'jen du btub pa de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po/ 'di lta ste/ sdug
103a5(mdo sde): bsngal dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis kyis chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang /
103a6(mdo sde): chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tshom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas
103a7(mdo sde): bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
103b1(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag ni 'phags so/ /bdag cag ni mngon par 'phags lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi
103b2(mdo sde): lags kyi dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /btsun pa/ de'i slad du 'dir
103b3(mdo sde): zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags
103b4(mdo sde): pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das gdan la bde bar bzhugs pa dang / gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba
103b5(mdo sde): dang / bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim
103b6(mdo sde): par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin cing phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyan pa'i
103b7(mdo sde): phyir 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du
104a1(mdo sde): 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i
104a2(mdo sde): gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs
104a3(mdo sde): so| |wA ra NA si na khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi ba dang / lnga pa gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzang ste/ rigs
104a4(mdo sde): kyi gtso bo'i bu dag gis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags ba skra dang / kha sbu bregs te gos dur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo zhes thos
104a5(mdo sde): so| |thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bstan pa'ang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir da ltar gyi rigs kyi gtso
104a6(mdo sde): po'i bu grags pa re zhig shin tu gzhon pa/ shin tu bde ba 'dod pa'ang skra dang / kha sbu bregs te gos dur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par
104a7(mdo sde): rab tu byung gi / ma la/ bdag cag gis kyang skra dang / kha sbu bregs te gos dur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar bya'o snyam mo/ /
104b1(mdo sde): de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzang ste/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams wA ra NA
104b2(mdo sde): si nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu
104b3(mdo sde): 'khod nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa gang po dang / dri ma med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzang ste/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu
104b4(mdo sde): rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag cag rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par dge
104b5(mdo sde): slong gi dngos po gnang na/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa de dag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba
104b6(mdo sde): la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/ de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa de dag gcig bu dben pa bag yod pa/ rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag
104b7(mdo sde): nyid gtod par gnas so/ /gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa/ rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gdod par gnas pa na gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu de dag skra dang / kha sbu bregs te gos dur
105a1(mdo sde): smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar byed pa/ tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa tshe 'di nyid la rang
105a2(mdo sde): gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag cag gi skye ba zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/ /bya ba byas so/ /srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar
105a3(mdo sde): byed cing tshe dang ldan pa de dag sems shin tu rnam par grol ba kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to/ /de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa bcu dang / bcu gcig pa ni
105a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das so/ /wA ra NA si na grong mi gtso bo gtso bo rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcus rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dang bo dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa ste grags
105a5(mdo sde): pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzang ste rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams skra dang / kha sbu bregs te gos dur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag par kho nas khyim
105a6(mdo sde): nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing / chos bstan pa'ang mchog ma yin pa ma
105a7(mdo sde): yin te/ gang gi phyir da ltar rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa ste grags pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag
105b1(mdo sde): dang | lag bzang ste rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams ni re zhig shin tu gzhon pa/ shin tu bde ba 'dod pa'ang skra dang / kha sbu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim
105b2(mdo sde): nas khyim med par rab tu byung gi / ma la/ bdag cag kyang skra dang / kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo snyam mo/ /de nas
105b3(mdo sde): grong khyer gyi gtso bo rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcu po dag wA ra NA si nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/
105b4(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas grong mi'i gtso bo'i khye'u lnga bcu po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag legs
105b5(mdo sde): par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par
105b6(mdo sde): bgyi'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa de dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/ de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan
105b7(mdo sde): pa de dag gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtod par gnas so/ /gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na gang
106a1(mdo sde): gi phyir rigs kyi bu de dag snga ma bzhin du ji srid sems shin tu rnam par grol ba kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to/ /de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra
106a2(mdo sde): bcom pa drug cu dang / drug cu gcig pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das wA ra NA si'i drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan
106a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /nga ni lha dang / mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no/ /dge slong dag /khyed kyang lha dang / mi rnams
106a4(mdo sde): kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyi/ dge slong dag /skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang / mi
106a5(mdo sde): rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i ched du rgyu zhing deng la khyed gnyis shig ni gcig tu ma 'gro zhig /nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so/ /
106a6(mdo sde): de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di wA ra NA si'i drang srong smra ba'i ri dwags kyi nags su 'dug nas de nyan thos rnams la 'di skad ces chos
106a7(mdo sde): ston te/ dge slong dag /nga ni lha dang / mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad grol ba yin no/ /dge slong dag /khyed kyang lha dang / mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba
106b1(mdo sde): yin gyi/ dge slong dag /skye bo mang po la phan pa dang zhes bya ba nas rgyu zhing deng zhig ces bya ba'i bar du ste/ nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing 'gro'o zhes zer
106b2(mdo sde): gyi| ma la bdag gis de la/ 'di lta ste/ dkrug pa'i las shig bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas bdud sdig can bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sbrul
106b3(mdo sde): te| bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/ ma grol grol bar 'du shes na/ /ji ltar bdag
106b4(mdo sde): nyid grol bar sems/ /bdag nyid dge sbyong ma bkrol bas/ /'ching ba chen pos bcings pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ e ma'o 'di ni bdud sdig
106b5(mdo sde): can yin te/ 'di lta ste/ dkrug pa'i las kyi phyir nye bar 'ongs so snyam du thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga ni lha dang mi rnams kyi/ /'ching ba gang yin
106b6(mdo sde): kun las grol/ /bar chad byed pa khyod bcom par/ /sdig can de ltar shes par gyis/ /de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong gau ta ma'i sems kyis
106b7(mdo sde): bdag shes so snyam du rig nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la yid la gcags nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyis su'ang dge
107a1(mdo sde): slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /nga ni lha dang / mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no/ /dge slong dag /khyed
107a2(mdo sde): kyang lha dang / mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyi/ dge slong dag /skye bo mang po la phan pa dang zhes bya ba nas/ rgyu zhing deng zhig ces bya ba'i bar
107a3(mdo sde): gong ma bzhin du'o/ /nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der gshegs so/ /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las nyid
107a4(mdo sde): mnyan nas ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis wA ra NA sir ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs
107a5(mdo sde): te| rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang grong khyer sde can du byon to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ras bal can gyi nags tshang tshing gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas shing zhig
107a6(mdo sde): gi drung du brten te nyin bar gyi gnas pas bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs grong khyer sde can gyi phyi rol tu nyi ma re re zhing bud med kyis byas pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/
107a7(mdo sde): dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na de rnams las bud med cig dam bcas pa dral te bros so/ /de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs bud med de tshol zhing ras
107b1(mdo sde): bal gyi nags tshang tshing gang na ba der dong ba dang / drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/ dad par 'os pa/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ thugs mchog tu dul
107b2(mdo sde): ba| zhi ba dang / dul ba dang ldan pa/ gser gyi mchod sdong lta bur dpal gyis 'bar zhing shing zhig drung na brten te bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na
107b3(mdo sde): ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ga bud med gcig gzigs sam/ gzhon nu dag /bud med de khyed cag gi cir 'ong /
107b4(mdo sde): btsun pa/ 'di na bdag cag drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs grong khyer sde can gyi slad rol tu bud med kyis bgyis pa'i rol mos rtse bar bgyis/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod
107b5(mdo sde): par bgyid de/ de rnams dang bdag cag rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod par bgyid pa na/ bud med gcig dam bcas pa dral te bros nas bdag cag tshol
107b6(mdo sde): lags so/ /gzhon nu dag /ji snyam du sems/ bud med tshol ba gang yin pa dang / bdag nyid tshol ba gang 'dam/ btsun pa/ bdag cag la bud med kyis ci bgyis/ bdag cag
107b7(mdo sde): ni bdag nyid tshol ba gang lags pa de 'dam lags so/ /gzhon nu dag /de'i phyir 'dug cig dang khyed la chos bshad do/ /de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das
108a1(mdo sde): kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug cu sde bzang po'i
108a2(mdo sde): tshogs la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'phags
108a3(mdo sde): pa'i bden pa bzhi po| 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs so/ /de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis chos mthong ba
108a4(mdo sde): dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las brgal ba dang / the tshom las brgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan
108a5(mdo sde): gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su
108a6(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang /
108a7(mdo sde): chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyi/ bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs
108b1(mdo sde): su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
108b2(mdo sde): zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i nub mo 'das nas snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed
108b3(mdo sde): dang chos gos bsnams te grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas
108b4(mdo sde): grong khyer sde can der thog mar su zhig la chos bshad snyam pa las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ngas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma la thog mar
108b5(mdo sde): chos bshad par bya ste/ de dag gis ba sngon sdug bsngal spong ba'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson pas gnas pa na 'dir mar gsar dang 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar bas bsnyen bkur byas
108b6(mdo sde): so snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs so/ /grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs mas bcom
108b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshur spyon/ bcom ldan
109a1(mdo sde): 'das| byon pa legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs su gsol/ zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan
109a2(mdo sde): bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu
109a3(mdo sde): 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan ces bya ba
109a4(mdo sde): nas/ mngon par dad nas skyabs su song ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no/ /de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
109a5(mdo sde): gsol to/ /btsun pa/ de'i slad du 'dir zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma la cang mi gsung bas
109a6(mdo sde): gnang ngo / /de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig cing bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas
109a7(mdo sde): gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' bdag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag rang gi
109b1(mdo sde): lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin te phyag bcabs shing lhung bzed gyur bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
109b2(mdo sde): kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang
109b3(mdo sde): dag par 'dzin du bcug / yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sde
109b4(mdo sde): can nas gshegs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ngas yul ma ga d+ha 'dir ngang tshul bzang por bkur ba'i dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze gang zhig dbang du byas na de dbang du gyur pas tshegs
109b5(mdo sde): chung dus skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ba su zhig yod snyam mo/ /de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas pa 'khogs gtugs pa zhig yod
109b6(mdo sde): pa de ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis bkur stir bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mchod par bya bas dgra bcom par bkur cing 'khor lnga brgya dang nai rany+dza nI'i chu klung gi
109b7(mdo sde): 'gram gyi bsti gnas na dka' thub spyod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas 'khogs gtugs
110a1(mdo sde): pa 'di ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas dka' thub spyod do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ ma la ngas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dbang du
110a2(mdo sde): bya ste| 'di dbang du gyur na tshegs chung dus skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas ga na ba der
110a3(mdo sde): gshegs so/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces
110a4(mdo sde): kyang gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ tshur spyon/ dge sbyong chen po/ byon pa legs so/ /dge sbyong chen po/ yun ring po zhig lags na gang nas 'khor 'dir byon/ dge sbyong chen
110a5(mdo sde): po| gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dang /
110a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu
110a7(mdo sde): 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung / gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na khyod kyi me khang du nga zhag gcig
110b1(mdo sde): cig 'dug go / dge sbyong chen po/ bdag la mi bde ba ma mchis na/ 'on kyang de na klu gdug pa zhig gnas te des khyod la mtho ba tsams par gyur du mchi'o/ /'od srung / khyod kyis re zhig
110b2(mdo sde): gnang bar gyis shig dang mtho btsams par mi 'gyur ro/ /dge sbyong chen po/ gal te khyod la mtho mi 'tsham na/ dge sbyong chen po/ ci bde kho nar bzhugs shig /de nas bcom ldan
110b3(mdo sde): 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi me khang gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas me khang gi phyi rol tu zhabs bsil nas me khang gi nang du zhugs te/ nyid kyis rtswa'i gding ba bshams
110b4(mdo sde): nas sku drang por bsrang ste skyil mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag ste bzhugs so/ /klu gdug pas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang
110b5(mdo sde): khros pa'i mthus dud pa byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus dud pa phyung ngo / /klu gdug pas khro ba'i mthus 'bar bar byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang me'i
110b6(mdo sde): khams la snyoms par bzhugs so/ /de nas klu gdug pa khros pa'i mthu dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus me khang thams cad 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar
110b7(mdo sde): te| me lce gcig tu gyur pas sreg par byed do/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can mtshan mo rgyu skar la lta ba na me khang thams gcad 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig
111a1(mdo sde): tu gyur nas sreg pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po gau ta ma 'di ltar mdzes par klu gdug pas thal bar byas par ma
111a2(mdo sde): gyur grang / kye hud nyon mongs/ bdag gi tshig mnyan to snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pas
111a3(mdo sde): phyas spyad kyi/ ma la ngas rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba la sems mnyam par bzhag na mes klu gdug pa'i me zil gyis mnan la/ des kyang de'i lus la gnod par mi
111a4(mdo sde): byed cing de dul bar byas nas lhung bzed kyi nang du bcug ste/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de la sbyin pa de lta bu zhig bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul ji
111a5(mdo sde): lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pa la thugs mnyam par bzhag na mes klu gdug pa'i me zil gyis mnan la/ des kyang de'i lus la gnod pa mi byed pa de lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad de/
111a6(mdo sde): de dul bar mkhyen nas lhung bzed du bcug ste/ lteng rgyas 'od srung gang na ba der bsnams te gshegs so/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring
111a7(mdo sde): po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ gson pa lta zhig /'od srung / gson no/ /dge sbyong chen po/ khyod kyi lhung
111b1(mdo sde): bzed na bsnams te byon pa ci/ 'od srung / klu gdug pa gang gi mthus khyod kyi me khang du mir gyur ba rdzu 'phrul dang mi ldan pa gnas su mi ster ba de/ ngas btul nas lhung bzed du bcug
111b2(mdo sde): nas khyer te 'ongs so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag cag kyang
111b3(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti
111b4(mdo sde): gnas na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam me la yongs su spyod par re re'i me thab gsum gsum ste/ me thab stong lnga brgya yod de/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams me la yongs su spyod par 'dod
111b5(mdo sde): na me spar bar ma nus so/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der song sti phyin nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
111b6(mdo sde): mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig /'dir bdag cag zhugs la yongs su spyod par 'tshal na zhugs te spar bar rngo ma thogs lags so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di
111b7(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po bdag gi nye 'khor na gnas na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste
112a1(mdo sde): phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzod cig /'dir bdag gi bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam me
112a2(mdo sde): la yongs su spyod par 'tshal na/ me de spar bar rngo ma thogs nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam
112a3(mdo sde): bgyid do/ /'od srung / me spar bar 'dod dam/ dge sbyong chen po/ spar du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me
112a4(mdo sde): de rang nyid 'bar bar gyur to/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi
112a5(mdo sde): bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams me la yongs su spyad nas me gsad par 'dod na gsad par ma nus so/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams
112a6(mdo sde): lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig /'dir bdag cag
112a7(mdo sde): zhugs la yongs su spyad pa nas zhugs dgum par 'tshal na dgum pa'i rngo ma thogs lags so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge slong chen
112b1(mdo sde): po bdag gi nye 'khro na gnas na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
112b2(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir bdag gi bram ze'i khye'u rnams zhugs la yongs su spyad nas zhugs dgum par 'tshal na dgum pa'i
112b3(mdo sde): rngo ma thogs nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam bgyid do/ /'od srung / me de bsad dam/ dge sbyong
112b4(mdo sde): chen po/ dgum du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de rang nyid shi'o/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa
112b5(mdo sde): can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas yang dus gzhan
112b6(mdo sde): zhig na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can rang nyid me la yongs su spyod par 'dod na spar bar ma nus so zhes bya ba nas/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma
112b7(mdo sde): bzhin no/ /de bzhin du yongs su spyad nas gsad par 'dod na zhes bya ba nas/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig
113a1(mdo sde): na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi me khang thams cad 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa de
113a2(mdo sde): la lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs chen po rnams kyis bsgribs kyang gdab par ma nus so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral
113a3(mdo sde): pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po gnas na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan
113a4(mdo sde): 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ dge sbyong chen po/ 'dir bdag gi me khang
113a5(mdo sde): thams cad 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa de la bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang / skye bo'i tshogs chen
113a6(mdo sde): pos bsgribs na zhugs dgum pa'i rngo ma thogs nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam
113a7(mdo sde): bgyid do/ /'od srung / me de zhi bar bya'am/ dge sbyong chen po/ zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus
113b1(mdo sde): me khang de rang nyid zhi bar gyur to/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang
113b2(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kha dog 'phags
113b3(mdo sde): bsam tshan mo la bab pa na bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te de rnams/ dper na/ me'i phung po 'bar/ rab tu 'bar
113b4(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po 'ang me la yongs su spyod de/ 'di ltar de'i
113b5(mdo sde): spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi yod do snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can nang bar sngar
113b6(mdo sde): langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir bdag mdang sum rgyu
113b7(mdo sde): skar rnams la lta ba na dge sbyong chen po'i spyan snga na zhugs kyi phung po 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur te sreg par byed pa bzhi mthong ngo / /mthong
114a1(mdo sde): nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po 'ang me la yongs su spyod do/ /'di ltar de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu
114a2(mdo sde): 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa bzhi mchis so snyam mo/ /'od srung / ci nga me la yongs su spyod dam/ nga me la yongs su mi spyod de/ mkhas pa kun nas nyon
114a3(mdo sde): mongs las/ /sems ni yongs su zlog byed kyi/ /me'am yang na chu dag la/ /yongs bsten yon tan ci zhig yod/ /de lta mod kyi 'dir mdang sum rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kha
114a4(mdo sde): dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na nga gang na ba der 'ongs te lhag nas nga'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te de rnams/ dper na/ me'i phung po 'bar/ rab tu
114a5(mdo sde): 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi po lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa yin no/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa
114a6(mdo sde): can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po
114a7(mdo sde): brgya byin kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de dper na/
114b1(mdo sde): me'i phung po 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa bzhi po de dag pas ches lhag cing ches 'phag pa ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyog gcig tu
114b2(mdo sde): 'dug go / lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar zhes bya ba nas/ dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul
114b3(mdo sde): che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no/ /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa kha dog 'phags
114b4(mdo sde): bas mtshan mo la bab pa na bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de dper na/ me'i phung po bzhi po de dag nyid snga
114b5(mdo sde): ma bzhin du sreg pa zhes bya ba nas/ me'i phung po chen po lnga po de me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar de dag pas kyang ches lhag cing ches 'phags la ches
114b6(mdo sde): bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na me'i phung po chen po
114b7(mdo sde): 'bar zhes bya ba nas/ dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no/ /de'i tshe lteng rgyas
115a1(mdo sde): 'od srung ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun pa byed pa la bab po/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ gal
115a2(mdo sde): te ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin par shes na de nyid la bya ba byed par sems kyi/ bdag la ni de lta ma yin pa'i gnas yod kyi/
115a3(mdo sde): kye ma| dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas
115a4(mdo sde): zhag bdun gzhan du bzhud do/ /de'i tshe zhag bdun du lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la rnyed pa dang / bkur sti chen po byung nas bza' ba dang / bca' bar rab tu mang po dang ldan/
115a5(mdo sde): skye bo'i tshogs chen po'ang dbang du gyur to/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byas zin pa dang 'di snyam du sems te/ zhag bdun po
115a6(mdo sde): 'di la bdag la rnyed pa dang / bkur sti chen po byung nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba rab tu mang po dang ldan/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po'ang dbang du gyur gyi/ kye ma da ni dge sbyong chen po
115a7(mdo sde): 'ongs kyang ci ma rung / bdag gis de'ang de la bsod snyoms spyod du gzhug go snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas
115b1(mdo sde): lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der gshegs so/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la
115b2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ byon tam/ 'od srung / 'ongs so/ /dge sbyong chen po/ khyod ci'i slad du zhag bdun 'di nas bzhud lags/ 'od srung khyod kyi 'dug gnas
115b3(mdo sde): n a mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byed pa la bab nas 'di snyam du gal te ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no bar shes na
115b4(mdo sde): d e kho na la bya ba byed par sems kyi bdag la ni de ltar ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod par 'gyur gyis kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung
115b5(mdo sde): snyam sems pa ma yin nam/ nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du song ngo / /'o na ci'i slad du 'dir byon lags/ 'od srung khyod kyi mchod
115b6(mdo sde): sbyin zhag bdun du byas zin nas 'di snyam du bdag la zhag bdun du rnyed pa dang / bkur sti chen po byung zhing bza' ba dang / bca' ba rab tu mang po dang yang ldan/ skye bo'i
115b7(mdo sde): tshogs chen po'ang dbang du gyur gyi/ kye ma dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung / bdag gis de yang de la yongs su longs spyod du gzhug go snyam du sems pa ma yin nam/ dge
116a1(mdo sde): sbyong chen po/ de lta lags so/ /nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas nga 'ongs pa yin no/ /dge sbyong chen po/ ci bde ba kho nar longs spyad du
116a2(mdo sde): gsol/ de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom
116a3(mdo sde): pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ de'i slad du bdag gi nye 'khor du bzhugs
116a4(mdo sde): shig dang / bdag gis khyod la chos dang mthun pa'i 'tsho ba sbyar ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas lteng
116a5(mdo sde): r gyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du rang kho nas g.yos byas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
116a6(mdo sde): gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na/ dge sbyong chen po/ da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ 'od srung / de'i phyir song zhig nga'ang
116a7(mdo sde): 'ong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing dzam+bu zhes bya ba gang
116b1(mdo sde): gis dzam+bu'i gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang / dri dang / ro dang ldan pa'i dzam+bu'i snye ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas bsnams te/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba
116b2(mdo sde): der gshegs pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'ongs nas lteng rgyas
116b3(mdo sde): 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ byon tam /
116b4(mdo sde): 'od srung / 'ongs so/ /dge sbyong chen po/ khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis/ 'dir ngas 'od srung khyod song na sring po ma lon par mkhyen nas/ ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing
116b5(mdo sde): dzam+bu zhes bya ba gang gis dzam+bu gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang / dri dang / ro dang ldan pa'i dzam+bu'i snye ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas 'dir phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
116b6(mdo sde): par zhugs kyi/ gal te 'dod na longs spyod cig /dge sbyong chen po/ ci bde ba kho nar 'tshal lags so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge
116b7(mdo sde): sbyong chen po/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /shing dzam+bu zhes bya ba gang gis dzam+bu'i gling du gdags pa de dang / ha
117a1(mdo sde): cang mi ring ba zhig na a ru ra'i nags dang / bil pa'i nags dang / ka bid tha'i nags dang / skyu ru ra'i nags kyang de bzhin no/ /byang gi sgra
117a2(mdo sde): m i snyan gyi gling du gshegs nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lus lhung bzed bkang ste bsnams nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs te
117a3(mdo sde): byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'ongs nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas
117a4(mdo sde): kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ byon tam/ 'od srung / 'ongs so/ /dge sbyong chen po/ khyod kyi lhung
117a5(mdo sde): bzed na ci mchis/ 'dir ngas 'od srung khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du gshegs nas ma rmos ma
117a6(mdo sde): btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bras lhung bzed bkang nas 'dir phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyi gal te 'dod na longs spyod cig / dge sbyong chen po/ ci bde
117a7(mdo sde): ba kho nar 'tshal lags so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag
117b1(mdo sde): kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can las bsod snyoms bzhes nas phyogs gzhan zhig tu bzhugs nas zhal zas kyi bya
117b2(mdo sde): ba mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas bcom
117b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lag pas sa la bsnun pa dang / de nas bkod ma chen po zhig byung ste chu bab pa de la bcom ldan 'das kyis
117b4(mdo sde): chus chu'i bya ba mdzad do/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na bkod ma chen po byung ste chu bab pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ chu 'di sngon ni
117b5(mdo sde): med na chu 'di da ltar gang nas byung snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
117b6(mdo sde): dge sbyong chen po/ mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag pa na bkod ma chen po'i chab cig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ chu 'di
117b7(mdo sde): sngon ma mchis na da ltar chu 'di gang nas bab snyam bgyid do/ /'od srung / 'dir khyod las bsod snyoms bzhes nas phyogs 'dir bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad pa na nga
118a1(mdo sde): chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo / /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis nga la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas nga gang na ba der
118a2(mdo sde): 'ongs te phyin nas nga'i mdun du lag pas sa la bsnun pa las de nas bkod ma chen po zhig byung ba de la ngas chus chu'i bya ba mdzad do/ /'od srung / rdzing 'di na lag pas brkos
118a3(mdo sde): pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang
118a4(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyem red du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas rdzing lag
118a5(mdo sde): pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' gcig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste rdzing lag pas brkos par zhugs nas sku khrus mdzad nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung
118a6(mdo sde): bar bzhed pa na shing ardzu na gang na ba de logs su phyag brkyang ngo / /de nas ardzu na'i yal ga chen po dud par gyur te/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis gzung nas rdzing lag
118a7(mdo sde): pas brkos pa nas byung ngo / /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na ardzu na'i yal ga chen po dud pa zhig mthong ngo / /
118b1(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ ardzu na'i yal ga 'di sngon ni dud par ma gyur na/ ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di da su zhig gis btud snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can
118b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag
118b3(mdo sde): pa na rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na ardzu na'i yal ga chen po dud par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems/ ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di sngon ni dud par ma
118b4(mdo sde): gyar na da su zhig gis btud snyam bgyid do/ /'od srung / 'dir phye ma red nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gang na ba der gshegs te
118b5(mdo sde): b yon nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' gcig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste rdzing lag pas brkos par zhugs te lus khrus byas nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa
118b6(mdo sde): nas byung bar 'dod pas shing ardzu na 'di dag gang na ba de logs su lag pa brkyang ba dang / de nas ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di dud par gyur te/ de la ngas 'jus nas rdzing lag
118b7(mdo sde): pas brkos pa nas byung ngo / /'od srung / 'di ni ardzu na lag pas bzung ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu
119a1(mdo sde): 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag
119a2(mdo sde): dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag brnyes nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras gang du bkru snyam mo/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang
119a3(mdo sde): p o brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas ri brag gcig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas
119a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag 'di la bkru bar gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod
119a5(mdo sde): pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ de'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du dgram snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams
119a6(mdo sde): kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas brag gcig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste
119a7(mdo sde): phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams dgram du gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis
119b1(mdo sde): phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag bkram mo/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdo leb che la ring ba dag mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ rdo
119b2(mdo sde): leb che la ring ba 'di dag sngon ni med na rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag su zhig gis khyer te 'ongs snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song
119b3(mdo sde): ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir bdag bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdo leb che la ring bdag gcig
119b4(mdo sde): mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag sngon ni ye ma mchis na/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag da su zhig gis 'tshal te mchis snyam
119b5(mdo sde): bgyid do/ /'od srung / 'dir ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag brnyes so/ /de nas nga 'di snyam du dgongs te/ phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag gang du bkru snyam pa dang /
119b6(mdo sde): de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes nas/ brag gcig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs te nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga la 'di
119b7(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkru bar gsol/ ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so/ /nga 'di snyam
120a1(mdo sde): du dgongs te/ ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du dgram snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis nga'i
120a2(mdo sde): dgongs pa shes nas brag gcig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs te nga gang na der 'ongs te phyin nas nga la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod
120a3(mdo sde): pa'i sha na'i ras dgram du gsol/ ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkram mo/ /'od srung / rdo leb che zhing ring ba 'di dag ni gnod sbyin gyis blangs pa zhes
120a4(mdo sde): bya'o| |de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom
120a5(mdo sde): pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe nai rany+dza na'i chu cher brub nas bab bo/ /
120a6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas lhag pas khebs pa'i lteng na rdul gyis yog pa bla ga ba med pa la 'chag pas 'chag par mdzad do/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung
120a7(mdo sde): ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po de ltar mdzes pa chu chen po brub pas khyer bar ma gyur grang / ma la/ bdag gis dge sbyong chen po btsal snyam du bsams
120b1(mdo sde): nas| shing gcig pa'i gru'i nang du zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das btsal ba na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas lhag par khebs pa'i steng
120b2(mdo sde): nas rdul gyis yog pa bla gab med pa na 'chag pas 'chag pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ gson nam/ 'od srung
120b3(mdo sde): gson no/ /dge sbyong chen po/ zhugs shing gcig pa'i grur 'jug gam/ 'od srung / 'jug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la/ ngas ji ltar thugs
120b4(mdo sde): mnyam par gzhag na shing gcig pa'i gru ji ltar chu la 'jug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'du bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam
120b5(mdo sde): par bzhag nas shing gcig pa'i gru ji lta bar chu la 'jug par de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di
120b6(mdo sde): ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral
120b7(mdo sde): pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung ral pa can/ khyod ni dgra bcom pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon
121a1(mdo sde): sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin te/ dgra bcom pa'i lam gang yin pa de'ang mi shes so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can 'di snyam du
121a2(mdo sde): sems te/ dge sbyong chen po gau ta ma'i thugs kyis bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam du rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ bdag legs par
121a3(mdo sde): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar bdag tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//
121a4(mdo sde): 'od srung khyod kyi 'khor la ltas sam/ dge sbyong chen po/ ma ltas lags so/ /'od srung / de'i phyir re zhig 'khor la ltos shig /'dir khyod lta bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa
121a5(mdo sde): shes nyen can rnams kyis ni 'khor la lta ba legs pa yin no/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can rang gi bsti gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la
121a6(mdo sde): smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag /shes par gyis shig /bram ze'i khye'u dag /kho bo ni dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs pa spyod pa spyad na/ shes ldan dag /ci byed/ mkhan po/
121a7(mdo sde): bdag cag gis cung zad ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni mkhan po la brten nas lags pas/ gal te mkhan po dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad na bdag cag
121b1(mdo sde): kyang mkhan po rab tu 'byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo / /bram ze'i khye'u dang / /khyed kyis de'i phyir g.yang gzhi dag shing shun dang / 'khar ba dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / blugs
121b2(mdo sde): gzar 'di dag chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram du 'or cig / mkhan po/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun dang / 'khar ba dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang /
121b3(mdo sde): blugs gzar rnams chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram du bor nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
121b4(mdo sde): mkhan po/ 'di ltar bdag cag gis bdag cag gi bgyi ba gang lags pa de bgyis lags so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor lnga brgya dan bcom ldan 'das gang
121b5(mdo sde): na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ bdag gis 'khor la bltas lags te bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul
121b6(mdo sde): ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na bdag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /'od srung / tshur shog /
121b7(mdo sde): tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig /de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de dag rab tu byung ba dang / des bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / des dge slong gi dngos por gyur to/ /de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung
122a1(mdo sde): ral pa can gyi spun chu klung 'od srung dang / ga yA 'od srung gnyis 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu gnyis brgya lnga bcu dang / chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i mjug gi
122a2(mdo sde): 'gram gyi bsti gnas na dka' thub spyod do/ /chu klung 'od srung dang / ga yA 'od srung spun gyis g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun dang / 'khar ba dang / ril pa spyi blugs dang /
122a3(mdo sde): blugs gzar de dag chu klung nai rany+dza nas khyer ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams rgyal po'am/ chom
122a4(mdo sde): rkun nam/ me'am/ chus nyes dmigs 'ga' zhig byung bar ma gyur grang / ma la/ bdag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams btsal lo snyam mo/ /de nas chu klung
122a5(mdo sde): 'od srung dang / ga yA 'od srung spun dag lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can tshol zhing lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der dong ba dang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan
122a6(mdo sde): pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can skra byi snam sbyar bgos nas 'khor lnga brgya dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/ /chu klung 'od srung dang /
122a7(mdo sde): ga yA 'od srung gis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can skra byi snam sbyar bgos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshe
122b1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'od srung / 'di mchog yin la/ de mchog ma yin nam/ 'od srung dag /'di ni mchog yin te/ de ni ma yin no/ /
122b2(mdo sde): de nas chu klung 'od srung dang / ga yA 'od srung spun dag 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bshad pa'ang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ gang
122b3(mdo sde): gi phyir da ltar lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lhag lon pa rgas 'khogs gtugs pa ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ brjed par
122b4(mdo sde): byas| mchod par byas shing dgra bcom par bkur ba de yang lan gnyis kyi bar du dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar rab tu byung bar khas blangs kyi/ ma la bdag cag kyang dge sbyong
122b5(mdo sde): chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i
122b6(mdo sde): chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ bdag cag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /
122b7(mdo sde): khyod kyis 'khor la bltas sam/ dge sbyong chen po/ ma bltas lags so/ /'od srung dag /de'i phyir re zhig 'khor la ltos shig /'di ltar khyod lta bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa/
123a1(mdo sde): shes nyen can dag gis ni 'khor la blta ba legs pa yin no/ /de nas chu klung 'od srung dang / ga yA 'od srung spun rang gi bsti gnas gang na ba der dong
123a2(mdo sde): ste phyin nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u dag/ shes par gyis shig /kho bo cag ni dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod na/ shes
123a3(mdo sde): ldan dag ci byed/ mkhan po dag /bdag cag cung zad ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni mkhan po dag la brten nas lags pas/ gal te mkhan po dag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan
123a4(mdo sde): sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyod na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po dag rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo / /bram ze'i khye'u dag /de'i dus da yin par shes par gyis shig /de
123a5(mdo sde): nas chu klung 'od srung dang / ga yA 'od srung spun 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
123a6(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po/ bdag cag gis 'khor la bltas lags te/ dge sbyong chen po/ bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu
123a7(mdo sde): byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na bdag kyang dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /'od srung dag /tshur shog/
123b1(mdo sde): tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig /de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de rnams rab tu byung ba dang / des bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / des dge slong gi dngos por gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
123b2(mdo sde): kyis ral pa can stong po de rab tu byung / bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas lteng rgyas su ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ ga yA gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te rim gyis rgyu
123b3(mdo sde): zhing gshegs pa na ga yAr byon nas/ ga yA'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon gyi ral pa can thams cad rab tu byung ba'i dge slong stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom
123b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis dge slong stong po de la cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis 'doms par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i
123b5(mdo sde): cho 'phrul lo/ /de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag pa nyid kyi gdan gyi nang du mi snang
123b6(mdo sde): bar gyur cing shar phyogs gyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas/ spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang /
123b7(mdo sde): mnal bar mdzad do/ /me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par mdzad de/ me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer
124a1(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad do/ /'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel gyi kha
124a2(mdo sde): dog go / cho 'phrul zung du ston par mdzad de/ sku'i smad nas me 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i stod las chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad do/ /sku'i stod nas me 'bar
124a3(mdo sde): bar mdzad la/ sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang / nub
124a4(mdo sde): dang | byang phyogs su'ang de bzhin no/ /phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa rnams bsdus te/ dge slong gi
124a5(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yin no/ /de la bcom ldan 'das kyi kun rjod pa'i cho
124a6(mdo sde): 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ dge slong dag /khyod kyi sems ni 'di lta bu'o/ /khyod kyi yid ni 'di lta bu'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni 'di lta bu'o/ /'di ni rtog cig /'di ni ma rtog cig /'di
124a7(mdo sde): ni yid la byos shig / 'di ni yid la ma byed cig /'di ni spongs shig /'di ni ma spangs shig/ 'di ni lus kyis mngon sum du byas la rdzogs par gyis te mnos shig /'di ni bcom ldan
124b1(mdo sde): 'das kyi kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul yin no/ /de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ dge slong dag /'di thams cad ni kun tu 'bar ba yin no/ /dge slong
124b2(mdo sde): dag |thams cad kun tu 'bar ba de ci yin zhe na/ dge slong dag /mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa kun tu 'bar ba yin zhing /
124b3(mdo sde): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de'ang kun tu 'bar ba
124b4(mdo sde): yin no/ /dge slong dag /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni kun tu 'bar ba yin zhing / /
124b5(mdo sde): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de'ang kun tu 'bar ba yin
124b6(mdo sde): no| |gang gis kun tu 'bar ba 'dod chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi me dang / gti mug gi mes kun tu 'bar ba/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang /
124b7(mdo sde): smra sngags 'dren pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa ste/ sdug bsngal gyis kun tu 'bar ba'o zhes smra'o/ /de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su
125a1(mdo sde): bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yin no/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong de dag len pa med par zag pa
125a2(mdo sde): rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ga yA'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can gyur pa'i dge slong stong po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/
125a3(mdo sde): zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par
125a4(mdo sde): grol ba sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams ljongs rgyu ba na/ shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal
125a5(mdo sde): ldan shing rta'i 'gram/ drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba de bram ze mtshan mkhan dang / ltas mkhan rnams kyis gal te khyim par gyur te khyim
125a6(mdo sde): na gnas na ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna
125a7(mdo sde): bdun ni 'di lta bu dag yin par 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang /
125b1(mdo sde): khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin po chen yin no/ /de la bu stong yang tshang bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/
125b2(mdo sde): pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par bdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/ chos dang
125b3(mdo sde): mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gal te skra dang / kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab
125b4(mdo sde): tu byung bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba lung bstan to zhes thos so/ /thos
125b5(mdo sde): nas kyang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha|mkhyen
125b6(mdo sde): par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag 'dir lha'i yul na rgyu ba na shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
125b7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur bar lung bstan pa zhig thos so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /lha| de khum zhig /lha ches gtso bo bas
126a1(mdo sde): ches gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'o/ /grong ba dag /shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos zhes bya ba nas/ grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong
126a2(mdo sde): ma bzhin te/ lha| de khum zhig /lha ches gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'o zhes khyed cag de skad ma smra zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ grong pa dag /shAkya rnams kyi gzhon
126a3(mdo sde): nu zhes bya ba nas byung ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du te/ gal te 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na de'i g.yog bya'o/ /gal te skra dang / kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad
126a4(mdo sde): pa yang dag par kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra
126a5(mdo sde): rnam par grags par gyur na de'i nyan thos su khas blangs bar bya'o/ /de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi la 'dug nas smon
126a6(mdo sde): pa'i gzhi lnga la smon par byed de/ kye ma'o/ /bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs
126a7(mdo sde): su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das byung ba dang / de
126b1(mdo sde): la'ang blta ba'i phyir bdag nye bar 'gro ba dang / nye bar song ba na des kyang bdag la chos bshad pa dang / bdag gis kyang chos bshad pa de shes pa dang / bdag gis chos shes
126b2(mdo sde): nas bslab pa bcas shing bslab pa de yang bdag gis blangs te gnas kyang ci ma rung snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ma
126b3(mdo sde): ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po de steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi la 'dug nas/ smon pa'i gzhi lnga smon pa byed de/ kye ma'o/ bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin
126b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag
126b5(mdo sde): cig ljongs rgyu ba na/ shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/ drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba gang yin
126b6(mdo sde): pa de bram ze mtshan mkhan dang / ltas mkhan zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de skra dang / kha spu
126b7(mdo sde): b regs te gos dur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
127a1(mdo sde): rgyas pas de ga yA na/ ga yA'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong stong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad
127a2(mdo sde): pa| bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol
127a3(mdo sde): ba sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo
127a4(mdo sde): sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha|mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag 'di na lha'i yul na rgyu ba na/ shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gang lags pa de zhes
127a5(mdo sde): bya ba nas/ 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de skra dang / kha spu bregs te gos dur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas
127a6(mdo sde): khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de lba na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de ga yA na ga ya'i mchod rten la sngon thams
127a7(mdo sde): cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs
127b1(mdo sde): gcig tu bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ lha| de dag la bkur sti mdzod cig dang / de lta na lha gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur ro/ /de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can
127b2(mdo sde): snying pos mi zhig la bsgo ba/ kwa'e nang rje/ tshur/ khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la song nas/ kho bo'i tshig 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
127b3(mdo sde): byos la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ 'tsho'am/ bskyod pa yang dam/ stobs dang / bde ba dang / sku nyams dang ldan nam/ reg par spyod dam zhes zhus la 'di skad ces kyang
127b4(mdo sde): gsol cig / bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi
127b5(mdo sde): rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol zhes gsol cig /lha|bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po
127b6(mdo sde): bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po las mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu

128a1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal nas/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam zhes bya ba nas/ reg par spyod dam zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du ste snyun gsol lags so//

128a3(mdo sde): bdag / bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad
