128a6(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa
128a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar sha stag dang thabs gcig tu ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ yul ma
128b1(mdo sde): ga d+ha pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal yod pa ga na ba der gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das legs par rab gnas su byon nas/ ma ga d+ha pa rnams
128b2(mdo sde): kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal yod pa na bzhugs so/ /ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur
128b3(mdo sde): ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po zhes bya ba nas/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa

128b7(mdo sde): 'khor lo sa'i nang du bying bar gyur to/ /des bsams pa/ bdag gis las skyon can cung zad cig byas par ma gyur grang snyam mo/ /lha rnams kyis de la smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/

129a2(mdo sde): smras pa/ gal te de lta na gdon no zhes rgyal pos btson rnams 'don du bcug go /yang rgyal po phyir byung bar brtsams pa na de'i dbu rgyan sgo la thug go /de nas yang bsams pa/
129a3(mdo sde): bdag gis ni gdon mi za bar las skyon can zhig byas te des na bdag la ltas ngan pa gzhan sgo la dbu rgyan thug pa 'di byung ngo snyam mo/ /lha de rnams kyis yang smras pa/ rgyal po
129a4(mdo sde): c hen po khyod kyis las skyon can ma byas mod kyi khyod dang lhan cig las mtshungs par spyad pa gang yin pa de dag kha cig ni 'dus kyang kha cig ni yul ljongs gzhan ga ge mo zhes bya ba

129b1(mdo sde): kun dga' ra bar zhugs so/ /ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos thag ji tsam nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba'i bar de nas rgyal po'i mtshan ma lnga po ze'u kha dang / gdugs
129b2(mdo sde): dang | ral gri dang / nor bu'i rnga yab dang / lham khra bo rnams phud do/ /de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos rgyal po'i mtshan ma lnga bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das

134b3(mdo sde): ba'am/ ngan pa'am/ gya nom pa'am/ gang dag thag ring ba'am/ gang dag thag nye ba'ang rung ste/ de dag thams cad la 'di ni bdag ma yin no/ /bdag ni 'di ma yin no/ /'di ni
134b4(mdo sde): bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa de ltar mthong ba
134b5(mdo sde): ni gzugs la'ang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la'ang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yid byung na 'dod chags
134b6(mdo sde): dang 'bral lo/ /'dod chags dang bral ba na rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par grol na bdag gi skye ba zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/ /bya ba byas so/ /srid pa 'di
134b7(mdo sde): las gzhan mi shes so zhes rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po dang / lha
135a1(mdo sde): brgyad khri dang / ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /
135a2(mdo sde): de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos chos mthong ba dang / chos thos pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las
135a3(mdo sde): brgal ba dang / the tshom las brgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan
135a4(mdo sde): las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang nab de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa /
135a5(mdo sde): bdag ni 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /bdag btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyi dge bsnyen du gzung
135a6(mdo sde): du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / dge
135a7(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / bsnyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen
135b1(mdo sde): bkur bgyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal po'i khab kyi ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang
135b2(mdo sde): mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
135b3(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+ha nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas rgyal po'i
135b4(mdo sde): khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na mu stegs yang dag rgyal ba can zhes bya ba skyes nas ring po ma lon par de rnams kyi ston pa dus byas par gyur pa
135b5(mdo sde): dang | de rnams kyi nang na nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes zhes bya ba gnyis tshogs yongs su bsdus pa dang / tshogs kyi 'dren par gyur ba gang yin pa de yongs su 'dren pa na de gnyis kyis
135b6(mdo sde): 'di ltar yu bu cag las gcig gis 'dud rtsi sngar rnyed kyang de gcig la gcig smra bar bya'o zhes dam bca' ba byas so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul snga dro sham thabs bgos /
135b7(mdo sde): lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs te 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang / cung zad lta ba dang / rnam par lta ba dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / snam sbyar dang / chos gos dang / lhung
136a1(mdo sde): bzed thogs pa mdzes pas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /de'i tshe na kun tu rgyu nye rgyal rgyal po'i khab tu bya ba zhig gi phyir spyod yul du zhugs pas
136a2(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa rta thul 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang / cung zad lta ba dang / rnam par lta ba dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / snam sbyar dang / chos gos dang / lhung bzed thogs
136a3(mdo sde): pa mdzes pas rgyal po'i khab na bsod snyoms la rgyu ba thag ring po kho nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal po'i khab 'dir rab tu byung pa ji snyed lhags
136a4(mdo sde): shing gnas pa dag las/ 'di lta ste/ rab tu byung ba 'di'i spyod lam 'di lta bu ni bdag gis sngon chad 'ga' yang ma mthong gi ma la bdag de'i gan du song ste/ dge slong khyed kyi
136a5(mdo sde): ston pa ni gang yin/ gang gi phyir ni rab tu byung / su'i chos la ni dga' zhes dri'o snyam du rig nas lam po che rub ba zhig na 'gro ba dang / ldog pas shas cher sdod cing 'dug go /de nas tshe
136a6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rta thul kun tu rgyu nye rgyal ga la ba der song ngo / /de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge slong / khyod kyi ston pa ni gang yin/ gang
136a7(mdo sde): gi phyir ni rab tu byung / su'i chos la ni dga'/ tshe dang ldan pa shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong gau ta ma shAkya'i ris las skra dang / kha spu bregs nas gos dur smrig dag bgos te dad pa yang
136b1(mdo sde): dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba zhig yod do/ /de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kho bo'i ston pa ni
136b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de yin no/ /kho bo de'i phyir rab tu byung ngo / /kho bo de'i chos la dga'o/ /dge slong / de'i phyir chos ston cig /tshe dang ldan pa/ kho bo ni na gzhon pa dang / rab tu byung
136b3(mdo sde): b a gsar pas de'i phyir kho bos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i bstan pa rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par
136b4(mdo sde): sla ba ma yin te/ 'on kyang 'di ltar de'i don bstan par bya'o/ /dge slong / kho bo la ni don dgos kyi tshig ni shin tu mang pos kyang ci bya ste/ khyod kyis don mang yang rung nyung yang rung
136b5(mdo sde): ston cig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang / /de yi rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa'ang / /de bzhin
136b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te/ /de skad gsung ba'i tshul can dge sbyong che/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ kun tu rgyu nye rgyal chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing
136b7(mdo sde): dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las brgal ba dang / the tshom las
137a1(mdo sde): brgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas ro stod bsrang
137a2(mdo sde): nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ skyob pa rnams kyi chos 'di yin/ /bskal
137a3(mdo sde): pa bye ba khrag khrig tu/ /sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa/ /'chi med mya ngan med pa yi/ /go 'phang 'di la rjes su rtogs/ /tshe dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das de da lta ga la bzhugs /
137a4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas 'di nyid na'o/ /de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis smras pa la mngon par bstod pa dang
137a5(mdo sde): rjes su yi rang ba byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la lan gsum bskor ba byas te song nas kun rgyu pang nas
137a6(mdo sde): skyes ga la ba der song ngo / /kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes kyis kun tu rgyu nye rgyal thag ring po kho nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang kun tu rgyu nye rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa/

137b1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ de'i phyir chos ston cig /de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang / /de yi rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa/ /
137b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te/ /de skad gsung pa'i tshul can dge sbyong che/ /tshe dang ldan pa/ da dung yang lan gcig brjod cig /tshe dang ldan pa/ brjod par bya'o/ /
137b3(mdo sde): chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang / /zhes pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med
137b4(mdo sde): cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /de nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las brgal ba
137b5(mdo sde): dang | the tshom las brgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas/ ro stod bsrang nas
137b6(mdo sde): lag pa g.yas brkyang ste/ kun tu rgyu nye rgyal ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ skyob pa rnams kyi chos 'di yin/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag
137b7(mdo sde): khrig tu/ /sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa/ /'chi med mya ngan med pa yi/ /go 'phang 'di la rjes su rtogs/ /tshe dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das de da lta ga la bzhugs/ /tshe dang ldan pa/
138a1(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas 'di nyid na'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa/ tshur shog /bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa
138a2(mdo sde): spyad par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa/ de'i phyir rje 'khor la blta bar bya ste/ bdag cag lta bu mi grags pa dang ldan pa/ shes par gyur pa dag gis 'khor la blta ba ni legs
138a3(mdo sde): pa yin no/ /de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis kyis bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams/ shes par gyis shig /kho bo cag gnyis
138a4(mdo sde): ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod par byed na khyed cag ji ltar byed/ mkhan po gnyis bdag cag cung zad ci 'tshal ba gang lags pa de dag thams
138a5(mdo sde): cad mkhan po gnyis las brten nas 'tshal ba lags na/ gal te mkhan po gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs pa spyad pa spyod na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po
138a6(mdo sde): gnyis rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /bram ze'i khye'u rnams/ da de'i dus la bab par shes par gyis shig /de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes
138a7(mdo sde): gnyis 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu lnga bcu dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo / /de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la chos ston
138b1(mdo sde): cing bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis thag ring po kho nas gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/
138b2(mdo sde): dge slong dag /khyod kyis grogs po'i tshogs yongs su sdud pa/ tshogs yongs su 'dren pa/ tshogs kyi mdun nas 'ong ba/ 'di lta ste/ nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis mthong
138b3(mdo sde): ngam| btsun pa/ mthong ngo / /'di gnyis ni nyan thos zung dang / zung gi mchog dang / zung bzang por gyur te/ gcig ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur la/
138b4(mdo sde): gcig shos ni shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ ston pa dgongs yul mtha' yas pa/ /skyes
138b5(mdo sde): bu'i dbang po mkhyen mthar byon/ /bcom ldan srid pa mthar mdzad pas/ /grogs po nye rgyal pang nas skyes/ /'od ma'i tshal du ma phyin par/ /de ltar mchi ba gzigs gyur nas/ /
138b6(mdo sde): tshogs mchog dbus su de gnyis ni/ /'di gnyis nga yi nyan thos kyi/ /zung mchog 'gyur zhes des bstan te/ /gcig ni rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mchog /gcig shos shes rab
138b7(mdo sde): ldan pa yi/ /mchog tu 'gyur bar lung bstan mdzad/ /de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
139a1(mdo sde): zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i
139a2(mdo sde): chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por gnang na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /
139a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu byung zhing / dge slong dag /tshur shog /tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / de
139a4(mdo sde): dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i mjug kho nar skra byi ba dang / snam sbyar gyon par gyur te/ lag na lhung bzed thogs pa skra dang / kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang / dge slong
139a5(mdo sde): bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/ /yang smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ /skra byi snam sbyar gyon
139a6(mdo sde): pa'i lus ldan zhing / /mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/ /de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro sham thabs
139a7(mdo sde): bgos/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can gyi mu stegs
139b1(mdo sde): can gyi gnas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pas yid ma rangs shing mngon par mi dga' ba de dag gis dge slong de dang / de dag mthong nas co 'dri zhing tshigs
139b2(mdo sde): su bcad pa smras pa/ sangs rgyas ma ga d+ha dag gi /grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas/ /yang dag rgyal ba'i kun khrid na/ /phyin chad ci zhig bkri bar bya/ /de dge slong rnams
139b3(mdo sde): spa gong zhing mi dga' ba dang / mi 'jigs pa med par gyur to/ /de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms rgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/ phyi dro bsod
139b4(mdo sde): snyoms mi len pas lhung bzed dang / chos gos mkhos su phab nas/ rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/ sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste phyin nas
139b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo pos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis
139b6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ 'di na bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po snga dro sham thabs 'tshal/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos dag thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod
139b7(mdo sde): snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can gyi mu stegs can gyi gnas nas rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lags
140a1(mdo sde): pas| yid ma rangs shing mngon par mi dga' ba de dag gis dge slong de dang / de dag mthong nas co 'dri zhing tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ sangs
140a2(mdo sde): rgyas ma ga d+ha dag gi / grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas/ /yang dag rgyal ba'i kun khrid na/ /phyin chad ci zhig bkri bar bya/ /zhes mchi nas des bdag cag rnams spa

140a4(mdo sde): skad ces/ 'di la dpa' chen bde gshegs dag /dam pa'i chos kyis khrid mdzad de/ /de dag chos kyis khrid mdzad la/ /mkhas pa su zhig mi bzod byed/ /ces brjod na
140a5(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab kyi mi de skad zer ba rnams kyi rlom pa tsam mam/ /spobs pa tsam gang yin pa de thams cad kyi thams cad du med par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge slong rab tu mang
140a6(mdo sde): po dag snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi gang dag yang dag
140a7(mdo sde): r gyal ba can gyi mu stegs can gyi gnas nas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pas yid ma rangs shing mngon par mi dga' ba de dag gis dge slong de dang
140b1(mdo sde): de dag mthong nas co 'dri zhing tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ sangs rgyas ma ga d+hA dag gi /grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas/ /yang dag rgyal ba'i kun khrid na/ /phyin chad ci
140b2(mdo sde): zhig bkri bar bya/ /de nas dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ 'di na dpa' chen bde gshegs dag /dam pa'i chos kyis khrid mdzad de/ /de dag chos kyis
140b3(mdo sde): khrid mdzad la/ /mkhas pa su zhig bzod mi byed/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi mi de skad ces zer ba rnams kyi rlom pa tsam mam/ spobs pa tsam gang yin pa
140b4(mdo sde): de thams cad kyi thams cad du med par gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /ko
140b5(mdo sde): sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po zas gtsang la spring yig bskur ba/ lha| dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/ khyod kyi sras kyis bdud rtsi thob nas bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim
140b6(mdo sde): par byed do/ /zhes spring ba rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas pho nya gtang ba las de de nyid du rab tu byung ste/ pho nya gang dang / gang gtang ba de dang / de nyid du legs par gsungs
140b7(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /rgyal po zas gtsang lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas pho nya gang dang / gang gtang ba de dang / de dag de nyid du legs par gsungs
141a1(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung ngo snyam nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa 'char kas mthong nas smras pa/ lha| khyod ci'i slad du phyag la
141a2(mdo sde): zhal gtad nas thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ 'char ka /gang gi tshe/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa dka' ba spyod pa de'i tshe kho bos sbring yig skyel
141a3(mdo sde): ba'i mi btang ba las de dag kho bo'i gan du 'ongs nas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bzhugs pa 'di dang / 'dis bzhugs so zhes smra'o/ /da ni kho bos spring yig skyel ba'i
141a4(mdo sde): mi btang na 'ga' yang phrin yig khyer te mi 'ong na ji ltar sems khong du chud par mi 'gyur/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha| bdag mchis te bka' mchid 'tshal la slar
141a5(mdo sde): mchi'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka /gang dang / gang song ba de dang / de'i bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas de nyid du 'dug pas khyod kyang song na de
141a6(mdo sde): nyid du 'dug par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do/ /'char kas smras pa/ lha| slar mchis lags so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang rang nyid kyis spring yig bris
141a7(mdo sde): pa| lhums su zhugs pa bzung nas su/ /khyod ni bdag gis cher bskrun te/ /nyon mongs me rab 'bar bzhin du/ /rgyal ba ljon shing la bsten na/ /de nyid khyod kyi slob ma
141b1(mdo sde): yi| |yal ga lcug ma 'phel 'gyur bas/ /gzhan ni bde bas dga' bar 'gyur/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal skal bar ldan/ /gzhan yang gang gis khyod ni ljon shing lcug phran mtshungs
141b2(mdo sde): tsam na/ /bdag gi bu ni 'di yin snyam nas chung nas bskrun bskrun te/ /bu gcig yul mis 'bras bu yongs su spyad pa thob gyur na/ /de la yon tan 'bras bu mi ster khyod la
141b3(mdo sde): snying rje med/ /gang tshe thog ma bltams pa na/ /nyid don bsgrubs nas gnyen rnams ni/ /shin tu che dang phan gdags zhes/ /khyod kyis dam bcas mdzad pas na/ /khyod kyis zhi

148b3(mdo sde): pa de'i tshe yang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos des kho bo'i yid bsdus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang phyag byas te/ 'di dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
148b4(mdo sde): lan gsum phyag byas so/ /de bas na 'di skad ces/ blo gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni/ /kun spyan zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te/ /bltams pa'i tshe na sa 'di g.yos
148b5(mdo sde): pa dang / /dzam+bu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de brtul nas 'khor brgya phrag du ma zil gyis
148b6(mdo sde): mnan nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang skad 'dzer cing mig mchi mas gang bas bcom ldan
148b7(mdo sde): 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ gzhal med khang gi gnas rnams las/ /yab kyi khab na bzhugs pa las/ /dgon pa 'jigs dang bcas
149a1(mdo sde): rnams su/ /ji lta bur ni 'ba' zhig bzhugs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi yi bdag po gang du ni/ /khyim gyi 'ching ba las grol ba/ /
149a2(mdo sde): 'phags pa yi ni gnas pa bcus/ /thub pa rnams ni gnas par mdzad/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ ba so gser gyi rtsa ba can/ /shin tu bde ba gting ba yis/ /khri la mnal bar
149a3(mdo sde): mdzad pa las/ /gding ba la ni ji ltar mnal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po rnam grol gnas mal ni/ /dga' ba byang chub yan lag gi/ me tog bkram
149a4(mdo sde): par chags med cing / /yongs su gdung ba rnam spangs mnal/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ dpa' bo nyid kyi pho brang na/ /glang po shing rta rtas bzhud pa/ /tsher mar bcas pa'i sa
149a5(mdo sde): gzhi la/ /zhabs kyis ji ltar gshegs par mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga yi shing rta rdzu 'phrul rkang / /yang dag rtsol ba'i gzhol ba yis/ /sa kun
149a6(mdo sde): rnam par rgyun yang / /nyon mongs tsher mas gnod pa med/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo sngon ni ka shi ka'i/ /na bza' mnabs nas mdzes pa las/ /ngur
149a7(mdo sde): smrig rtsub po'i gos mnabs pa/ /ji ltar khyod kyis sku yis bzod/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po nga'i gos ngo tsha shes/ /nga yi bgo ba snam sbyar te/ /de
149b1(mdo sde): bgos thub pa zhi ba rnams/ /nags khrod na ni mdzes par 'gyur/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ 'di ltar khyod sngon gser gyi gzhong ba nas/ /du ma'i ro ldan 'bras
149b2(mdo sde): chan gsol ba las/ /'di ltar gtso bo da lta'i bsod snyoms ni/ /phal pa gsol pa ji ltar mgul du mchi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zas kyi sred pa thams
149b3(mdo sde): cad spangs nas ni/ /nges par byung dang mnyam par bzhag ldan pa'i/ /nga yi chos kyi ro mchog gsol mod kyi/ /'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir spyod do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang
149b4(mdo sde): gis gsol pa/ mgur du bde ba mang bgyid pa'i/ /rgun skyems kha ra'i chab gsol na/ /rnyog pa can la dri nga ba'i/ /chab ni ji lta zhig tu gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
149b5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ mi yi bdag po gang 'thungs na/ /bdag la 'thung ba thams cad ni/ /dug dang 'dra bar snang gyur pa/ /chab kyi ro mchog nga 'thung ngo / /rgyal po zas gtsang gis
149b6(mdo sde): gsol pa/ 'di ltar khyod sngon bsil khang gzhal med khang / /khang bzang steng na ji lta'i dus bzhin bzhugs/ /da ltar gcig pu nags khrod khyod bzhugs pa/ /blo bzang ji
149b7(mdo sde): ltar bsnyengs pa med par bzhugs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gau tam 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa/ /dri ma bag chags bcas par yang spangs pas/ /da
150a1(mdo sde): ni mya ngan 'jigs pa med gnas te/ /nga la 'di na 'jigs pa cung zad med/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ /khyod sngon khrus khang shin tu
150a2(mdo sde): yid 'ong bar/ /khrus mchog khyad par 'phags pas rtag bsil na/ /gcig pu khyod ni nags khrod gnas ldan par/ /thub dbang da ltar su yi khrus mdzad 'gyur/ /bcom
150a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gau ta ma chos kyi mtsho phran dri med pa/ /tshul khrims 'jug ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste/ /de la reg pa'i yon tan mi bkru na/ /lus
150a4(mdo sde): mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu brgal/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol/ /dpa' bo nyid kyi khab na ni/ /gser dngul bum pas khrus mdzad na/ /rnyog pa can la dri nga ba/ /
150a5(mdo sde): chab kyis ji ltar khrus mdzad lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gau tam dad pa'i 'bab chu rnyog pa med/ /bsod nams 'jug ngogs dam pas bsngags pa
150a6(mdo sde): ste| |de la rig pa'i yon tan ma bkrus na/ /lus mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu brgal/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyod sngon ser skya yis/ /tsan+dan
150a7(mdo sde): gyis ni sku bkrus shing / /ka shi'i mchog gnas mdzes pa las/ /de dang bral nas mdzes ma lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrims nga yi rgyan
150b1(mdo sde): yin te/ /tshul khrims nyid ni byug pa yin/ /gser dang nor bu rna cha dag /rmongs skyes nga la ci zhig bya/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ gang gis khyod ni khyad du gsod/ /
150b2(mdo sde): gang las 'jigs su rung ba skye/ /yid 'byung ba yang gang las skyes/ /zhus pa de dag bdag la gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gis nga ni khyod gsod
150b3(mdo sde): dang | |gang zhig las ni 'jigs pa dang / /gang las yid 'byung skyes pa dag /nyon cig khyod la bshad par bya/ /rga dang na dang 'chi ba ste/ /gal te 'di gsum yod min
150b4(mdo sde): na| |nga yang shin tu yid 'ong ba'i/ /yul rnams la ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ shAkya rnams kyi rigs dga' ba/ /legs par 'khrungs
150b5(mdo sde): pa'i dpa' bo legs/ /khyod ni 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis/ /ji lta bur yang ma gos so/ /de nas rab dga' dang ba rgyas byas nas/ /drang srong dge 'dun bskor ba byas nas
150b6(mdo sde): ci| |thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ /bde bar gshegs la kun nas rtog cing 'dug /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gi bus
150b7(mdo sde): yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob pa ni bdag gi rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar 'khor de'i bsam pa dang /
151a1(mdo sde): bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bshad par mdzad de/ de thos pas zas dkar la sogs
151a2(mdo sde): pa shAkya bdun khri bdun stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te rgyal po zas gtsang ni ma gtogs so/ /lha byin nga rgyal las nga rgyal can sdig pa 'dod
151a3(mdo sde): pa des bden pa mthong bar ma byas pas khro bas kun nas bkris pa dang bcas pas smras pa/ gal te bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i sgyu mas dbang du byed pa shes na/ bdag
151a4(mdo sde): gis kyang 'jig rten thams cad dbang du bya ba zhig / de la shAkya rnams kyis gshe ba'i tshig gis smras pa/ lhas byin/ bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul che ba yin gyi de
151a5(mdo sde): skad ma smra zhig ces bzlog nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go / tshangs pas bskor ba'i skyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang
151a6(mdo sde): ma gtogs par bre bo zas la sogs pa shAkya drug khri drug stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na'ang lhas byin de kho na bzhin du zer ro/ /ro hi ta
151a7(mdo sde): ka'i skyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par bdud rtsi zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri lnga stong gis rgyun
151b1(mdo sde): du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na'ang lhas byin de kho na bzhin du zer ro/ /'khor lhag ma rnams las kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /kha
151b2(mdo sde): cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu/ kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha
151b3(mdo sde): cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom par
151b4(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song / kha cig gis ni chos la/ kha cig gis ni dge 'dun la ste/ 'khor de dag phal cher yang sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos
151b5(mdo sde): la 'bab/ dge 'dun la bab par bkod do/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon ni bcom ldan 'das lha dang / lha ma yin gyi 'gro bar bcas pas mchod pa
151b6(mdo sde): dang | rjed pa dang / mngon du smra bar gyur na/ da lta ni mis mchod kyi/ lhas ni ma yin no snyam mo/ /de nas shAkya gzhon nu zhig gis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ drang srong chen
151b7(mdo sde): po smra mchog dam chos kyi/ /char pas 'gro ba 'di ni tshim mdzad de/ /mi bzad lam du lhung ba'i 'jig rten 'di/ /drangs te thar ba'i lam la spyod par mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan
152a1(mdo sde): 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ni 'di snyam du bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig /'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no snyam ste
152a2(mdo sde): lhag par dga' ba las gyur gyi mdor na de'i dregs pa spong du gzhug go / rgyu gnyis kyis bden pa rnams mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ ha cang zhum pa dang / shin tu dga' ba'o/ /
152a3(mdo sde): de la zhum pa'i sems dang / shin tu dga' ba yod kyis/ ma la ngas de'i zhum pa dang / shin tu dga' ba gnyis spong du gzhug go snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
152a4(mdo sde): ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud+gal gyi bu/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la sgoms shig /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu
152a5(mdo sde): chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas rgyal po zas gtsang gang na ba der song ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po rgyang ring po nas
152a6(mdo sde): 'ong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po/ /tshur spyo na/ maud+gal gyi bu chen po khyod
152a7(mdo sde): byon pa legs so/ /btsun pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po/ gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig /tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen pos gdan bshams pa nyid la 'dug
152b1(mdo sde): go |de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na/ rang gi stan las mi snang bar gyur te shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par
152b2(mdo sde): 'phags nas spyod lam rnam par bzhi byed de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal bar byed do/ /me'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug
152b3(mdo sde): par byed do/ /me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po'i lus las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par byed de/ 'di lta ste/
152b4(mdo sde): sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog dag go /cho 'phrul zung du'ang ston par byed do/ /lus kyi smad nas me 'bar bar
152b5(mdo sde): byed la lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do/ /lus kyi stod nas me 'bar bar byed la lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed pa de lta bu'i ting nge
152b6(mdo sde): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su'ang de bzhin no/ /phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi
152b7(mdo sde): bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba bsdus te stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces
153a1(mdo sde): smras so/ /btsun pa mo+od+gal gyi bu chen po/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba gzhan yang mchis lags
153a2(mdo sde): sam/ rgyal po chen po mchis so zhes tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ mthu che ba dag gsum rig dang / sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa dang / /zag zad dgra bcom gang yin
153a3(mdo sde): pa/ /thub pa'i nyan thos mang du mchis/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar ma zad de/ 'di ltar
153a4(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i rab tu byung ba gzhan yang yod do snyam nas de shin du dga' ba gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/ /skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig
153a5(mdo sde): rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad de/ kye ma brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams 'ongs na/ lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos bshad do snyam pa dang / chos nyid kyis
153a6(mdo sde): gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ srog chags grog spur rnams kyi sems kyis kyang bcom ldan
153a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis dgongs pa shes par 'gyur na/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ gang gi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed
153b1(mdo sde): pa de'i tshe nyan thos chen po rnams kyi sems kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa mi shes na brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs te lha rnams kyis lta ci smos/ srog chags
153b2(mdo sde): grog sbur rnams kyis lta ga la shes/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam pa
153b3(mdo sde): las de 'di snyam du sems te/ lha'i 'khor dag pa rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed do snyam nas des lha'i bu bzo thams cad pa la sgo ba/ bzo thams cad pa/ bcom ldan 'das
153b4(mdo sde): lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad par bzhed kyi/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtseg ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul cig /ko+o shi ka / khyod kyi
153b5(mdo sde): g sung mchog tu bzang ngo zhes lha'i bu bzo thams cad pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin las mnyan te n+ya grog d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtseg ma gdan sna tshogs
153b6(mdo sde): bshams pa zhig sprul to/ /de la rgyal po chen po bzhi sgo bzhi na 'khod pa ni yul 'khor skyong dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / lus ngan po ste/ shar sgo na
153b7(mdo sde): ni yul 'khor skyong dpung rgyan dang / rna cha gdub 'khor dang / phreng ba dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po lha'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
154a1(mdo sde): pa'o| |nub kyi phyogs na ni mig mi bzang rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'o/ /byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /
154a2(mdo sde): de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba che thang du brgyan du bcug ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
154a3(mdo sde): la don de rgyas par gsol to/ /de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas khang pa brtsegs par zhugs te lha'i 'khor phal
154a4(mdo sde): po che'i gung la rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po rgyal po zas gtsang khrid de bcom
154a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po nang du zhugs pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang la rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong gis/
154a6(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po/ nang du ma 'gro bar sdod cig ces bzlog go /ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi
154a7(mdo sde): dbang ngo / /bzhin bzang khyod su zhig /rgyal po chen po/ bdag ni yul 'khor skyong ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang lho sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags
154b1(mdo sde): skyes pos mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig /rgyal po zas gtsang gi mthong nas smras pa/ bzhin bzang khyod su zhig /'phags
154b2(mdo sde): skyes pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ bdag ni 'phags skyes po'o/ /ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug
154b3(mdo sde): tu mi dbang ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang nub sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod
154b4(mdo sde): cig / rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa/ bzhin bzang khyod su zhig /mig mi bzang gis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ bdag ni mig mi bzang ngo / /ci'i
154b5(mdo sde): phyir| bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang byang sgor song ba dang / rgyal po
154b6(mdo sde): chen po rnam thos kyi bus mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ bzhin bzang khyod su zhig /rnam
154b7(mdo sde): thos kyis bus smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ bdag ni rnam thos kyi bu'o/ /ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug
155a1(mdo sde): tu mi dbang ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad pa de bdag gis blta'o snyam pa'i 'dod pa
155a2(mdo sde): skyes so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis zhum pa'i rgyud gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis gal te
155a3(mdo sde): nga ma mthong na khrag dron po skyugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de yod kyi/ de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
155a4(mdo sde): rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs pa gang yin pa de shel las byas par sprul pa dang / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par mthong ngo //
155a5(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang / mgu ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das
155a6(mdo sde): kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba
155a7(mdo sde): de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs
155b1(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa/ bdag la phas ma bgyis/ mas ma lags/ rgyal bas ma
155b2(mdo sde): lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags/ sngon gyi 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyis ma lags/ sdug pa dang / rang gi skye bo dang / gnyen gyi tshogs kyis
155b3(mdo sde): ma lags pa gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/ khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bkum /
155b4(mdo sde): mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/ bdag lha dang / mi rnams su ni bzhag go /yang gsol pa/ pha la lan du phan gdags pa/ /dam pa'i bus ni bgyi ba gang / /khyod kyis bdag la
155b5(mdo sde): mdzad lags te/ /sems ni grol bar gzhol bar bgyis/ /khyod kyis bdag ni ngan 'gro las/ /drangs te mtho ris thar pa las/ /bsgrim mi 'tshal bar bzhag lags te/ /khyod kyis
155b6(mdo sde): dga' ba mdzad pa legs/ /mgon po byams pa khyed kyis ni/ /bdag gi tshong pa rnyed ldan ltar/ /mtho ris rnyed pa srid pa yi/ /longs spyod dag ni rnyed par mdzad/ /de nas rgyal
155b7(mdo sde): p o zas gtsang stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
156a1(mdo sde): to| |bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnad bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /
156a2(mdo sde): /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan
156a3(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te zas dkar gang na ba der song ste phyin nas zas dkar la 'di skad ces smras
156a4(mdo sde): so| |gzhon nu/ rgyal srid thob kyi/ rgyal srid khyer cig /ci'i slad du/ ngas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bas so/ /gang gi gdugs la lags/ de

156a6(mdo sde): ba mthong lags so/ /de bzhin du bre bo zas la rgyal srid khyer cig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi tshe tshangs pas bskor
156a7(mdo sde): ba'i skyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe shAkya bdun khri drug stong dang bden pa mthong lags so/ /de bzhin du bdud rtsi zas la rgyal srid khyer cig ces smras
156b1(mdo sde): pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag gis kyang gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis ro hi ta ka'i skyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe shAkya bdun khri lnga stong dang lhan cig bden pa

156b3(mdo sde): bzang ldan rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag sta gon byas
156b4(mdo sde): nas nang par sngar langs te/ gdan bshams shing nor bu chu snod bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gdugs
156b5(mdo sde): tshod lags na/ da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ snga dro na bza' dang / sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te dge slong gi tshogs
156b6(mdo sde): kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang gi bkang sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung
156b7(mdo sde): la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i
157a1(mdo sde): bza' ba dang / bca' bas rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' bas rang gi lag
157a2(mdo sde): nas bstabs shing tshim par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la n+ya
157a3(mdo sde): gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis yon bsngo bar mdzad pa/ sbyin pa'i bsod nams gang yin 'dis/ /

157b1(mdo sde): lus gdungs pas lus mi mdzes par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar ral pa can 'di dag spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin mod kyi/ lus mdzes pa ma

162a1(mdo sde): 'khus nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /ko ka li ka dang / khan dra drab bya dang / ka ta mo ra ka dang / rgyal dang / rgya mtshos sbyin rnams phyir
162a2(mdo sde): byung ba na/ bong bu'i skad grags nas de dag kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ 'di dag gis kyang nyan thos chen po rnams la tshig ngan pa smras nas dmyal bar
162a3(mdo sde): gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /nye dga' glang po che la zhon nas phan tshun du lta bar byed pa na mu tig gi do shal lhung ba dang / de glang po che las babs te blangs so/ /de'ang de rnams kyis

162b1(mdo sde): la| ngas thams cad dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang / bzhi'i las kyis rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs su gzhug go snyam du dgongs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal

162b4(mdo sde): par btang nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyi skra 'dreg pa na/ de ngom zung gnag cir mchi ma 'dzag cing skad 'dzer cing dbugs brtsegs pas skra 'dreg par byed do/ /shAkya'i
162b5(mdo sde): rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ nye bar 'khor/ ci'i phyir du/ de snying rje rje skad du gcom chung ngur dal bus tshig re re nas smras pa/ lha| bdag dzam+bu'i gling gi skyes bu gtso
162b6(mdo sde): bo rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pha mi phal pa rnams la'ang bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ba lta zhig / khyed kyis spangs te gson pa bas na gum mi bsngo'o/ /shAkya'i
162b7(mdo sde): rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ nye bar 'khor khyod kyis rje bo la snying nye ba'i mnyes par bya ba bstan zin te chog gi /mya ngan ma byed cig /ngas ji ltar mi phal che ba rnams la
163a1(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/ des phyogs gcig tu ras gcig bting nas shAkya'i gzhon nu rnams la smras pa /
163a2(mdo sde): shes ldan gzhon nu dag nyon cig /'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor 'dis bdag cag la bkur sti byas la bdag cag kyang slar khyim du mi gnas kyi/ rgyan rnams de'i 'tsho ba'i
163a3(mdo sde): rkyen du ras kyi steng du zhog cig / de rnams kyi se mo do dang / do shal dang / mgul rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna rgyan la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan
163a4(mdo sde): pa'i rgyan khyad par can rnams kyis ras kyi steng du phung po chen por spungs so/ /nye bar 'khor gyis de rnams mthar gyis skra bregs te de rnams khrus la dong ba dang / des bsams
163a5(mdo sde): pa| re zhig gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang / 'byor pa dang / lang tsho la bab cing chung ma dang ldan la/ mdzod dang / bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa'ang spangs nas rab tu byung na bdag
163a6(mdo sde): rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab
163a7(mdo sde): tu 'byung zhing chu bo las brgal ba dang / sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir btsal ba dang / 'bad pa la brtson par bya ba zhig snyam mo/ /'di ni chos nyid yin te/
163b1(mdo sde): ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa de bzhin du nyan thos chen po rnams kyang byad
163b2(mdo sde): pas| tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor lhag par skyo ba skyes pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'dreg mkhan nye ba 'khor gang na pa der song ste phyin nas
163b3(mdo sde): 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /nye bar 'khor/ khyod ci'i phyir shin tu mi dga' bas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug /nye bar
163b4(mdo sde): 'khor gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gang gi phyir da ltar gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang / 'byor pa dang / lang tshol bab cing chung ma dang ldan la bang mdzod dang / bar
163b5(mdo sde): mdzod kyis rgyas pa'ang spangs nas rab tu 'byung na/ bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na
163b6(mdo sde): bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las brgal ba dang / sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir btsal ba dang / 'bad pa
163b7(mdo sde): la brtson par bgyi ba zhig na bdag ci'i phyir sems khong du chud par mi 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bzhin bzang / thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab
164a1(mdo sde): 'di la ni rigs snying por byed pa ma yin/ rus snying por byed pa ma yin/ rgyud snying por byed pa ma yin/ thos pa snying por byed pa ma yin te/ 'di ltar thub
164a2(mdo sde): pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni sgrub pa snying por byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams rigs dang ni/ rgyud dang rus la rtog mi mdzad/ /'das nas yun ring lon pa yi/ /
164a3(mdo sde): las rnams la ni rtog par mdzad/ /gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po rdzogs par 'dod na tshur
164a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dod dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /des khas blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus 'dreg mkhan nye
164a5(mdo sde): par 'khor khrid de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
164a6(mdo sde): gsol to/ /btsun pa/ nye bar 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal lags na thugs brtse bar
164a7(mdo sde): nye bar bzung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di rab tu dbyung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong tshur shog /tshangs
164b1(mdo sde): par spyod pa spyod cig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i mod kho nar skra byi ba dang / snam sbyar gyon pa dang / lag pa lhung bzed dang / bya ma bum gyis 'brel ba dang / skra dang / kha spu
164b2(mdo sde): skyes nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam dang / dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/ /smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal
164b3(mdo sde): pas| skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing / /mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/ /shAkya rab tu byung ba rnams ni
164b4(mdo sde): rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du 'dud pa byed pas/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan 'dud par byed pa na nye bar 'khor gyi rkang pa yin par shes so/ /de nas des gdong bteg ste gsol pa/
164b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni nye bar 'khor lags na/ ci/ bdag gis 'di'i rkang pa gnyis la'ang gdud par bgyi'am/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu| nga rgyal spangs pa'i
164b6(mdo sde): phyir rab tu byung ba yin te/ 'di rgan gyi/ nga rgyal gyi dregs pa chog la thud cig /des de'i rkang pa la gtugs pa nas chen po lan drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos
164b7(mdo sde): rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mthon nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mthon shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho
165a1(mdo sde): byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma' bar gyur te/ de ltar thams
165a2(mdo sde): cad kyis rim bzhin du gtugs so/ /lhas byin gyis ma btud pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu/ nga rgyal spang ba'i phyir rab tu byung ba yin gyis thud cig /
165a3(mdo sde): des gsol pa/ bdag gis de'i rkang pa la ma gtugs na khyod la gnod pa ci mchis zhes te 'dud du ma btub ste/ der thog mar bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lhas byin gyis
165a4(mdo sde): bcag go / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya'i gzhi n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po 'dun
165a5(mdo sde): khang du tshogs shing 'dus nas bar skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dag gleng bar byed de/ shes ldan dag /shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci
165a6(mdo sde): zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin/ gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad 'dri ste/ shes ldan dag /shAkya rnams ni gang
165a7(mdo sde): las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin zhes de skad du 'dri na/ bdag cag gis ni shAkya rnams gang las skyes
165b1(mdo sde): pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ni ci zhig yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin pa'ang mi shes na ji skad du lung bstan/ tshur bdag cag bcom ldan
165b2(mdo sde): 'das gang na ba der dong la lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la don de nyid zhus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar bya'o/ /
165b3(mdo sde): de nas ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs
165b4(mdo sde): gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ 'dir bdag ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rab tu mang po 'dun
165b5(mdo sde): khang du tshogs shing 'dus nas bar skabs kyi bka' mchid 'di lta bu dag gleng ste/ shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi
165b6(mdo sde): sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin/ gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad 'dri ste/ shes ldan dag /shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni
165b7(mdo sde): ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin zhes de skad du 'dri na/ bdag cag gis shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/
166a1(mdo sde): shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud gang yin pa'ang mi shes na ji skad du lung bstan/ tshur bdag cag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong la
166a2(mdo sde): lhag pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la don 'di nyid zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar bgyi'o snyam nas de'i
166a3(mdo sde): slad du bcom ldan 'das la bdag cag don 'di nyid zhu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes lags/ thog ma ni gang lags/ rgyu ni ci zhig lags/
166a4(mdo sde): shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te ngas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas
166a5(mdo sde): chos kyi gtam glengs na/ mu stegs can dang / kun tu rgyu gzhan dag 'di skad ces dge slong gau ta ma ni ci 'dod pa de lung ston pas bdag nyid bstod par byed do/ /zhes smra
166a6(mdo sde): ba gang yin pa'i gnas 'di yod pas nga'i nyan thos las shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam glengs par nus pa su yod snyam mo/ /de'i tshe tshe
166a7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud+gal
166b1(mdo sde): gyi bu| nga ro rgyab bsnyung bas re zhig de bsal gyi/ khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas dge slong rnams la chos kyi gtam bya bar spobs par gyis shig
166b2(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen pos cang mi smra bas khas blangs
166b3(mdo sde): par thugs su chud nas snam sbyar btab ste sngas su bcug nas/ glo g.yas pa phab ste/ zhabs kyi steng du zhabs bzhag nas snang ba'i 'du shes dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin
166b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i 'du shes kho na yid la mdzad pas mnal to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la/ bdag gis sems ji ltar mnyam par
166b5(mdo sde): bzhag na shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ni ci yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud gang yin pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting
166b6(mdo sde): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud mthong
166b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen pos shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang / thog
167a1(mdo sde): ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ni ci zhig yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs
167a2(mdo sde): te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go / 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams la smras pa/ gau ta ma
167a3(mdo sde): dag / 'jig rten 'di 'jig cing 'jig rten zhig nas/ sems can phal cher 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/ de rnams de na yid las byung ba'i gzugs
167a4(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa dbang po ma nyams shing ma tshang ba med pa yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od can/ nam mkha'
167a5(mdo sde): la 'gro ba/ dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /de'i tshe sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur zhing mtsho gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /sa chen po 'di chu 'ba'
167a6(mdo sde): zhig gi mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis pris ma chags pa dang / mkhregs pa dang / khebs par byed do/ /dper na/ 'o ma bskol ba grangs par gyur pa'i steng du rlung
167a7(mdo sde): gis pris ma chags pa dang / mkhregs pa dang / khebs pa de bzhin du sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig gi mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis pris ma chags pa dang /
167b1(mdo sde): mkhregs pa dang / khebs par byed do/ /sa'i bcud de ni kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa yin zhing kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/
167b2(mdo sde): dper na/ mar sar lta bu'o/ /ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na/ sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'i dus gang yin pa de yod do/ /gau ta ma dag /'jig rten gang yin pa 'di
167b3(mdo sde): 'chags shing 'jig rten chags na/ de na sems can kha cig tshe zad las zad/ bsod nams zad nas 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'di lta bur mi rnams
167b4(mdo sde): dang skal ba mnyam par 'ong zhing de rnams 'di na yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ dbang po ma nyams shing ma tshang ba med pa/ yan lag dang / nying lag thams
167b5(mdo sde): cad dang ldan zhing kha dog bzang pos gnas pa rang gi 'od can/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba/ dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe
167b6(mdo sde): nyi ma dang / zla ba yang 'jig rten du mi 'byung ste/ rgyu skar rnams kyang med/ skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam yang med/ mtshan mo dang / nyin mo yang med/ zla ba dang /
167b7(mdo sde): zla ba phyed dang / dus tshigs dang / lo rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung ba med do/ /skyes pa dang / bud med du mngon pa yang med kyi/ gzhan du na sems can sems can zhes bya
168a1(mdo sde): ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /de nas sems can brkam chags kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myong bar byed de/ ji lta ji ltar
168a2(mdo sde): myangs pa de lta de ltar sred do/ /ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o/ /sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can de mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud
168a3(mdo sde): myong bar byed de/ ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar sred la/ ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de rnams kyis kyang mdzub
168a4(mdo sde): mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myang par rtsom ste/ ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar sred do/ /ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o/ /gang gi tshe sems can da
168a5(mdo sde): rnams kyis sa'i bcud la kham gyi zas rim gyis zos pa de'i tshe/ de rnams kyi lus la mkhrang ba dang / lci ba zhugs par gyur to/ /de rnams kyi kha dog bzang po'i gsal ba
168a6(mdo sde): gang yin pa de'ang nub par gyur pas 'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to/ /gau ta ma dag /chos nyid kyis 'jig rten du mun pa byung ba na nyi ma dang / zla ba gnyis 'jig rten du
168a7(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar dang / skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam dang / mtshan mo dang / nyin mo dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus tshigs dang / lo 'jig
168b1(mdo sde): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de rnams de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /de rnams las zas la ches nyung zad du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par
168b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par 'gyur te/ kha zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon te/ kha dog rnams pa gnyis
168b3(mdo sde): yod pas/ kye/ sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan no/ /khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod do/ kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de
168b4(mdo sde): rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i bcud de nub par gyur to/ /gau ta ma dag /sa'i bcud de nub pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas
168b5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba/ kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur to/ /dper na/ da ltar mi rnams kyis zas zhim po cung zad cig zos
168b6(mdo sde): nas sngon gyi yi ge dang / tshig dang / tshig 'bru de nyid rjes su dran nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba/ kyi hud bro ba zhes smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams sa'i bcud de nub pa na
168b7(mdo sde): tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba/ kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin/ smras pa/
169a1(mdo sde): 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes de'i don ni mi shes so/ /gau ta ma dag /sems can de rnams kyi sa'i bcud de nub pa na/ sa'i zhag kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun
169a2(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa byung bar 'gyur te/ kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na/ dong ka'i me tog lta bu'o/ /ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na/ sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'o/ /de rnams de za
169a3(mdo sde): zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /de rnams las kha zas la ches nyung du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur to/ /kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin
169a4(mdo sde): pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur to/ /zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon te/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kye| sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la khyod
169a5(mdo sde): ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do/ /kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i
169a6(mdo sde): rgyas pa'i zhag nub par gyur to/ /gau ta ma dag /sa'i zhag de nub par gyur pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba/ kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags
169a7(mdo sde): 'don la mya ngan gyis sdug bsngal bar byed do/ /dper na/ da ltar mi rnams sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba 'ba' zhig gis reg pa na sngon gyi yi ge dang / tshig dang / tshig 'bru de
169b1(mdo sde): nyid rjes su dran nas 'di skad ces e ma'o kyi hud/ e ma 'o kyi hud ces smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams sa zhag de nub pa na tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces kyi hud bro ba/ kyi hud bro
169b2(mdo sde): ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal bar 'gyur kyang smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin /smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes bya bar mi shes so/ /gau ta ma dag /sems can de rnams
169b3(mdo sde): kyis zhag de nub pa na/ myu gu'i tshal kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na/ shing ka dam pa ka'i me tog lta bu'o//
169b4(mdo sde): ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na/ sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'o/ /de rnams de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /de rnams las kha zas la ches nyung bar za ba
169b5(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur to/ /kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur to/ /zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon no/ /kha
169b6(mdo sde): dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kye/ sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do/ /kha dog gi mngon
169b7(mdo sde): pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur to/ /gau ta ma dag /myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur pa na sems can de rnams
170a1(mdo sde): tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ mdun nas phar song / mdun nas phar song zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur to/ /
170a2(mdo sde): dper na/ da ltar mi rnams 'ga' zhig la drag po'i tshar gcad pas tshar gcod par 'dod pa na sngon gyi yi ge dang / tshig dang / tshig 'bru de dag nyid rjes su zlos shing 'di skad du/ mdun nas phar
170a3(mdo sde): song / mdun nas phar song zhes smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams myu gu'i tshal nub pa dang / tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces mdun nas phar song / mdun nas phar song
170a4(mdo sde): zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang / smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin/ smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes bya bar de'i don ni mi shes so/ /gau ta ma dag /
170a5(mdo sde): sems can de rnams kyi myu gu'i tshal nub nas/ ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bras bu tshon bzhi pa/ phub ma med pa/ spun pa med pa/ shun pa med pa/ dag pa/ gtsang ma skye
170a6(mdo sde): ste| de nub brngas na nang skye zhing smin par 'gyur/ nang brngas na nub skye zhing smin par 'gyur bas/ brngas shing brngas kyang slar skye bas brngas par yang mi mngon no/ /de rnams de za zhing
170a7(mdo sde): zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /gang nas sems can de rnams kyi ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bras bu la kham gyis zas su rim gyis zos pa de nas
170b1(mdo sde): de rnams kyi dbang po tha dad 'byung bar gyur te/ kha cig la ni skyes pa'i dbang po'o/ /kha cig la ni bud med kyi dbang po'o/ /de na bud med kyi dbang po can gang yin pa rnams dang / skyes pa'i
170b2(mdo sde): dbang po can gang yin pa rnams gcig la gcig mig gis mig tshugs su blta'o/ /ji lta ji ltar gcig la gcig mis mig tshugs su lta ba de lta de ltar kun tu chags so/ /ji lta ji ltar
170b3(mdo sde): kun tu chags ba de lta de ltar zhen no/ /ji lta ji ltar zhen pa de lta de ltar log par zhugs so/ /sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can gyis sems can la log par zhugs pa
170b4(mdo sde): mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang sa dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mos gtor nas 'di skad ces/ sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed do/ /sems can
170b5(mdo sde): ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed pa yin gyi/ kwa'e/ sems can khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can sun dbyung zhes smra'o/ /dper na/ da ltar gyi mi rnams bag ma blangs pa na
170b6(mdo sde): phye ma dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / gos dang / 'bras yos kyis gtor nas/ 'di skad ces/ bag ma bde bar gyur cig ces zer ba de bzhin du sems can rnams kyis sems can
170b7(mdo sde): la log par zhugs pa mthong ba nas sa gtor cing bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams kyis kyang gtor nas kyang / 'di skad ces/ sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba
171a1(mdo sde): ma yin pa byed do/ /sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed kyi/ kwa'e/ sems can khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can sun dbyung zhes bya ba smra ba'i
171a2(mdo sde): dus gang yin pa de yod do/ /gau ta ma dag /de ltar sngon chos ma yin par 'dod pa gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi 'dul ba ma yin par 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni da ltar chos su
171a3(mdo sde): 'dod do/ /'dul bar 'dod do/ /sngon smad par bya bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni da ltar bsngags par bya bar 'dod do/ /de rnams kyis de zhag gcig cig spangs pa nas zhag
171a4(mdo sde): gnyis dang / gsum dang / bdun du'ang spangs so/ /gang na sems can de rnams sdig pa can dam pa ma yin pa'i chos de la lhag par sdig pa can gyi brtul zhugs spyod pa de
171a5(mdo sde): rnams khang pa brtsig pa la brtson par byed do/ /'dir bdag cag bya ba ma yin pa spyad do/ /'dir bdag cag bya ba ma yin pa spyad do zhes zer bas khyim khyim zhes bya bar grags
171a6(mdo sde): te| gau ta ma dag / 'di ni 'jig rten du khang pa'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i rtsom pa dang po yin no/ /de'ang chos kyis yin gyi/ chos ma yin pas ma yin te/ de la rgyal
171a7(mdo sde): ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di ni gtso bo yin no/ /de rnams nub bza' ba don du gnyer ba'ang dgongs ka /nang bza' ba don du gnyer ba'ang nang par sA lu'i ched du 'dong bar
171b1(mdo sde): byed do/ /de nas sems can snyoms las kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis nang par gyi sA lu nub blangs so/ /de nas sems can gzhan zhig gis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
171b2(mdo sde): kye| sems can khyod tshur sA lu'i phyir 'dong ngo / /de nas sems can des sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye| sems can khyod rang gi sA lu la soms shig /kho bos ni nang
171b3(mdo sde): par gyi sA lu nub blangs so/ /de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma de ni legs so/ /kye ma de ni shin tu legs kyi/ ma la/ bdag gis zhag gnyis kyi dang / zhag gsum gyi dang /
171b4(mdo sde): zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sA lu blang ngo snyam nas/ des zhag pa gnyis kyi dang / zhag gsum gyi dang / zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sA lu blangs so/ /de nas sems can zhig gis sems can de la/ 'di skad
171b5(mdo sde): ces smras so/ /kye| sems can khyod tshur sA lu'i phyir 'dong ngo / /de nas sems can des sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye|sems can khyod rang gi sA lu la soms
171b6(mdo sde): shig |kho bos ni zhag gnyis kyi dang / gsum gyi dang / zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sA lu blangs zin no/ /de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma de ni legs so/ /kye ma de ni
171b7(mdo sde): shin tu legs kyi/ ma la/ bdag gis zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig gi sA lu blang ngo snyam nas/ des zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig gi sA lu blangs so/ /gang nas sems can de rnams kyis
172a1(mdo sde): ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru gsog 'jog gi yongs su longs spyad pas zos pa de nas sA lu de'i 'bras bu phub ma dang / spun pa dang / shun
172a2(mdo sde): pas yog par gyur to/ /brngas shing brngas na'ang phyir mi skye bas brngas par yang mngon la/ sA lu'ang spubs sam/ yal ga'i sbubs la yod par gyur to/ /de nas sems can
172a3(mdo sde): de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas/ shes ldan dag /bdag cag sngon yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ dbang po mnyams shing ma tshang ba med pa/ yan lag
172a4(mdo sde): dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od dang ldan pa/ nam mkha' la 'gro zhing dga' ba za zing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun
172a5(mdo sde): ring du gnas la/ bdag cag la sa'i bcud kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/ bdag cag sa'i bcud la kham gyi zas
172a6(mdo sde): kyi rim gyis zos te/ gang gi tshe bdag cag gis sa'i bcud la kham gyi rim gyis zos pa de'i tshe bdag cag gis lus la rtsub pa nyid dang / lci ba nyid du zhugs par gyur te/ kha
172a7(mdo sde): dog bzang po'i gsal ba gang yin pa de ni nub par gyur pas 'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to/ /bdag cag de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas par gyur
172b1(mdo sde): to| |bdag cag las kha zas la ches nyung du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog bzang por gyur/ kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/ kha zas kyi tshad gnyis
172b2(mdo sde): la brten nas kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon te/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kwa'e/ sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis
172b3(mdo sde): sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do/ /bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i bcud de nub par gyur to/ /
172b4(mdo sde): sa'i bcud de nub pa nas zhag kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/ bdag cag de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring
172b5(mdo sde): gnas so/ /bdag cag las kha zas ches nyung du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur/ kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/ zas kyi tshad
172b6(mdo sde): gnyis la brten nas kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon no/ /kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kwa'e/ sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can

173a1(mdo sde): de nub pa na myu gu'i tshal kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/ bdag cag de za zhing de zas su
173a2(mdo sde): za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /bdag cag rnams las kha zas ches nyung du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur/ kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni
173a3(mdo sde): kha dog ngan par gyur te/ kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon no/ /kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kwa'e/ sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no

173a6(mdo sde): gtsang ma skye ste/ de nub brngas na nang skye zhing smin par 'gyur/ nang brngas na nub skye zhing smin par 'gyur bas brngas shing brngas kyang slar yang skye bas brngas par yang mi mngon te/ bdag
173a7(mdo sde): cag de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /gang nas bdag cag gis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru gogs 'jog gi yongs su longs spyad
173b1(mdo sde): pas zos pa de nas sA lu de'i 'bras bu phub ma dang / spun pa dang / shun pas yog par gyur to/ /brngas shing brngas na'ang slar mi skye bas brngas par mngon la/ sA lu'ang spubs
173b2(mdo sde): sam yal ga'i sbubs la yod par gyur pas/ ma la/ bdag cag tshogs shing 'dus la zhing gzhal te mtshams bcad la/ 'di ni khyod kyi'o/ /'di ni nga'i 'o zhes mu thug bre bar
173b3(mdo sde): bya'o zhes de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas zhing bgos te mtshams su mu thug bres so/ /gau ta ma dag /'di ni 'jig rten du mu thug bre ba'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i rtsom pa dang
173b4(mdo sde): po yin no/ /de'ang chos kyis yin gyi/ chos ma yin pas ma yin pas de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di ni chos kyi mchog yin no/ /de nas sems can zhig gis rang gi sA lu yod
173b5(mdo sde): bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par blangs so/ /sems can gzhan dag gis sems can des rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par blangs pa mthong ngo / /mthong
173b6(mdo sde): nas sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kwa'e/ sems can khyod rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par ci'i phyir blang zhes de phar drangs/ tshur drangs nas ci
173b7(mdo sde): tsam na 'khor gyi nang du khrid de/ shes ldan dag /sems can 'di rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par len to zhes spyos so/ /de nas sems can
174a1(mdo sde): de rnams kyis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kwa'e/ sems can khyed rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par ci'i phyir blang / kwa'e/

174a3(mdo sde): drangs/ tshur drangs nas ji tsam na 'khor gyi nang du yang phyung nas spyos so/ /de nas sems can de rnams kyis sems can de la 'di smras so/ /kwa'e/ sems can khyod kyis

174a6(mdo sde): la| bdag cag tshogs shing 'dus la bdag cag gi nang na sems can lhag par gzugs bzang ba/ lhag par blta na sdug pa/ lhag par mdzes pa/ lhag par

174b5(mdo sde): pas gcad par bya ba la ni chad pas gcod/ phan gdags par bya ba rnams la ni phan 'dogs par byed cing de la de rnams kyi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las chos bzhin
174b6(mdo sde): du thog shes dbul te/ skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bkur shing skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bkur bas/ mang pos bkur ba/ mang pos bkur ba zhes grags so/ /zhing de rnams kyi bdag por gyur pa
174b7(mdo sde): na nyams pa las skyob par byed pas/ rgyal rigs/ rgyal rigs zhes bya bar grags so/ /chos kyis skye dgu mgu bar byed cing tshul khrims nyams su blangs te gnas/ shes rab nyams su
175a1(mdo sde): blangs te gnas pas/ rgyal po/ rgyal po zhes bya bar grags so/ /gau ta ma dag /rgyal po mang pos bkur gyi tshe mi rnams kyi ming sems can/ sems can

175a6(mdo sde): zhing shin tu mnyen te/ dper na/ shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/ /de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang
175a7(mdo sde): ba| blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ spyi bo las skyes pas/ spyi bo skyes zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gzhon
175b1(mdo sde): nu byung ma thag tu rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi btsun mo drug khri'i nang du dkri ba dang / de thams cad kyi nu ma la 'o ma zag nas re res nga las nu/ nga las nu zhes smras pas/ nga las nu/ nga
175b2(mdo sde): las nu zhes bya bar grags so/ /gau ta ma dag /rgyal po nga las nu gang gi tshe rgyal srid byed pa de'i tshe mi rnams sems par byed/ 'jal bar byed/ nye bar rtog par byed de/ de rnams bsams/
175b3(mdo sde): gzhal/ nye bar brtags nas bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas tha dad pa dag byed du 'jug pas des na/ de rnams yid la skyes/ yid las skyes zhes bya bar grags so/ /gau ta ma dag /
175b4(mdo sde): rgyal po drug po 'di dag ni tshe tshad med cing tshe dpag tu med pa yin no/ /gau ta ma dag /rgyal po nga las nu'i bral g.yas par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/ dper na/
175b5(mdo sde): shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/ /de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang zhing / blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes
175b6(mdo sde): bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ brla g.yas pa las skyes pas ming mdzes pa/ mdzes pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing
175b7(mdo sde): mthu che ba yin pas da dung yang gling bzhi la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go / gau ta ma dag /rgyal po mdzes pa'i brla g.yon par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu
176a1(mdo sde): mnyen te/ dper na/ shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/ /de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs
176a2(mdo sde): bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ brla g.yon pa las skyes pas ming nye mdzes/ nye mdzes
176a3(mdo sde): zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung yang gling gsum la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go /gau ta ma dag /rgyal po nyi mdzes
176a4(mdo sde): kyi rkang pa g.yas par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/ dper na/ shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/ /
176a5(mdo sde): de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ rkang pa g.yas
176a6(mdo sde): pa las skyes pas ming mdzes ldan/ mdzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung du'ang gling gnyis la nga rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la
176a7(mdo sde): dbang byed du 'jug go / gau ta ma dag /rgyal po mdzes ldan gyi rkang pa g.yon par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/ dper na/ shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/ ras
176b1(mdo sde): bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/ /de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
176b2(mdo sde): kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ rkang pa g.yon pa las skyes pas ming nye mdzes ldan/ nye mdzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung
176b3(mdo sde): du'ang gling gcig la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/ gau ta ma dag /de ltar na rgyal po mang pos bkur gyis bu 'od mdzes so/ /'od mdzes kyi bu dge ba'o/ /dge ba'i bu
176b4(mdo sde): dge mchog / dge mchog gi bu gso sbyong 'phags so/ /gso sbyong 'phags kyi bu nga las nu'o/ /nga las nu'i mdzes pa'o/ /mdzes pa'i nyi mdzes pa'o/ /nyi mdzes kyi mdzes ldan dang /

177a2(mdo sde): tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya tham pa yul gru 'dzin du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po dgra 'dul zhes bya ba byung ste/ dgra 'dul bar byed pas dgra 'dul/ dgra 'dul zhes bya bar

177a4(mdo sde): ni rgyal po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ ma rgyal ba las rgyal bar byed pas na/ ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba/ ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya bar grags so/ /gau ta ma dag /rgyal
177a5(mdo sde): po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri drug stong yul wA ra NA sir byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po bzod dka' zhes bya ba byung
177a6(mdo sde): ngo| |gau ta ma dag / rgyal po bzod dka'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong kim bi la'i grong khyer du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po tshangs
177a7(mdo sde): pas byin ces bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag /rgyal po tshangs byin gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong glang po che'i grong khyer du byung ste/ de
177b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po glang pos byin ces bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag /rgyal po glang pos byin gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga stong yul rdo 'jog tu byung

179b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ma 'ongs pa na byang chub par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab nas tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes so/ /gau ta ma dag /rgyal po kri kri'i bu legs

179b4(mdo sde): srid la mngon par dga'o/ /de pha chos dang / chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed pa mthong nas des bsams pa/ bdag yab 'das nas rgyal por gyur te/ bdag gis kyang chos dang /
179b5(mdo sde): chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byas nas sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur bas 'dir ci'i dus la bab ce na/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam du bsams
