179b7(mdo sde): mchis bar rab tu 'byung ngo / /des smras pa/ bu gang gi phyir mchod sbyin mchod par byed pa dang / sbyin sreg sreg par byed pa dang / dka' thub dka' thub spyod pa de dag ni 'di'i
180a1(mdo sde): ched yin te/ nga 'das na rgyal srid lag mthil du 'ongs te rgyal po byed par 'gyur na ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung / des smras pa/ yab| bdag gis chos dang /

180a3(mdo sde): zhig na drang srong mdog gang ces bya ba gnas so/ /de nas gzhon nu gau ta ma rgyal pos gnang nas/ dga' zhing mgu la dga' ba rgya chen po dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ drang srong

180b2(mdo sde): ta ma gru 'dzin gyi nye 'khor du lo ma'i spyil bu byas te gnas so/ /de'i tshe grong khyer gru 'dzin na smad 'tshong ma bzang mo zhes bya ba dang / skyes bu g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa lag ces bya ba gnas
180b3(mdo sde): te| des de la dga' mgur spyad pa'i phyir gos dang / rgyan dag bskur ro/ /des gos dang / rgyan dag thogs nas chas pa las/ yang mi gzhan zhig kAR+ShA pa Na lnga brgya thogs pa zhig 'ongs
180b4(mdo sde): nas| bzang mo dga' mgur spyad kyi tshur shog / des bsams pa/ gal te bdag song na kAR+ShA pa Na lnga brgya'ang mi 'thob la khyim du 'ongs pa spangs te gzhan du 'gro ba 'di ni legs
180b5(mdo sde): pa ma yin no snyam nas des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/ song la pad+ma'i rtsa lag la jo mo'i mchid nas re zhig bdag skabs ma mchis te slad kyis mchi'o zhes smros shig /des
180b6(mdo sde): de'i gan du song nas smras so/ /mi de'ang bya ba mang po zhig yin pas de de dang / dga' mgur spyad nas thun dang po nyid la song ngo / /des bsams pa/ nam tshod ring du yod pas de'i sems
180b7(mdo sde): kyang bsrung bar nus so snyam nas/ des yang bu mo de la bsgo ba/ pad+ma'i rtsa lag gi gan du song la jo mo'i mchid nas sta gon bgyis lags na skyed mos tshal gang du mchis zhes smros
181a1(mdo sde): shig |des de'i gan du song nas smras pa dang / des smras pa/ khyod kyis skad cig la skabs med/ skad cig la skabs yod ce'am/ bu mo de de dang / rigs

181b1(mdo sde): drang srong gau ta ma gnas so/ /de nas skyes bu g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa lag de skrag nas ral gri khrag can drang srong gau ta ma'i mdun du bor nas skye bo'i tshogs de nyid kyi nang du zhugs so/ /

181b6(mdo sde): ba 'di ngas spangs kyis gsal shing la gshon cig / de rab tu byung ba de me tog ka ra bI ra'i phreng ba mgul du btags shing skyes pa gos sngon po gyon pa lag na mtshon thogs pa rnams

182b5(mdo sde): par bas na ji ltar sngon gyi yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par 'gyur/ de'i mkhan po mngon par shes pa thob pa yin pas de rdzu 'phrul gyis rdzi char chen po sprul nas char pa'i thigs pas
182b6(mdo sde): de'i lus la phog pa dang / de nas char ba dang / rlung grang mo reg pas sdug bsngal rnam par mnan nas/ des sngon gyi yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par bya bar brtsams so/ /gang gi tshe

183a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten sems pa dang / sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa sems pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul sems pa'o/ /khu
183a2(mdo sde): ba'i thigs pa de gnyis sgo nga gnyis su gyur nas nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis smin nas rdo la ba dang / khye'u gnyis shig byung nas de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i
183a3(mdo sde): bu ram shing gi tshal gseb der de gnyis zhugs so/ /de nas nyi ma'i 'od zer shin tu tsha ba byung ste/ nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis drang srong gau ta ma gdungs nas shi'o/ /de nas drang srong
183a4(mdo sde): gser mdog 'ongs nas shi ba mthong nas des gsal shing gi nye 'khor du bltas na/ sgo nga rdol ba'i khog pa gnyis shig 'dug nas/ de phan tshun rjes gcod cing bu ram shing
183a5(mdo sde): gi tshal gseb tu zhugs pa las/ ji tsam na khye'u gnyis shig mthong ngo / /des 'di gnyis su'i bu yin zhes bsams pa las zhugs pa dang / drang srong gau ta ma'i bu yin
183a6(mdo sde): par gyur nas/ de nas de lhag par sdug pa skyes te/ des de gnyis bsti gnas su khrid nas bsnun gsos te/ de de gnyis kyi ming btags pa nyi ma shar ba'i tshe nyi ma'i 'od
183a7(mdo sde): zer gyis smin par byas pa las 'di gnyis skyes par gyur pas de bas nyi ma'i rigs yin pas des na nyi ma'i rigs/ nyi ma'i rigs zhes bya bar gyur to/ /drang srong gau ta ma'i
183b1(mdo sde): bu yin pas ming gnyis pa la ni/ gau ta ma/ gau ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rang gi yan lag las skyes pas ming gsum pa yan lag skyes/ /yan lag skyes zhes bya bar gyur to/ /bu ram
183b2(mdo sde): shing gi tshal gseb nas rnyed pas ming bzhi pa bu ram shing pa/ bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po b+ha ra dwa dza bu med par shi nas/ blon po rnams
183b3(mdo sde): 'dus nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag /su zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ de'i gcen po gau ta ma drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste
183b4(mdo sde): rgyal srid 'di ni de'i rigs rgyud du 'ongs pa yin pas de dbang bskur ro/ /de nas de rnams kyis gros byas nas drang srong gser mdog gi drung du song ste phyin pa dang / rkang pa gnyis la
183b5(mdo sde): gtugs nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ gau ta ma gang du mchis/ des smras pa/ khyed cag kho nas bsad do/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ bdag cag gis de mthong bar
183b6(mdo sde): yang mi dran na ji ltar bsad/ kho bos khyed cag dran par bya'o/ /ma nongs so/ /des de rnams dran par byas pa dang / smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ gal te de lta na sdig pa spyod pa de ming
183b7(mdo sde): tsam smos pa'ang bsgrags pa ma yin gyi zhog cig / des sdig pa'i las ci dang / ci byas/ 'di dang / 'di'o/ /skyon med pa gnod pa mi byed pa des sdig pa'i las ma byas par khyed cag gis
184a1(mdo sde): bsad do/ /de ltar ci mngon/ des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams yid mi bde ba skyes nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ gal te de lta na
184a2(mdo sde): des ma legs kyi/ bdag cag gis sdig pa'i las bgyis so zhes de rnams de skad du smra bar byed pa na/ khye'u de gnyis kyang drang srong gi drung du 'ongs so/ /blon po rnams kyis smras
184a3(mdo sde): pa| drang srong chen po/ khye'u 'di gnyis su'i lags/ des smras pa/ de kho na'i bu'o/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di gnyis ji ltar skyes/ 'di gnyis kyi ming ci lags/ des byung ba
184a4(mdo sde): dang bcas par rgyas par smras pa/ blon po rnams kyis de thos te mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas/ de rnams kyis drang srong de la gsol ba btab nas de gnyis las gzhon nu phu bo
184a5(mdo sde): shos rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba las de'ang bu med par shi'o/ /de nas gcig shos nu bo dbang bskur nas de'i ming rgyal po bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur
184a6(mdo sde): to| |gau ta ma dag / rgyal po bu ram shing pa'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po bu ram shing pa brgya'ang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni
184a7(mdo sde): rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag /rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po la bu bzhi ste/ skar mda' gtong dang / lag rna dang / glang po
184b1(mdo sde): che 'dul dang / rkang gdub can no/ /dus gzhan zhig na de'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas de lags pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha|
184b2(mdo sde): ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad nas thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ nga'i btsun mo dam pa shi na ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing mi 'dug /lha| gal te de lta na nyi
184b3(mdo sde): 'og gi rgyal po rnams la bu mo mchis na ci'i slad du lha'i btsun mo dam pa mi btsal/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu 'di dag ni rgyal srid mngon par 'dod pas phyir rgol ba
184b4(mdo sde): 'di dag yod na nga la su zhig bu mo ster bar 'gyur/ lha| dgongs shig dang / bdag cag gis btsal lo/ /ji tsam na rgyal po gzhan zhig gi bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta na
184b5(mdo sde): sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ btsun mo dam par 'tsham pa yod pa de mi rnams kyis brtags te/ rgyal po de'i drung du dong nas/ de rnams kyis gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de rgyal po de la
184b6(mdo sde): rig par byas pa dang / rgyal pos bsgo ba/ khug cig /de nas de rnams rgyal po'i spyan sngar dong nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te thog mar gtam byas nas 'dug go /gtam gyi
184b7(mdo sde): skabs rnyed cing rgyal po'i zhal mthong nas smras pa/ lha| bkra shis par gyur cig /bkra shis par gyur cig /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /khyed ci gsol/ rgyal po bu ram
185a1(mdo sde): shing pa 'phags skyes po'i btsun mo dam pa gum nas de'i ched tu sras mo bslang nge / /rgyal pos smras pa/ 'thab rir bab pa'i mchog yin pas rung na 'o na
185a2(mdo sde): kyang dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te nga'i bu mo la khye'u zhig yod par gyur na de gal te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la gzhag pa lta na sbyin no/ /lha| bka' bzhin 'tshal/ mchis la lha
185a3(mdo sde): la snyan du gdas par gsol lo zhes de rnams dong nas/ rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gzhon nu
185a4(mdo sde): ches phu bor gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te/ nu bo rgyal srid la 'jog pa de ni 'os pa ma yin no/ /lha| don 'di la nges pa ma mchis te/ re zhig btsun
185a5(mdo sde): mo blangs la lha de dang lhan cig rtsed mo dang / dgyes pa dang / dgyes dgur spyod pa mdzod cig /de la khye'u btsa' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te bu mor 'gyur ram/ spyi ma mchis par
185a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba sus 'tshal/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gal te de lta na deng la longs shig /de rnams dong nas bsu ste/ ji tsam na rgyal po'i dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos
185a7(mdo sde): blangs nas de'ang rgyal pos mngon par 'dod par gyur te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/
185b1(mdo sde): dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur to/ /de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu 'das pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug
185b2(mdo sde): pa| mdzes pa zhig btsas so/ /btsas nas de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/ /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha|
185b3(mdo sde): 'di ltar ma skyes pa nyid nas rgyal srid la mngon par dga' bas de'i slad du khye'u'i ming rgyal srid dga' zhes bgyi'o/ /khye'u rgyal srid dga' ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes
185b4(mdo sde): bya ba nas rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur du skyed drag par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de rgyal tshab kyi rgyal srid la ma bzhag pa de'i zhang po rgyal pos thos nas/
185b5(mdo sde): des de la pho nya btang ste/ tshig rtsub po dang chas pa'i sbring yig bskur ba/ khyed kyis sngon khas blangs shing dam bcas pa bzhin gal te byed na de lta na legs/ gal te de ltar ma

185b7(mdo sde): thos nas skrag ste/ blon po rnams bsogs nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag /nga la rgyal po des 'di skad ces spring na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha| rgyal srid
186a1(mdo sde): dga' rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur lags mod/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gzhon nu ches phu bor gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs

186a3(mdo sde): bar yul phur mar rlog pa gang lags pa'i gnas de mchis pas rgyal srid dga' rgyal tshab kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par dbang bskur la/ gzhon nu de rnams ni sbyug tu

186a6(mdo sde): bzhag nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go / blon po rnams tshogs nas phan tshun du gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag /thabs shig bsham par bya ste/ des na rgyal po gzhon
186a7(mdo sde): nu rnams la thugs byung bar 'gyur ba zhig bya'o zhes de nas de rnams kyis skyed mos tshal byi dor byas pa/ ri mo sna tshogs bris par shin tu dri zhim pa'i pog phor nye bar bzhag /
186b1(mdo sde): dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po btags/ me tog sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar byas pa zhig byed tu bcug go /de nas de rnams kyis blon po rnams kyis skyed mos tshal de'i byi dor byed
186b2(mdo sde): pa rgyang ring po nas mthong nas gzhon nu rgod bag can de rnams skyed mos tshal gyi phyogs su dong ngo / /blon po rnams skyed mos tshal gyi byi dor byas nas sgor byung ba dang / gzhon nu
186b3(mdo sde): rnams kyis dris pa/ 'di su'i skyed mos tshal/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i lags so/ /de rnams slar log par brtsams pa dang / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu rnams

186b7(mdo sde): tshal na ku co'i sgra grag na 'di ni su zhig 'dug / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ gzhon nu rnams so/ /gal te de lta na ngas gzhon nu rnams spangs so/ /blon po rnams kyis

189a7(mdo sde): mo ma dang / bdud rtsi ma'o/ /zas gtsang la bu gnyis te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'o/ /zas dkar la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal dang / shAkya'i
189b1(mdo sde): rgyal po bzang ldan no/ /bre bo zas la bu gnyis te/ ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'o/ /bdud rtsi zas kyi bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lhas byin no/ /

189b5(mdo sde): maud+gal gyi bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /maud+gal gyi bu/ khyod kyis dge slong rnams kyi mdun du shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam smras pa'ang khyod
189b6(mdo sde): legs so/ /maud+gal gyi bu/ yang khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams te chos kyi gtam rtag tu smros shig dang / des ni de rnams la yun ring po'i don dang /
189b7(mdo sde): phan pa dang / bde bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyed kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i
190a1(mdo sde): chos kyi gtam chongs shig / zungs shig /lhogs shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag /shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud la brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam
190a2(mdo sde): ni don dang ldan/ chos dang ldan pa nas/ tshangs par spyod pa'i bar dang ldan pa yin te/ dge slong dag /rigs kyi bu dad pas rab tu byung bas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs
190a3(mdo sde): rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam gzung zhing bklag pa'i rigs so/ /de nas ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/
190a4(mdo sde): rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / /de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na rgyal po seng ge
190a5(mdo sde): 'gram zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa
190a6(mdo sde): dang | 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na bu gcig pa la sdug
190a7(mdo sde): pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do/ /grong khyer lhas bstan du rgyal po legs par rab sad ces bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo
190b1(mdo sde): legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar bya bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi
190b2(mdo sde): phreng ba dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na/ bu gcig pa lag pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do/ /rgyal po legs par rab sad kyi btsun mo dam pa gzugs bzang
190b3(mdo sde): ba| blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ yul gyi bzang mo lum bi nI zhes bya ba yod do/ /lhas bstan na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya
190b4(mdo sde): che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de'i kun dga' ra ba me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
190b5(mdo sde): chu phun sum tshogs pa dang / bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pas de'i kun dga' ra ba dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa der rgyal po dus dus su btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig lhags nas/ de na
190b6(mdo sde): dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyams su myong bar byed do/ /lum bi nI sa de mthong nas 'dod pa skyes te/ des smras pa/ lha| kun dga' ra ba 'di bdag la stsal du gsol/ rgyal pos smras
190b7(mdo sde): pa| da kun dga' ra ba 'di khyim bdag gi yin na ji ltar sbyin/ gal te khyod la kun dga' ra ba dgos na khyod kyi phyir de bas lhag par bzang ba gzhan zhig bya'o/ /de nas rgyal bo
191a1(mdo sde): legs par rab sad kyis lum bi nI'i ched du de bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i kun dga' ra ba zhig byed du bcug nas/ de'i ming lum bi nI'i tshal zhes
191a2(mdo sde): bya bar gyur to/ /rgyal po seng ge 'gram la yun ring po nas kye ma'o bdag gi rgyud la 'khor los sgyur bar skye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do/ /rgyal po legs
191a3(mdo sde): par rab sad la yang yun ring po nas/ kye ma'o/ bdag ni seng ge 'gram dang lhan cig gnyen du gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do/ /ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na
191a4(mdo sde): de'i btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod pa las dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu
191a5(mdo sde): 'das pa na bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ yan lag dang / nyid lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /btsas pa de'i gzugs bzang pos rgyal po
191a6(mdo sde): legs par rab sad btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te/ the tshom du gyur nas ci 'di bu mo yin
191a7(mdo sde): nam| 'on te las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul yin snyam mo/ /de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu rgya cher byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming
191b1(mdo sde): cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/ /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo
191b2(mdo sde): rnams su gleng ba kha cig gi mchid nas ni 'di bu mo kho na legs te/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas gzugs bzang zhing kha dog phun sum tshogs par gyur to zhes mchi'o/ /gzhan
191b3(mdo sde): dag gi mchid nas ni 'di bu mo ma lags kyi 'o na ci zhe na/ las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul lags so zhes mchi lags pas/ de bas na bu mo'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes bgyi bar
191b4(mdo sde): gdags so zhes btags so/ /bu mo sgyu 'phrul ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes bya ba des chen mor gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis
191b5(mdo sde): lung bstan pa/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pa du ma dang ldan pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing stobs kyis 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan to/ /yang de rtse bar byed/ dga'
191b6(mdo sde): bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /de btsas pa na grong
191b7(mdo sde): khyer de dag thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos snang bar byas te/ sgyu 'phrul la ji lta ba bzhin du de'i gzugs bzang pa rnam pa thams cad du dpyad par mi nus so/ /de'i btsas pa'i
192a1(mdo sde): btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/ /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ sgyu 'phrul bas 'di lhag
192a2(mdo sde): par gzugs bzang bas/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bgyi bar gdags so zhes btags so/ /de'ang skyed bsrings nas chen mor gyur pa dang / de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung
192a3(mdo sde): bstan pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur te/ de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /rgyal po legs
192a4(mdo sde): par rab sad kyis rgyal po seng ge 'gram la pho nya btang ste/ bdag la bu mo gnyis shig btsas pa ni sgyu 'phrul dang / sgyu 'phrul chen mo lags te/ de la gcig la ni mtshan
192a5(mdo sde): thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur te/ de ni stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /gcig shos la ni skyes bu chen
192a6(mdo sde): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyi/ 'di gnyis las gang
192a7(mdo sde): bzhed pa gzhon nu zas gtsang gi chung mar snoms shig / seng ge 'gram gyis slar sbring pa/ gnyis ka'ang gzhon nu la dgos mod kyi/ 'on kyang chung ma 'dra ba gnyis gcig la
192b1(mdo sde): gzhag par mi bya bas/ gang la skyes bu chen pos mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / de'ang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan
192b2(mdo sde): pa de re zhig 'dod do/ /gcig shos kyang tshogs la btab par bya'o/ /des de 'khor lnga brgya dang bkri'o/ /de'i tshe shAkya rnams kyi phyir rgol ba skya bseng zhes bya ba'i ri khrod pa zhig yod
192b3(mdo sde): nas shAkya rnams 'dus te/ rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du song nas/ lha| skya bseng ri khrod pa bdag cag la gnod pa bgyid kyi grogs mdzad du gsol/ des smras pa/ shes ldan
192b4(mdo sde): dag |kho bo rgas pas de rnams dang lhan cig g.yul sprad par mi nus so/ /lha| gzhon nu zas gtsang gtang du gsol/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te gzhon nu ji lta bu 'dod pa'i dam pa
192b5(mdo sde): gcig bslangs pa'i dam pa de sbyin pa blta na gtang ngo / /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha| bka' bzhin 'tshal/ sul bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal pos dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa gzhon
192b6(mdo sde): nu zas gtsang la bsngo nas des ri khrod pa de rnams bcom/ rab tu bcom ste rmeg btang ngo / /de nas shAkya rnams mgu nas rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du dong ste/ lha/ gzhon nus
192b7(mdo sde): ri khrod pa rnams bcom rab tu bcom ste rmeg btang lags pas bdag cag glo ba dga' na/ gzhon nu mchog ci bzhed gsungs shig /dbul lo/ /shes ldan dag /shAkya rnams
193a1(mdo sde): kyi khrims su bcas pa sus kyang mnyam pa las chun ma gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bcas so/ /lha| ci khrims 'dral lam/ des smras pa/ lhag par shin
193a2(mdo sde): tu bsdam gyi dral bar mi bya na/ 'on kyang gzhon nu'i dam pa gcig slong ba ni mnyam pa las chun ma blang ba yin no/ /lha rung gi de bzhin du mdzod cig /de nas seng ge 'gram
193a3(mdo sde): gyis legs par rab sad la pho nya btang nas/ kho bos tshogs brtags zin gyis bu mo gcig shos kyang bkri zhig /des de'ang 'khor lnga brgya dang bkri ste/ gzhon nu zas gtsang
193a4(mdo sde): gis gnyis ka blangs so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po seng ge 'gram shi nas/ ser skya'i gzhi na rgyal po zas gtsang rgyal srid byed du bcug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa
193a5(mdo sde): dang | bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang bos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing / nad rab tu zhi bar
193a6(mdo sde): gyur pa/ 'bras dang / bur ma shing gi phreng ba dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na/ bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do/ /de dus gzhan zhig
193a7(mdo sde): na btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen po dang lhan cig steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi skyes pa med par dong nas/ rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /
193b1(mdo sde): 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhug par na 'jig rten la gzigs pa lngas gzigs par mdzad do/ /rigs la gzigs pa dang / yul
193b2(mdo sde): la gzigs pa dang / dus la gzigs pa dang / rgyud la gzigs pa dang / bud med la gzigs pa ste/ rgya cher mdo snga ma dang sbyar ro/ /mngon par 'byung ba'i mdo rdzogs so// //
193b3(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsaR+ya d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang / zhus chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ b+hik+ShU pra re
193b4(mdo sde): dzu sU tra nA ma/ bod skad du/dge slong la rab tu gces pa'i mdo zhes bya ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan

194a1(mdo sde): te| pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas lag pa gnyis kyi thal mo snying gar sbyar ba byas te/ 'dzum dmul nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
194a2(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to/ /'khor ba'i 'dam nas pad+ma ltar byung ba'i/ /skyob mdzad ri bo lta bur mi bskyod thub pa'i sku/ /dpe byad rgyan gyis brgyan cing mtshan gyi me tog mdzes/ /
194a3(mdo sde): blta bas mi ngoms rab mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis bdag cag 'dir 'dus 'di dag la/ /dge slong 'ba' zhig gnas pas dge slong gi /ngo bo dbye dang sgra
194a4(mdo sde): 'jug ched bya ba/ /bzhi po 'di dag thub pas gsung du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan bde gshegs rab dgyes te/ /nye bar 'khor la spyan gzigs 'di skad gsungs/ /legs
194a5(mdo sde): par nyon cig bu khyod nye bar 'khor/ /ngas ni khyod kyis sems rangs bya phyir dang / /dge slong rnams la phan phyir de bshad do/ /dge slong zhes bya chos kyi rgyal mtshan te/ /dge slong
194a6(mdo sde): zhes bya rdo rje srog shing yin/ /dge slong zhes bya sdug bsngal spangs pa ste/ /dge slong zhes pa rgyal ba'i sras po yin/ /dge slong zhes bya nyon mongs srog bcad de/ /dge slong zhes
194a7(mdo sde): bya thar pa'i tshal 'gro'o/ /dge slong rang gi ngo bo bsngams pa ste/ /rtsa ba bzhi sogs nyis brgya lnga bcu pa/ /ched du bya ba rnam dag tshul khrims yin/ /dbye ba ming gi dge slong gang
194b1(mdo sde): yin dang / /rtags tsam 'dzin dang yang dag dge slong ste/ /sgra 'jug rnam par zad phyir dang / /dge ba slong dang zas slong dang / /zhi bar gnas dang lam zhugs dang / /legs
194b2(mdo sde): par 'tsho dang chags spangs dang / /yid 'ong phyir na dge slong ngo / /dge slong zhes bya brgyan pa ste/ /rgyan spangs rgyan gyis legs par brgyan/ /chags spangs chags pa chen pos
194b3(mdo sde): spyad| |byug pa khrus dang bza' ba dang / /rgyan dang gos dang kha dog dang / /rta dang glang po khyogs sogs kyi/ /bzhon pa bla med de yang bzhon/ /de dag 'byor pa dge slong ste/ /de dag
194b4(mdo sde): mi 'byor dge slong min/ /de nas nye bar 'khor de yis/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol/ /ci de bde bar gshegs pa yis/ /skad byings rtogs par dka' ba gsungs//
194b5(mdo sde): de nyid bde bar gshegs pa yis/ /tshig gi mun pa tshig gi ni/ /mar mes gsal bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gser la sogs pa
194b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten rgyan/ /rab tu spangs pas snying rje yi/ /rgyan gyis mchog gis brgyan par bya/ /'jig rten ma yin bslab pa yi/ /gos gyon gos mchog bzang po yin/ /ga bur la
194b7(mdo sde): sogs ma yin pa'i/ /tshul khrims byug pa mchog gis byugs/ /dkar dmar la sogs ma yin pa'i/ /dad pa'i kha dog rnam par mdzes/ /'jig rten ma yin brtson
195a1(mdo sde): 'grus kyi/ /bzhon pa bla med mgyogs pa'i mchog /bsam gtan chos spyod zas mchog ni/ /'bras chan pas ni ro mchog ldan/ /dge 'dun tshogs
195a2(mdo sde): kyi gzhal yas khang / /zhi gnas stan la rab tu spyad/ /de dag ldan zhing phyir mi ldog /de ni yang dag dge slong yin/ /gtso bo gsum dang 'khor lngar ldan/ /drang srong snod
195a3(mdo sde): bcas 'khar gsil ldan/ /lus ngag yid gsum rnam par bsdams/ /rang gi spyod pa brtul zhugs bstan/ /de yang yang dag dge slong yin/ /de gnyis thar pa'i grong
195a4(mdo sde): khyer la/ /bsnyen pas thar pa'i bde ba'i mchog /yang dag ma yin gcig shos ni/ /lhung bzed la sogs rab 'bar bas/ /dmyal bar khro chu lta bur ni/ /bskal pa stong
195a5(mdo sde): phrag bzhi ru 'tshed/ /la la'i tshul khrims bde ba ste/ /la la'i tshul khrims sdug bsngal rgyu/ /tshul khrims ldan pa bde ba'i mchog /tshul khrims 'chal pa sdug bsngal

195a7(mdo sde): nyi ma gcig la yang / /bsod nams phung po dpag med pa/ /gsod cing sangs rgyas 'bras bu skrun/ /rang gis rang la bslus 'debs shing / /bslab pa la ni mi gnas shing //
195b1(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin/ /gzugs tsam la ni brten nas su/ /nga ni dge slong yin zer ba/ /glang smyon sna ral btags pa'am/ /sbrum ma sgyur rtsi 'thungs pa ltar/ /
195b2(mdo sde): mi de nyi ma gcig la yang / /sdig pa'i sa bon dpag med dang / /rang la gnod pa sna tshogs la/ /byed par 'gyur ba kho na yin/ /gang zhig bslab la mi gnas shing / /bder gshegs
195b3(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa bas/ /bslab pa mi gnas skad cig la/ /gzugs por khyim par gnas pa bzang / /bslab pa mi gnas rtags 'dzin pa/ /'jig rten pa ni thams cad kyi/ /
195b4(mdo sde): snying du sdug par mi 'gyur zhing / /kun gyi tshig gi ngan snod la/ /dper na sdong po bzang po la/ /yun ring yal ga 'khrung pa bzhin/ /mi de rtags tsam yun ring na/ /kha na ma tho'i
195b5(mdo sde): gtam 'bel dang / /sdig pa'i las rnams 'phel bar bshad/ /tshul khrims 'di ni bde ba'i mchog /tshul khrims 'di ni thar pa'i lam/ /tshul khrims 'di ni yon tan
195b6(mdo sde): zhing | |tshul khrims 'di ni sangs rgyas rgyu/ /tshul khrims 'di ni rab mchog yin/ /mig gi 'bras bu bzhin du srungs/ /srog la bab kyang tshul khrims ni/ /gtong ba mi mkhas blun
195b7(mdo sde): po yin/ /srog chad phyi mar skye ba ste/ /tshul khrims phyi nas de ltar min/ /de bas nye bar 'khor sogs kyis/ /'di nyid la ni brtan par zungs/ /de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis
196a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal to/ nye bar 'khor la sogs pa dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /dge slong la rab tu gces
196a2(mdo sde): pa'i mdo zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar skad du/ shrI la saM yuk+ta sU tra/ bod skad du/ tshul khrims yang dag par ldan pa'i mdo/ thams cad mkhyen pa la
196a3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon na med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/
196a4(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
196a5(mdo sde): dag| shes pa ni 'grib/ srog ni cha da/ tshe'i 'du byed ni nges par 'joms par 'gyur na/ ci'i phyir brtson 'grus dang / brtul ba brtan pos sgrub par mi byed/ mi'i
196a6(mdo sde): l us ni shin tu rnyed par dka' na de thob nas des rnyed pa'i rgyal ba'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'ang rnyed na thar pa'i don dang mi mthun pa dag gis bslus te sdug bsngal
196a7(mdo sde): bar gyur ta re/ dge slong dag /srog dang bral zhing shi ba ni sla yi/ tshul khrims nyams pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ srog dang bral ba ni tshe 'di nyid kyi skye ba zad
196b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur gyi/ tshul khrims nyams shing zhig pa ni skye ba 'bum phrag brgya'i bar du rigs dang bral zhing bde ba spangs te rnam par ltung ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de phyir ston
196b2(mdo sde): pas tshul khrims rab bsngags bshad/ /tshul khrims ldan pa sangs rgyas 'byung dang phrad/ /tshul khrims ldan pa rgyan rnams kun gyi mchog /tshul khrims 'byor ba dri dang byug
196b3(mdo sde): pa yin/ /tshul khrims ldan pa dga' ba kun gyi gnas/ /tshul khrims ldan pa gdung ba sel ba'i chu/ /tshul khrims ldan pa 'jig rten kun gyis bstod/ /tshul khrims dag
196b4(mdo sde): gis 'gro ba dam pa mnos/ /ji ltar sprul pa gdug klu chen nag po yang / /tshul khrims can la gnod med gzhan ci smos/ /tshul khrims ldan pa'i dge slong 'od dang ldan/ /tshul
196b5(mdo sde): khrims ldan pa grags 'gyur bde ba thob/ /tshul khrims ldan pa mtho ris 'gro ba'i rgyu/ /tshul khrims bsrungs pas mya ngan 'da' thob 'gyur/ /ji ltar mig med gzugs
196b6(mdo sde): mthong mi rung ltar/ /de bzhin tshul khrims med na chos mi mthong / /ji ltar rkang med lam 'jug ga la nus/ /de bzhin tshul khrims med na thar mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar bum pa
196b7(mdo sde): bzang po rin chen snod/ /de bzhin tshul khrims chos rnams skyed pa'i gzhi/ /ji ltar bum chag rin chen snod mi rung / /de bzhin tshul khrims ral pas chos kun gtugs/
197a1(mdo sde): dang po tshul khrims med par gyur pa des/ /phyi nas mya ngan 'das pa thob snyam mam/ /sna dang rna rdum la sogs pa gang yin pa/ de la me long dag ni
197a2(mdo sde): dgos mi 'gyur/ /rna bas ma thos mig sngar ma mthong bzhin/ /bstan srung mi de mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/ /thos mang thos ldan thos srung mtho ris nyid/ /bud med bstan
197a3(mdo sde): du ga la rung / /rgyal po'i pho brang ga la dga'/ /dbu ba snying po ga la yod/ /longs spyod rtag pa ga la yin/ /bud med dag la rung ba med/ /rgyal srid dag la dga' ba med/ /
197a4(mdo sde): dbu ba dag la snying po med/ /longs spyod dag la rtag pa med/ /longs spyod dag ni 'bab chu bzhin/ /gru de ci 'dra khyim de 'dra/ /me tog ci 'dra gzugs de bzhin/ /srog ni
197a5(mdo sde): chu bur 'dra ba yin/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /
197a6(mdo sde): tshul khrims yang dag par ldan pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ pany+tsa pat+ti ni kA ya shu b+hA shub+ha pha la pa rIk+Sha sU tra/ bod skad du/ ltung ba sde lnga'i
197a7(mdo sde): dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i 'bras bu brtag pa'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
197b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal
197b2(mdo sde): pa| dge slong dag / dzam+bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig /zla ba bcu gnyis la
197b3(mdo sde): lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lo lnga brgya ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad do/ /dge slong dag /bslab pa'i chos gang dag bsrung ba dang / sbed pa dang / yongs su skyong ba
197b4(mdo sde): dang / 'da' bar mi byed pa dang / de dag las 'das pa ston pa dang / rab tu ston pa ni lus zhig nas bde 'gro rgyal chen bzhi pa'i ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ de
197b5(mdo sde): dag der yang lha'i tshe dang / lha'i kha dog dang / lha'i stobs dang / lha'i bde ba dang / lha'i dbang phyug la dbang byed cing / lha'i gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang /
197b6(mdo sde): lha'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lo lnga brgya gang yin pa de ni dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi nyin zhag gcig go /
197b7(mdo sde): nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig /zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lo lnga brgya ni dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi tshe'i tshad do/ /dge slong dag /bslab pa'i chos gang
198a1(mdo sde): dag mi srung ba dang / mi sbed pa dang / yongs su mi skyong ba dang / de dag las 'da' bar byed pa dang / 'das pa de dag mi ston pa dang / rab tu mi ston pa de ni
198a2(mdo sde): lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu dmyal ba chen po yang sos su skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag der yang sdug bsngal drag pa dang / rtsub pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du ma 'ong ba'i tshor ba
198a3(mdo sde): myong bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /dzam+bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams kyi lo brgya gang yin pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go /nyin zhag de sum cu la zla
198a4(mdo sde): ba gcig / zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lo stong ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad do/ /dge slong dag /so sor bshags pa'i chos gang dag srung
198a5(mdo sde): ba dang / sbed pa dang / yongs su skyong ba dang / 'da' bar mi byed pa dang / de dag las 'das pa ston pa dang / rab tu ston pa de ni lus zhig nas bde 'gro sum cu rtsa gsum
198a6(mdo sde): gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag der yang lha'i tshe dang / lha'i kha dog dang / lha'i stobs dang / lha'i bde ba dang / lha'i dbang phyug la dbang byed cing / lha'i gzugs

198b1(mdo sde): pa chen po thig nag gi nyin zhag gcig go / nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig /zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lo stong ni dmyal ba chen po thig nag gi tshe'i tshad do/ /dge
198b2(mdo sde): slong dag / so sor bshags pa'i chos gang dag mi srung ba dang / mi sbed pa dang / yongs su mi skyong ba dang / de dag las 'da' bar byed pa dang / 'das pa de dag mi ston pa dang / rab
198b3(mdo sde): tu mi ston pa de ni lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu dmyal ba chen po thig nag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag der yang sdug bsngal drag pa dang / rtsub pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong

201b1(mdo sde): na shrI gup+ta dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa// //bod skad du/ mchog tu gdags pa'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
201b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i

201b7(mdo sde): yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog yin par bstan to/ /sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba
202a1(mdo sde): su'ang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag ni rnam par smin pa'ang lha rnams kyi nang du ltar gyur
202a2(mdo sde): pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/ /chos mchog
202a3(mdo sde): tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni 'dod chags dang bral pa'i chos mchog yin par bstan to//
202a4(mdo sde): chos la mngon par dga' ba su'ang rung ba de dag ni/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag ni/ rnam par smin pa'ang lha rnams

202a6(mdo sde): bya'o| |dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ tshogs sam/ 'dus pa'am/ mang po'am/ 'khor gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
202a7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mchog yin par bstan to/ /dge 'dun la mngon par dga' ba su'ang rung ba de dag ni mchog
202b1(mdo sde): la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag ni rnam par smin pa'ang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog
