281a1(mdo sde): zhing dbugs brdubs na so sor spangs pa'i rjes su lta zhing dbugs brdubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes pa dang / so sor
281a2(mdo sde): spangs pa'i rjes su lta zhing dbugs phyung na so sor spangs pa'i rjes su lta zhing dbugs phyung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes pa ste/ dge slong dag /'di dag
281a3(mdo sde): ni dbugs rdub pa dang / 'byung ba dran pa rnam pa bcu drug go /de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i yan lag bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di la 'phags pa nyan thos ni de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das
281a4(mdo sde): de ni de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul
281a5(mdo sde): ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so zhes sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa yin/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
281a6(mdo sde): chos ni legs par gsungs pa/ yang dag par mthong ba/ nad med pa/ dus chad pa med pa/ nye bar gtod pa/ 'di mthong ba la don yod pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis rang gis rig
281a7(mdo sde): par bya ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ rgyags pa med par byed pa/ sred pa rab tu sel ba/ kun gzhi legs par 'joms pa/ lam gyi rgyun bcad pa/ sred pa zad pa/ 'dod chags
281b1(mdo sde): dang bral ba/ 'gog pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes chos la shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa yin/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni legs par zhugs pa/ rigs pa
281b2(mdo sde): la zhugs pa/ drang po la zhugs pa/ mthun par zhugs pa/ chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la zhugs pa/ rjes su mthun pa'i chos spyod pa ste/ dge 'dun gyi nang na rgyun du
281b3(mdo sde): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dag kyang yod/ dge 'dun gyi nang na rgyun du zhugs pa dag kyang yod/ dge 'dun gyi nang na lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i
281b4(mdo sde): 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dag kyang yod/ dge 'dun gyi nang na lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dag kyang yod/ dge 'dun gyi nang na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon
281b5(mdo sde): sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dag kyang yod/ dge 'dun gyi nang na phyir mi 'ong ba dag kyang yod/ dge 'dun gyi nang na dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir
281b6(mdo sde): zhugs pa dag kyang yod/ dge 'dun gyi nang na dgra bcom pa dag kyang yod de/ 'di lta ste/ skyes bu zung bzhi/ skyes bu gang zag ya brgyad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi
281b7(mdo sde): dge 'dun ni 'di lta bu ste/ dad pa phun sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs la/ thos pa phun sum tshogs pa/ ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa/ shes rab phun
282a1(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa/ rnam par grol ba phun sum tshogs pa/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba phun sum tshogs pa/ kun tu sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur
282a2(mdo sde): pa| rab tu sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa/ thal mo sbyar ba'i 'os su gyur pa/ phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas yin
282a3(mdo sde): no zhes dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa yin/ 'phags pa bzhed pa'i tshul khrims rnams dang ldan pa yin te/ tshul khrims de dag ni ma nyams pa/ ma zhig pa/
282a4(mdo sde): ma ral pa/ 'dren mar ma gyur pa/ sra bsrer ma yin pa/ rang dbang can ma 'bags pa/ shin tu rdzogs pa/ mkhas pas bsngags pa mkhas pa dag gis ma smad pa dag
282a5(mdo sde): ste| 'di dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i yan lag bzhi'o/ /dge slong dag /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ dge slong dag /de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnas
282a6(mdo sde): la'ang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen cing / gnas ma yin pa la'ang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di ni de bzhin
282a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i stobs dang po'o/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / rnam par smin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu
282b1(mdo sde): mkhyen to/ /sems can pha rol mos pa du ma can dag gi mos pa sna tshogs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /khams du ma pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khams sna tshogs
282b2(mdo sde): can du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems can gzhan dag gi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /thams cad du
282b3(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems gzhan dag gi dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar
282b4(mdo sde): pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rnam par bzhag pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rnam
282b5(mdo sde): pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang bcas/ rgyu ci las gyur pa dang bcas par sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/ skye ba gcig kyang rjes su dran no/ /gnyis dang / gsum dang /
282b6(mdo sde): bzhi nas skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma rjes su dran no zhes rgya cher sbyar ro/ /lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas sems skye ba dang / lus dang / ngag dang /
282b7(mdo sde): yid kyis legs par spyad pa dang / nyes par spyad pa dag gis bde 'gro dang / ngan 'gro rnams su skye ba dag gi sems can gzigs so zhes rgya cher sbyar ro/ /yang dag pa'i
283a1(mdo sde): shes rab kyi zag pa rnams zad nas zag pa las sems rnam par grol ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te/ dge slong dag/ 'di dag
283a2(mdo sde): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
283a3(mdo sde): rgyas so zhes bdag nyid zhal gyis 'che ba la 'dir lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang /
283a4(mdo sde): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu las gang gis kyang khyod kyis chos 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes de la rgol ba'i mtshan ma de yang dag
283a5(mdo sde): par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan ma yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas bde ba thob cing mi 'jigs pa thob par gnas shing khyu mchog gi
283a6(mdo sde): gnas su dam bcas te/ 'khor gyi nang du song nas seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ sus kyang chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du ma
283a7(mdo sde): bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / yang gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod
283b1(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ro zhes 'dir de la zhes bya bar rgyas par sbyar ba dang / gang yang 'dis 'phags pa nges par 'byung ba'i lam bsten pa de dag bstan pa de bstan kyang sdug bsngal
283b2(mdo sde): yang dag par zad par bya ba'i phyir nges par 'byung ba ma yin no zhes gang yang 'dir de la zhes bya bar rgyas par sbyar ba dang / nga zag pa zad do zhes bdag nyid zhal gyis 'che
283b3(mdo sde): ba la 'dir lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu las gang gis
283b4(mdo sde): kyang zag pa 'di dag yongs su ma zad do zhes de la rgol ba'i mtshan ma de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan ma yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
283b5(mdo sde): bas bde ba thob cing mi 'jigs pa thob par gnas shing khyu mchog gi gnas su dam bcas te/ 'khor gyi nang du song nas seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing dge sbyong dang / bram
283b6(mdo sde): ze'am| sus kyang chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba ste/ 'di dag ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
283b7(mdo sde): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
284a1(mdo sde): spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ 'di dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o/ /de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ de
284a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang / ca co med pa dang / bsnyel pa med pa dang / sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa dang / tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang / so
284a3(mdo sde): sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang / 'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / shes
284a4(mdo sde): rab nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba nyams pa med pa dang / 'das pa'i dus na ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing
284a5(mdo sde): thogs pa med pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs
284a6(mdo sde): pa med pa dang / lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su
284a7(mdo sde): 'brang ba dang / yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste/ 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do/ /de la de bzhin
284b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes pu chen po'i mtshan zhabs shin tu gnas pa 'di dang / zhabs kyi 'og gi
284b2(mdo sde): mthil gnyis 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / rting ba yangs shing zhabs byin gyis mtho ba dang / sor mo ring ba dang / phyag dang / zhabs dra bas 'brel ba dang / phyag dang / zhabs
284b3(mdo sde): 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa dang / bdun mtho ba'i sku dang ldan pa dang / byin pa ri dwags e na ya'i lta bu dang / mdoms kyi sba ba spubs su nub pa dang / ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba dang /
284b4(mdo sde): thal gong rgyas pa dang / dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang / ma btud par phyag pus mor slebs pa dang / sku rnam par dag pa dang / mgur dung lta bu dang / 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba dang /
284b5(mdo sde): tshems bzhi bcu mnyam pa dang / tshems mnyam zhing thags bzang ba dang / tshems shin tu dkar ba dang / ljags shin tu ring ba dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs
284b6(mdo sde): dang / bya ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs dang / spyan mthon mthing dang / spyan gyi rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma 'dra ba dang / pags pa srab pa dang / pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba dang / spu'i
284b7(mdo sde): khung bu re re ba dang / spu gyen du g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / dbu skra rin po che an da rnyil lta bu dang / smin mtshams kyi sgo'i bar gyi dpral ba'i spu shin tu dkar ba dang / dbu
285a1(mdo sde): gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / kun tu mdzes pa 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan te/
285a2(mdo sde): 'di dag ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan zhabs shin tu gnas pa 'di ni sngon yid ma
285a3(mdo sde): la brten pas mngon par grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gnyis 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan
285a4(mdo sde): pa 'di ni sngon sbyin pa sna tshogs pa bsags pas mngon par grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rting pa yangs shing zhabs
285a5(mdo sde): byin gyis mtho ba 'di ni sngon sems can gzhan las pa bkod pa ma byas pas mngon par grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sor
285a6(mdo sde): mo ring ba 'di ni sngon sems can rnams la chos kyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byas pas mngon par grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i
285a7(mdo sde): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan phyag dang / zhabs dra bas 'brel ba'i 'di ni sngon g.yog 'khor gyi dbyen ma byas par mngon par 'grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu
285b1(mdo sde): chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan phyag dang / zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa 'di ni sngon gos dam pa sna tshogs rab tu byin pas mngon par grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
285b2(mdo sde): pa'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan bdun mtho ba'i sku dang ldan pa 'di ni sngon bza' ba dang / btung ba rgya chen po byin pas mngon par grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
285b3(mdo sde): pa'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan byin pa ri dwags e na ya'i lta bu 'di ni sngon sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bzung bas mngon par grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
285b4(mdo sde): pa'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan mdoms kyi sba ba spubs su nub pa 'di ni sngon gsang ba'i tshig bsrungs pa dang / 'khrig pa'i chos spangs pas mngon par grub
285b5(mdo sde): pa'o| |de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba 'di ni sngon dge ba'i las kun tu bsrungs pas mngon par grub pa'o/ /de
285b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan thal gong rgyas pa 'di ni sngon dge ba'i chos yang dag par sbyad pas mngon par grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
285b7(mdo sde): pa'i dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa 'di ni sngon gzhan dag la dbugs 'byin pa byin pas mngon par grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag ma btud par pus mor slebs
286a1(mdo sde): pa 'di ni sngon gzhan la bya ba ci yod ces bya bas mngon par grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa 'di ni sngon dge ba bcu'i
286a2(mdo sde): las kyi lam ngoms mi myong bar yang dag par spyad pas mngon par grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mgur dung lta bu 'di ni sngon nad pa rnams la sman sna tshogs byin
286a3(mdo sde): pas mngon par grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba 'di ni sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par byas pas mngon par grub pa'o/ /de bzhin
286a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i tshems bzhi bcu mnyam pa 'di ni sngon sems can la mtshungs par gnas sbyar bar mngon par grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems thags
286a5(mdo sde): bzang ba 'di ni sngon sems can bye ba'i sdums byas pas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems shin tu dkar pa 'di ni sngon yid du 'ong ba rab tu byin pas so/ /tshems
286a6(mdo sde): mnyam pa ni sngon lus dang / ngag dang / yid las kun tu bsrungs pas grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljags shin tu ring ba 'di ni sngon bden pa'i tshig yang
286a7(mdo sde): dag par bsrungs pas grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa 'di ni sngon bsod nams tshad med pas bdag nye bar bsten cing gzhan la rab
286b1(mdo sde): tu byin pas grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / bya ka la pi da ka'i sgra dbyangs 'di ni sngon sems can la tshig 'jam po smras pa dang / kun tu dga'
286b2(mdo sde): pa'i tshig thos par byas pas grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan mthon mthing 'di ni sngon byams pa dang ldan pas sems can yang dag par bsrungs pas so/ /sbyan gyi
286b3(mdo sde): rdzim ba'i 'dral 'di ni sngon bsams pa bcom ma ma yin pas so/ /pags pa srang ba 'di ni sngon chos dag par sdud pa las su rung bas mngon par grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
286b4(mdo sde): pa'i pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba 'di ni sngon mal cha dang / gding ba dang / gos yid du 'ong ba byin pas mngon par grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i khung bu
286b5(mdo sde): re re ba 'di ni sngon 'du 'dzi yongs su spangs pas mngon par grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu gyen du g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba 'di ni sngon mkhan po dang / slob
286b6(mdo sde): dpon dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rjes su bstan pa la mthun par 'dzin pas grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra rin po che an da rnyil lta bu 'di ni sngon
286b7(mdo sde): sems can gyi srog la snying brtse ba dang / bong ba dang / dbyug pa dang / mtshon cha bor bas grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i smin mtshams kyi sgo'i bar gyi dpral
287a1(mdo sde): ba'i spu shin tu dkar ba 'di ni sngon bsngags par 'os pa rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod pas mngon par grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu
287a2(mdo sde): gtsug tor dang ldan pa 'di ni sngon bla ma la gus par byas pas mngon par grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa 'di ni sngon bdag dang /
287a3(mdo sde): gzhan ting 'dzin la sbyor bas mngon par grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sred med kyi bu chen po lta bur kun tu mdzes pa 'di ni sngon de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
287a4(mdo sde): gzugs byas pa dang / mchod rten zhig pa bcos pa dang / gzhan dag 'jigs pa las dbugs dbyung ba byas pas grub pa ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pas chos 'di dag la
287a5(mdo sde): dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po dag sku la mngon par grub pa'o/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas
287a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu dang / sen mo mdog snum pa dang / sen mo mtho ba dang / sen mo rnams zlum pa dang / sen mo rnams rgyas pa dang / sor mo
287a7(mdo sde): rnams byin gyis phra ba dang / rtsa mi mngon pa dang / rtsa mdud pa med pa dang / long bu mi mngon pa dang / zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa dang / seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa dang /
287b1(mdo sde): glang po che'i stabs su gshegs pa dang / ngang pa'i stabs su gshegs pa dang / khyu mchog gi stabs su gshegs pa dang / g.yas phyogs su ldog cing gshegs pa dang / mdzes
287b2(mdo sde): par gshegs pa dang / mi g.yo bar gshegs pa dang / sku 'khril bag chags pa dang / sku byi dor byas pa lta bu dang / sku rim par mtshams pa dang / sku kho lag yangs shing
287b3(mdo sde): bzang ba dang / mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gom pa snyoms pa dang / sku gtsang ba dang / sku 'jam pa dang / sku rnam par dag pa dang / sku zhum pa med pa dang / sku rgyas pa dang / sku
287b4(mdo sde): shin tu grims pa dang / yan lag dang / nying lag shin tu rnam par 'byes pa dang / gzigs pa rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa dang / dku zlum pa dang / dku skabs phyin pa
287b5(mdo sde): dang | dku ma snyongs pa dang / phyal phyam me pa dang / lte ba zab pa dang / lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang / kun nas mdzes pa dang / ku tu spyod pa gtsang ba dang / sku la
287b6(mdo sde): sme ba dang / gang bag med pa dang / phyag shing bal ltar shin tu 'jam pa dang / phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod pa dang / phyag gi ri mo zab pa dang / phyag gi ri mo ring ba dang / zhal ha
287b7(mdo sde): cang yang mi ring ba dang / zhal la gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba dang / ljags srab pa dang / ljags 'jam pa dang / ljags dmar ba dang / glang po che'i nga ro dang / 'brug
288a1(mdo sde): gi sgra dang ldan pa dang / gsung snyan cing snyen la 'jam pa dang / mche ba zlum pa dang / mche ba rno ba dang / mche ba dkar ba dang / mnyam ba
288a2(mdo sde): dang / mche ba byin gyis phra ba dang / shangs mtho ba dang / shangs gtsang ba dang / spyan yangs pa dang / spyan ring ba dang / rdzi ma stug pa dang / spyan dkar gang 'byes
288a3(mdo sde): shing ut+pa la'i 'dab ma yangs pa lta bur 'dug pa dang / brang che zhing rgyas la mkhregs pa dang / smin tshugs ring ba dang / smin ma 'dzem pa dang / smin ma'i spu mnyam
288a4(mdo sde): pa dang / smin ma snum pa dang / snyan shal stug cing ring ba dang / snyan mnyam pa dang / snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa dang / dpral ba legs par 'byes pa dang / dpral
288a5(mdo sde): ba'i dbyes che ba dang / dbu shin tu rgyas pa dang / dbu skra bung ba ltar gang pa dang / dbu skra stug pa dang / dbu skra 'jam pa dang / dbu skra ma 'dzings pa dang / dbu skra mi gshor
288a6(mdo sde): ba dang / dbu skra dri zhim pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi phyag dang / zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang / 'khor lo
288a7(mdo sde): dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma dang / nya la sogs pa'i mtshan yod pa yin te/ 'di dag ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o/ /dge slong dag/ khyed la chos bshad par bya ste/ tshangs par
288b1(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba dang / don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba 'di
288b2(mdo sde): lta ste/ don rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu bshad par bya zhes gang smras pa de ni bshad pa 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag /'di dag ni dgon
288b3(mdo sde): pa'i gnas sam/ shing drung ngam/ khang stong ngam/ ri sul sam/ ri phug gam/ sog khrod dam/ bla gab med pa'am/ dur khrod dam/ nags tshal gyi mthongs sam/ bas mtha'i
288b4(mdo sde): mal stan dag nges par bsam gtan du gyis shig / dge slong dag /bdag med par gyur nas phyis 'gyod par gyur ta re/ 'di ni nged kyis rjes su bstan pa'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs
288b5(mdo sde): 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag
288b6(mdo sde): dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
288b7(mdo sde): par bstod do/ /don rnams par nges par zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA barma dang / zhus chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de
289a1(mdo sde): ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ar+tha bi sta ra nA ma d+harma paR+yA ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags
289a2(mdo sde): pa don rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni/ bcom
289a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan shA ri'i bus dge slong rnams la smras pa/
289a4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa dag /khyed la chos thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs
289a5(mdo sde): pa| yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byad pa tshangs par spyod pa bstan par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ don rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu bshad kyi de legs par
289a6(mdo sde): rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do/ /don rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /dal ba tshogs pa bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni 'phags
289a7(mdo sde): pa'i chos thob par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ bdag gi 'byor ba dang / gzhan gyi 'byor pa dang / mi nyid dang / yul dbus su skyes pa dang / dbang po rnams mtshang ba med
289b1(mdo sde): pa dang / las kyi mtha' ma btang ba nyid dang / gnas la dad par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams byung ba dang / dam pa'i chos bstan pa dang / chos bstan pa rnams gnas pa
289b2(mdo sde): dang | gnas pa rnams rjes su 'jug pa dang / zhan la so sor snying brtse ba ste/ de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa dag /dal ba tshogs pa bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i chos
289b3(mdo sde): 'thob par 'gyur ba yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag/ smra ba'i dge slong gtam smra bas gzhan dag la rnam pa nyi shus gtam bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ dus su dang / gus pa dang / 'tsham
289b4(mdo sde): pa mtshams 'byor pa dang / rjes su 'brel ba dang / ri mo dang / 'dod pa dang / mgu ba dang / spro ba dang / mi smod pa dang / rigs pa dang / 'brel ba dang / ma 'chol ba dang / ji
289b5(mdo sde): lta ba bzhin gyi sems dang / phan pa dang / phan pa'i sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la mi brten par bya'o/ /gtam de
289b6(mdo sde): dag smra ba na bdag la bstod par mi bya/ gzhan la smod par mi bya bar gtam bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag /chos nyan par 'dod pas rnam pa bcu drug gis mnyam pa bya ste/ 'di
289b7(mdo sde): lta ste/ dus su chos mnyan par bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / gus par nyan pa dang / ma rangs pa med pa dang / bsgo ba bzhin nyan pa dang / kla na ka mi tshol ba dang / chos
290a1(mdo sde): la gus par bya ba dang / chos smra ba'i gang zag la gus par bya ba dang / chos la mi brnyas pa dang / chos smra ba'i gang zag la mi brnyas pa dang / bdag la mi brnyas pa dang / rtse
290a2(mdo sde): gcig pa'i sems dang / kun shes par bya ba'i sems dang / rna ba blags te mnyan pa dang / sems bsdus te sems thams cad kyi sa bsams te chos mnyan par bya'o/ /de de ltar
290a3(mdo sde): chos yang dag par nyan pa na mya ngan 'das pa gtsor bya ba la dad cing sems dang ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mya ngan las 'das pa gtsor bya ba la sems mchog tu dga' ba dang /
290a4(mdo sde): yi rangs pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mya ngan las 'das pa gtsor bya ba la zang zing med par dga' bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mya ngan las 'das pa gtsor bya ba la nye ba'i nyon mongs
290a5(mdo sde): pa rnams spong zhing sems mnyam par 'jog pa dang / som nyi rnams sel ba dang / lta ba drang por byed par 'gyur ro/ /mya ngan las 'das pa gtsor bya ba la sems rnal 'byor
290a6(mdo sde): du 'gyur ba dang rtun pa dang / rjes su brtson pa dang / spong ba dang / nang du yang dag 'jog dang / don gyi mchog par 'gyur ro/ /mya ngan las 'das pa gtsor bya ba la 'du byed
290a7(mdo sde): thams cad zhi ba dang / stong pa nyid du dmigs pa dang / srid pa zad pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la sems rab tu 'jug
290b1(mdo sde): cing dad pa dang / yang dag par gnas pa dang / rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /mya ngan la 'das pa gtsor bya ba la phung po mi rtag pa nyid dang / phung po gsog nyid dang / phung po gsob
290b2(mdo sde): nyid dang / phung po snying po med pa nyid dang / phung po 'jig pa nyid la sems rab tu 'jug cing dad pa dang / yang dag par gnas pa dang / rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /mya ngan las
290b3(mdo sde): 'das pa gtsor bya ba la 'phags pa'i bden pa gzhi shes par bya ba la mig rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /mya ngan las 'das pa gtsor bya ba la rnam par grol ba yongs su rdzogs

290b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa dang / dge ba'i dang tshul can nyid dang / sems shes rab can nyid dang / bka' blo bde ba nyid dang / gus par nyan
290b7(mdo sde): pa dang / yongs su 'dri ba dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / dam pa'i chos rtag tu byed pa dang / skyo bar bya ba'i chos rnams la skyo ba dang / de bzhin du kun tu skyo ba la'ang tshul bzhin
291a1(mdo sde): bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong bas dge ba'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin du rab tu 'jog pa dang / de rnam par byang ba dang / ting
291a2(mdo sde): nge 'dzin la dbang thob cing tshul bzhin du'ang yid la byed pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag /'phags pa nyan thos de ltar yang dag par tshul bzhin yid la byas pa'i bdag nyid kyis
291a3(mdo sde): 'du shes bcu po/ 'di lta ste/ mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal la bdag med pa'i 'du

291a6(mdo sde): ste| 'di lta ste/ bud med dang lhan cig gnas pa dang / dran pa g.yengs pas bud med la lta ba dang / bag med pa dang / 'dod chags shas che ba nyid dang / sdug pa'i mtshan ma'i

291b1(mdo sde): mi nyan pa dang / yongs su mi 'dri ba dang / dbang po rnams kyi sgo ma bsrungs pa dang / zas kyi tshod mi rig pa dang / dben pa la mngon par mi dga' ba dang / ji lta ba bzhin la so sor

291b3(mdo sde): lta ste/ le lo dang / 'gyod pa dang / yal ba dang / bag med pa dang / mi brtson pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin so sor mi rtog pa'o/ /sdug bsngal la bdag med pa'i 'du shes kyi bar du
291b4(mdo sde): gcod pa ni bdag tu lta ba'o/ /zas la mi 'phrod pa'i 'du shes kyi bar du gcod pa ni ro la sred pa'o/ /'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes kyi bar du gcod
291b5(mdo sde): pa ni 'jig rten gyi sna tshogs dag la 'dun pa dang / 'dod chags kyi rjes su chags pa'o/ /snang ba'i 'du shes kyi bar du gcod pa'i chos ni bcu gcig ste/ 'di lta ste/ the tshom dang /

292a2(mdo sde): gson pa la 'chums pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag /chos gsum po gces spras byed pa dang / 'dun pa spong ba dang / de la mang du gnas pa ni bar du gcod pa ma bcom pa de

292b1(mdo sde): na 'du byed spong bar 'gyur ro/ /mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes kun tu bsten bsgoms lan mang du byas na le lo dang / 'gyod pa spong bar 'gyur ro/ /sdug bsngal la

293a1(mdo sde): 'dri ba dang / mi mthun pa'i lung dang / lug ltar lkugs pa nyid dang / sred pa can nyid dang / bya ba mang pa nyid dang / las kyi mtha' nyes par byas pa

293b6(mdo sde): ste| bdag ni khyim pa'i rtags spangs pa ste mi sdug pa'o zhes gnas 'di rab tu byung bas yang dang yang du so sor brtag par bya'o/ /bdag ni mi 'dra ba khas blangs pa ste /
293b7(mdo sde): bdag gi cha byad dang / bya ba gzhan yin no/ /bdag gi 'tsho ba ni gzhan la rag las pa ste/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi/ 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang /
294a1(mdo sde): mal stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad pha rol las btsal dgos pa'o/ /bdag ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi rnams kyi 'dod pa dag las
294a2(mdo sde): ldog pa byas pa'o/ /bdag ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi rnams kyi rtsed mo'i dga' ba dag las ldog pa byas pa'o/ /ci ga bdag gis bdag tshul khrims dag gis ma smad
294a3(mdo sde): dam/ ci ga bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams kyis chos nyid kyis ma smad dam/ ci ga bdag nyid ma smras pa dang / ma nyams par spyod dam/ ci

294b2(mdo sde): pa dge slong gi 'bras bu bzhi las 'bras bu gang yang rung ba zhig 'thob bam/ bdag ni skye ba'i chos can te/ skye ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa/ rga ba'i chos can/ na ba'i

294b6(mdo sde): dang | yang du so sor rtog pa de'i dge sbyong gi 'du shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dge sbyong gi 'du shes yongs su rdzogs na 'du shes bdun yongs su rdzogs par
294b7(mdo sde): 'gyur te| rtag par rgyun du byed pa dang / rgyun du 'jug pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems med pa dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / nga rgyal med pa dang / 'tsho
295a1(mdo sde): ba'i yo byad rnams de'i ched du ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag/ sems dang /yid dang / rnam par shes pa gang
295a2(mdo sde): yun ring por gzugs la chags pa dang / sgra la chags pa dang / dri la chags pa dang / ro la chags pa dang / reg bya la chags pa dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang /

302a5(mdo sde): bim+ba pra tiSh+Tha a nu shaM sa sam+ba dan+ti nA ma d+harma par+yA ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhag pa'i phan yon yang dag par brjod
302a6(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu
302a7(mdo sde): rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag cig rim gro'i gnas su lhags te 'dug nas bar
302b1(mdo sde): skabs der gtam 'di lta bu zhig glengs so/ /khyed cag la bram ze'am/ khyim bdag dad pa can thos pa 'dzin pa/ thos pa bsags pa/ dge ba ji ltar bya zhes tshol ba/ de bzhin
302b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid par spro ba skyed pa dag snang la de dag gal te bdag cag gi drung du lhags na/ btsun pa dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan
302b3(mdo sde): bgyid pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po la phan yon ji tsam zhig mchis par rig par bgyi zhes rmed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa la phan yon ji tsam zhig
302b4(mdo sde): yod pa bdag cag gis mi shes te/ de'i tshe de dag la bdag cag gis ji ltar chos dang mthun par lan gdab par bya/ gang don 'di dag nyid ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
302b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/ ston pa de la
302b6(mdo sde): bdag cag gis zhu'o/ /'on tang bcom ldan 'das da bdag cag la lung ston par mdzad de/ bdag cag gis de bzhin bzung nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la rgya
302b7(mdo sde): cher bye ste lan gdang par bya'o zhes bgros so/ /de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
303a1(mdo sde): btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun
303a2(mdo sde): pa| bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po dag rim gro'i gnas der lhags te 'dus pa dang / bar der bka' mchad 'di lta bu zhig glengs te/ khyed cag la bram ze'am/

303a4(mdo sde): la| de dag gal te bdag cag gi drung du mchis nas/ btsun pa dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po la phan yon ji tsam zhig

303a6(mdo sde): la bdag cag gis ji ltar chos dang mthun par lan gdab par bgyi/ gang don de dag nyid ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
303a7(mdo sde): ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/ ston pa de la bdag cag gis zhu bar bgyi'o/ /'on tang bcom
303b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bdag cag la lung ston par mdzad de/ bdag gis de bzhin bzung nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la rgya cher bye ste lan gdab par bgyi'o snyam

303b4(mdo sde): la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhus te/ khyed gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don de nyid zhu bar sems pa legs so/ /legs so/ /

303b6(mdo sde): pa po la phan yon 'di lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ gzhal med khang chen por gnas pa dang / bong steng bzang por grags pa dang / spro ba mang ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / grags pa
303b7(mdo sde): dad ldan pa dang / bde ba mang ba ste/ dge slong dag/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon dang po yin no/ /gzhan yang / phyug
304a1(mdo sde): po dang / nor mang ba dang / longs spyod che ba dang / nor rdzas dang / yo byad mang ba dang / bdag dbang ba bdag gir bya ba mang ba dang / nor dang / 'bru

304b1(mdo sde): de'i bu'am/ chung ma'am/ bran nam/ nye bar 'tsho ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad de la gus par nyan pa dang / bka' nyan par byed de/ dge slong dag/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs

304b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ der skyes nas lha'i rgyal po khyad par can lha dang / lha'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo rnams kyi rten du 'gyur la/ gnas bcu po lha'i tshe dang / lha'i

305a1(mdo sde): bsgyur/ ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ tsai t+ya pra dak+Shi Na gA thA/ bod skad
305a2(mdo sde): du| mchod rten bskor ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab blo ldan 'jig rten na/ chos kyi 'khor lo rjes bskor ba/ /shes rab

309a6(mdo sde): gzugs dang gzugs med khams kyi ting nge 'dzin/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i sa mchog kun myong nas/ /tha mar skye dang rga la sogs pa yi/ /sdug bsngal med pa'i sangs
309a7(mdo sde): rgyas go 'phang 'thob/ /su dag 'di ni rgyal ba'i gzugs byed pa/ /de dag gzugs bzang yid 'ong yon tan ldan/ /dbang po bsdams shing 'od 'bar nyi ma bzhin/ /'jig
309b1(mdo sde): rten dag na mig tu sdug par 'gyur/ /su dag bde bar gshegs pa'i gzugs byed pa/ /de yi lus ni dri ma med pa dang / /pad+ma'i snying po lta bur 'jam zhing yangs/ /nad dang
309b2(mdo sde): mya ngan sdug bsngal 'jigs las thar/ /su zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i gzugs byed pa/ /bran du mi skye ma dag gzhug skye mi 'gyur/ /dbul por mi 'gyur rigs dman mi
309b3(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing / /dbang po rnams kyang nyams par yang mi 'gyur/ /thub dbang mchod rten byed pa'i mi rnams ni/ /mya ngan yongs mod lus kun brten pa dang / /longs spyod
309b4(mdo sde): mchog ldan rin chen mdzod mang ldan/ /dgra yi tshogs rnams kyang ni thub par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten srog shing phul ba yis/ /chos dang rjes mthun chos la
309b5(mdo sde): sgrub pa dang / /tshul khrims thos dang bzod pa'i mchog dang ldan/ /'jig rten dag na don kun grub par 'gyur/ /mchod rten mchog la gdugs brtsegs phul ba yis//
309b6(mdo sde): lha dang mi yi nang na skye ba dang / /sred med bu yi lus 'dra lus kun brtan/ /bkur sti bya ba'i yon tan ldan par 'gyur/ /thub dbang mchod rten rdo thal byugs pa yis/ /
309b7(mdo sde): lha mi'i 'jig rten dag na tshe ring zhing / /lus sems nad dang mya ngan byed spangs te/ /rtag tu skyid cing nor gyis phyug par 'gyur/ /gser dngul spa ba'i glegs mos
310a1(mdo sde): g.yogs pa yi/ /thub pa'i dbang po mchod rten byas pa yis/ /mi rnams srid pa'i khyad par gzhan dag tu/ /lus mkhregs 'od kyang 'bar
310a2(mdo sde): zhing mdzes par 'gyur/ /su dag la la mchod rten sku gzugs la/ /dad pa'i sems kyis bla re 'bul byed pa/ /de dag sa steng rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa/ /ma lus gnod
310a3(mdo sde): med rgyal gcig dbang byed 'gyur/ /bde gshegs mchod rten dag la dga' bzhin du/ /rnam mang rgya chen gdugs ni btags pa yis/ /lha mi'i 'jig rten dag na gdugs
310a4(mdo sde): 'dra ba/ /lha dang mi yi dbang po lta bur 'gyur/ /mi rnams su dag sku gdung snying po can/ /dri med bsod nams 'byung gnas gyur pa la/ /ba dan mdzes pa sna tshogs 'dogs
310a5(mdo sde): pa dang / /mthu dang ldan zhing srid gsum mchod gnas 'gyur/ /bde gshegs mchod rten cod pan btags pa yis/ /mi dbang dpal dang lha dbang dpal thob cing //
310a6(mdo sde): bde ba'i mchog kyang nyams su myong gyur nas/ /rnam par grol ba'i cod pan khyad par 'thob/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag la dril phul bas/ /tshig btsan grags pa
310a7(mdo sde): chen po dag dang ldan/ /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'ong skye ba dran/ /de dag gis ni rgyan rnams sna tshogs 'thob/ /mkhas pa su dag bde gshegs mchod rten la/ /
310b1(mdo sde): dad pa'i sems kyis phreng ba 'dogs byed pa/ /gser phreng rin chen mang pos legs spras pa/ /bsod nams las ldan de yi mgo la thogs/ /ston pa'i mchod rten dag la
310b2(mdo sde): rgyan 'phyang 'dogs/ /de dag do shal rgyan phreng nor bu dang / /gdu bu dag dang dpung rgyan mchog rnams kyis/ /lus brgyan 'jig rten dag na rgyu bar 'gyur/ /su dag
310b3(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la/ /sa dang lci bas nyug pa de dag ni/ /lha dang mir skye lus mdog sdug pa dang / /rnam dag rma med bde dang ldan par 'gyur/ /thub
310b4(mdo sde): dbang mchod rten byi dor byas pa yis/ /shin tu blta na sdug cing mig tu mdzes/ /byed bzhin bzang zhing pad+mo'i mdog dang ldan/ /srid pa'i skyon rnams dang yang 'bral
310b5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ /su dag spos mchog sbyar ba'i 'bru mar gyis/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten nyug byed pa/ /de dag spos kyis mchod cing tsan dan gyis/ /lus byugs
310b6(mdo sde): nyi ma'i 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /mi rnams gang dag thub dbang mchod rten la/ /spos chu gtsang zhing dad pas khrus gsol pa/ /de dag lus la dri ma med pa dang / /
310b7(mdo sde): gdung ba med cing mdog 'jam mya ngan med/ /su zhig sangs rgyas mchod rten sku gzugs khang / /tshon rtsi sna tshogs dag gis mdzes byed pa/ /de ni bde gshegs mnga'
311a1(mdo sde): ba'i yon tan rnams/ /sna tshogs ldan pa kun gyis brtsegs par 'gyur/ /su dag dpyid ka'i dus su gtsang ma'i chus/ /mchod rten nye 'khor
311a2(mdo sde): rdul rnams zhi byed pa/ /de la bud med rnams ni dga' bzhin du/ /rdul yab gser gyi yu ba can gyi g.yo ba/ /dkon mchog gsum phyir mi rnams gang dag gis/ /'phags
311a3(mdo sde): pa dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor byas pas ni/ /rkang pas sor mo dra bas 'brel ba dang / /yan lag thams cad kyang ni skyon med 'gyur/ /su dag dkon mchog gsum la me
311a4(mdo sde): tog dang / /'bras bu gser thog byung ba 'bul byed pa/ /de dag 'gro ba rnams su 'khor ba na/ /ro mchog kun thob mi rdzi stobs dang ldan/ /phreng ba rgyan chen me tog char
311a5(mdo sde): rnams kyis/ /su dag 'dir ni rgyal ba'i gzugs la mchod/ /de dag lha dang mi yi 'jig rten du/ /chu byad yid 'ong sna tshogs legs par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas mchod
311a6(mdo sde): rten dag la dri zhim phul/ /bdug spos rgya chen mang po ldan sbyar dang / /a ga ru yi bdug spos phul ba yis/ /de yi lus kun spos dang ldan par 'gyur/ /su dag bde
311a7(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la/ /dga' bzhin rnga yab rnams ni 'bul byed pa/ /thugs dga' rgyal rnams snying rje rnga yab thogs/ /che ba de la cher yang g.yob par byed/ /
311b1(mdo sde): shin tu dri med zla ba nya 'dra ba'i/ /me long sdug gu thams cad mkhyen la 'bul/ /de dag tshe rabs brgyud pa rnams su yang / /lha mi rnams kyis blta bar 'os par 'gyur/ /su
311b2(mdo sde): dag bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la/ /mchod pa'i khyad par ci yod ci 'byor pa/ /'tsham par 'bul byed de dag dri med cing / /mya ngan med pa'i bla med byang chub thob//
311b3(mdo sde): mi rnams gang dag sangs rgyas mchod rten nam/ /sku gzugs dag la mgos btud gus phyag 'tshal/ /de dag lha rnams dang ni mi rnams kyis/ /cher yang che bar bkur ba'i
311b4(mdo sde): gnas su 'gyur/ /su zhig dang pas thub pa'i mchod rten nam/ /sku gzugs dag la skor ba byed pa de/ /phyi ma'i tshe la dgra chen rnams kyis btud/ /bzang po'i snod
311b5(mdo sde): 'gyur yon tan rnams dang ldan/ /mi rnams su dag dga' bzhin gus pa yis/ /bla med mchod rten rnams dang sku gzugs la/ /lus kyi las rnams byed pa de dag ni//
311b6(mdo sde): srid pa kun tu mdzod rnams shin tu rgyas/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten rol mo'i sgra phul bas/ /zab cing rigs pa'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs/ /yan lag lnga rdzogs yid
311b7(mdo sde): 'ong tshig dang ldan/ /sgra skad dag gis 'jig rten 'gengs par byed/ /su dag rgyal ba'i gdung ldan bstod byed pa/ /de dag gling bu'i sgra dang glu snyan dang / /sgra snyan yid
312a1(mdo sde): du 'ong ba thob pa dang / /so so yang dag rig pa'ang thob par 'gyur/ /mi rnams gang dag rtswa shing so phag gis/ /'jig rten bla ma'i spyi
312a2(mdo sde): gab rig pas byed/ /yang na gzhan dag byed du 'jug kyang rung / /de dag 'gro ba rnams kyi skyabs 'drar 'gyur/ /mi rnams gang dag rgyal ba'i gtsang khang byed/ /de
312a3(mdo sde): dag 'gro ba rnams su 'khor ba na/ /lha dbang gnas 'dra'i khang khyim 'od 'bar ba/ /dus rigs kun tu bde ldan thob par 'gyur/ /mtho ris las bzang 'bras bu'i
312a4(mdo sde): gnas rnams su/ /bskal pa dga' byed rtag tu dga' bzhin du/ /rtson par byed cing mya ngan med pa dang / /tha mar zhi ba'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /gang dag 'ja' khugs 'dra
312a5(mdo sde): ba'i rta babs mdzod/ /thub pa'i chab sgor sbreng byed de dag ni/ /srid pa gzhan du khang khyim sgo dang bcas/ /rnam par brgyan pa rnams ni thob par 'gyur/ /mi rnams gang
312a6(mdo sde): dag ston pa'i sku gdung khang / /bsrung phyir dad pas 'obs dang sgo 'dzugs pa/ /de dag tshe rabs gzhan du dgra rnams kyis/ /dpal yon rnams dang dbral bar
312a7(mdo sde): yongs mi nus/ /mi rnams su dag mchod rten rnying pa rnams/ /gzhan gyi ngor byed ma yin rang gi blos/ /ral tshems byed pa'i skye bo de dag ni/ /lus bzang yon tan
312b1(mdo sde): dam pas brgyan par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten me tog rnying bsal byas/ /'dod chags chags med zhe sdang sdang mi 'gyur/ /gti mug rmongs med lta ngan chags
312b2(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/ /mi rnams rab tu dga' zhing skyid par 'gyur/ /su dag glang chen dril dbyangs spa bar brgyan/ /dul ba'i rta dang sbyar ba'i shing rta dag /ston pa dang ni 'phags
312b3(mdo sde): pa'i tshogs la 'bul/ /de dag bla med theg chen thob par 'gyur/ /skye bo su dag 'jig rten mgon po la/ /rin chen 'bar ba yid dang 'thad pa rnams/ /'bul ba
312b4(mdo sde): de dag rin chen bdun po dang / /byang chub yan lag rin chen dri med 'thob/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten la ni gos phul bas/ /bsod nams byams pa'i ngo tsha'i gos gyon
312b5(mdo sde): te| |dga' zhing yon tan kun ldan ser sna med/ /mdog kyang 'jam zhing kha dog gser 'drar 'gyur/ /dpe med mchod rten mar me phul ba yis/ /ut+pa la sngon po kha
312b6(mdo sde): bye 'dra mig / gsal zhing sdug la mig gi dkyus ring mdzes/ /dri ma med pa'i lha yi mig dang ldan/ /su dag mchod rten mar me dngar ba 'bul/ /de dag mig tu sdug cing mi
312b7(mdo sde): rab rgyas/ /mig gi dkyus ring mthong ka'i mdog dang ldan/ /skyes pa bud med dag gis blta bar 'os/ /mtshan mo thub chen spyan sngar thal sbyar 'khod/ 'byor dang mtshan
313a1(mdo sde): ma mar me'i sdong bu 'bul/ /de dag srid pa gzhan du 'bras bur ldan/ /rin chen rags pa'i 'od ldan lus kyang thob/ /rgyal la phul ba'i
313a2(mdo sde): mar me 'chi ba na/ /dga' ba'i sems kyi 'dir ni dga' bzhin du/ /snying po skul bar byed pa de dag ni/ /spyan lnga dag kyang nges par 'thob par 'gyur/ /mi rnams
313a3(mdo sde): gang dag dge ba'i sems ldan pas/ /rgyal ba'i mchod pa gzhan gyis byas pa la/ /rjes su yi rang don de ma byas kyang / /mdor na de dag gis kyang byas par 'gyur/ /
313a4(mdo sde): tshul khrims ldan pa phyogs nas lhags pa la/ /su dag dga' bzhin mal stan sbyin byed pa'i/ /mi rnams 'gro ba dag tu 'khor ba na/ /gser gyi khri dang stan gyi mchog
313a5(mdo sde): rnams 'thob/ /su dag rab tu byung dang 'tsham pa yi/ /kha zas bzang po dge 'dun sbyin byed pa/ /de dag 'khor ba'i dgon par gnas pa na/ /kha zas kha dog ro la
313a6(mdo sde): sogs ldan 'thob/ /su dag rab tu byung dang 'tsham pa yi/ /btung rgya chen dge 'dun sbyin byed pa/ /de dag 'khor ba'i dgon par gnas pa na/ /btung ba kha dog
313a7(mdo sde): ro la sogs pa 'thob/ /su dag 'jig rten bla mas gsungs pa yi/ /dam chos tshul bzang thos nas nyams su len/ /de dag nyon mongs chu rlabs rab 'jigs pa'i /srid
313b1(mdo sde): pa'i rgya mtsho myur du brgal bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po dge ba'i las 'di thams cad ni/ /'khor ba'i bde ba sna tshogs smin gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub dam pa yi/ /'bras
313b2(mdo sde): bu bde blag kho nar thob par 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal po dga' mdangs ldan pa yis/ /drang srong dge 'dun bskor ba byas nas kyang / /thub dbang zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ /
313b3(mdo sde): rgyal po rgyal byed tshal nas byung bar gyur/ /gsal rgyal gyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ e ka gA thA/ bod skad du/ tshigs su bcad pa
313b4(mdo sde): gcig pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyes bu khyu mchog khyod 'dra'i dge sbyong chen po gzhan dag lha yul sa la med/ /'jig rten 'di na'ang yod pa ma
313b5(mdo sde): yin rnam thos bu yi gnas na'ang yod ma yin/ /lha yi pho brang gnas mchog dag na'ang yod min phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag na'ang med/ /ri dang nags
313b6(mdo sde): su bcas pa'i sa steng rgyas pa kun tu yul zhig ga la yod/ /tshigs su bcad pa gcig pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ tsa tu ra gA thA/ bod skad du/ tshigs
313b7(mdo sde): su bcad pa bzhi pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skur gyur pa ni thams cad la/ /mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis mnga' ba/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags
314a1(mdo sde): ldan pa'i/ /rgyal ba kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzogs sangs gang du bltams pa dang / /gang du byang chub la reg dang / /zhi ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
314a2(mdo sde): zag med mya ngan 'das pa dang / /bde gshegs gang du bzhugs pa dang / /'chag pa dang ni bzhengs pa dang / /seng ge lta bur gzims pa yi/ /gnas de la ni bdag phyag
314a3(mdo sde): 'tshal/ /steng dang 'og dang bar dag dang / /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su yang / /sku bcas sku ni med pa yi/ /mchod rten la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /rkang gnyis
314a4(mdo sde): dam pa shar dang ni/ /byang gi phyogs char bzhugs pa yi/ /rgyal ba bstan dka' zhes bya ba/ /des ni tshigs bcad 'di gsungs so/ /gang gi tshigs bcad 'di bzhi
314a5(mdo sde): yis| |de bzhin gshegs la bstod byed pa/ /de ni tshe rabs stong du yang / /ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa rdzogs so// //
314a6(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ nA ga rA dza b+he rI gA thA/ bod skad du/ klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra'i tshigs su bcad pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
314a7(mdo sde): lo| |de bzhin gshegs pas rab bstan pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyes pa'i rabs/ /thams cad legs par 'dus nas su/ /shin tu dad pa'i sems kyis nyon//
314b1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha yi lha/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa na/ /dge slong rnams ni gcig la gcig /kha stobs la sogs rnams kyis 'gying / /dge slong tshig ngan
314b2(mdo sde): 'don pa dang / drang srong chen pos gsan pa na/ /de phyir thub pas dge 'dun rnams/ /bsdus nas 'di skad bka' stsal te/ /khyed cag kha stobs la sogs pas/ /gcig
314b3(mdo sde): la gcig ni 'tshe byed pa/ /khyim nas khyim med rab byung dang / /de dag mthun pa ma yin no/ /rtag tu yang dag dga' byed pa'i/ /chos drug gang yin la 'jug pa/ /'di ni khyim
314b4(mdo sde): nas khyim med par/ /rab tu byung ba rnams dang mthun/ /sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/ /'tshe ba med par ngas bsgoms nas/ /ji ltar byang chub don gnyer ba/ /
314b5(mdo sde): dge slong nga las 'di nyon cig /shes rab ldan pa'i mi yi 'di/ /thos nas sdig pa rnam spongs la/ /grub dang bde ba thob bya'i phyir/ /dge ba'i chos la spyad par
314b6(mdo sde): gyis| |sngon gyi spun drung gyur pa yi/ /klu yi rgyal po gnyis byung ba/ /gcig gi mang ni rnga zhes bya/ /gnyis pa nye rnga zhes bya'o/ /gnyis ka srog gcod las ldog cing //
314b7(mdo sde): tshul khrims ldan zhing dbang chen grags/ /klu yi skye gnas la smod cing / /mi yi srid pa 'dod par gyur/ /tshul ldan mang du thos pa yis/ /dge sbyong bram ze mthong
315a1(mdo sde): ba dang / /mi yi tshul du bsgyur nas ni/ /bsnyen bkur dag kyang byed par 'gyur/ /zla ba phyed dang tshes brgyad dang / /bcu bzhi bco lnga gang yin pa/ /
315a2(mdo sde): de la yan lag brgyad pa yi/ /gso sbyong la ni legs mnyam 'jog/ de gnyis sngon gyi gnas spangs nas/ /yul gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang / /de dang nye ba'i gnas
315a3(mdo sde): de na/ /rnga sgra zhes bya'i klu gnas so/ /klu yi skyes mchog spun gnyis po/ /de gnyis 'od bar des shes nas/ /khengs shing khros pa'i yid kyis su/ /du ba can gyi
315a4(mdo sde): dbugs 'byin cing / /khyed gnyis chos spyod ma yin te/ /g.yon can tshul ngan 'chos pa'o zhes/ /rnga sgras tshig ni rtsub mo yis/ /yang dang yang du skrod par byed/ /dman
315a5(mdo sde): pas bskrad pa thos pa dang / /nye rnga rab tu khros gyur te/ /de tshe phu bo rnga la ni/ /tshig rnams kyis ni go byas pa/ /kye rnga mi yi 'jig rten dag 'di na/ /tshig ngan mngon
315a6(mdo sde): du smra bas gdung byed cing / /sbal zan chu yi 'gram na skyes pa yis/ /mche ba gdug pas bdag cag skrod par byed/ /'di ni chu nang dud 'gro rnams la 'tshe/ /
315a7(mdo sde): thang la mi rnams la yang 'tshe bar byed/ /gtso bo gal te bdag la bzod mchis kyang / /tshig ngan smra la yid ni bzod mi nus/ /deng ni 'di yi grong khyer dang / /pho brang
315b1(mdo sde): gnyen 'dun bcas brlag ste/ /rnga sgra gtan nas blangs nas su/ /'di nas bdag cag 'dod par bya/ /klu yi rgyal po stobs po che/ /de yis nu bo'i tshig thos nas/ /yid la bab par
315b2(mdo sde): byed pa yi/ /tshigs bcad 'di skad smras te bsgo/ /gang gis khyim du nyin zhag 'ga' gnas shing / /bza' dang btung ba legs par blangs gyur pa/ /de la yid kyis gnod par
315b3(mdo sde): mi bsam ste/ /byas pa gzo ba skyes bu dam pas bsngags/ /ljon shing gang gi grib ma yis/ /yud tsam zhig kyang legs 'gebs de'i/ /lo ma'ang bcad par mi bya na/ /yal ga
315b4(mdo sde): ljon shing smos ci dgos/ /nags tshal shing ni bcad dam bsregs kyang rung / /slar yang skye 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /lag pa rlon bcad phyir yang mi skye ltar/ /grogs la
315b5(mdo sde): 'khu bas yun ring bde mi thob/ /skye bo ngan pa yun ring mchod byas shing / /bza' btung zhim po mang pos phan btags kyang / /des ni nges par grogs po spong 'gyur te/ /glang
315b6(mdo sde): chen gyis ni ko'u shi'i spyil bu bzhin/ /ji ltar chu 'gram shing ni 'gyel 'gyur ltar/ /mi gang blo ni g.yo zhing 'gyur byed pa/ /de yi mdza' bshes brtan par mi 'gyur te/ /
315b7(mdo sde): shing shun tshon gyis ras dkar btsos pa bzhin/ /gal te mkhas pas dgra bo dag /mi dga' bar ni byed 'dod na/ /sems la skyon ni med byas dang / /de nyid kyis ni der gnod 'gyur/
316a1(mdo sde): rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab dang / /sa rnams bdag gi khur min gyi/ /byas pa mi gzo gang yin pa/ /de ni bdag gi khur chen yin/ /mi gang sems ni
316a2(mdo sde): mi rgod cing / /byas pa gzo dang byas pa tshor/ /byas pa chud gzon mi byed pa/ /de dag mkhas pas rab tu bsngags/ /chos bde byams pa bde ba ste/ /'jug dogs bde
316a3(mdo sde): ba'i chu klung bzhin/ /grogs la 'khu ba med pa dang / /nga snyems nga rgyal zad pa bde/ /khengs dang zol byed nga rgyal che/ /sdig pa'i grogs po bsten pa dang / /stobs
316a4(mdo sde): ldan rnams la rgol byed pa/ /de dag rnams kyi grags pa 'jig /de phyir khengs par mi bya ste/ /khro ba rnam par spang bar bya/ /khengs dang khro ba 'ongs 'gyur na/ /grags
316a5(mdo sde): pa mtha' dag 'jig par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rgan dang byis pa nad pa dang / nyam chung thabs stor de bzhin dman pa dang / /rgyal pos spangs dang skyabs med pa dag la//
316a6(mdo sde): snying brtse med pa de dag mir mi rung / /rang gi yul 'khor gnas spangs te/ /gzhan gyi ljongs su phyin pa na/ /tshig ngan so sor zlog pa la/ /bzod pa chen po bya dgos
316a7(mdo sde): so| |rang gi yul na brnyas bzhin 'dug pa bas/ /mi rnams gzhan gyi yul na gnas kyang rung / /gang na mi rnams gzhan gyis mi brnyas te/ /rang gi yul yin de dag rang
316b1(mdo sde): gi mi/ /mi mchog rnams ni brnyas thabs byas pa'i tshe/ /chung ma sdug dang longs spyod rgya chen gtong / /ngan ba rnams ni de na'ang yongs su 'khyam/ /brnyas thabs byas pa de
316b2(mdo sde): yang chu bzhin 'thung / /dar ba rnyed pa dga' ba ste/ /rgud pa med pa yin pa'i phyir/ /sems can dmas par gyur pa'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /gal te nor med
316b3(mdo sde): phyogs nyung ngam/ /mdza' bshes phyogs kyi stobs chung ngam/ /dgra bo phyogs kyi stobs lngan tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /mi rnams chos min byed pa dang / /'dod pa'i
316b4(mdo sde): longs spyod mngon dga' zhing / /dad tshung ngo tsha med pa'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /mi rnams khro bar byed pa dang / /gnod sems mang por gyur pa dang / /gzhan
316b5(mdo sde): la'ang gdug pa'i tshul ldan tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /mi rnams dad pa med pa dang / /khwa bzhin mu cor smra ba dang / /sgyu dang g.yo dag byed pa'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug
316b6(mdo sde): dang bde ba 'thob/ /mi rnams tshul khrims 'chal ba dang / /gtum zhing gzu lums byed pa dang / /bden pa'i chos dang mi ldan tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /mi rnams
316b7(mdo sde): dang tshul ngan pa dang / /log pa'i lta bas bcom pa dang / /gtum zhing sdang bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /ngo tsha med cing brdzun du smra/ /don med phra ma
317a1(mdo sde): tshig rtsu ba dang / /dbyen dang khyal pa smra ba'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /ya rabs tshul med shin tu khengs/ /nga rgyal gyis ni 'gying ba
317a2(mdo sde): dang / /phrag dog brkam dang tshul nyams tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /gang tshe mi yi rus rnams dang / /rigs rnams shes pa ma yin pa'i/ /mi dang lhan
317a3(mdo sde): cig 'dug pa na/ /de tshe nga rgyal byar mi rung / /gzhan gyi yul na 'dug pa dang / /gzhan gyi 'tsho bas 'tsho ba'i tshe/ /yul gyi phyir dang bde ba'i phyir/ /gzhan gyis brnyas
317a4(mdo sde): pa de bzod bya/ /gzhan gyi yul na gnas pa dang / /gzhan gyi 'tsho bas 'tsho ba'i tshe/ /sdang bas 'khrug par gyur pa na/ /gzhan gyis brnyas pa de bzod bya/ /gzhan gyi yul
317a5(mdo sde): na 'dug pa dang / /gzhan gyi 'tsho bas 'tsho ba'i tshe/ /dman pas bskrad par gyur kyang rung / /shes rab ldan pas de bzod bya/ /kye ma yul log bdag gnas shing / /mdza'
317a6(mdo sde): bshes ngan dang phrad pa na/ /byis pa rnams dang 'grogs pa yi/ /gnas su mi ngan rten byed med/ /shes rab ldan pas de bsams nas/ /mi shes mi dang 'grogs byed
317a7(mdo sde): kyang / /mkhas pas nor dang longs spyod phyir/ /gzu lums kho nar khro mi bya/ /ji ltar thal bas bkab pa'i me/ /rtswa dang shing gis g.yogs pa la/ /rlung rnams kyis ni
317b1(mdo sde): legs bus na/ /shin tu rab tu 'bar 'gyur te/ /rtswa dang shing de bsregs nas su/ /chen por mched cing 'bar ba yis/ /rtswa dang gel ba mang po dag /ljon shing chen po
317b2(mdo sde): sreg pa ltar/ /de bzhin rnam rtog bud shing las/ /byung ba'i khro ba me 'dra bas/ /bdag nyid dang ni gzhan dag la/ /phung khrol chen po byed par 'gyur/ /de phyir khro ba byung ba na/ /
317b3(mdo sde): zhe sdang gnyen por gyur pa yi/ /byams pa'i sems la bsgoms nas su/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis zlog par byed/ /bstod pa byas na mdza' byed la/ /ma bstod mdza' bar mi byed
317b4(mdo sde): cing / /mod la yongs su spong byed pa/ /de ni byis pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ /gal te 'di na byis pa dag /sgro gshog btogs pa'i bya lta bur/ /blo spangs shes rab ma 'chal na/ /
317b5(mdo sde): mkhas pa ji ltar 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /gang phyir byis pa phal cher ni/ /blo gros spangs shing shes 'chal ba/ /de phyir mkhas pa shes rab can/ /khyad par du ni bde bar 'tsho/ /
317b6(mdo sde): mkhas pa nor rnyed dga' bar mi 'gyur la/ /phongs par gyur kyang mi 'khrul 'khrug pa med/ /rjes su bzung phyir phan pa de smra na/ /legs smra yin zhes gzhan gyis cis mi
317b7(mdo sde): rtogs| |mkhas pa gzu lums med par gyur pa de/ /de nyid dpyad pa legs par mnyan nas su/ /de ltar rnam par bsams nas rang don dang / /gzhan gyi don dag legs
318a1(mdo sde): par spyod par byed/ /mkhas pa rnams ni 'tsho ba'i rgyu tsam gyis/ /sdig pa'i las rnams kun tu spyod mi 'gyur/ /gal te bde dang sdug bsngal
318a2(mdo sde): ldan gyur kyang / /rtag tu chos don yongs su gtong ba med/ /blo ldan g.yo sgyu can du mi 'gyur te/ /rmongs par mi 'gyur tshig rtsu ba khro mi 'gyur/ /phongs pa'i gnas na mya
318a3(mdo sde): ngan mi byed pa/ /gzhan gyis gnas la 'bebs par byed re skan/ /ha cang thal dang ha cang zhum pa yi/ /dman pa'i mi rnams la yang ma yin te/ /bar ma'i gnas la ston
318a4(mdo sde): par byed pa dag / de ni mkhas pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid yin/ /ha cang thal ba rtag tu 'khon/ /ha cang zhum pa rtag tu brnyas/ /de phyir de gnyis spangs nas su/ /go 'phang bar
318a5(mdo sde): ma bsten par bya/ /res 'ga' lkugs pa'am 'on pa lta bur gyis/ /dus la bab na sa bdag bzhin du smros/ /res 'ga' gangs ri bzhin du bsil bar gyis/ /dus la
318a6(mdo sde): bab na me lce bzhin du spor/ /res 'ga' rtswa dang 'dra bar zhum par bya/ /dus la bab na ri rab lta bur gyis/ /res 'ga' rgyal po lta bur 'gyur bar bya/ /dus la bab na thub
318a7(mdo sde): 'dra nags su song / /res 'ga' bkres dang skom pa'ang bzod par bya/ /dus su bde dang sdug bsngal dang du blang / /nor phyir bran bzhin bkol bar mi bya ste/ /khro ba'i dbang
318b1(mdo sde): du gyur par mi bya'o/ /res 'ga' dga' ba'i glu dang sil snyan gyis/ /rtse zhing sha dang chang yang spyad par bya/ /res 'ga' ri drags lta bur 'jigs bzhin song / /dus su gcan
318b2(mdo sde): zan bzhin du nyams rtsal bstan/ /dang por dus dang dus min dang / /bdag nyid stobs ldan stobs med dang / /dar dang rgud pa brtags nas su/ /de nas don rnams legs par
318b3(mdo sde): brtsam/ /bzod med rnams la bzod pa dang / /bzod ldan rnams la'ang bzod par gyis/ /nyam chung rnams la'ang bzod pa dang / /stobs ldan rnams la rtag bzod gyis/ /
318b4(mdo sde): 'khon gyis 'khon zhir nams kyang mi 'gyur bas/ /bzod med rnams la'ang bzod par byas na legs/ /khros pa rnams la rtag tu dad pa dang / /gzhan gyi skyon rnams rtag
318b5(mdo sde): tu bcab par gyis/ /gtso bo rnams kyi tshig ni 'jigs phyir dang / /'thab zla'i tshig dag 'thab gcugs gyur phyir bzod/ /gang zhig 'og ma'i tshig dag bzod byed pa/ /de ni
318b6(mdo sde): bzod pa'i mchog ces dam pas gsungs/ /gshe dang gya tshom smra ba dang / /tshig ngan smra bar byed pa la/ /blo gros chung du mi bzod de/ /pad+ma la ni rdo char bzhin/ /gshe dang
318b7(mdo sde): gya tshom smra ba dang / /tshig ngan smra bar byed pa la/ /mkhas pa shin tu bzod byed de/ /glang chen me tog char pa bzhin/ /khro ba dang ni rdzun dag dang / /tshig ngan smra bar byed pa la/ /
319a1(mdo sde): mkhas pas shes rab ldan gyur pa/ /gang yin de ni thams cad bzod/ /rdo ba bsregs kyang 'ju mi 'gyur/ /char pa bab kyang 'jig pa med/ /de bzhin
319a2(mdo sde): bde dang sdug bsngal gyis/ /mkhas pa nyams par 'gyur ba med/ /gang zhig bden pas gshe byed pa/ /de la mkhas pas bzod par byed/ /bden pa ma yin pa yang bzod//
319a3(mdo sde): de las gzhan pa bstan du med/ /'di ltar skyes bu mkhas pa nor gyi phyir/ /sdug bsngal bzod bya bzod par 'gyur bar bya/ /gal te mi bzod mya ngan rnam spangs te/ /
319a4(mdo sde): gzhan du song na stong phrag rnyed dang 'dra/ /yal ga snyegs la 'ju bar mi bya zhing / /chags bral sems la chags par mi bya ste/ /bzang zhing sdug pas sa steng gang bas na/ /
319a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten yangs pa gzhan du 'gror zad mod/ /gang na brnyas byed bkur sti mi byed dang / /smod par byed cing bstod par mi byed na/ /mkhas dang blun 'grogs ched ka mi che
319a6(mdo sde): bas| |rang rgyal bzhin du mi smra de 'gro rigs/ /gang na skyes bu 'thab la dga' gyur nas/ /g.yo sgyu'i bsam ldan rtag tu glags kyang byed/ /kyal pa dbyen rdzun tshig rtsub smra
319a7(mdo sde): byed pa/ /de tshe mkhas pa myur du yul gzhan song / /gang na mi rnams 'tsho bar byed gyur nas/ /phan tshun gnod la 'bebs par dga' ba dang / /lus dang ngag yid sdom
319b1(mdo sde): pa med gyur pa/ /de tshe mkhas pa myur du yul gzhan song / /gang na mi rnams phrag dog byed gyur nas/ /gzhan gyi rnyed la rtag tu mi bzod cing / /sdang ba'i bsam pas rnam
319b2(mdo sde): rmongs tshul 'chos pa/ /de tshe bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis/ /gang na mi rnams sdig byed 'dod gyur nas/ /bkur sti 'dod cing tshul 'chos g.yo sgyu byed/ /nang yang ma
319b3(mdo sde): dag phyi yang ma dag pa/ /de tshe bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis/ /gang na mi rnams zhes med gyur nas/ /ya rabs tshul med khengs shing nga rgyal ldan/ /byis pas
319b4(mdo sde): mkhas pa rtag tu brnyas byed la/ /de tshe bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis/ /gang dang gang du bza' btung dang / /gang du gos rnams rnyed pa dang / /gang du 'tsho
319b5(mdo sde): ba der song la/ /chags 'byung gnas su ma 'dug cig /lan 'ga' rtsod 'gyur sred pa gang yin spongs/ /rtag khengs mchod med nga rgyal gang yin spongs/ /'bras bu
319b6(mdo sde): ngan pa'i khro ba gang yin spongs/ /phongs dus mi lta'i grogs po gang yin spongs/ /me yis gang ba'i lam 'dra'i ma rig spongs/ /byas gzo med pa'i gnyen 'dra'i 'dod
319b7(mdo sde): chags spongs/ /mche ba mi bzad klu 'dra'i chags pa spongs/ /dgra bo mtshon thogs lta bu'i sdug bsngal spongs/ /klu mo lta bu mi bzod chung ma spongs/ /mgo la me 'bar
320a1(mdo sde): lta bu'i bu rnams thongs/ /'go ba'i nad bcas lta bu'i khyim rnams thongs/ /btung ba dug chen lta bu'i 'dod pa thongs/ /khyim gyi phyir ni
320a2(mdo sde): gcig btang ste/ /grong khyer don du khyim btang ngo / /ljongs kyi phyir ni grong khyer te/ /bdag gi don dus btang ngo / /mi yi yan lag phyir ni nor btang zhing / /srog
320a3(mdo sde): gi don du yan lag btang bar bya/ /nor dang yan lag rnams dang de bzhin srog /thams cad btang gi 'dir ni chos srung ngo / /chos spyod pa la 'jigs skrag med
320a4(mdo sde): pa nyid/ /chos spyod pa dag ngan 'gror mi 'gro ste/ /chos spyod pa ni 'dod pa'i 'gro bar 'gro /chos mi spyod pa shi nas gdung bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pa nor rnyed
320a5(mdo sde): dga' bar mi 'gyur la/ /nor zad na yang blo gros mi 'khyar bar/ /'jig rten dag na ci dgar legs rgyu ba/ /sems can nang na mi yi snying por chud/ /gang zhig
320a6(mdo sde): dga' bas gzhan la nor sbyin zhing / /nga rgyal 'tshe ba rnam spangs bden la gnas/ /rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sems ldan de dag ni/ /dpa' bo rtul phod ya rabs thabs ldan
320a7(mdo sde): yin| |gang zhig de dang de la legs bslabs pas/ /don rnams kun la mkhas par gyur pa dang / /des la 'grogs na bde ba de dag ni/ /dam pas legs pa yin zhes
320b1(mdo sde): bsngags pa mdzad/ /nye rngas smras pa/ /rnga khyod la ni phyi phyir zhing / /'di ltar bdag ni rab tu dad/ /bdag gi lus 'di skams pa'am/ /yang na sems ni med kyang sla/ /
320b2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad par/ /lhung yang phyin chad sdig mi bgyid/ /tshul khrims nyams pa gson pa bas/ /tshul khrims ldan pa shi yang sla/ /skye ba gcig tu 'di
320b3(mdo sde): yi phyir/ /ji lta bur ni mi zad spyad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sngon tshe gang du rab gnas shing / /de dang der ni skyes pa na/ /mi dge'i grogs dang 'grogs
320b4(mdo sde): pa yis/ /nga yi mi dge las rnams byas/ /dge ba'i bshes dang phrad pa na/ /mi dge'i las rnams sdangs pa yis/ /bdag gis mi dge'i las rnams bsal/ /bcom
320b5(mdo sde): ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yis/ /sngon gyi gnas rnams mngon mkhyen nas/ /de phyir dge slong rnams la ni/ /thub pas lung yang bstan par mdzad/ /sngon tshe nga ni
320b6(mdo sde): rngar gyur te/ /kun dga' bo ni nye rnga yin/ /lha sbyin rnga sgar gyur to zhes/ /skyes rabs de ltar gzung bar gyis/ /chos rnams sdud par byed pa yi/ /don rgyas mdo sde 'di thos
320b7(mdo sde): nas| |dge slong thams cad gus bcas pa/ /chos la spyad pa nyid du gyis/ /klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ u dA na brga/
321a1(mdo sde): bod skad du/ ched du brjod pa'i tshoms/ bam po dang po/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bkra shis par gyur cig /rgyal bas
321a2(mdo sde): ched du brjod gsungs pa/ /bdag gis rab tu bshad par bya/ /gnyid dang rmugs pa rnams sol la/ /yid la dga' ba bskyed de nyon/ /thams cad mkhyen pa skyob
321a3(mdo sde): pa po/ /thub pa rjes su thugs brtse ba/ /sku yi tha ma 'dzin pa yi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs/ /kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag /skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos
321a4(mdo sde): can yin/ /skyes nas 'jig par 'gyur ba ste/ /de dag nye bar zhi ba bde/ /de ltar rab tu 'bar ba la/ /ci zhig dgar yod mgur ci yod/ /mun pa'i nang zhugs gnas
321a5(mdo sde): pa dag / ci phyir sgron ma tshol mi byed/ /rus pa thi ba'i mdog 'dra ba/ /bor ba gang yin 'di dag ni/ /phyogs dang phyogs su rnam 'thor ba/ /de mthong 'di la ci zhig dga'//
321a6(mdo sde): gang gi nub mo kho na nas/ /mngal du dang por 'jug pa'i mi/ /de ni sdod med 'gro 'gyur zhing / /song ba las kyang ldog pa med/ /snga dro skye bo mang mthong ba/ /phyi dro kha cig
321a7(mdo sde): mthong mi 'gyur/ /phyi dro skye bo mang mthong ba/ /snga dro kha cig mthong mi 'gyur/ /skyes pa bud med mang po dang / /dar la bab pa'ang 'chi 'gyur na/ /de la mi 'di gzhon
321b1(mdo sde): zhes te/ /gson pa'i gdeng drod ci zhig yod/ /kha cig mngal du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin kha cig btsas pa'i sar/ /de bzhin kha cig gog tsam na/ /de bzhin kha cig
321b2(mdo sde): yongs rgyug na/ /la la rgan dang la la gzhon/ /la la dar la bab pa'i mi/ /rim gyis rab tu 'gro 'gyur te/ /'bras bu smin pa ltung ba bzhin/ /dper na 'bras bu smin pa rnams/ /ltung
321b3(mdo sde): bas rtag tu 'jigs pa ltar/ /de bzhin skyes par gyur pa'i mi/ /rtag tu 'chi bas 'jigs par 'gyur/ /dper na rdza ma'i mkhan po yis/ /'jim pa las ni snod byas pa/ /thams
321b4(mdo sde): cad tha mar 'jig pa ltar/ /mi rnams srog kyang de bzhin no/ /dper na thags ni brkyang ba la/ /spun ni gang dang gang bcug pa'i/ /spun gyis rting la gtugs par ltar/ /mi rnams
321b5(mdo sde): srog kyang de bzhin no/ /dper na nges par bsad pa dag /gom pa gang dang gang bor bas/ /bsad sa'i drung du bsnyen pa ltar/ /mi rnams srog kyang de bzhin no/ /chu klung drag
321b6(mdo sde): tu 'bab pa'i rgyun/ /ldog pa med pa ji lta bar/ /de bzhin mi yi tshe 'gro ba/ /slar ni ldog par 'gyur ba med/ /dka' ba nyid dang 'thung ba dang / /de yang sdug bsngal
321b7(mdo sde): ldan pa dag / myur ba kho nar 'jig 'gyur te/ /chu la dbyug gus bris pa bzhin/ /dper na phyugs rdzi dbyug thogs kyis/ /phyugs rnams gnas su phyin byed ltar/ /de
322a1(mdo sde): bzhin nad dang rga ba yis/ /mi rnams 'chi bdag drung du skyel/ /chu bran gyi ni chu lta bur/ /nyin dang mtshan mo 'das pa yis/ /mi rnams tshe yang zad
322a2(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing / /srog kyang nye bar 'jig par 'gyur/ /mel tshe byed la mtshan mo ring / /lam kyis dub la rgyang grags ring / /dam chos rnam par mi shes pa'i/ /byis pa
322a3(mdo sde): rnams la 'khor ba ring / /bdag la bu yod de bzhin du/ /nor yod ces pas byis pa brlag /phyi rol nang na bdag med na/ /su yi bu yin ci zhig nor/ /skyes pa bud
322a4(mdo sde): med rnams kyi rigs/ /brgya dang stong phrag mang po dang / /longs spyod legs par bsgrubs pa yang / /'chi bdag dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bsags pa kun gyi
322a5(mdo sde): mtha' zad cing / /bslang ba'i mtha' ni 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /phrad pa'i mtha' na bral ba ste/ /gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba ni/ /gson mtha' 'chi ba yin pas na/ /sems
322a6(mdo sde): can thams cad 'chi 'gyur zhing / /dge sdig 'bras bur nyer 'gro ba'i/ /ji bzhin las kyi rjes su 'brang / /sdig pa'i las kyis dmyal ba dang / /bsod nams byas pa bde
322a7(mdo sde): 'gro ste/ /gzhan dag gis ni lam bsgoms pas/ /zag med mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/ /gang yang sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos kyang / /sku
322b1(mdo sde): lus 'di ni spong mdzad na/ /skye bo phal pa smos ci dgos/ /gang du gnas na 'chi bas mi tshugs pa'i/ /sa phyogs de ni yod pa ma yin te/ /bar snang la med rgya mtsho'i nang na
322b2(mdo sde): med| |ri bo rnams kyi gseb tu zhugs na'ang min/ /byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa/ /kun gyis lus 'di btang nas 'gro ba dang / /de kun 'jigs par mkhas pas rtogs
322b3(mdo sde): gyis te/ /chos la gnas gyis tshangs par spyad pa spyod/ /rga ba mthong zhing nad kyis sdug bsngal dang / /sems dang bral ba'i shi ba mthong nas ni/ /brtan pas btson ra 'dra ba'i
322b4(mdo sde): khyim spangs kyi/ /'jig rten phal pas 'dod spang nus re skan/ /rgyal po'i shing rta shin tu bkra ba'ang 'jig /de bzhin lus kyang nye bar rga bar 'gyur/ /dam pa rnams kyi
322b5(mdo sde): chos 'di dam pa ste/ /mi mchog gzhan rtogs byed cing rga mi 'gyur/ /rga ba khyod ni blun zhing ngan/ /khyod ni mi rigs byed pa ste/ /yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs 'di yang / /khyod
322b6(mdo sde): kyis mngon par bcom par gyur/ /gang zhig lo ni brgyar 'tsho ba/ /de yang 'chi bdag nyid kyis khrid/ /'di dag rga bar 'gyur ba 'am/ /yang na na ba'ang 'chi bas 'joms/ /rtag
322b7(mdo sde): tu ldog pa med par 'gro 'gyur zhing / /nyin dang mtshan du rab tu 'jig pa dang / /skye dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan pa/ /chu tshan nang du gdungs pa'i nya dang 'dra/ /tshe
323a1(mdo sde): 'di nyin dang mtshan mo dang / /'gro ba dang ni 'dug pa na/ /chu klung chen po'i rgyun bzhin du/ /phyir mi ldog par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /chu chung
323a2(mdo sde): nang gi nya lta bur/ /gang zhig nyin mtshan 'da' ba yis/ /tshe 'di shin tu thung 'gyur na/ /de la dga' bar byar ci yod/ /gson mtha' 'chi ba yin pa'i phyir/ /lus 'di
323a3(mdo sde): yongs su rga ba dang / /nad kyi tshang 'di myur 'jig cing / /snag gi tshogs kyang 'jig par 'gyur/ /kye ma lus 'di mi thogs par/ /stong zhing rnam shes dang bral nas/ /dur
323a4(mdo sde): khrod bor ba'i mgal dum ltar/ /sa yi steng du 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /rgyun du nad kyis mngon gdung zhing / /rtag tu mi gtsang 'dzag pa dang / /rga dang 'chi bas 'tsher
323a5(mdo sde): 'grib pa'i/ /lus 'di dor bcir mi rung / /myur du 'jig cing na ba dang / /rnag dang ldan pa'i lus 'di yis/ /grub dang bde ba bla med pa/ /zhi mchog don du gnyer
323a6(mdo sde): bar gyis/ /dgun kha dang ni dpyid ka dang / /dbyar kha 'di dag bya'o zhes/ /byis pa rnam par sems byed pas/ /bar chad mthong bar ma gyur to/ /bu dang nor phyugs
323a7(mdo sde): 'byor pa la/ /mi yi yid ni rnam chags pa/ /'chi bdag gis ni blangs nas 'gro /nyal grong chu bos bdas pa bzhin/ /'chi ba'i dus la bab pa na/ /bu rnams skyabs
323b1(mdo sde): su mi 'gyur zhing / /pha yang ma yin gnyen 'dun min/ /khyod la skyabs su 'gyur ba med/ /'di ni bya ba byas zin don 'di bya/ /de dag byas nas bdag gis 'di bya zhes/ /
323b2(mdo sde): de ltar mi ni yongs su shom pa na/ /rga dang nad bcas 'chi bas mngon du bcom/ /de ltas rtag tu ting 'dzin la dga' mnyam par zhog /brtson bskyed la skye dang rga ba'i
323b3(mdo sde): mtha' ma ltos/ /bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa mngon par zil non la/ /dge slong dag go skye shi'i pha rol 'gro bar gyis/ /mi rtag pa'i tshoms te dang po'o// //kun rtog las ni 'dod skyes pas/ /'dod pa'i rtsa bar shes gyis te/ /khyod ni kun rtog ma byed dang / /des na khyod la 'byung mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa rnams las mya ngan skyes/ /
323b4(mdo sde): 'dod pa rnams las 'jigs pa 'byung / /'dod pa dag ni rnam spangs na/ /mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med/ /dga' ba rnams las mya ngan skyes/ /dga' ba rnams las
323b5(mdo sde): 'jigs par 'byung / /dga' ba dag ni rnam spangs na/ /mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med/ /'dod dga'i rnam smin sdug bsngal te/ /dang po mngar la 'bras bu tsha/ /me
323b6(mdo sde): sbron lag nas ma bor pa/ /mjug tu phyis ba sreg byed bzhin/ /nor bu'i rna cha bu dang bu mo la/ /yongs su chags sems gang yin la ltos na/ /lcags shing gres
324a1(mdo sde): ma las byas chings ma gang / /de dag dam po min zhes 'phags pa gsung / /'dod pa'i chings ma gang yin de lhod kyang / /rab tu dgrol bar
324a2(mdo sde): dka' zhes 'phags pa gsung / /brtan rnams 'dod pa'i bde la mi lta bar/ /de dag gtubs nas myur du 'gro bar byed/ /'jig rten sna tshogs gang de 'dod min
324a3(mdo sde): gyi| |skyes bu'i kun rtog 'dod chags 'dod pa yin/ /'jig rten sna tshogs de bzhin gnas kyang ni/ /'on kyang brtan rnams 'di la 'dun pa 'dul/ /mi rnams
324a4(mdo sde): la ni rtag pa'i 'dod pa med/ /'dod can gang la chags de mi rtag pas/ /yang srid med phyir sems kyis rab spongs la/ /'chi ba'i gnas mi 'gyur bar byos zhes
324a5(mdo sde): gsungs/ /'dun pa skyes shing zad par mi byed dam/ /sems la skyon med pa dang dran pa dang / /'dod pa rnams la so sor ma chags gang / /de ni gong du 'pho ba yin
324a6(mdo sde): zhes gsungs/ /mgar ba yis ni dngul bzhin du/ /blo gros ldan pas rim pa bzhin/ /skad cig skad cig cung zad tsam/ /rang gi dri ma bsal bar bya/ /lham mkhan
324a7(mdo sde): gyis ni ko ba dag / yongs su spyangs nas lham byed ltar/ /'dod pa gang dang gang spangs pa/ /de de bde ba phun sum ldan/ /gal te bde ba kun 'dod na/ /'dod pa thams
324b1(mdo sde): cad yongs su spongs/ /'dod pa thams cad yongs spangs pas/ /mchog tu bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /ji srid 'dod pa'i rjes 'brang ba/ /de srid par du ngoms mi 'gyur/ /de
324b2(mdo sde): las gang dag shes rab kyis/ /ldog byed de dag tshim pa thob/ /'dod pas ngoms par mi 'gyur pas/ /shes rab kyis ni ngoms pa skyid/ /shes rab kyis ni ngoms
324b3(mdo sde): pa'i mi/ /srid pa'i dbang du mi 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa chags pa'i mi gang yin/ /de dag kye ma chos min dga'/ /cung zad gson por 'dug pa na/ /bar chad mthong bar mi
324b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /blo ngan longs spyod kyis bcom pas/ /pha rol tshol bar mi byed cing / /bsam brlag 'dod la sred pa yis/ /bdag dang gzhan yang phung bar byed/ /kAr ShA
324b5(mdo sde): pa Na'i char bab kyang / /'dod pa rnams kyis ngoms mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa mnog chung nyes mang ba/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis khong du chud/ /lha yi 'dod pa rnams la yang / /
324b6(mdo sde): lhag par dga' bar mi 'gyur gyi/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams/ /sred pa zad pas dgyes par 'gyur/ /gangs can dang ni mnyam pa yi/ /gser gyi ri bo yod
324b7(mdo sde): gyur kyang / /nor des gcig kyang mi tshim par/ /rtogs par gyis la legs par spyod/ /gang dag sdug bsngal de yi rgyu shes pa/ /de dag nam yang 'dod la dga' mi 'gyur//
325a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten dag na zug rngu'i rgyur shes nas/ /de dag gdul phyir brtan pa slob par byed/ /'dod pa'i tshoms te gnyis pa'o// //lus can rnam par rtog pas rab bcom pa/ /'dod chags mi bzad gtsang bar rjes lta bas/ /'dod chags phyir zhing rab tu 'phel 'gyur te/ /rang gi 'ching ba de
325a2(mdo sde): yis dam por byed/ /gang dag rnam rtog nye bar zhi dga' zhing / /mi sdug sgom pa rtag tu dran byed de/ /de yi sred pa rab tu spangs pa yis/ /rang gi 'ching ba de dag
325a3(mdo sde): rul bar byed/ /'dod pa mun nag 'dra bas g.yogs/ /srid pa'i dga' bas bkab pa dang / /bag med 'ching bas bcings pa dag /tshed mar chud pa'i nya dang
325a4(mdo sde): 'dra| |skyes bu bag med rab tu spyod byed pa/ /'khri shing bzhin du sred pa 'phel 'gyur zhing / /rga dang 'chi ba'i rjes su 'gro 'gyur te/ /ma drung nu zho 'dod pa'i be'u
325a5(mdo sde): dang 'dra/ /mi dag dran par byed dang chags byed dang / /yid bde ba la rtog par byed pa dag /de yis yang dang yang du 'khor bar 'khyams/ /tshal nang 'bras bu 'dod pa'i
325a6(mdo sde): spre'u dang mtshungs/ /mi gang rtag tu bde ba 'dod byed pa/ /skye dang rga bar nye bar 'gro 'gyur zhing / /skye dgu sred pa rnams kyis mdun du bdar/ /rgya nang ri bong yongs
325b1(mdo sde): su rgyug pa bzhin/ /sred pa rnams kyi mdud pa'i sems can dag /srid dang srid min dag la sems chags shing / /kun sbyor ro la dga' ba'i byis pa rnams/ /yang dang
325b2(mdo sde): yang du sdug bsngal 'thob par 'gyur/ /skye bo grub dang bde rnams dang bral zhing / /bdud kyi sbyor ba dag dang ldan pa de/ /rga dang 'chi ba'i rjes su 'gro 'gyur te/ /ma drung nu zho
325b3(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i be'u dang 'dra/ /'di na sred pa de 'dra spong byed pa/ /srid dang srid min dag la sred bral zhing / /dge slong srid pa zil gyis gnon byed pa/ /lhag ma med par yongs su mya ngan
325b4(mdo sde): 'da'/ /gang zhig 'jig rten spang dga' ba'i/ /sred pa'i bud med 'dis bkol ba/ /de yi mya ngan 'phel 'gyur te/ /rtswa la char pa bab pa bzhin/ /gang zhig 'jig rten
325b5(mdo sde): spang dka' ba'i/ /sred pa'i bud med 'di spong ba/ /de yi mya ngan ldog 'gyur te/ /pad+ma las ni chu thigs bzhin/ /de phyir ji snyed 'dir lhags pa/ /khyed la smra yi khyed bde
325b6(mdo sde): zhig / u shir phyir ni rtswa bzhin du/ /sred pa rtsar bcas drung nas phyung / /skyes bu sred pa dang 'grogs na/ /yun ring dus su 'khyam 'gyur bas/ /sred pa drungs nas phyung
325b7(mdo sde): zhig dang / /mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med/ /yang dang yang du nyer len cing / /yang dang yang du mngal du 'jug /gnas skabs 'gyur dang gzhan 'gyur bas/ /sems
326a1(mdo sde): can 'ong dang 'gro bar byed/ /'dir ni spang dka'i sred pa de/ /spongs las bon chod cig dang / /de la sred pa med 'gyur zhing / /de ni yang du 'khor
326a2(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/ /dal 'byor chud ni ma gzan par/ /gang gis lha dang mi rnams su/ /don gnyer bcings nas 'jog byed pa/ /yul la sred pa de las rgol/ /sems can dmyal
326a3(mdo sde): bar skyes na yang / /dal 'byor thal bas 'gyod par 'ong / /gang phyir srid mtsho rgyur gyur pa/ /yul la sred pa 'bras kyi gzhi/ /'khri shing dra bas khebs byed pa/ /gdung
326a4(mdo sde): bar byed pa ma btul na/ /sdug bsngal 'di ni yang dang yang / /rnam pa kun tu ldog mi 'gyur/ /dper na ljon shing rtsa nas ma bton na/ /bcad kyang phyir zhing skye ba kho
326a5(mdo sde): nar zad/ /de bzhin sred pa'i phra rgyas ma bton na/ /yang dang yang du sdug bsngal 'di mi ldog /dper na bdag nyid kyis ni byas pa'i mtshon/ /de yis rkun pa'i mthu
326a6(mdo sde): yis bdag gsod ltar/ /de bzhin nang gi sems las byung ba yi/ /sred pas lus can nye bar gsod par byed/ /de ltar sred las sdug bsngal dag /'byung ba'i nyes
326a7(mdo sde): dmigs shes gyis te/ /sred spongs nye bar len med dang / /dran ldan dge slong kun tu rgyus/ /sred pa'i tshoms te gsum pa'o// //bag yod 'chi
326b1(mdo sde): med gnas yin te/ /bag med pa ni 'chi ba'i gnas/ /bag yod 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/ /bag med pa ni rtag tu 'chi/ /de yi khyad par de rig pas/ /mkhas pa rnams ni bag
326b2(mdo sde): dang bcas/ /bag yod pa la rab dga' ba/ /'phags pa'i spyod yul dga' ba yin/ /de la rgyun du bsgoms pa dang / /rtag tu pha rol gnon brtan pa'i/ /brtan pas grub
326b3(mdo sde): bde bla med pa/ /mya ngan 'das la reg pa yin/ /gang tshe mkhas pas bag yod pas/ /bag med bcom pa de yi tshe/ /shes rab khang bzang steng 'dzegs nas/ /mya nga med
326b4(mdo sde): pas gdung bcas dang / /brtan rnams ri bo'i spo dag las/ /sa steng byis pa rnams la blta/ /brtson 'grus dang ni bag yod dang / /yang dag sdom dang dul ba yis/ /mkhas
326b5(mdo sde): pas gling du byas nas ni/ /chu bo chen po mngon du zlog /brtson 'grus ldan zhing dran dang ldan pa dang / /spyod pa gtsang zhing brtags nas byed pa dang / /yang dag sdom dang chos kyis
326b6(mdo sde): 'tsho ba dang / /bag yod rnams kyi grags pa mngon par 'phel/ /lhag pa'i sems la bag bya ste/ /thub pa'i thub gzhi rnams la bslab/ /nyer zhi rtag tu dran ldan pa'i/ /
326b7(mdo sde): skyong ba mya ngan med pa yin/ /dman pa'i chos la mi rten cing / /bag med pa la bsten mi bya/ /log par blta la 'dod med dang / /'jig rten 'phel bar mi bya'o/ /'jig
327a1(mdo sde): rten pa yi yang dag lta/ /chen po su la yod gyur pa/ /de ni tshe rabs stong du yang / /ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bag med pa la sbyor byed pa/ /
327a2(mdo sde): skye bo byis pa bsam brlag yin/ /tshong dpon nor rnams srung ba ltar/ /mkhas pa bag dang ldan par bya/ /bag med pa la mi sbyor zhing / /'dod la dga' ba mi gsog
327a3(mdo sde): dang | |rtag tu bag yod sems byed pa/ /zag pa zad pa thob par 'gyur/ /zag pa zad pa ma thob kyang / /dus 'dir bag med mi bya ste/ /ri dwags ma yin seng ge ltar/ /bag
327a4(mdo sde): med pa dag bsad par 'gyur/ /bag med pha rol bud med sten byed pa'i/ /mi gang yid la gnas skabs 'di bzhi 'byung / /bsod nams mi 'thob bde bar mi nyal
327a5(mdo sde): dang | |gsum pa smad 'gyur bzhi pa dmyal bar 'gyur/ /bsod nams ma thob sdig pa'i 'gro ba dang / /'jigs dang bag tsha lhan cig bde ba chung / /rgyal po'i chad pa
327a6(mdo sde): chen pos gcod 'gyur zhing / /lus zhig sems can dmyal ba rnams su 'tshod/ /gang zhig bdag bde lta 'dod pa/ /des ni gong ma bzhin du bya/ /byis pa'i shing
327a7(mdo sde): rta bzhin 'gyur bags/ /brtan pas brtson 'grus zhan mi bya/ /dper na byis pa'i shing rta dag /lam chen bzang po bor nas su/ /lam ngan dag tu 'gro byed pas/ /
327b1(mdo sde): mig chags sems khong chud pa ltar/ /de bzhin chos ni spangs nas kyang / /chos min rjes su 'jug byed pa'i/ /byis pa 'chi ba dag dbang 'gro zhing / /mig chag bzhin
327b2(mdo sde): du bcom pa thob/ /gang zhig bya ba rnam spangs nas/ /mi bya ba dag byed pa dang / /bag med pa yis rlom byed pa/ /de dag rnams kyi zag pa 'phel/ /gang gis zag pa 'phel
