327b6(mdo sde): chos 'dzin pa yin/ /gal te rigs bcas mang du smras kyang ni/ /bag med mi dag de ltar byed mi 'gyur/ /dper na phyugs rdzis gzhan gyi phyugs bgrangs ltar/ /de
327b7(mdo sde): dag dag sbyong skal pa thob ma yin/ /gal te rigs bcas nyung du smra byed kyang / /chos kyi rjes su chos la spyod pa dang / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug spong byad pa/ /de

330b1(mdo sde): bo gzhan rnams dga' bar byed/ /rang gi don ni byed pa la/ /'di ltar gzhan rnams dga' 'gyur zhing / /mthong ba'i chos la bsngags pa dang / /pha rol tu yang bde 'gror
330b2(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /gtams na gnang ba'i tshig smra dang / /mi rigs spyod las zlog pa la/ /dam pa rnams ni dga' bar byed/ /dam pa ma yin dga' mi 'gyur/ /de bas mchog
330b3(mdo sde): dang mchog min pa/ /shi 'phos bral bar gyur pa na/ /dam pa ma yin dmyal bar 'gro /dam pa mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sdug pa'i tshoms te lnga pa'o// //bsngags par 'gyur dang nor 'thob dang / /pha rol bde 'gror dga' 'gyur ba'i/ /bde ba gsum po don gnyer ba'i/ /mkhas pas tshul khrims bsrung bar bya/ /'phags dang mthong
330b4(mdo sde): ba phun tshogs dang / /'jig rten zhi ba rten 'gyur ba'i/ /gnas gzhan 'di dag mthong ba yis/ /mkhas pas tshul khrims bsrung bar bya/ /lus la yongs su gdung med par/ /tshul
330b5(mdo sde): khrims kyi ni bde ba 'thob/ /mtshan mo bde bar nyal ba dang / /sad pa na yang dga' bar 'gyur/ /sbyin pa tshul khrims ldan pa dag /mkhas pas byas pa'i bsod nams kyis/ /'di dang pha
330b6(mdo sde): rol dag tu yang / /rtag tu bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /rgan pa'i bar la tshul khrims dge /dad la rab tu gnas na legs/ /mi yi rin chen shes rab ste/ /bsod nams chom pos dbrog par
331a1(mdo sde): dka'/ /dge slong tshul khrims la gnas shing / /dbang po rnams kyang bsdams pa dang / /zas kyi tshod ni rig pa dang / /mi nyal ba la 'bad pa ste/ /de ltar
331a2(mdo sde): gnas par brtson pa dang / /nyin mtshan snyoms las mi byed pa/ /mya ngan 'das dang nye ba'i phyir/ /yongs su nyams 'gyur mi srid do/ /mi ni tshul khrims la gnas nas/ /sems
331a3(mdo sde): dang shes rab bsgom pa la/ /brtson zhing des nas dge slong gis/ /sdug bsngal bzad par thob par 'gyur/ /de phyir rtag tu tshul khrims dang / /ting 'dzin rjes su srung ba dang / /
331a4(mdo sde): lhag mthong la ni bslab pa dang / /shes bzhin so sor dran par bya/ /des ni kun sbyor zad byas nas/ /yid bral lhag ma med 'gyur te/ /lus zhig shes rab ldan pa yis/ /
331a5(mdo sde): bgrang du med pa'i mya ngan 'das/ /gang zhig tshul khrims ting 'dzin dang / /shes rab 'di gsum legs bsgoms te/ /shin tu dri med mthar phyin cing / /gdung med yang
331a6(mdo sde): srid zad gyur dang / /chags pa'i 'ching las rnam grol zhing / /lus spangs shes rab ldan pa dang / /bdud kyi yul las 'das pa dang / /nyi ma bzhin du lam me 'bar/ /
331a7(mdo sde): dge slong phyi dang nang nyid la/ /bag med rlom par byed pa yis/ /tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab rnams/ /yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /sprin gyis khebs
331b1(mdo sde): las char 'bab cing / /nam thang ba las char mi 'bab/ /de bas khebs pa sol cig dang / /'di ltar char ba 'bab ba mi 'gyur/ /de ltar rtag tu mthong ba dang / /dge slong tshul khrims
331b2(mdo sde): sdom pa yi/ /mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i lam/ myur ba kho nar rnam par 'dag/ me tog dri ni rdzi phyogs min mi 'gro/ rtsa ba rgya spos tsan+dan rnams kyang min/ /dam pa'i dri ni rdzi phyogs
331b3(mdo sde): mi 'gro ste/ /phyogs rnams kun tu mi mchog dri yis khyab/ /rgya spos dang ni tsan+dan dang / /ut+pa la dang ma li ka /spos kyi rigs ni 'di dag pas/ /tshul khrims dri bsung phul du
331b4(mdo sde): phyin/ /rgya spos tsan+dan gang yin pa'i/ /dri bsung 'di ni chung du ma/ /tshul khrims ldan pa'i dri bsung gang / /des ni 'di dang mtho ris khyab/ /de ltar bag yod gnas bya zhing / /
331b5(mdo sde): tshul khrims rnam par dag par bya/ /yang dag shes pas rnam grol na/ /bdud kyi lam ni rnyed mi 'gyur/ /'di ni bde bar 'gro lam ste/ /rnam par dag byed lam 'di la/ /
331b6(mdo sde): rab tu zhugs te bsgoms nas kyang / /bdud kyi 'ching ba spong bar gyis/ /tshul khrims kyi tshoms te drug pa'o// //lus kyi nyes par spyod spangs shing / /lus kyi
331b7(mdo sde): legs spyad spyad pa'i phyir/ /lus kyi nyes chen las bsrungs na/ /lus ni bsdam par byas par 'gyur/ /ngag gi nyes par spyad spangs shing / /ngag gi legs spyad spyad
332a1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ /ngag gi nyes chen las bsrungs na/ /ngag ni bsdam pa byas par 'gyur/ /yid kyi nyes par spyod spangs shing / /yid kyi legs spyad spyad pa'i phyir//
332a2(mdo sde): yid kyis nyes chen las bsrungs na/ /yid ni bsdams pa byas par 'gyur/ /lus kyi nyes par spyod spangs shing / /ngag gi nyes par spyod pa spang / /yid kyi nyes par spyod
332a3(mdo sde): spang zhing / /skyon gzhan ldan pa gang yin spang / /lus kyi dge ba rnams bya zhing / /ngag gi dge ba phal chen bya/ /yid kyi dge ba rnams bya zhing / /tshad med bzhi dang ldan
332a4(mdo sde): par bya/ /lus kyi dge ba rnams bya zhing / /ngag dang yid kyis byas na ni/ /'di dang pha rol dag tu yang / /rtag tu bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /rtag tu lus ni bsdams pa'i
332a5(mdo sde): phyir/ /thub pa 'tshe ba med pa yin/ /de ni 'chi med gnas 'gro zhing / /gang du song na'ang mya ngan med/ /rtag tu ngag ni bsdams pa'i phyir/ /thub pa 'tshe ba med pa yin/ /de
332a6(mdo sde): ni 'chi med gnas 'gro zhing / /gang du song na'ang mya ngan med/ /rtag tu yid ni bsdams pa'i phyir/ /thub pa 'tshe ba med pa yin/ /de ni 'chi med gnas 'gro zhing / /gang
332a7(mdo sde): du song na'ang mya ngan med/ /brtan pa rnams kyis lus bsdam zhing / /brtan pa rnams kyis ngag kyang bsdam/ /brtan pa rnams kyis yid bsdam zhing / /brtan pas kun
332b1(mdo sde): tu bsdams byas na/ /de dag 'chi med gnas 'gro zhing / /gang du song yang mya ngan med/ /lus kyi sdom pa legs pa ste/ /ngag gi sdom pa'ang legs pa yin/ /yid kyi sdom pa'ang
332b2(mdo sde): legs pa ste/ /thams cad du ni bsdams pa legs/ /kun tu bsdams pa'i dge slong ni/ /sdug bsngal kun las rnam par 'grol/ /ngag rnams bsrung zhing yid ni legs
332b3(mdo sde): bsdams te/ /lus kyis mi dge ba dag spyad mi bya/ /las lam gsum po 'di dag rnam sbyangs na/ /drang srong gsungs pa'i lam ni thob par 'gyur/ /legs par spyad pa'i
332b4(mdo sde): tshoms te bdun pa'o/ / //gang dag byas bzhin ma byas zer ba dang / /brdzun du smra ba dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mi de gnyis ka 'dra ba pha rol tu/ /song
332b5(mdo sde): nas dman pa'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur/ /skyes bu skyes pa'i kha nas ni/ /tshig ngan smra bar byed pa yis/ /tshig gi sta re skyes gyur nas/ /bdag nyid gcod par byed par 'gyur/ /
332b6(mdo sde): gang zhig smad 'os skye bo bstod byed dang / /bstod 'os skye bo rnam par smad byed pa/ /de ni kha yis 'thab khrol kun gsog cing / /'thab khrol can gang des ni bde mi 'thob/ /gang
332b7(mdo sde): 'dir cho los rang nor pham byed pa/ /'thab khrol de ni cung zad tsam du zad/ /gang zhig bde bar gshegs la yid 'khrug pa/ /de 'dir 'thab khrol shin tu chen po yin/ /ngag
333a1(mdo sde): yid 'phags pas smad pa'i sdig bsten na/ /bye bar chu pur can dang stong phrag ni/ /bzhi bcu gcig tu chu bur rdol ba yi/ /sems can dmyal ba rnams su
333a2(mdo sde): 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i sems kyis ma nyes skyon brjod pa/ /bdag nyid bsad phyir dmyal ba spel bar zad/ /stobs ldan nyes med pa dag bzod byed cing / /de la sems
333a3(mdo sde): kyang 'khrugs par mi byed do/ /bsam brlag gang zhig sdig can gyi/ /lta la brten nas 'phags pa ni/ /dgra bcom chos kyis 'tsho ba dang / /bstan pa spong bar byed pa dag/
333a4(mdo sde): smyig ma 'bru chags lta bur ni/ /de ni rang gi 'bras bus gsod/ /tshig bzang kho na smra bya yi/ /sdig pa can dag smra mi bya/ /sdig can gdung byed smra ba bas/ /tshig bzang
333a5(mdo sde): smra bar byed pa rung / /byis pa sdig can smra byed pa/ /smra ba'i tshe na 'ching 'gyur la/ /gal te smra na gzhan spong ba/ /de dag 'phags pa mi gsung ngo / /dge slong dag ni
333a6(mdo sde): bsdams pa dang / /dal bus smra zhing rlom pa med/ /gang zhig chos ldan don ston pa/ /de ni snyan par smra ba yin/ /legs par smra ba mchog ces 'phags pa gsung / /
333a7(mdo sde): snyan smra mi snyan ma yin de gnyis pa/ /bden smra rdzun pa ma yin de gsum pa/ /chos smra phal pa ma yin bzhi bde'o/ /tshig de rnams ni smra bya zhing / /gang gis bdag
333b1(mdo sde): kyang mi gdung la/ /pha rol la yang gnod med pa'i/ /tshig de legs par smra bar bya/ /gang gis mngon par dga' 'gyur zhing / /gang gis sdig pa mi skyed dang / /smras pas pa
333b2(mdo sde): rol dga' 'gyur ba'i/ /snyan tshig kho na smra bar bya/ /bden pa'i tshig ni bdud rtsi ste/ /bden pa'i tshig ni bla med yin/ /don dang chos la rab gnas pa/ /bden pa yin zhes/
333b3(mdo sde): dam pa gsung / /sdug bsngal thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs tshig gang / /bden pa mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'i/ /tshig de bla na med pa yin/ /tshig gi tshoms
333b4(mdo sde): te brgyad pa'o/ / //chos gcig las ni rab 'das shing / /'jig rten pha rol bcom pa yi/ /lus can brdzun du smra ba yi/ /sdig pa mi bya ci yang med/ /lcags
333b5(mdo sde): sgong me lce 'bar 'dra ba/ /zos par gyur pa ches sla yi/ /tshul 'chal legs par mi sdom pas/ /yul 'khor bsod snyoms za mi rung / /khyod ni sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs
333b6(mdo sde): shing / /khyod la sdug bsngal mi sdug na/ /mngon sum dag gam lkog tu'ang rung / /sdig pa can gyis las mi bya/ /gal te sdig pa'i las byas sam/ /byed kyang rung ste khyod
333b7(mdo sde): kyis ni/ /kog ces langs te bros byas kyang / /sdug bsngal las ni thar mi 'gyur/ /gang du gnas na las kyis mi tshugs pa'i/ /sa phyogs de ni yod pa ma yin te/ /bar snang
334a1(mdo sde): la med rgya mtsho'i nang nas med/ /ri bo rnams kyi gseb tu zhugs kyang min/ /pha rol po la brtags kyang gang / /sdig ba can gyi las mthong ba/ /de dag
334a2(mdo sde): bdag gis mi bya ste/ /sdig byas las ni rjes su 'brang / /las gang shin tu mi bzad dang / /zol byed gzhal blugs 'chos pa dang / /mi la 'tshe bar byed pa dang / /gzhan la
334a3(mdo sde): byed du 'jug pa yi/ /las de mi yi rjes 'brang bas/ /de yis g.yang sar ltung bar byed/ /mi yis dge ba'am/ sdig pa yi/ /las ni gang dang gang byas pa'i/ /las rnams chud
334a4(mdo sde): zar me 'gyur te/ /de lta de ltar 'bras bur 'gyur/ /de yi tshogs pa ji srid par/ /de srid 'di ni rdung bar byed/ /de la gzhan dag rdung byed de/ /rdung byed de ni brtags par
334a5(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /'di ni bdag rjes mi 'brang zhes/ /byis pas ma brtags byas pa yi/ /sdig pa'i las kyis 'gro ba dag/ pha rol tu ni shes par 'gyur/ /gal te byis pas mi
334a6(mdo sde): shes par/ /sdig pa'i las ni byas pa dag/ nam zhig na ni de nyid kyis/ /rnam smin tsha ba so sor sten/ /rang gi las kyis de'i 'og tu/ /me yis bsregs pa bzhin du
334a7(mdo sde): gdungs/ /byis pa shes rab chung du dag/ bdag la dgra bzhin byad pa yis/ /gang zhig 'bras bu tsher 'gyur ba'i/ /sdig can las ni sbyong bar byed/ /gang dag byas
334b1(mdo sde): bas gdung 'gyur zhing / /ma chi mas gdong yog du bzhin du/ /snam smin so sor sten pa yi/ /las de dag ni ma byas legs/ /gang zhig byas na mi gdung zhing / /dga' zhing yid
334b2(mdo sde): ni bde ba yis/ /rnam smin so sor sten pa yi/ /las de dag ni byas na legs/ /bdag nyid bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir/ /dgod bzhin sdig pa'i las byas pa'i/ /sdig pa'i las de'i rnam
334b3(mdo sde): smin dag/ du bzhin nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ /des par sdig las 'phral du ni/ /'o ma lta bur 'gyur mi byed/ /thal bas g.yogs pa'i me lta bur/ /des ni byis pa sreg par
334b4(mdo sde): byed/ /sdig las 'phral du nges par ni/ /mtshon bzhin gcod par mi byed kyang / /sdig pa'i las kyi 'gro ba dag/ pha rol tu ni mngon par 'gyur/ /gang du de dag rnam smin ni/ /
334b5(mdo sde): tshab so sor sten pa yi/ /sdig pa'i las kyi 'gro ba dag/ pha rol tu ni shes par 'gyur/ /lcags las g.ya' ni langs gyur pa/ /langs pa des ni de nyid za/ /de bzhin ma brtags
334b6(mdo sde): byas pa yi/ /rang gi las kyis ngan 'gror 'gro/ /las kyi tshoms te dgu pa'o// //dad dang ngo tsha tshul khrims sbyin pa ste/ /chos 'di ni rnams ni skyes bu dam pas
334b7(mdo sde): bsngags/ /'di yis lha yi 'jig rten 'gro 'gyur zhing / /lam 'di nyid kyis lha yul 'gro zhes gsungs/ /'jungs rnams lha yi 'jig rten mi 'gro zhing / /de yis byis pa sbyin
335a1(mdo sde): ba'i bsngags mi brjod/ /brtan rnams sbyin la rjes su yi rang ba/ /des ni de dag gzhan du bde ba myong / /'di na skyes bu'i nor mchog dad pa ste/ /'di na
335a2(mdo sde): chos la legs spyod pa de pa 'thog/ /bde na kho na ro bro rnams kyi phul/ /shes rab kyis 'tsho 'tsho ba'i mchog ces gsungs/ /mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba yi/ /dgra bcom chos
335a3(mdo sde): la dang bskyed de/ /mkhas pas gus par mnyan na ni/ /de dang de yi shes rab 'thob/ /bag can gyis ni rgya mtsho dang / /dad pas chu bo rnams las sgrol/ /brtson 'grus kyis

335a5(mdo sde): bas/ /'ching ba thams cad gcod par 'gyur/ /gang gis dang dang tshul khrims dang / /shes rab nyid ni legs bsgoms shing / /mkhas pa skyon rnams spong ba de'i/ /legs
335a6(mdo sde): pa'i ngang tshul can zhes brjod/ /dad dang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs/ /gtong ldan 'jungs pa rnam spangs pa/ /de ni gang dang gar song ba/ /de dang der ni mchod par 'gyur//
335a7(mdo sde): mkhas gang 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten na/ /dad dang shes rab stan byed pa/ /de dag de yi nor mchog ste/ /de yi nor gzhan phal par zad/ /'phags pa lta bar 'dod pa dang //
335b1(mdo sde): dam chos nyan par dga' ba dang / /ser sna'i dri ma rnams spangs pa/ /de ni dad pa can zhes bya/ /dad pa'i lam rgyags bskur bar bya/ /bsod nams chom pos dbrog mi nus/ /chom
335b2(mdo sde): rkun 'phrog par byed pa bzlog / dge spyong rnams kyis blangs nas dga'/ /mkhas pa dge sbyong 'ongs pa la/ /mngon par dga' bar byed 'gyur zhing / /skye bo rnams ni ci rigs
335b3(mdo sde): par/ /dad pa ji bzhin sbyin byed cig /gzhan gyi zas dang skom de la/ /gang zhig yin ni mi bde ba/ /des ni nyin dang mtshan rnams su/ /ting 'dzin thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /
335b4(mdo sde): gang gis ta la'i mgo bcad ltar/ /de 'dra kun tu gcod byed pa/ /des ni nyin dang mtshan rnams su/ /ting nge 'dzin dag thob par 'gyur/ /khron pa skam po ji lta bar/ /dad pa
335b5(mdo sde): med pa bsten mi bya/ /ji ste de la yongs brkos kyang / /'dam chu dring 'byung bar 'gyur/ /chu mang rnam par dad pa dang / /bsil bar gyur cing rnyog med pa'i/ /mtsho la chu 'dod ji
335b6(mdo sde): lta bar/ /shes rab can gyis dad ldan pa sten/ /chags sam ma chags kyang rung ste/ /de yis thub sku mi nges pas/ /ma dad pa dag spang bar bya/ /dad pa rnams ni nye bar bsten/ /
335b7(mdo sde): dad pa'i tshems te bcu pa'o// //sdom la/ mi rtag 'dod dang sred pa dang / /bag yod de bzhin dga' ba dang / /tshul khrims legs spyod tshig dag dang / /
336a1(mdo sde): las dang dad pa de dag bcu/ /bram zes 'dod pa rab spang zhing / /brtson 'grus kyis ni rgyun chod cig/ 'dod pa rab tu ma spangs par/ /thub pa gcig
336a2(mdo sde): gis ma thob bo/ /kun tu rgyu ba zhan pa dag/ nyon mongs phyir yang kun gsog pas/ /brtson 'grus brtan po kho na yis/ /bya ba de nyid byed la rag/ zhan pa'i las ni ji snyed
336a3(mdo sde): dang / /kun nas nyon mongs dka' thub dang / /tshangs spyod yongs su ma dag de/ /don chen 'gyur snyam mi byed do/ /ji ltar mda' ni gzung nyes pas/ /lag pa chod par gyur pa
336a4(mdo sde): ltar/ /dge slong bsrung pa bya nyes dang / /dmyal bar nye bar khrid par byed/ /ji ltar mda' ni bzung legs pas/ /lag pa chod par mi 'gyur ltar/ /dge sbyong bsrung ba bya legs
336a5(mdo sde): na| |mya ngan 'das par nye bar 'dren/ /dge sbyong rnam par ma shes dang / /rgal bar dka' dang bzod dka' dang / /gang dag zhan pa 'gyod 'gyur ba'i/ /sdug bsngal mang
336a6(mdo sde): po de dag 'byung / /yang dang yang du 'gyod pa yi/ /kun rtog dbang du 'gro ba yi/ /sems ni zlog pa ma byas par/ /dge sbyong spyod pa ji ltar bya/ /nyes par rab byung nyes
336a7(mdo sde): dga' ba/ /khyim 'dug nyes rtsom byed pa dag/ sdug bsngal mnyam med sten pa dang / /yang srid sdug bsngal sogs par zad/ /tshem bu dur smrig gyon pa dang / /phal
336b1(mdo sde): cher yang dag mi sdom zhing / /sdig pa'i chos can sdig la dga'/ /sdig can de dag ngan 'gror 'gro/ sA la'i shing la 'khri shing ltar/ /gang zhig shin tu khrims 'chal te/ /ji
336b2(mdo sde): ltar rang la dgra bzhin du/ /de ni de ltar byed par 'dod/ /mgo bo skya bor gyur par du/ /de dung rgan rabs ma chud pa/ /de ni lang tsho gtugs pa ste/ /de ni rgan blun zhes bya'o/ /
336b3(mdo sde): gang zhig dge dang sdig pa dag/ spangs shing tshangs par spyod pa dang / /sde tshogs spangs nas spyod byed pa/ /de ni rgan rabs zhes bya'o/ /brtul zhugs med cing brdzun smra na/ /
336b4(mdo sde): mgo po bregs tsam dge sbyong min/ /rmongs pa 'dod la zhugs pa dag/ ji ga dge sbyong yin nam kye/ /brtul zhugs med cing brdzun smra na/ /mgo bo bregs tsam dge sbyong min//
336b5(mdo sde): gang zhig sdig pa zhi gyur te/ /mkhas pas dge sbyong yin par shes/ /brtul zhugs med cing brdzun smra na/ /mgo bo bregs tsam dge sbyong min/ /gang dag sdig pa che phra
336b6(mdo sde): dag/ kun la brtags nas byed pa dang / /sdig pa zhi ba de dag ni/ /dge sbyong nyid ces brjod par bya/ /sdig pa spangs pa bram ze ste/ /zhi bar byed pa dge sbyong yin/ /bdag gi/
336b7(mdo sde): dri ma rab spangs pa/ /des na rab tu byung zhes brjod/ /dge sbyong gi tshoms te bcu gcig pa'o// //gang tshe 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi/ /shes rab kyis
337a1(mdo sde): ni mthong ba dang / /lam 'di rab tu shes pa yis/ /srid pa'i sred pa rab tu 'dral/ /dper na rlung gis rdul bslang ba/ /char pa bab pas zhi byed ltar/ /gang
337a2(mdo sde): tshe shes rab kyis mthong ba/ /de tshe kun rtog zhi bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig legs par rtogs pa yis/ /skye shi legs par zad 'gyur zhing / /'jig rten nges 'byed 'gyur ba yi//
337a3(mdo sde): shes rab de ni gtso bo yin/ /bden pa'i nang na bden bzhi dang / /lam nang yan lag brgyad pa mchog/ rkang gnyis nang na mig can dang / /chos kyi nang na chags bral
337a4(mdo sde): mchog/ /'du byed thams cad mi rtag par/ /gang tshe shes rab kyis mthong ba/ /de tshe sdug bsngal las yid 'byung / /lam 'di rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /'du byed
337a5(mdo sde): thams cad sdug bsngal bar/ /gang tshe shes rab kyis mthong ba/ /de tshe sdug bsngal las yid 'byung / /lam 'di rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /'du byed thams cad stong nyid
337a6(mdo sde): du| |gang te shes rab kyis mthong ba/ /de tshe sdug bsngal las yid 'byung / /lam 'di rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /'du byed thams cad bdag med par/ /gang tshe shes
337a7(mdo sde): rab kyis mthong ba/ /de tshe sdug bsngal las yid 'byung / /lam 'di rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /srid pa'i zug rdu gcod byed lam/ /das ni khyed cag rnams la bstan/ /
337b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa ste/ /khyed cag rnams kyis bya dgos so/ /srid pa'i zug rngu sel ba'i lam/ /ngas ni khyed cag rnams la bstan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa ste/ /
337b2(mdo sde): khyed cag rnams kyis bya dgos so/ /lta ba rnam par dag byed pa/ /lam 'di ma gtogs gzhan med pas/ /ting nge 'dzin la rab gnas te/ /bdud kyi 'ching ba spang bar gyis/ /'di
337b3(mdo sde): ni drang lam 'di ni pha rol gnon/ /mtsho la ngang pa'i srang ltar bgrod pa gcig/ shAkya thub pas mnyam gzhag gang rtogs nas/ /tshogs la yang dang yang du bshad pa 'di//
337b4(mdo sde): skye shi'i mtha' rtogs phan mdzad thugs brtse bas/ /bgrod pa gcig lam rab tu bstan mdzad pa'i/ /lam 'dis chu bo rnams las sngon brgal cing / /de bzhin brgal bar
337b5(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing rgal bar mdzad/ /shin tu mthar gtugs gdul bya dag bya dang / /'khor ba'i skye shi zad par bya ba dang / /khams rnams du ma so sor rtogs bya'i phyir/ /sbyan dang
337b6(mdo sde): ldan pas lam 'di rab tu bstan/ /ji ltar chu klung gang+gA'i chu rgyun zhugs/ /rgya mtsho'i nang du 'bab par 'gyur ba ltar/ /de bzhin gshegs rab yangs pas bstan pa'i lam/ 'di
337b7(mdo sde): ni 'chi med thob par bya phyir 'jug/ gang zhig 'byung pa kun la thugs brtse bas/ /sngon chad ma thos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /skyob pa lha dang mi rnams 'dul mdzad pa/ /
338a1(mdo sde): srid pa'i mthar phyin de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam rtog dge ba gsum ni brtag bya zhing / /dge ba ma yin gsum yang rnam par spangs/ /kun nas
338a2(mdo sde): rdul langs char gyis mnan pa ltar/ /de nas rtog dang dpyod pa zhi ba bya/ /de nas sems la rnam rtog nyer zhi nas/ /bla med byang chub bde la reg par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin
338a3(mdo sde): gsum po rnams la yid gtad cing / /bden pa las skyed tshad med bsgom par bya/ /dran ldan mkhas pas mdud pa zhi bya zhing / /gsum po rnams kyis gnas gsum rab tu
338a4(mdo sde): dral/ /shes rab mtshon dang brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan/ /dran ldan mnyam gzhag ting 'dzin la dga' bas/ /'jig rten skye dang 'jig par rtogs nas ni/ /kun
338a5(mdo sde): las rab tu rnam grol de rig yin/ /'jig rten mtha' ma legs par rtogs gyur nas/ /'jig rten mthar son pha rol phyin zhes brjod/ /gang gis zhi ba 'phags lam
338a6(mdo sde): yan lag brgyad/ /lam dang bsgoms pa des ni bdud rtsi rnyed/ /de ltar spyod pas bde 'dod bde ba 'thob/ /snyan pa 'thob cing grags pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ /lam gyi
338a7(mdo sde): tshoms te bcu gnyis pa'o/ / //ched du brjod pa'i tshoms bam po gnyis pa/ /dre'u mo rang gi mngal gyis dang / /'dam bu smyig ma 'bras bu
338b1(mdo sde): bu dang / /chu shing 'bras bus phung ba ltar/ /pho bshal bkur stis phul bar 'gyur/ /ji srid blun po mchod byas pa/ /de srid rab tu brlag par 'gyur/ /byis pa'i dkar po'i cha 'grib
338b2(mdo sde): cing / /de yi sbyi bo'ang nges par nyams/ /ngan pa rnyid pa 'dod pa dang / /dge slong 'khor ni 'dod pa dang / /gnas la ser sna byed pa dang / rigs gzhan dag gis mchod pa dang / /
338b3(mdo sde): rab tu byung dang khyim pa dag/ gang yang rung bas bdab/ 'phrigs te/ /bya ba byas rung ma byas rung / /bdag dbang gyur re stes zhes/ /de ltar byis pa kun rtogs na/ /sems
338b4(mdo sde): la 'dod chen 'phel bar 'gyur/ /rnyed pa'i thabs ni gzhan yin la/ mya ngan 'dad 'gro'i gzhan yin zhes/ /de ltar ci rigs shes nas su/ /bur sti dag la mi dga'
338b5(mdo sde): zhing / /dben pa rim gyis 'phel byed pa'i/ /dge slong sangs rgyas nyan thos yin/ /thams cad la ni mi rtsol zhing / /mi yis 'phrigs par mi gyur dang / /'tsho ba gzhan la
338b6(mdo sde): mi rten cing / /chos la tshod pa bzhi mi spyad/ /rang gi rnyed pa blang bya zhing / /gzhan gyi la ni 'dod mi bskyed/ /dge slong gzhan gyi 'dod byed pas/ /ting nge 'dzin 'thob par mi
338b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /gal te bde bar 'tsho 'dod cing / /dge spyod 'di la lta 'dod na/ /dge 'dun gyis ni chos gos dang / /bza' ba tung byin par gyur na blang / /gal te bde bar
339a1(mdo sde): 'tsho 'dod cing / /dge sbyong 'di la lta 'dod na/ /byi ba'i khung nas sprul lta bur/ /gnas mal dag la bsten par gyis/ /gal te bde bar 'tsho 'dod
339a2(mdo sde): cing / /dge sbyong 'di la lta 'dod na/ /ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes shing / /chos gcig po yang bsgom par bya/ /gal te mang po mi shes shing / /tshul khrims legs par
339a3(mdo sde): mnyam gzhag na/ /de shes pa dag 'tsho dag cing / /snyoms las med ces bstod par byed/ /gal te 'chi bdag nyams byed pa'i/ /zag med rig pa gsum ldan na/ /blun pos
339a4(mdo sde): ci yang mi shes zhes/ /bsams nas de la 'phya yang sla/ /gang zag sdig pa'i chos can la/ /gal te bza' dang btung ba yis/ /rnyed pa dag dang ldan gyur na/ /de la de dag mchod
339a5(mdo sde): pa byed/ /mgo bregs ngur smrig byis pa yi/ /bza' ba dang ni btung ba dang / /gos dang mal cha rnyed pa lta/ /dgra byed mang ba kho nar zad/ /de ltar bkur sti 'jigs chen gyi/ /
339a6(mdo sde): skyon rnams khong du chud byas nas/ /'phrigs nyung sems khral bskyungs nas su/ /dran ldan dge slong kun tu rgyus/ /kham gyi zas kyis sems zhing mi 'gyur yang / /'tsho ba 'di
339a7(mdo sde): phyir mi bza' mi bya ste/ /kha zas kyis ni lus dag gnas 'gyur pa/ /de ltar rtogs la bsod snyoms dag la rgyus/ /rigs kyis phyag byas mchod pa gang yin 'di/ /zug rngu
339b1(mdo sde): phra mo dbyung bar dka' ba ste/ /mi yis bzod dka' bkur sti gang yin 'di/ /'dam dang 'dra bar rab tu rtogs par gyis/ /bkur sti'i tshoms te bcu gsum pa'o// //sdig pa'i las ni mi byed pa/ /'khu bya min la gang 'khu ba/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/ /de nyid sdig pa rnams kyi gos/ /dang por bdag ni phung byed cing / /phyi nas gzhan yang phung
339b2(mdo sde): byed pa/ /khra yi gzan ma'i bya lta bur/ /phung zhing gzhan yang phung bar byed/ /rdeg par byed pa rdeg pa 'thob/ /'khon du 'dzin pas 'khon can mthong / /de bzhin gshe bas gshe
339b3(mdo sde): ba ste/ /khro bar byed la khro ba 'byung / /'di gzhan dge sbyong byis pa ste/ /ngam pa'i chos la mi mkhas pa/ /yongs su tshe thung 'di la yang / /gyi na'i phyir ni 'khon par byed/ /'di ni
339b4(mdo sde): mchog ces bsams nas su/ /so sor smra zhing mthun 'jug pas/ /'di na dge 'dun 'byed pa'i tshe/ /ci phyir stobs med sems mi byed/ /rus pa gcog cing srog gcod
339b5(mdo sde): la| |rta phyugs nor ni 'phrog pa dang / /yul 'khor 'joms par byed pa yang / /phyi nas 'jal du ma byed pa ltar/ /mkhas pas brtags shing gsungs pa'i tshig/ spyod
339b6(mdo sde): yul ston par byed pa yi/ /chos 'di rnam par shas na ko/ /khyed cag ci phyir byed mi 'gyur/ /khyod ni mi mkhas lugs can te/ /kha bya yis ni rtsol byed pa/ /pha rol po
340a1(mdo sde): dag mi shes pas/ /bdag ni 'di la brtson par byed/ /'di na mkhas pa gang yin pa/ /de dag bzhams pa'i tshig gis zhi/ /bdag la kha zer bdag la
340a2(mdo sde): gshe/ bdag pham bdag pham byed pa'o zhes/ /'di gang sems la 'dzin byed pa/ /de yi 'khon ni zhi mi 'gyur/ /bdag la kha zer bdag la gshe/ bdag pham bdag
340a3(mdo sde): pham byed pa'o zhes/ /'di gang sems la mi 'dzin pa/ /de yi 'khon ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /'di na 'khon gyis 'khon can dag/ nam yang zhi bar 'gyur ba med/ /bzod pas
340a4(mdo sde): 'kho na ni zhi 'gyur ba/ /'di ni chos kyi rang bzhin yin/ /'khon gyis 'khon can nam yang zhi mi 'gyur/ /'khon med rnams kyis 'khon ni zhi bar byed/ /sha khon zhugs
340a5(mdo sde): pa lus can la gnod pas/ /de phyir mkhas pas 'khon par mi bya'o/ /brtan pa legs gnas lhan cig spyad pa yi/ /grogs po mkhas pa gal te rnyed na ni/ /nyon mongs
340a6(mdo sde): thams cad mngon par zil mnan nas/ /dran ldan dga' ba'i yid kyis de dang spyad/ /brtan pa lags gnas lhan cig spyad pa yi/ /grogs po mkhas pa gal te ma rnyed
340a7(mdo sde): na| |yul 'khor yangs pa spangs pa'i rgyal po ltar/ /gcig pus spyad byas sdig pa mi bya'o/ /bdag dang mthun par spyod pa yi/ /grogs bzang rnyed par ma gyur na/ /
340b1(mdo sde): byis pa grogs su mi 'gyur bas/ /gcig pus spyod pa brtan par bya/ /byis pa grogs su mi 'gyur bas/ /gcig pus spyod par byed slabs/ /ma tang dgon pa'i glang po ltar/ /sems
340b2(mdo sde): khral bskyangs te gcig pu spyad/ /'khu ba'i tshoms te bcu bzhi pa'o// //sangs rgyas kyis ni bstan pa bzhin/ /gang gi dbugs dbyung rngub dran pa/ /yongs su
340b3(mdo sde): rdzogs par legs bsgoms pas/ /rim gyis yongs su byung gyur te/ /sprin bral nyi ma zla ba ltar/ /'jig rten 'di ni kun nas gsal/ /'greng dang 'dug dang de bzhin nyal
340b4(mdo sde): ba dang / /lus dang de bzhin sems ni 'jog byed cing / /dge slong dran pa de legs 'jog pa na/ /snga phyi'i khyad par rnams ni thob par 'gyur/ /snga phyi'i khyad par rnams ni thob
340b5(mdo sde): gyur na/ /'chi bdag rgyal pos bltar yang med par 'gro/ lus rtogs dran pa nye bar gzhag nas su/ /reg pa'i skye mched drug ni bsdam byas te/ /gang zhig rtag tu mnyam
340b6(mdo sde): par 'jog byed pa/ /de bdag nyid kyis mya ngan 'das pa rtogs/ /gang zhig rtag tu rnam pa thams cad du/ /lus rtogs dran pa nye bar 'jog byed pa/ /bdag nyid med cing
340b7(mdo sde): bdag gir 'dzin pa med/ /bdag tu mi 'gyur bdag gir 'dzin mi 'gyur/ /de ltar dge slong mnyam 'jog myur du ni/ /yul la sred pa dag las brgal bar 'gyur/ /gang
341a1(mdo sde): zhig dran dang shes bzhin mnyam 'jog dang / /dga' dang rab tu dang pas dus dus su/ /chos 'di la spyod mel tshe byed pa de/ /skye rga rnams las
341a2(mdo sde): brgal bar 'gyur zhes gsung / /de ltas rtag tu mel tshe byed sten cing / /dge slong mkhas pa dran ldan brtson pa yis/ /skye ba kun tu sbyor ba spangs nas su/ /des ni 'di la mya ngan
341a3(mdo sde): 'das pa 'thob/ /gnyid log de dag sad par byed pa yi/ /mel tshe bdag las khyod nyon cig /nyal bas mel tshe byed sla ste/ /mel tshe byed la 'jigs pa med/ /mel tshe byed
341a4(mdo sde): par brtson pa dang / /nyin mtshan rjes su slob byed cing / /'chi ba med la lhag mos pa'i/ /zag pa rnams ni zad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/ /sangs rgyas
341a5(mdo sde): rjes su dran byed cing / /gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs song ba/ /de dag mi yi rnyed pa yin/ /gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/ /chos rnams rjes su dran byed cing / /gang dag
341a6(mdo sde): chos la skyabs song ba/ /de dag mi yi rnyed pa yin/ /gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/ /dge 'dun rjes su dran byed cing / /gang dag dge 'dun skyabs song ba/ /de dag
341a7(mdo sde): mi yi rnyed pa yin/ /gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran byed pa/ /gau ta ma yi nyan thos de/ /legs par sad pas sad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig nyin

341b6(mdo sde): sad pas sad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/ /'tshe ba med la yid dga' ba/ /gau ta ma yi nyan thos de/ /legs par sad pas sad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig

342a6(mdo sde): ngan 'das la yid dga' ba/ /gau ta ma yi nyan thos de/ /legs par sad pas sad par 'gyur/ /dran pa'i tshoms te bco lnga pa'o// //bdag gi bya ba
342a7(mdo sde): bya ba'i dus g.yo bas/ /dang po kho nar bya ba'i mel tshe gyis/ /bdag gis dang po de ltar byas na ni/ /bya ba bya ba'i dus lta zas 'dod cing / /ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin 'byor
342b1(mdo sde): 'gyur bar/ /de yi rang bzhin nga yis mthong bas na/ /ji srid don ni phun sum tshogs 'gyur ba/ /de srid bar du mi yis bsgrim par gyis/ /bsgrim zhing brtson par bya ba yis/ /
342b2(mdo sde): bdag nyid gling du 'gyur bar bya/ /mgar ba yis ni dngul bzhin du/ /rang gi dri ma sbyang bar gyis/ /dri ma sbyangs ba skyon mi 'byung / /phyi nas skye dang rga mi 'thob/ /ngo tsha min la ngo
342b3(mdo sde): tsha zhing / /ngo tsha ba la ngo mi tsha/ /mi 'jigs pa la 'jigs lta dang / /'jigs la mi 'jigs lta ba yi/ /log par lta ba blangs pa yis/ /sems can ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/

343a1(mdo sde): pa'i las byas pa/ /dge bas 'gebs par byed pa de/ /'jig rten 'di na sred pa las/ /dran pas legs par 'da' bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig
343a2(mdo sde): gson la mi dga' ba/ /de ni shi na'ang mya ngan med/ /brtan pa go 'phang mthong ba de/ /mya ngan dbus na'ang gdung mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig gson la mi dga' ba/ /de ni shi na

343a4(mdo sde): khyim med song nas su/ /spyod yul dben pa gang yin pa/ /de la mngon par dga' bslab cing / /'dod pa ci yang med par spongs/ /rtag tu snying po dag pa dang / /rtag tu gso
343a5(mdo sde): sbyong dag pa dang / /gtsang ma'i las ni dag pa de'i/ /brtul zhugs phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /zhing gi skyon ni rtswa yin ltar/ /skye dgu 'di la 'dod chags skyon/ /
343a6(mdo sde): de bas 'dod chags bral rnam la/ /byin na 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/ /zhing gi skyon ni rtswa yin ltar/ /skye dgu 'di la zhe sdang skyon/ /de bas zhe sdang bral rnams la/ /byin na
343a7(mdo sde): 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/ /zhing gi skyon ni rtswa yin ltar/ /skye dgu 'di la gti mug skyon/ /de bas gti mug bral rnams la/ /byin na 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/ /zhing gi
343b1(mdo sde): skyon ni rtswa yin ltar/ /skye dgu 'di la nga rgyal skyon/ /de bas nga rgyal bral rnams la/ /byin na 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/ /zhing gi skyon ni rtswa yin ltar/ /skye dgu 'di la chags pa skyon/ /de bas

343b3(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /drug pa bdag po rgyal po ste/ /chags par gyur na chags can yin/ /ma chags gyur na ma chags yin/ /chags pa byis pa zhes brjod do/ /'dod chags zhe sdang nga rgyal
343b4(mdo sde): dang / /'chab pa gang du gnas pa yi/ /grong khyer rus pa'i ra ba can/ /sha dang khrag gis zhal zhal byas/ /rgyu yis kun nas bslang ba las byung sdug bsngal can/ /de ma mthong
343b5(mdo sde): na der ni de dag 'ching 'gyur zhing / /de dag rtogs na chu bo rnams ni rab tu spong / /phyi rol pa la chags pa de dag spong pa med/ /sil bu'i tshoms te bcu drug pa'o// //de dag khyim la mi dga' bar/ /dran dang ldan pa 'bad pa yis/ /dang pas mtsho ngan spong ba ltar/ /de dag khyim spangs chu bo brgal/ /brtan pa 'jig rten nges byung nas/ /bdud
343b6(mdo sde): kyi sde rnams rab bcom ste/ /nyi ma'i lam nas ngang pa ltar/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la 'gro/ tshangs par spyod pa ma spyad cing / /gzhon nur nor ni ma rnyed pa/ /mtsho ngan nya

344a2(mdo sde): zhing / /lus bskums nas ni nyal bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa chung byas bdag nyid kyi/ /phyi bzhin mi 'ong ma sems shig/ chu yi thigs pa lhung ba yis/ /bum chen gang ba ji bzhin
344a3(mdo sde): du| / cung zad cung zad bsags pa yi/ /sdig pas byis pa gang bar 'gyur/ /dge ba chung byas bdag nyid kyi/ /phyi bzhin mi 'ong ma sems shig /chu yi thigs pa lhung ba yis
344a4(mdo sde): bum chen gang ba ji bzhin du/ /cung zad cung zad bsags pa yi/ /dge bas brtan pa gang bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig rags brtsigs mtsho ngan spangs/ /rgya mtsho'i chu bo rgal 'dod
344a5(mdo sde): pa| |skye bos gzings ni bcas nas kyang / /skye bo mkhas pa rgal bar byed/ /brgal nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /bram ze skam sar gnas par mdzod/ /de la dge
344a6(mdo sde): slong khrus byed cing / /nyan thos rnams kyis gzings kyang bcas/ /ji ltar mtsho chen zab mo dag/ rab tu man ma dang rnyog med ltar/ /de bzhin mkhas pa rab dang bas/ /'di
344a7(mdo sde): ni chos ni nyan par byed/ /'di ltar kun na chu yod pas/ /su zhig tshol zhing rgyu byed de/ /khron pa'i chu lta ci zhig dgos/ /sred pa rtsa nas bcad par gyis/ /btso blag mkhan
344b1(mdo sde): dag chus 'khru zhing / /mda' mkhan mes ni spong ba dang / /shing mkhan shing la 'jog sbyong ltar/ /mkhas pas bdag nyid gdul bar bya/ /nam mkha' lta bur chags med cing /
344b2(mdo sde): sgo them lta bur g.yo ba med/ /rnyog pa can gyi mtsho lta bur/ /mkhas pa 'khor ba la mi dga'/ /chu'i tshoms te bcu bdun pa'o// //lhar bcas gshin rje'i
344b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di/ /sa steng las rgyal gang zhing lags/ /me tog lta bur rab 'dod pa'i/ /chos bzhi legs par ston mkhas gang / /lhar bcas gshin rje'i 'jig rten 'di/ /sa
344b4(mdo sde): steng las rgyal slob pa yi/ /me tog lta bur rab 'dod pa'i/ /chos bzhi legs par ston mkhas de/ /nags tshal las ni 'jigs skyes phyir/ /nags tshal gcad kyi shing ma
344b5(mdo sde): yin/ /nags dang nags sbyor chod cig dang / /dge sbyong mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /gal te nags sbyor ma bcad na/ /phra rab kyis kyang mi rnams skye/ /ma drung nu zho 'dod be'u
344b6(mdo sde): ltar/ /de yis yid ni rab tu 'ching / /lag pas ston ga'i pad+ma ltar/ /bdag la dga' ba bcad nas su/ /rgyal gsungs mya ngan 'das pa'i phyir/ /zhi ba'i lam nyid bskyed
344b7(mdo sde): par gyis/ /ji ltar me tog yid 'ong ba/ /kha dog bzang yang dri med ltar/ /de bzhin legs pa gsungs pa'i tshig/ /'bras bu med par ma byed cig/ ji ltar bung ba me to
345a1(mdo sde): gi| kha dog dri la mi gnod par/ /khu ba bzhibs nas 'phur ba ltar/ /de bzhin thub pa grong du rgyu/ /gzhan gyi skyon la mi brtag cing / /gzhan gyi byas
345a2(mdo sde): dang ma byas min/ /bdag nyid kyis ni rigs pa dang / /mi rigs pa la brtag par bya/ /ji ltar phyag dar phung po dag/ mi gtsang chu ni med 'di las/ /pad+ma kha bye gtsang ba
345a3(mdo sde): dang / /dri zhim yid 'ong rab skyes ltar/ /de bzhin so so skye bo dag/ ldongs gyur phyag dar phung 'di las/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dag/ shes rab kyis ni gsal
345a4(mdo sde): ba 'byung / /ji ltar me tog phung po las/ /me tog phreng rgyud mang byed ltar/ /de bzhin mir ni skyes pa yi/ /dge ba phal chen rnams kyang bya/ /ji ltar dbyar kha ba ku la'i/ /
345a5(mdo sde): me tog rab tu rnam 'brul ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong 'dod chags dang / /zhe sdang gti mug spang bar gyis/ /mi yi yid la rnam chags dang / /me tog bzhin du rab bsags
345a6(mdo sde): pa| |'chi bdag gis ni blangs nas 'gro/ /nyal 'gro chu bos bcas pa bzhin/ /mi yi yid la rnam chags dag/ me tog bzhin du rab bsags pa/ /'dod pa rnams kyis
345a7(mdo sde): mi ngoms shing / /'chi bdag gis ni dbang du byed/ /mi yi yid la rnam chags dag/ me tog bzhin du rab bsags pa/ /longs spyod skye bar mi 'gyur zhing / /'chi bdag
345b1(mdo sde): gis ni dbang du byed/ /mi yi yid la rnam chags dag /me tog bzhin du rab bsags pa/ /bya ba mthar ni ma phyin bar/ /'chi bdag gis ni dbang du byed/ /lus 'di bung ba 'dra
345b2(mdo sde): bar rtogs byas shing / /de bzhin chos rnams smig rgyu 'drar shes nas/ /bdud kyi me tog mchog ni 'dir gcod pa/ /'chi bdag rgyal pos bltar yang med par 'gro /
345b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di dag bung ba 'drar rtogs shing / /de bzhin chos rnams smig rgyu 'drar shes nas/ /bdud kyi me tog mchog ni 'dir gcod pa/ /'chi bdag rgyal pos
345b4(mdo sde): bltar yang med par 'gro/ lus 'di dbu ba 'dra bar rtogs byas shing / /de bzhin chos rnams smig rgyu 'drar shes nas/ /bdud kyi me tog mchog ni 'dir gcod pa/ /
345b5(mdo sde): 'chi bdag rgyal pos bltar yang med par 'gro/ 'jig rten 'di dag dbu ba 'drar rtogs shing / /de bzhin chos rnams smig rgyu 'drar shes nas/ bdud kyi me tog
345b6(mdo sde): mchog ni 'dir gcod pa/ /'chi bdag rgyal pos bltar yang med par 'gro/ srid pa u du ma bA ra'i me tog ltar/ /snying po med par sems pa'i dge slong gang / /de ni pha
345b7(mdo sde): rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sprul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /chu skyes rtsa ba'i me tog chu gnas lta'i/ /'dod chags ma lus gcod byed dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol
346a1(mdo sde): min pa'i pha rol po| |slong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /chu skyes rtsa ba'i me tog chu gnas lta'i/ /zhe sdang ma lus gcod byed dge slong gang
346a2(mdo sde): de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /chu skyes rtsa ba'i me tog chu gnas lta'i/ /gti mug ma lus gcod byed dge slong gang / /de ni pha
346a3(mdo sde): rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /chu skyes rtsa ba'i me tog chu gnas lta'i/ /nga rgyal ma lus gcod byed dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol
346a4(mdo sde): min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sprul rgas pags rnying rjes bzhin/ /chu skyes rtsa ba'i me tog chu gnas lta'i/ /chags pa ma lus gcod byed dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min
346a5(mdo sde): pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /chu skyes rtsa ba'i me tog chu gnas lta'i/ /sred pa ma lus gcod byed dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha
346a6(mdo sde): rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /me tog gi tshoms te bco brgyad pa'o// //ji ltar rta bzang lcag gis gzhus pa na/ /skrag cing shugs
346a7(mdo sde): drag 'gro byed ji bzhin du/ /dad pa tshul khrims ting 'dzin ldan pa dang / /chos rnams rnam par gtan la 'bebs ldan zhing / /dbang po mnyam gzhag bzod ldan 'grogs
346b1(mdo sde): bde ba/ /skyob pa de rnams sred pa ma lus spong / /ji ltar rta bzang lcag gis gzhus pa na/ /skrag cing shugs drag 'gro byed ji bzhin du/ /dad pa tshul khrims ting 'dzin ldan pa dang / /chos
346b2(mdo sde): rnams rnam par gtan la 'bebs ldan zhing / /rig dang rkang par ldan zhing dran ldan pa'i/ /skyob rnams sdug bsngal ma lus spong bar mdzad/ /'dul sbyod byed pas legs brtul rta lta
346b3(mdo sde): bur/ /gang zhig dbang po legs par sdom pa yis/ /khro ba spong zhing zag pa zad byed pa/ /thub de rnams kyis lha yi bar du myong / /bag yod pa yis bag med dang / /mi nyal mang pos
346b4(mdo sde): gnyid log dang / /rta bzang gis ni rta rgod ltar/ /shin tu mkhas pas spangs nas 'gro/ /rta bzang la ni lcag bzhin du/ /gang zhig ngo tsha shes sten cing / /shes rab legs par
346b5(mdo sde): mnyam bzhag pa/ /des ni sdig pa sel bar byed/ /dul ba 'dun sar 'gro byed cing / /dul ba rgyal po lhag par zhon/ /gang zhig tshig nang bzod byed pa/ /dul ba mi yi nang na mchog/
346b6(mdo sde): glang po'i nang na glang chen dang / /sin du'i cang shes rta dang ni/ /dre'u 'dul byed pa gang yin pa/ /de bas bdag nyid 'dul ba mchog/ bdag nyid legs 'dul gang yin pa'i/ /
346b7(mdo sde): mkhas des zhi ba thob 'gyur gyi/ /bzhon pa de dag rnams kyis ni/ /sa de mngon par 'thob mi srid/ /glang po'i nang na glang chen dang / /sin du'i cang shes rta dang ni/ /dre'u 'dul
347a1(mdo sde): byed pa gang yin pa/ /de bas bdag nyid 'dul ba mchog/ bdag nyid legs 'dul dran ldan gang / /des ni sdug bsngal mthar phyin gyi/ /bzhon pa de
347a2(mdo sde): dag rnams kyis ni/ /sa de mngon par 'thob mi srid/ /glang po'i nang na glang chen dang / /sin du'i cang shes rta dang ni/ /dre'u 'dul byed pa gang yin pa/ /de bas bdag nyid 'dul
347a3(mdo sde): ba mchog/ bdag nyid legs 'dul dran ldan gang / /des ni 'gro rnams spong 'gyur gyi/ /bzhon pa de dag rnams kyis ni/ /sa de mngon par 'thob mi srid/ /glang po'i nang ni
347a4(mdo sde): glang chen dang / /sin du'i cang shes rta dang ni/ /dre'u 'dul byed pa gang yin pa/ /de bas bdag nyid 'dul ba mchog/ bdag nyid legs 'dul gang yin des/ /'ching ba
347a5(mdo sde): bcad nas 'gro 'gyur gyi/ /bzhon pa de dag rnams kyis ni/ /sa de mngon par 'thob mi srid/ /'dul sbyong byed pas rta bzang ltar/ /bdag nyid kho na gdul bar bya/ /bdag
347a6(mdo sde): med legs par 'dul ba yis/ /sdug bsngal rnams kyi pha mthar phyin/ /bdag nyid kho na bdag gi mgon/ /bdag nyid bdag gi skyabs yin pas/ /'dul spyod byed pas
347a7(mdo sde): rta bzang ltar/ /de bas bdag nyid gdul bar bya/ /rta yi tshoms te bcu dgu pa'o// //khro ba spangs shing nga rgyal rnams spangs na/ /kun sbyor kun las shin
347b1(mdo sde): tu 'da' 'gyur zhing / /ming dang gzugs la chags pa med de dag/ ci yang med par chags pa'i rjes mi ltung / /skyes ma thag tu khro ba spongs/ /skyes nas 'dod chags spang bar gyis/ /
347b2(mdo sde): brtan pas ma rig rab tu spang / /bden pa mthong na bde bar 'gyur/ /khro ba spangs na bde bar nyal/ /khro ba spangs na gdung mi 'gyur/ /dge slong khro ba bde 'joms pa'i/ /dug gi rtsa
347b3(mdo sde): ba chom zhig dang / /'phags pa rnams kyis bsngags 'gyur zhing / /de bcom pa yis mya ngan med/ /gang khros bdag gis legs byas kyi/ /ma legs min zhes rab smra ba/ /de ni khro
347b4(mdo sde): ba zhi 'og tu/ /me yis bsregs bzhin gdung bar 'gyur/ /ngo tsha med cing khrel med pa/ /khro ba can la brtul zhugs med/ /khro bas mngon par zil non pa/ /de la su yang rten mi
347b5(mdo sde): byed/ /gang zhig byis pa'i mthu stobs can/ /de yi stobs ni stobs med yin/ /byis pa chos dang bral ba la/ /bsgrub par bya ba yod re skan/ /gang zhig stobs dang ldan gyur kyang //
347b6(mdo sde): stobs chung rnams kyi bzod byed pa/ /de ni bzod pa'i mchog ces gsungs/ /nyam chung ba lta rtag tu sgur/ /gang zhig gzhan gyi dpon gyur kyang / /stobs chung rnams kyi bzod
347b7(mdo sde): byed pa/ /de ni bzod pa'i mchog ces gsungs/ /nyam chung ba lta rtag tu sgur/ /gzhan gyis lhag par brgyad bkag kyang / /stobs ldan gang zhig bzod byed pa/ /de ni bzod
348a1(mdo sde): pa'i mchog ces gsungs/ /nyam chung ba lta rtag tu skur/ /gzhan gyis lhag par smad byas kyang / /stobs ldan gang zhig bzod byed pa/ /de ni bzod pa'i
348a2(mdo sde): mchog ces gsungs/ /nyam chung ba lta rtag tu sgur/ /gang zhig pha rol khros rig nas/ /bdag nyid nye bar zhi byed pa/ /de ni bdag dang gzhan dag gi/ 'jigs chen dag las
348a3(mdo sde): skyob pa yin/ /gang zhig pha rol khros rig nas/ /bdag nyid nye bar zhi byed pa/ /de ni bdag dang gzhan dag gi /gnyis ka'i don ni spyod pa yin/ /bdag nyid dang ni gzhan
348a4(mdo sde): dag dang / /gnyis ka'i don ni spyod de la/ /skye bo chos la mi mkhas rnams/ /byis pa yin zhes sems kyang sla/ /gtso ba'i tshig ni 'jigs phyir bzod byed dang / /'thab zla'i
348a5(mdo sde): tshig ni 'thab gcugs rgyu bzod pas/ /gang zhig dman pa'i tshig la bzod byed de/ /bzod pa'i mchog ces dam pas rab tu gsungs/ /byis pa khros nas tshig rtsub dag/
348a6(mdo sde): smras na rgyal bar 'gyur snyam sems/ /gang zhig tshig dag bzod byed pa/ /de ni rtag tu rgyal ba yin/ /bden par smra bya khro mi bya/ /slong la chung yang sbyin par bya/ /rnam
348a7(mdo sde): pa 'di gsum gnas kyis ni/ /lha yi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /khro ba'i zil gyis non pa'i mis/ /rang gi don kyang mi rtogs pas/ /'khor gyi nang du bag skyong la/ /
348b1(mdo sde): khro ba med pa'i tshig smros shing / /gang zhig khros la slar khro ba/ /de ni sdig pa can 'gyur bas/ /khros la slar ni ma khro dang / /thub bar dka' ba'i g.yul las rgyal/ /khro ba med pas
348b2(mdo sde): khro ba thub/ /legs pas legs pa ma yin thub/ /sbyin pa yis ni 'jungs pa thub/ /bden pas bden pa ma yin thub/ /dul zhing rigs pas 'tsho ba dang / /khro ba med pa gal
348b3(mdo sde): khro/ /yang dag shes pas rnam grol ba'i/ /mkhas pa rnams la khro ba med/ /khro ba med la 'tshe med la/ /'phags pa'i skye bos rtag bsten kyang / /skye bo sdig can khro ba dang / /ri
348b4(mdo sde): bo bzhin du sgur bar byed/ /gang zhig khro ba byung ba dang / /shing rta 'khyams las 'dzin byed de/ /'dul sbyong mkhan du ngas gsungs kyi/ /zhogs 'dogs skye bo phal pa yin/ /khro
348b5(mdo sde): ba'i tshoms te nyi shu pa'o/ / //sdom la/ dge sbyong lam dang bkur sti dang / /'khu dang lnga pa dran pa ste/ /sil bu chu dang me tog dang / /rta dang khro ba
348b6(mdo sde): bcu pa'o/ / //'jig rten 'di na kun rig kun zil gnon/ /'di ni chos rnams kun gyis ma gos shing / /kun spangs sred zad rab tu rnam grol ba/ /
348b7(mdo sde): nyid kyis mngon mkhyen pa la su yid bstan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha mi'i ston pa ste/ /stobs rnams kun ldan thams cad mkhyen pa nga / /byang chub brnyes nas nyid kyis
349a1(mdo sde): rab ston pa/ /mtshungs med mnyam med nga la su yis bstan/ /nga ni 'jig rten dgra bcom ste/ /'jig rten dag na bla med dang / /lha dang bcas pa'i
349a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten na/ /bdud rnams zil gnon rgyal ba nga / /nga dang 'dra ba med pas na/ /nga la slob dpon su yang med/ /'jig rten 'di ni gcig pu yis/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla
349a3(mdo sde): med brnyes/ /gang zhig zag pa zad brnyes pa/ /rgyal ba nga 'drar shes par gyis/ /sdig pa'i chos las nga rgyal bas/ /de bas nye 'gro nga rgyal ba/ /'jig rten yul sred brgal ba
349a4(mdo sde): yi| |kun mkhyen sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das/ /'jig rten pa la ma bstan par/ /kun nas 'byung ba mi shes pas/ /wA ra NA sir song nas su/ /ngas ni chos kyis rnga brdung zhing / /'jig
349a5(mdo sde): rten sus kyang ma bskor ba'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya/ /dpa' bo de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /'di na chos kyis 'dul bar mdzad/ /de dag chos kyis btul ba la/ /
349a6(mdo sde): mkhas pa su yang smod mi byed/ /brtan gang ting 'dzin la zhugs shing / /nges 'byung zhi la dga' ba dang / /sku yi tha ma 'dzin pa yi/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa/ /shes
349a7(mdo sde): rab myur ba de dag la/ /lha dang mi rnams dga' bar byed/ /gang dag 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /gang dag ma byon sangs rgyas dang / /gang dag da ltar rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /mang
349b1(mdo sde): po'i mya ngan sel mdzad pa/ /bzhugs par gyur cing bzhugs pa dang / /de bzhin bzhugs par 'gyur kun gyis/ /dam chos bla ma mdzad pa 'di/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid yin/ /
349b2(mdo sde): de bas 'di na bdag dga' zhing / /bdag nyid chen po mngon 'dod pas/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa dran byas te/ /dam pa'i chos la bla mar bya/ /mi gang sangs rgyas bstan pa la/ /dad pa
349b3(mdo sde): ma skyes byis pa de/ /rgud pa'i gnas su 'gro 'gyur te/ /srin mo rnams kyis tshong pa bzhin/ /mi gang sangs rgyas bstan pa la/ /dad pa bskyed pa shes rab can/ /de ni bde bar pha
349b4(mdo sde): rol 'gro/ /sprin shugs ldan pas tshong pa bzhin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam med mtshungs pa med/ /bde bar rnam rtog de bzhin rab dben pa'i/ /rnam rtog gnyis po spyod
349b5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /mun bsal pha rol gshegs shing grags dang ldan/ /des ni brnyes bya ba rnyes shing yid dbang gyur/ /kun grol zag zad rab tu rnam par grol/ /rnam
349b6(mdo sde): grol thugs ldan tha ba zag med rnams/ /lus can 'jig rten rnams la phan phyir gzigs/ /'ga' zhig ri bo'i spo la 'dug nas su/ /'gro ba rnams la kun tu lta ba ltar/ /de
349b7(mdo sde): bzhin blo bzang mya ngan bral ba dag/ chos las byung ba'i khang bzang steng gshegs nas/ /skye bo skye rgas zil gnon mya ngan gyis/ /gdungs pa rnams la kun tu spyan gzigs
350a1(mdo sde): nas/ /'chi ba med pa'i sgo mo 'byed mdzad kyi/ /gang dag nyan 'dod the tshom bsal bar gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshoms te nyi shu gcig
350a2(mdo sde): pa'o|| ||legs par thos dang legs spyod dang / /khyim nas legs par byung ba dang / /spong bar byed pas rab bskor cing / /dge sbyong gi ni rjes mthun
350a3(mdo sde): legs/ /byis pa mi mkhas pa dag ni/ /'chi ba med pa lta bur spyod/ /mkhas pa dam pa'i chos dag la/ /mtshan mo'i nad pa bzhin du byed/ /ji ltar khyim ni legs g.yogs
350a4(mdo sde): pa| |mun pas khebs pa'i nang zhugs na/ /gzugs rnams yod par gyur kyang ni/ /mig ldan bzhin du mi mthong ba/ /de bzhin 'di na rigs skyes pa'i/ /mi ni blo gros
350a5(mdo sde): ldan gyur kyang / /sdig pa dang ni dge ba'i chos/ /ma thos bar du shes mi 'gyur/ /mig ldan mar me yod pa yis/ /gzugs rnams mthong ba ji lta bar/ /de bzhin dge
350a6(mdo sde): dang sdig pa'i chos/ /thos pas rnam par shes par 'gyur/ /thos pas chos rnams rnam par shes/ /thos pas sdig las ldog par 'gyur/ /thos pas don med spong bar
350a7(mdo sde): byed| |thos pas mya ngan 'das pa 'thob/ /gal te thos pa mang gyur kyang / /tshul khrims legs par mi sdom na/ /de ni tshul khrims phyir smad cing / /de yi thos pa phun
350b1(mdo sde): sum min/ /gal te thos pa nyung gyur kyang / /tshul khrims legs par sdom byed na/ /de ni tshul khrims phyir bsngags shing / /de yi thos pa phun sum 'gyur/ /gang zhig thos pa nyung ba
350b2(mdo sde): dang / /tshul khrims legs par mi sdom pa/ /de ni gnyis ka'i phyir smad cing / /de yi brtul zhugs phun sum min/ /gang zhig mang du thos pa dang / /tshul khrims legs par sdom
350b3(mdo sde): byed pa/ /de ni gnyis ka'i phyir bsngags shing / /de yis brtul zhugs phun sum 'gyur/ /thos pa mang zhing chos 'dzin dang / /shes rab ldan zhing mnyam gzhag pa/ /de dag sus
350b4(mdo sde): kyang smad 'os min/ /dzam+bu'i gling gi gser rgyan bzhin/ /gang zhig gzugs kyis rjes dpog cing / /nga la sgra yis 'jal byed pa/ /'dun pa'i 'dod chags ldan pa yi/ /skye bo de
350b5(mdo sde): yis nga mi shes/ /gal te nang ni rnam shes shing / /phyi rol mthong bar ma 'gyur na/ /nang gi 'bras bu mthong ba gang / /de ni sgra yis drang du rung / /gal te phyi rol mthong gyur cing / /
350b6(mdo sde): nang ni shes par ma gyur na/ /phyi rol 'bras bu mthong ba gang / /de ni sgra yis drang du rung / /gal te nang yang mi shes shing / /phyi rol mthong bar ma gyur na/ /byis pa kun nas bsgribs
350b7(mdo sde): pa dag/ de ni sgra yis drang du rung / /gal te nang ni rnam shes shing / /phyi rol dag kyang mthong gyur pa/ /bstan pa nges 'byung shes rab can/ /de ni sgra yis drang du rung / /rna bas
351a1(mdo sde): phal cher thos pa dang / /mig gis mang po mthong na yang / /bstan pa mthong thos de kun gyis/ /yid ches bya ba'i mi rigs so/ /legs gsungs
351a2(mdo sde): thos pa snying por shes pa dang / /ting nge 'dzin dag snying por shes gyur kyang / /gang zhig bag med rlang por byed pa de'i/ /thos dang shes pa don chen mi 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig
351a3(mdo sde): 'phags pas bstan pa'i chos 'ga' zhing / /de bzhin lus dang ngag gis spyod byed pa/ /de dag bzod ldan 'grogs dga' dbang po bsdams/ /thos dang shes pa'i pha rol
351a4(mdo sde): phyin pa 'thob/ /thos pa'i tshoms te nyi shu gnyis pa'o// //legs par gsungs la bslab bya zhing / /dge sbyong la ni bsnyen bkur dang / dpen pa dang ni
351a5(mdo sde): stan gcig dang / /sems ni nye bar zhi bar bya/ /stan gcig mal stan gcig pa dang / /gcig pu snyom las med spyod cing / /gcig pu nags tshal gnas pa dang / /gcig pus
351a6(mdo sde): bdag nyid gdul bar bya/ /gang zhig stong phrag stong dag gi /mi yi g.yul las rgyal ba bas/ /gang zhig bdag las rgyal byed pa/ /de ni mi yi g.yul las rgyal/ /rtag tu
351a7(mdo sde): sdom pa spyod pa yi/ /mi yis bdag brtul gcig pu yis/ /bdag nyid las rgyal mchog yin gyi/ /skye dgu gzhan lta phal par zad/ /shes rab kyis gnas dge slong gis//
351b1(mdo sde): rgyal bar byas la bdud dang ni/ /tshangs par bcas pas lam mi nus/ /lha yis ma yin dri zas min/ /bdag nyid dang por rigs par gnas byas nas/ /phyi nas gzhan dag bdag bzhin
351b2(mdo sde): gdul bar bya/ /bdag nyid dang por rigs par gnas byas na/ /phyi dus 'dul tshe mkhas pa nyon mi mongs/ /bdag la ji ltar byas pa bzhin/ /gzhan dag la yang de ltar bya/ /bdag
351b3(mdo sde): nyid dul zhing zhi ba yis/ /gzhan dag bde bar gdul bar bya/ /bdag la ji ltar byas pa bzhin/ /gzhan dag la yang de ltar bya/ /kye ma bdag dang legs dul ba/ /bdag nyid dul
351b4(mdo sde): bas dga' bar 'gyur/ /bdag gi don phyir gzhan don ni/ /mang po dag kyang gtang bar bya/ /bdag don ched cher shes gyur na/ /rang gi don gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bdag
351b5(mdo sde): gis mgon yin gyi/ /gzhan lta su zhig mgon du 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bdag gi mgon gyur pa'i/ /mkhas pas don rnams 'thob par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bdag gi mgon
351b6(mdo sde): yin gyi| |gzhan lta su zhig mgon du 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bdag gi mgon gyur pa'i/ /mkhas pas chos rnams 'thob par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/ /gzhan
351b7(mdo sde): lta su zhig mgon du 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bdag gi mgon gyur pa'i/ /mkhas pas grags pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/ /gzhan lta su zhig mgon
352a1(mdo sde): du 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bdag gi mgon gyur pa'i/ /mkhas pas bde ba 'thob par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/ /gzhan lta su zhig
352a2(mdo sde): mgon du 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bdag gi mgon gyur pa'i/ /mkhas pas bde 'gro thob par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/ /gzhan lta su zhig mgon du
352a3(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bdag gi mgon gyur pas/ /yun ring mtho ris dga' bar 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/ /gzhan lta su zhig mgon du 'gyur/ /bdag
352a4(mdo sde): nyid bdag gi mgon gyur pa/ /gnyen gyi nang na lam mer 'bar/ /bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/ /gzhan lta su zhig mgon du gyur/ /bdag nyid bdag gi mgon
352a5(mdo sde): gyur pa/ /mya ngan nang na gdung mi 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/ /gzhan lta su zhig mgon du 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bdag gi mgon gyur pas/ /'ching ba
352a6(mdo sde): thams cad gcod par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/ /gzhan lta su zhig mgon du 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bdag gi mgon gyur pas/ /ngan 'gro thams cad
352a7(mdo sde): spong bar 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/ /gzhan lta su zhig mgon du 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bdag gi mgon gyur pas/ /sdug bsngal kun las rab tu thar/ /
352b1(mdo sde): bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/ /gzhan lta su zhig mgon du 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bdag gi mgon gyur pas/ /bdag nyid mgon du 'gyur ba 'thob/ /bdag nyid bdag gi
352b2(mdo sde): mgon yin gyi/ /gzhan lta su zhig mgon du 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi/ /mya ngan 'das nyid nye bar 'gyur/ /bdag gi tshoms te nyi shu gsum pa'o// //gang dag don dang mi ldan tshig /tshigs bcad brgya dag smra ba bas/ /gang dag nye bar zhi 'gyur ba'i/ /don ldan tshig gcig thos pa rung / /gang dag chos dang mi ldan tshig/ tshigs
352b3(mdo sde): bcad brgya dag smra ba bas/ /gang dag nye bar zhi 'gyur ba'i/ /chos ldan tshig gcig thos pa rung / /tshul 'chal mnyam par ma bzhag pa/ /lo brgyar gson pa gang yin pas/ /
352b4(mdo sde): tshul khrims ldan zhing mnyam bzhag pa/ /nyin zhag 'ga' zhig gson pa rung / /brtson med le lo ldan pa dag/ lo brgyar gson pa gang yin pas/ /brtson 'grus brtan pa
352b5(mdo sde): brtsams pa dag/ nyin zhag 'ga' zhig gson pa rung / /shes 'chal mnyam par ma bzhag pa/ /lo brgyar gson pa gang yin pas/ /shes rab chen po mnyam bzhag pa/ /
352b6(mdo sde): nyin zhag 'ga' zhig gson pa rung / /skye dang 'jig pa ma mthong ba/ /lo brgyar gson pa gang yin pas/ /skye dang 'jig pa mthong ba dag/ nyin zhag 'ga' zhig gson pa
353a1(mdo sde): rung / /tshor ba zad pa ma mthong ba/ /lo brgyar gson pa gang yin pas/ /tshor ba zad pa mthong ba dag /nyin zhag 'ga' zhig gson pa rung / /zag pa zad
353a2(mdo sde): pa ma mthong ba/ /lo brgyar gson pa gang yin pas/ /zag pa zad pa mthong ba dag /nyin zhag 'ga' zhig gson pa rung / /go 'phang mi g.yo ma mthong ba/ /lo brgyar

353b3(mdo sde): bsgom la yud tsam zhig / mchod pa byed pa gang yin pa/ /mchod byed de nyid ches rung gi /lo brgyar sbyin sreg byed mi rung / /zla ba re re ku sha'i rtses/ /kha zas za ba gang yin
353b4(mdo sde): des| |sangs rgyas la ni dad pa yi/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /zla ba re re ku sha'i rtses/ /kha zas za ba gang yin des/ /dam pa'i chos la dad pa yi/ /bcu drug char yang mi
353b5(mdo sde): phod do| |zla ba re re kun sha'i rtses/ /kha zas za ba gang yin des/ /dge 'dun la ni dad pa yi/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /zla ba re re kun sha'i rtses/ /kha zas za ba gang yin

353b7(mdo sde): drug char yang mi phod do/ /zla ba re re ku sha'i rtses/ /kha zas za ba gang yin des/ /'byung po rnams la snying brtse ba'i/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /zla ba re rer ku sha'i rtses//
354a1(mdo sde): kha zas za ba gang yin des/ /byams pa sems par byed pa yi/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /zla ba re rer ku sha'i rtses/ /kha zas za ba gang yin des//

354b2(mdo sde): des| |gang zhig drang po'i sems kyis phyag 'tshal ba/ /de yi bzhi char yang ni mi phod do/ /bsgre ba'i tshoms te nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //ched du brjod pa'i tshoms/
354b3(mdo sde): bam po gsum pa/ dad pa med cing 'jungs pa dang / /dbyen byed phra ma can dag dang / /mkhas pas shes par mi bya zhing / /sdig can mi dang 'grogs mi bya/ /dad ldan snyan par smra
354b4(mdo sde): ba dang / /thos mang tshul khrims ldan pa dang / /mkhas pa yis ni mdza' bya zhing / /mi mchog dag dang 'grogs par bya/ /sdig pa'i grogs po mi bsten cing / /skyes bu ngan pa

354b6(mdo sde): mang gnas mang sems pa dang / /dad dang shes rab ldan de mi yis bsten/ /'dir ni de yis legs smras mnyan byas na/ /ring po nas kyang khyad par thob par 'gyur/ /dman pa
354b7(mdo sde): bsten pas mi dag nyams 'gyur zhing / /thad kar bab pa bsten pas so na gnas/ /gtso bo bsten pas dam pa 'thob 'gyur bas/ /de phyir bdag pas gtsor gyur bsten par
355a1(mdo sde): bya| |tshul khrims nye bar zhi ba dang / /shes rab ches mchog ldan pa yi/ /gtso bo gang yin de bsten na/ /gtso bo pas kyang ches gtsor 'gyur/ /mi yis
355a2(mdo sde): 'di na nye rul la/ /ku sha'i gtsang byed bcings pa gang / /ku sha nyid kyang rul 'gyur ba/ /sdig pa bsten pa'ang de bzhin 'gyur/ /mi yis rgya spos pa la sha'i/ /lo mar phur
355a3(mdo sde): ma byas pa gang / /lo ma nyid kyang dri zhim pa/ /dam pa bsten pa'ang de bzhin 'gyur/ /gal te sdig pa byed pa dag /sdig mi byed pas bsten na yang / /sdig pa byed par dogs
355a4(mdo sde): skye zhing / /mi snyan pa yang 'phel bar 'gyur/ /bsten bya ma yin bsten pa'i mi/ /de yi skyon gyis skyon can 'gyur/ /dong par dug bskus mda' bcug pas/ /dug ma skus

355a6(mdo sde): de ni ci 'dra bar/ /ring po mi thogs de 'drar 'gyur/ /de bas 'bras bu'i snod bzhin du/ /bdag gis bsten pa shes pa yis/ /dam pa ma yin mi bsten cing / /mkhas pas
355a7(mdo sde): dam pa bsten byas la/ /dge slong de'i lam rjes 'brang na/ /sdug bsngal zad pa thob par 'gyur/ /byis pas ji srid gson par du/ /gal te mkhas pa bsten byas kyang / /
355b1(mdo sde): de yis chos shes mi 'gyur te/ /gzar bus tshod ma'i ro bzhin no/ /shes rab ldan pas yud tsam zhig /mkhas pa nye bar bsten pas kyang / /de yis chos rnams shes 'gyur te/ /
355b2(mdo sde): lce yis tshod ma'i ro bzhin no/ /byis pas ji srid gson par du/ /gal te mkhas pa bsten byas na/ /de la mig ni med pa'i phyir/ /chos rnams shes par mi 'gyur ro/ /shes
355b3(mdo sde): rab ldan pas yud tsam zhig / mkhas pa nye bar bsten pas kyang / /de la mig ni yod pa'i phyir/ /chos rnams rab tu shes par 'gyur/ /byis pas ji srid gson par du/ /gal te
355b4(mdo sde): mkhas pa bsten byas kyang / /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa yi/ /chos rnams de yis shes mi 'gyur/ /shes rab ldan pas yud tsam zhig /mkhas pa nye bar bsten pas

355b6(mdo sde): gsung gis kyang / /byis pa'i bya ba byed mi 'gyur/ /blo dang ldan pa tshig gcig gis/ /tshig brgya dag ni shes par 'gyur/ /byis pa la ni tshig stong gis/ /tshig gcig shes
355b7(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ro/ /gnyis na mkhas dang mi mdza' sla'i/ /byis pa rnams dang mdza' mi rung / /byis pa rnams dang mdza' byed pa/ /sems can dmyal bar khrid par byed/ /
356a1(mdo sde): byis pa gang zhig byis pa'o zhes/ /shes pa de 'dir mkhas pa yin/ /byis pa gang zhig mkhas sems pa/ /de ni byis pa zhes brjod do/ /byis pas bstod

356a3(mdo sde): bas/ /byis pa mi thos mi mthong zhing / /ma bsten gyur pa nyid rung ngo / /gnyen dang phrad pa ji lta bar/ /brtan pa bsten na bde bar 'gyur/ /de bas rgyu skar lam du zla ba ltar/ /brtan zhing thos mang
356a4(mdo sde): mchog 'dren byed pa dang / /tshul khrims ldan dang 'phags pa'i brtul zhugs can/ /mi mchog brtse ldan blo bzang bsten par gyis/ /mdza' bshes kyi tshoms te nyi shu rtsa
356a5(mdo sde): lnga pa'o/ / //rus sbal rang gi khog par yan lag ltar/ /dge slong yid kyi rnam rtog nang bsdus nas/ /rten pa med cing gzhan la 'tshe med par/ /mya ngan
356a6(mdo sde): 'das la su yang smod mi byed/ /bzod pa dka' thub mchog ste bzod pa ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa mchog ces sangs rgyas gsung / /rab tu byung ba gzhan la 'tshe ba dang / /gzhan
356a7(mdo sde): la gnod pas dge sbyong ma yin no/ /tshig rtsub ci yang smra mi bya/ /smras na slar yang smra bar byed/ /'thab gcugs tshig gis sdug bsngal zhing / /de la phyir yang chad pas
356b1(mdo sde): gcod/ /gal te bdag gis phar byas na/ /'khar ba'i snod la brdungs pa bzhin/ /'khor bar skye dang rga ba dag/ yun ring nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ /bdag gis phar ni ma

357a2(mdo sde): ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ /da ltar byung ba'ang yod ma yin/ /blta dka' mtha' med bder mi mthong / /bden pa rab rtogs shes pa dang / /sred dang dga' ba med mthong

357b1(mdo sde): sbyangs pa yod pas 'gro ba dang / 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba dang / 'ong ba yod pas gzhan du shi 'pho len par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan du shi 'pho blangs pas 'di ltar gzhan du skye ba dang / rga
