358a5(mdo sde): zhing | |rga dang 'chi dang rmongs pa yi/ /chos can rab tu 'jig 'gyur ba/ /zas kyi rgyud las byung ba yi/ /'jig 'gyur 'di la dga' mi bya/ /de yi nges par 'byung ba'i
358a6(mdo sde): gzhi| |rtog dang dpyod dang zhi ba dang / /sdug bsngal chos rnams 'gags pa ste/ /'du byed nye bar zhi ba bde/ /dge slong dag /de ni gang du'ang gnas par mi 'gyur
358a7(mdo sde): te| sa la gnas par mi 'gyur/ chu la ma yin/ me la ma yin/ /rlung la ma yin/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la ma yin/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la
358b1(mdo sde): ma yin| |ci'ang med pa'i skye mched la ma yin/ 'du shes yod min med min skye mched la ma yin/ 'jig rten 'di la ma yin/ 'jig rten pha rol la ma yin/ nyi ma dang / zla ba
358b2(mdo sde): gnyis la gnas pa ma yin te/ 'di la dmigs pa med par ngas mngon par shes so/ /dge slong dag /de la 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba yod par nga mi smra ste/ gnas par ma yin no/ /'chi
358b3(mdo sde): 'pho yod par nga mi smra ste/ skye bar ma yin/ 'di lta bu 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung / /gang la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa/ /de la dkar pos
358b4(mdo sde): gsal mi byed/ /de la mun pa'ang yod ma yin/ /de la zla bas snang mi byed/ /de la nyi mas mngon mi byed/ /thub pa bram ze gang yin pa/ /des ni rang gis rig pa yin/ /de ni
358b5(mdo sde): gzugs dang gzugs med dang / /sdug bsngal kun las rab tu grol/ /mthar phyin 'jigs pa med pa ste/ /rlom med 'gyod pa med pa yin/ /srid pa'i zug rngu gtugs
358b6(mdo sde): pa ste| |lus kyi tha mar gyur pa yin/ /'di ni mthar phyin rnams kyi mchog /zhi ba'i go 'phang bla med pa/ /mtshan ma thams cad zad pa ste/ /byang grol go 'phang 'chi med
358b7(mdo sde): yin| |mtshungs dang mi mtshungs 'byung ba yi/ /'du byed thub pas rab tu spangs/ /nang du mnyam gzhag dga' ba yis/ /sgo nga'i spubs ni dral nas byung / /sbyin kun
359a1(mdo sde): chos kyi sbyin pas thub/ /dga' kun chos kyi dga' bas thub/ /stobs kun bzod pa'i stobs kyis thub/ /bde kun sred pa zad pas thub/ /mya ngan
359a2(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i tshoms te nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o/ / //bdag las gzhan pa'i skyon dag ni/ /phug ma gtor ba ji bzhin du/ /gzhan gyi skyon mthong sla
359a3(mdo sde): ba ste| |rang gi skyon ni mthong bar dka'/ /g.yo can cho lo 'jo ba ltar/ /rang gi de ni sbed pa dang / /gzhan gyi skyon la lta byed cing / /rtag tu 'phyas lang 'du shes can/ /de
359a4(mdo sde): yis ring du chos mi mthong / /g.yon phyogs chos ni rab tu 'phel/ /spyi rdol byed cing 'phrog rlom can/ /mi gtsang las ldan khwa lta bu/ /shin tu nyon mongs 'tsho ba can//
359a5(mdo sde): ngo tsha med pa'i 'tsho ba sla/ /rtag tu gtsang ma tshol ba dang / /thub chod mi byed 'dzem bag can/ /'tsho ba dag pa lta ba yi/ /ngo tsha shes pa'i 'tsho ba dka'/ /'jig rten
359a6(mdo sde): mun par gyur 'di ste/ /de las lhag mthong ldan pa nyung / /rgya las shir ba'i bya lta bur/ /mtho ris la dga' shas tsam zhig /byis pa lus kyis bcings gyur pa/ /mun
359a7(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba yin/ /'jig rten nor la chags pa dag /gzhan rdzas lta bur lta bar byed/ /bdag gis skye dgu 'di phyung zhing / /gzhan gyis byas so snyam
359b1(mdo sde): sems pa/ /bden pa min la bden lta bas/ /ci yang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ni 'gas kyang mi mthong zhing / /zug rngu mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yul sred gang la skye bo chags
359b2(mdo sde): pa yi| |zug rngu de dag sngon chad mthong ba dag / de ni bdag gis byas snyam mi 'dzin cing / /de ni gzhan gyis bya snyam mi 'dzin to/ /skye dgu 'di dag nga rgyal ldan/ /nga rgyal
359b3(mdo sde): la chags nga rgyal bcings/ /rtsod par gyur pa'i lta ba can/ /'khor ba ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /thob par gyur pa gang yin dang / /thob par bya ba gang yin pa/ /de dag gnyis
359b4(mdo sde): ka rngul gyis yog / rjes su nad pa slob par byed/ /gang zhig tshul khrims dang / bslab pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / tshangs par spyod pa dang / dka' thub dang / nye bar
359b5(mdo sde): gnas pa snying por byed pa de ni mtha' gcig go / gang zhig de ltar lta zhing 'di skad ces 'dod pa ni gtsang ba'o/ /'dod pa ni bsod nams can no/ /'dod pa ni longs spyad
359b6(mdo sde): par bya ba'o/ /'dod pa ni skyon med pa yin no zhes smra zhing / de dag lhag par 'dod pa rnams su lhung bar byed pa'i brtul zhugs len pa 'di 'ang mtha' gcig go /mtha'
359b7(mdo sde): gnyis po 'di dag ni dur khrod 'phel bar byed pa ste/ 'di dag gis dur khrod 'phel bar byas so/ /mtha' gnyis po 'di dag ma mthong ba kha cig zhen par byed cing / kha
360a1(mdo sde): cig mngon par rgyug par byed la/ de dag lhag par zhen par byed cing lhag par rgyug par byed pa dag mig dang ldan pas mthong ngo / /mtha' gnyis po 'di
360a2(mdo sde): dag mthong ba na zhen par mi byed/ rgyug par mi byed la/ de dag lhag par zhen par mi byed cing lhag par rgyug par mi byed pa'ang mig dang ldan pas mthong ngo / /de dag de ltar
360a3(mdo sde): mi byed cing de dag de ltar mi sems na/ de dag gi lam du mi gdags pa/ 'di lta ste/ 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no/ /ji ltar chu bur mthong ba dang / /ji ltar smig rgyu mthong ba ltar/ /
360a4(mdo sde): de bzhin 'jig rten lta byed pa/ /'chi bdag rgyal pos mthong mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar chu bur mthong ba dang / /ji ltar smig rgyu mthong ba ltar/ /de bzhin lus la lta byed pa/ /'chi
360a5(mdo sde): bdag rgyal pos mthong mi 'gyur/ /gang la byis pa mngon chags pa/ /de la mkhas pa chags mi 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i shing rta bkra ba ltar/ /lus 'di rtag tu blta bar gyis//
360a6(mdo sde): gang la byis pa rmongs 'gyur pa/ /de la mkhas pa rmongs mi 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i shing rta bkra ba ltar/ /lus 'di rtag tu blta bar gyis/ /gang du byis pa nyams gyur ba/ /glang
360a7(mdo sde): rgan rdzab tu chud pa bzhin/ /rgyal po'i shing rta bkra ba ltar/ /lus 'di rtag tu blta bar gyis/ /nad pa lta bur 'jig chos can/ /rma byung ba dang 'dra ba ste/ /gang yang brtan
360b1(mdo sde): par mi gnas pa/ /lus 'di rtag tu blta bar gyis/ /nad pa 'jig pa'i chos can ltar/ /gang yang brtan par mi gnas par/ /nor bu'i rna cha gdub 'khor gyis/ /brgyan pa'i lus la
360b2(mdo sde): blta bar gyis/ /skra ni lan bu brgyad byas shing / /mig sman gyis ni bskus pa'i mig/ phyis pa lhag par rmongs byed kyang / /pha rol tshol bar mi byed do/ /mig sman gyis ni gsar bris
360b3(mdo sde): shing / /rnag can lus ni brgyan pa yis/ /byis pa lhag par rmongs byed kyang / /pha rol tshol bar mi byed do/ /lus 'di dri zhim gyis bskus nas/ /rkang pa btsag gis byugs pa
360b4(mdo sde): dag / byis pa lhag par rmongs byed kyang / /pha rol tshol bar mi byed do/ /gang zhig 'dod par kun sbyor 'brel chags shing / /kun tu sbyor ba'i skyon rnams ma mthong ba/ /'dod
360b5(mdo sde): par 'brel la chags pa'i mi de yis/ /chu bo mtha' yas yangs pa rgal mi 'gyur/ /chags bral mchog dang tha ma thams cad dag /'di la bdag dang bdag gir mi lta
360b6(mdo sde): zhing / /de ltar rnam grol sngon chad ma brgal ba'i/ /chu bo rab brgal yang srid med par 'gyur/ /gang zhig tshal spangs tshal med pa/ /nags tshal spangs nas nags su rgyug
360b7(mdo sde): grol ba 'ching bar gcen pa yin/ /gang zag 'di la ltos shig tshur/ /shing rta mthun pa'i rtsibs ldan pa/ /yan lag yid 'ong gos dkar g.yogs/ /sdig med 'gro ba
361a1(mdo sde): la ltos la/ /chings ma'i rgyun rnams bcad par gyis/ /'jigs pas skrag pa'i mi dag ni/ /phal cher ri dang nags tshal dang / /skyed mos tshal dang
361a2(mdo sde): mchod gnas dang / /ljon shing rnams la skyabs su 'gro /skyabs de gtso bo ma yin zhing / /skyabs de mchog tu gyur pa min/ /de la skyabs su song ba yis/ /sdug bsngal kun
361a3(mdo sde): las grol mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas chos dang ni/ /dge 'dun la ni skyabs song zhing / /sdug bsngal sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang / /sdug bsngal yang dag 'das pa
361a4(mdo sde): dang / /bde ba mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'o/ /'phags lam yan lag brgyad pa ste/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag /gang tshe shes rab kyis mthong ba/ /de ni skyabs kyi
361a5(mdo sde): mchog yin zhing / /de ni skyabs kyi dam pa yin/ /de la skyabs su song ba yis/ /sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /mthong bas mthong zhing mthong bas ma mthong
361a6(mdo sde): mthong / /ma mthong mi mthong mthong bya mthong mi 'gyur/ /'dra mthong lhag mthong tha dad dngos por brjod/ /nyin mtshan nam yang lhan cig mi gnas bzhin/ /'dra ba
361a7(mdo sde): mthong bas mthong mi 'gyur/ /gal te mthong na 'dra mi mthong / /mthong 'dis 'dra ba mi mthong ste/ /'dra mthong mi yis mthong ba med/ /mi yis ci ma mthong na 'dra ba
361b1(mdo sde): mthong / /ci zhig mthong na 'dra ba mthong mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'di ni 'dra ba mthong ba dag /gang zhig med na 'dra bar mthong dang bral/ /gang tshe 'di yis sdug bsngal ma mthong
361b2(mdo sde): ba| |de yi tshe na bdag tu mthong bar 'gyur/ /ji lta ji ltar sdug bsngal rtogs gyur ba/ /des ni bdag 'di 'dra ba mthong mi 'gyur/ /gang gis so so'i skye bsgribs na/ /'du
361b3(mdo sde): byed sdug bsngal ma mthong ba/ /de phyir 'di na 'dra mthong ste/ /de med 'dra ba mi mthong ngo / /mthong ba'i tshoms te nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// //sdig pa thams
361b4(mdo sde): cad mi bya ste/ /dge ba phun sum tshogs par bya/ /rang gi sems ni yongs su gdul/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin/ /sbyin pas bsod nams rab tu 'phel/ /legs
361b5(mdo sde): bsdams dgra gsog mi 'gyur ro/ /dge dang ldan pas sdig pa spong / /nyon mongs zad pa mya ngan 'da'/ /mkhas dang 'dre dang byis pa'i skye bo dang / /lhan cig spyod dang
361b6(mdo sde): gcig pu gnas kyang rung / /ngang pas chu las 'o ma 'thung ba ltar/ /mkhas pas sdig pa can rnams rab tu spang / /'jig rten nyes dmigs mthong ba dang / /'gog par
361b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i chos mthong bas/ /'phags pa sdig la dga' mi byed/ /sdig can dge la dga' mi 'gyur/ /legs par nyer zhi'i ro dang ni/ /rab tu dben pa'i ro shes pa//
362a1(mdo sde): rims nad med cing sdig med la/ /chos la dga' ba'i ro dag 'thung / /sems kyi zag pa med pa dang / /sems ni 'ching bas ma bcos la/ /dge
362a2(mdo sde): dang sdig pa rab spangs pa/ /ngan 'gro rnams kyis 'jigs pa med/ /gnas min zlog dang legs smra dang / /nyes dmigs ston par byed pa dang / /mkhas pas tshar gcod
362a3(mdo sde): smra byed pa/ /de lta'i skye dgu bsten par bya/ /de lta bu dag bsten byas na/ /sdig par mi 'gyur legs par 'gyur/ /nye bar zhi zhing rab zhi la/ /dal bus smra zhing khengs
362a4(mdo sde): med pa| |sdig pa'i chos rnams sprug byed de/ /rlung gis ljon shing lo ma bzhin/ /gang zhig skyes bu dag cing nyon mongs med/ /rab tu sdang med mi la khro byed pa'i/ /byis
362a5(mdo sde): pa de la sdig pa phyir 'gog ste/ /rdzi phyogs su ni rdul rnams gtor ba bzhin/ /dge ba byed pas dge ba dang / /sdig pa byed pas sdig pa ste/ /mi yis gang dang gang byas
362a6(mdo sde): pa| |de de rang gis mthong bar 'gyur/ /bdag gis sdig pa byas na ni/ /de bdag kho na kun nyon mongs/ /bdag gis sdig pa ma byas na/ /bdag nyid kho na rnam par
362a7(mdo sde): dag / gzhan gyis gzhan spyod mi byed kyi/ /dag dang ma dag rang rang byed/ /bdag nyid kyis ni sdig pa dag /byas shing nye bar bsags pa yis/ /bsam brlag mngon
362b1(mdo sde): du 'joms par byed/ /rdo rjes nor bu 'bigs pa bzhin/ /mig ldan 'gro bar byed pa yis/ /nyam nga'i lam dag ji lta bar/ /mkhas pas 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'dir/ /sdig pa dag
362b2(mdo sde): ni yongs su spang / /nor chen gyis ni grogs nyung dang / /tshong pas 'jigs bcas lam dang ni/ /gson par 'dod pas dug lta bur/ /mkhas pas sdig can yongs su spang / /
362b3(mdo sde): gal te lag mthil rma med na/ /lag pas dug ni bzung byas kyang / /rma med dug ni mi 'jen ltar/ /ma byas pa la sdig pa med/ /bdag la mi phan bya ba dang / /legs par
362b4(mdo sde): ma yin bya bar sla/ /gang dag phan zhing bder 'gyur ba/ /de ni mchog tu bya bar dka'/ /dam pas legs pa bya sla yi/ /dam pas sdig pa bya bar dka'/ /ngan pas sdig pa bya sla
362b5(mdo sde): yi| |'phags pas sdig pa bya bar dka'/ /ji srid sdig pa ma smin pa/ /de srid byis pa mngar bar sems/ /gang tshe sdig pa smin gyur pa/ /de tshe de ni tsha bar sems/ /ji srid
362b6(mdo sde): sdig pa ma smin pa/ /de srid sdig la rung bar lta/ /gang tshe sdig pa smin gyur pa/ /de tshe sdig par mthong bar 'gyur/ /ji srid bzang po ma smin pa/ /de srid bzang po sdig par
362b7(mdo sde): mthong / /gang tshe bzang po smin gyur pa/ /de tshe bzang por mthong bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa sdug bsngal gsog pas na/ /de la dga' bar mi bya'o/ /brgya la sdig pa byas na
363a1(mdo sde): yang / /yang dang yang du de mi bya/ /bsod nams bde ba gsog pas na/ /de nyid la ni dga' bar bya/ /gal te bsod nams byas na yang / /de ni yang
363a2(mdo sde): dang yang du bya/ /sdig la yid ni mngon dga' ba/ /bsod nams dal bus byed 'gyur bas/ /sdig pa las ni sems zlog cing / /bsod nams mngon par smyur te bya/ /
363a3(mdo sde): sdig pa chung du byas pas kyang / /'jig rten pha rol 'jig chen dang / /phung khrol chen po byed 'gyur te/ /khong bar song ba'i dug bzhin no/ /bsod nams chung du byas
363a4(mdo sde): pas kyang / /'jig rten pha rol bde ba 'dren/ /don chen dag kyang byed 'gyur te/ /'bru rnams phun sum 'byor ba bzhin/ /gang zhig nyes med chad pas gcod/ /sdang ba
363a5(mdo sde): min la rab sdang ba/ /gnas gzhan gang yang rung ba bcu/ /myur du thob pa kho nar 'gyur/ /tshor ba mi bzad pa dag gam/ /yang na lus ni 'dral ba'am/ /gnod pa'i
363a6(mdo sde): tshor ba tsha ba'ang rung / /yang na sems 'khrugs thob par 'gyur/ /gnyen 'dun rnams dang bral ba'am/ /longs spyod zad par 'gyur ba'am/ /rgyal po'i gnod pa
363a7(mdo sde): 'byung ba'am/ /mi snyan shin tu mi bzad dam/ /yang na khyim ni me chen pos/ /nges par sreg par byed par 'gyur/ /shes rab 'chal ba lus zhig nas/ /bcu pa ngan
363b1(mdo sde): 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa byas pas bag dbab mi bya ste/ /ring byas rgyang mar byas kyang bag mi dbab/ /dben par byas kyang bag dbab mi bya ste/ /de yi rnam smin yod pas bag mi
363b2(mdo sde): dbab/ /bsod nams byas pas bag ni dbab bya ste/ /ring byas rgyang ring byas kyang bag dbab cing / /dben par byas kyang bag ni dbab par bya/ /de yi rnam smin yod pas bag dbab bo//
363b3(mdo sde): bdag gis sdig pa byas pas mya ngan byed/ /ring dang rgyang ring byas pas mya ngan byed/ /bdag gis dben par byas pas mya ngan byed/ /de yi rnam smin yod pas mya ngan byed/ /bdag nyid
363b4(mdo sde): nag po'i las dang ldan mthong nas/ /'dir yang mya ngan gzhan du'ang mya ngan byed/ /sdig pa byas pas gnyis kar mya ngan byed/ /de ni mya ngan de rab mya ngan byed/ /bdag gis bsod
363b5(mdo sde): nams byas pas dga' bar 'gyur/ /ring dang rgyang ring byas pas dga' bar 'gyur/ /bdag gis dben par byas pas dga' bar 'gyur/ /de yi rnam smin yod pas dga' bar 'gyur//
363b6(mdo sde): bdag nyid rnam dag las dang ldan mthong nas/ /'di na dga' 'gyur gzhan du'ang dga' bar 'gyur/ /bsod nams byas pas gnyis kar dga' 'gyur zhing / /de ni dga' 'gyur
363b7(mdo sde): de rab dga' bar 'gyur/ /bdag gis sdig pa byas pas gdung 'gyur zhing / /ring byas rgyang ring byas pas gdung bar 'gyur/ /bdag gis dben par byas pas gdung 'gyur zhing //
364a1(mdo sde): de yi rnam smin yod pas gdung bar 'gyur/ /bdag nyid nag po'i las dang ldan mthong nas/ /'di na gdung 'gyur pha rol gdung bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa byas
364a2(mdo sde): pas gnyis kar gdung 'gyur zhing / /de ni gdung 'gyur de rab gdung bar 'gyur/ /bdag gis bsod nams byas pas dga' 'gyur zhing / /ring byas rgyang ring byas pas
364a3(mdo sde): dga' bar 'gyur/ /bdag gis dben par byas pas dga' 'gyur zhing / /de yi rnam smin yod pas dga' bar 'gyur/ /bdag nyid dkar po'i las dang ldan mthong nas/ /
364a4(mdo sde): 'di na dga' 'gyur pha rol dga' bar 'gyur/ /bsod nams byas pa gnyis ka dga' 'gyur zhing / /de ni dga' 'gyur de rab dga' bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa byas shing
364a5(mdo sde): bsod nams ma byas la/ /chos dang gol zhing chos min thob pa'i mi/ /sdig pa'i las can 'chi bas 'jigs 'gyur te/ /chu chen nang du gru ngan zhig pa bzhin/ /bsod
364a6(mdo sde): nams byas shing sdig pa ma byas la/ /dam pa rnams kyi sngon gyi chos spyod pas/ /nga ni nam yang 'chi bas 'jigs med de/ /brtan pa'i gru yis pha rol 'gro ba bzhin/ /
364a7(mdo sde): sdig pa'i tshoms te nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //ji srid nyi ma ma shar ba/ /de srid srin bu me khyer snang / /nyi ma shar bar gyur pa na/ /snang ba med cing sngon
364b1(mdo sde): por 'gyur/ /ji srid de bzhin gshegs ma shar/ /de srid rtog ge ba rnams snang / /'jig rten rdzogs sangs rgyas shar ba/ /rtog can nyan thos bcas mi snang / /gces min gces
364b2(mdo sde): par blos 'dzin cing / /gces la gces pa min rtag pa/ /log par kun rtog spyod yul can/ /des ni gces pa thob mi 'gyur/ /gces pa min la gces min dang / /gces la
364b3(mdo sde): gces par 'du shes pa/ /legs par kun rtog spyod yul can/ /des ni gces pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /'di na lta dang nyan la mngon zhen pa'i/ /chings ma gsar dang gsar du
364b4(mdo sde): 'phel ba dag / 'khor bar rgyug cing 'gro dang sdod 'gyur te/ /me nang lhung ba'i phye ma leb dang 'dra/ /'di la myong 'gyur gzhan la myong 'gyur ba'am/ /'di na the tshom tha
364b5(mdo sde): dad ji snyed pa/ /de dag tshangs par spyad spyod 'bad pa dang / /sems par byed pas rab tu rnam par spong / /gang zhig snyigs ma yod bzhin du/ /ngur smrig gos ni gyon byed
364b6(mdo sde): pa| |dul dang nges pa med pa de/ /ngur smrig gyon pa'i 'os ma yin/ /gang zhig snyigs ma rnams spangs nas/ /tshul khrims legs par mnyam gzhag pa/ /dul dang nges
364b7(mdo sde): par ldan pa de/ /ngur smrig gyon pa'i 'os yin no/ /g.yo sgyu 'jungs dang ldan pa'i mi/ /kha dog dang ni gzugs ldan pa'am/ /yang na smra bar byed tsam gyis/ /pho mchog
365a1(mdo sde): yin par mi chud do/ /gang zhig chos gsum de dag rnams/ /ta la'i mgo bo bzhin bcad nas/ /blo ldan skyon ni bsal ba de/ /pho mchog yin par brjod
365a2(mdo sde): par bya| |'jig rten 'di na legs par ma bsdams pa/ /phal cher legs bsdams rtags kyis rgyu byed pas/ /legs par ma brtags par du mi dag gi /mdog gzugs
365a3(mdo sde): lan 'ga' mthong bas yid ma rton/ /ra gan kha bsgyur lta bur mi 'tsham zhing / /lcags phyed gser gyis g.yogs pa ji lta bur/ /khong pa rab gdug phyi rol 'phags
365a4(mdo sde): tshul gyis/ /'jig rten 'di na 'khor dang bcas par rgyu/ /gang zhig rde 'gengs gnyid ni log pa dang / /nyin dang mtshan du 'gre ldog nyal byed pa/ /rdzab nang phag chen lus
365a5(mdo sde): rgyas ji lta bar/ /yang dang yang du smad pa'i mngal du 'jug /mi ni rtag tu dran pa ldan pa dang / /rtag tu kha zas kyi ni tshod shes pa/ /de yi sdug bsngal chung bar 'gyur ba
365a6(mdo sde): dang / /dal bus 'ju bas tshe yang ring bar byed/ /gang zhig dbang po ma bsdams shing / /zas kyi tshod ni mi shes la/ /dran pa nyams dang le lo can/ /gtsang bar lta zhing
365a7(mdo sde): gnas byed pa/ /de ni 'dod chags rnams kyis bcom/ /rlung gis mi brtan ljon shing bzhin/ /gang zhing dbang po legs bsdams shing / /zas kyi tshod ni shes pa
365b1(mdo sde): dang / /so sor dran zhing brtson 'grus ldan/ /mi gtsang lta bas gnas byed pa/ /de ni 'dod chags kyis mi tshems/ /rlung gis ri bo mi g.yos bzhin/ /dgon pa dga' bar bya 'os
365b2(mdo sde): pa| |de la skye bo mi dga' yang / /de la 'dod chags bral ba dga'/ /'dod pa tshol bar byed rnams min/ /dgon pa'am yang na grong dag gam/ /gshong dam thang bu dag
365b3(mdo sde): kyang rung / /gang na 'phags pa bzhugs pa yi/ /sa de yid du 'ong ba yin/ /dam pa ring nas snang gyur te/ /gangs can gyi ni ri bo bzhin/ /ngan pa nye yang mi snang ste/ /mun khrod
365b4(mdo sde): mda' ni 'phangs pa bzhin/ /mkhas pa don sems byed pa yi/ /dam pa nyid dang 'grogs na ni/ /don chen 'gyur zhing zab mo yi/ /shes rab so sor rtogs par 'gyur/ /
365b5(mdo sde): gzhu yis mda' 'phangs bsnun pa yi/ /g.yul ngo'i glang chen ji bzhin du/ /tshul 'chal skye bo mang po yis/ /mi snyan smras pa bzod par bya/ /mi gang khyim 'bigs byed pa
365b6(mdo sde): dang / /dad pa med cing byas mi gzo/ /go skabs bcom dang skyugs pa za/ /de ni skyes bu dam pa yin/ /pha ma dag ni bsad byas shing / /rgyal po gtsang sbra can gnyis dang / /yul
365b7(mdo sde): 'khor 'khor dang bcas pa bcom na/ /mi ni dag par 'gyur zhes bya/ /gang dag kun tu gsog med cing / /gang dag kha zas yongs shes pa/ /stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang / /
366a1(mdo sde): dben pa nyid kyi spyod yul can/ /de dag 'gro ba rtogs dka' ste/ /nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/ /gang dag kun tu gsog med cing / /gang dag kha zas
366a2(mdo sde): yongs shes pa/ /stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang / /dben pa nyid kyi spyod yul can/ /de dag rjes ni rtogs dka' ste/ /nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/ /gang dag kun tu gsog
366a3(mdo sde): med cing / /gang dag kha zas yongs shes pa/ /stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang / /rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul can/ /de dag 'gro ba rtogs dka' ste/ /nam mkha' la ni bya
366a4(mdo sde): rjes bzhin/ /gang dag kun tu gsog med cing / /gang dag kha zas yongs shes pa/ /stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang / /rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul can/ /de dag rjes
366a5(mdo sde): ni rtogs dka' ste/ /nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/ /gang dag kun tu gsog med cing / /gang dag kha zas yongs shes pa/ /stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang / /dben pa
366a6(mdo sde): nyid kyi spyod yul can/ /de dag 'gro ba rtogs dka' ste/ /nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/ /gang dag kun tu gsog med cing / /gang dag kha zas yongs shes pa/ /stong
366a7(mdo sde): dang mtshan ma med pa dang / /dben pa nyid kyi spyod yul can/ /de dag rjes ni rtogs dka' ste/ /nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/ /gang dag pha mthar rten med cing / /
366b1(mdo sde): gang gis zag zad yongs shes pa/ /stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang / /dben pa nyid kyi spyod yul can/ /de dag 'gro ba rtogs dka' ste/ /nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/ /gang
366b2(mdo sde): dag pha mthar rten med cang / /gang gis zag zad yongs shes pa/ /stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang / /dben pa nyid kyi spyod yul can/ /de dag rjes ni rtogs dka' ste/ /nam mkha'
366b3(mdo sde): la ni bya rjes bzhin/ /gang dag pha mthar rten med cing / /gang gis zag zad yongs shes pa/ /stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang / /rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul can/ /de dag
366b4(mdo sde): 'gro ba rtogs dka' ste/ /nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/ /gang dag pha mthar rten med cing / /gang gis zag zad yongs shes pa/ /stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang / /rtag tu
366b5(mdo sde): bsam gtan spyod yul can/ /de dag rjes ni rtogs dka' ste/ /nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/ /gang dag pha mthar rten med cing / /gang gis zag zad yongs shes pa/ /stong
366b6(mdo sde): dang mtshan ma med pa dang / /rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul can/ /de dag 'gro ba rtogs dka' ste/ /nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/ /gang dag pha mthar rten med cing / /
366b7(mdo sde): gang gis zag zad yongs shes pa/ /stong dang mtshan ma med pa dang / /rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul can/ /de dag rjes ni rtogs dka' ste/ /nam mkha' la ni bya rjes
367a1(mdo sde): bzhin| |skye dgu phal pa 'di dag ni/ /pha mtha' nyid du rgyug byed pas/ /gang dag pha rol 'gro byed pa'i/ /mi yi skye bo de dag nyung / /gang dag
367a2(mdo sde): legs par gsungs pa yi/ /chos la chos kyi rjes lta bas/ /skye bo de dag skye shi yi/ /mtsho chen rgal dka'i pha rol 'gro/ skyob pa rab tu rnam grol zhing / /dus 'dus mya
367a3(mdo sde): ngan bral ba dang / /mdud pa thams cad spangs pa la/ /yongs su gdung ba yod mi 'gyur/ /'jigs dang bcas pa'i lam brgal cing / /g.yang sa yongs su spangs pa dang / /
367a4(mdo sde): sbyor dang mdud pa las grol bas/ /'dod chags kyi ni dug kun bcom/ /'dod pa lta bu'i 'dam rdzab med/ /zhe sdang lta bu'i gnod med do/ /gti mug lta bu'i rgya med
367a5(mdo sde): de| |sred pa lta bu'i chu klung med/ /nam mkha' la ni rjes lta bur/ /phyi rol pa la dge sbyong med/ /byis pa spros la mngon par dga'/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spros mi
367a6(mdo sde): mnga'| |sbyor bas byis pa khrid pa'i phyir/ /mkhas pa sbyor ba 'joms par byed/ /mkhas pa lha dang mi dag gi /sbyor ba gang yin 'joms byed pa/ /sbyor ba kun dang
367a7(mdo sde): bral ba'i phyir/ /sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /sbyor ba las ni srid pa byung / /sbyor ba med pas srid pa zad/ /srid pa dang ni srid med pa'i/ /lam 'di gnyis
367b1(mdo sde): ni shes gyis la/ /sbyor las rab tu 'da' bya'i phyir/ /mkhas pas de la bslab par gyis/ /nyes par spyad pa byas pas gdung 'gyur zhing / /ngan 'gror song ba'i 'og tu'ang gdung
367b2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ /legs par sbyad pa byas pas dga' 'gyur zhing / /bde 'gror song ba'i 'og tu'ang dga' bar 'gyur/ /phyi nas gdung 'gyur de byed pas/ /gnyis na nyes spyad ma byas
367b3(mdo sde): sla| |gdung bar mi 'gyur de bya ste/ /legs par spyad pa byas na rung / /mkhas dang byis pa 'dres pa las/ /ma smras shes par mi 'gyur bas/ /zhi ba'i go 'phang smros shig dang //
367b4(mdo sde): smras pa yis ni shes par 'gyur/ /legs bshad drang srong rgyal mtshan to/ /drang srong rgyal mtshan chos yin pas/ /chos ni bshad pas gsal bya zhing / /drang srong rgyal mtshan
367b5(mdo sde): bsgreng bar gyis/ /ma smras na yang smod byed cing / /mang du smras na smod par byed/ /dal bus smras kyang smod byed de/ /'jig rten na ni mi smad med/ /gcig tu smad par bya ba dang /
367b6(mdo sde): gcig tu bstod par bya ba'i mi/ /da ltar yod pa ma yin te/ /byung bar ma gyur 'byung mi 'gyur/ /gang dag la ni gnas pa'i spros med cing / /gang dag kun sbyor gdung las rab
367b7(mdo sde): log pa| |thub pa srid bral de dag rgyu mdzad kyang / /lhar bcas 'jig rten rnams kyis mi shes so/ /gang gis dad dang tshul khrims dang / /blo la phan ni ma byung bar/ /ji lta
368a1(mdo sde): ji ltar rtogs gyur pa'i/ /shes pa can dag bstod byed de/ /de dag sus kyang smad 'os min/ /dzam+bu'i gling gi gser rgyan bzhin/ /ji ltar ri dang brag
368a2(mdo sde): dag ni| |rlung gis g.yos par mi 'gyur ltar/ /de bzhin bstod dang smad pa yis/ /mkhas pa rab tu g.yo ba med/ /sa la gang gi rtswa med pa/ /lo med lcug phran ga la yod/ /
368a3(mdo sde): 'ching ba las grol brtan pa de'i/ /ji ga sus kyang smad 'os min/ /gang zhig rgyal las mi nyams shing / /'jig rten ma rgyal cung zad med/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha'
368a4(mdo sde): yas de| |'gro med gom pa gang gis bkri/ /gang zhig rgyal las mi nyams shing / /'jig rten ma rgyal cung zad med/ /sangs rgyas mthu rtsal mtha' yas de/ /'gro med
368a5(mdo sde): gom pa gang gis bkri/ /gang la 'khrid byed sred pa ni/ /yul sred dra ba dga' med pa/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas de/ /'gro med gom pa gang gis bkri/ /gang la
368a6(mdo sde): 'khrid byed srid pa ni/ /yul sred 'dra ba 'ga' med pa/ /sangs rgyas mthu rtsal mtha' yas de/ /'gro med gom pa gang gis bkri/ /gang zhig rnam par rtog pa rnam
368a7(mdo sde): bsal cing / /nang gi kun la rnam par rtog med pa/ /kun tu sbyor dang gzugs dang 'du shes 'das/ /rnal 'byor bzhi dang bral la skye ba med/ /sngon bral phyi ma dang bral
368b1(mdo sde): zhing / /dbus bral srid pa'i pha rol phyin/ /rnam pa kun las sems grol ba/ /skye rga phyi ma 'dren mi 'gyur/ /phrugs kyi tshoms te nyi shu dgu pa'o// //rgyal ba las
368b2(mdo sde): ni 'khon byung zhing / /pha rol pham pa sdug bsngal 'thob/ /rgyal dang pha rol pham spangs na/ /nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba 'thob/ /gzhan la sdug bsngal bskyed pa yis/ /gang zhig
368b3(mdo sde): bdag ni bde 'dod pa/ /dgra dang mi 'bral 'grogs pa dang / /de ni sdug bsngal las mi 'grol/ /bde ba 'dod phyir 'byung po la/ /gang zhig 'tshe zhing chad pas gcod/ /bdag
368b4(mdo sde): gi bde ba 'dod pa de/ /pha rol tu ni bde mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig bde ba 'dod pa dag /'byung po la ni mi 'tshe zhing / /chad pas mi gcod bde 'dod pa/ /de dag pha rol bde ba
368b5(mdo sde): 'thob| |chos spyod legs par spyad bya zhing / /nyes par spyad pa de mi spyod/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/ /chos spyad pas ni bde ba 'thob/ /chos la legs spyod bde skyed
368b6(mdo sde): pas| |chos spyod chos kyis bsrung bar bya/ /chos spyod ngan 'gror mi 'gro ba/ /chos la legs spyod phan yod de'o/ /yangs pa'i gdugs kyis dbyar kha ltar/ /chos spyod chos
368b7(mdo sde): kyis bsrung bar bya/ /chos spyod ngan 'gror mi 'gro ba/ /chos la legs spyod phan yod de'o/ /bag med mi yis chos min spyad na ni/ /'gro ba gang yang rung ba ngan 'gror
369a1(mdo sde): 'gro/ /'di na sbrul nag rked nas bzung ba ltar/ /chos min spyod pa de dag brlag par 'gyur/ /chos dang chos min gnyis ka yi/ /rnam smin 'dra
369a2(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur te/ /chos ma yin pas dmyal bar 'gro/ /chos kyis bde 'gro thob par byed/ /sbyin pa byed pa'i dus dang g.yul 'gyed dus/ /rgyu yis yongs su bzung
369a3(mdo sde): bar 'dra bas na/ /sbyin pa byed dang g.yul 'gyed 'dra zhes gsungs/ /yon tan de gnyis mi ngan rten mi byed/ /shin tu legs par chas pa gcig pus kyang / /legs
369a4(mdo sde): par ma chas 'phyes las rgyal byed ltar/ /gal te dad bskyed chung du byin pas kyang / /des ni de dag gzhan du bde bar 'gyur/ /'di na lan brgyar g.yul zlog dpa'
369a5(mdo sde): bo bas| |ser sna dgrar gyur zil gyis mnan nas su/ /gang zhig chags med sems kyis sbyin byed pa/ /de dag ches dpa' yin par ngas gsungs so/ /bsod nams
369a6(mdo sde): rnam smin bde ba ste/ /mngon par bsams pa 'byor par byed/ /myur du zhi ba dam pa yi/ /mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur/ /bsod nams byed pa rnams la ni/ /
369a7(mdo sde): gzhan las byung ba'i gnod pa dang / /lha dang bdud kyi ris rnams kyis/ /bar chad bya bar mi nus so/ /gal te sdug bsngal zad bya'i phyir/ /'phags dang shes rab
369b1(mdo sde): gtong ldan la/ /de yis 'bad rtsol byas na ni/ /lhag mthong gis ni reg par 'gyur/ /sems ni rab tu rnam dang bas/ /chos la dga' byed bde ba 'thob/ /'phags pas gsungs
369b2(mdo sde): ba'i chos dag la/ /mkhas pa rtag tu dga' bar byed/ /gang dag sems ni bsam gtan dga'/ /gang zhig skye med dga' ba dang / /dran pa nye bar gzhag bzhi dang / /byang chub
369b3(mdo sde): yan lag bdun dag dang / /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi rnams dang / /yan lag brgyad lam gang dga' ba/ /de dag chos gos 'chang ba dang / /bsod snyoms bde bar za bar byed/ /de
369b4(mdo sde): dag ri dang nags tshal na/ /bde bar 'chag par byed pa dang / /de dag bde 'thob bde bar ni/ /mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan 'da'/ /'khon dang 'jigs pa kun 'das zhing / /
369b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten yul gyi srid las rgal/ /chos thos pa dang mthong ba dang / dben par dga' ba bde ba ste/ /'jig rten srog chags 'byung po la/ /'tshe med yang dag sdom pa
369b6(mdo sde): bde| |'dod pa rnams las rab 'das shing / /'jig rten 'dod chags bral ba bde/ /nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dag /btul ba de dag mchog tu bde/ /rgas khar tshul khrims
369b7(mdo sde): ldan pa bde/ /dad la rab tu gnas pa bde/ /don ldan tshig la dga' ba bde/ /sdig pa mi byed pa dag bde/ /'jig rten na ni phar 'dzin bde| /de bzhin mar yang 'dzin pa
370a1(mdo sde): bde| |'jig rten dge sbyong 'dzin pa bde/ /de bzhin bram zer 'dzin pa bde/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba bde/ /de bzhin chos rnams bstan
370a2(mdo sde): pa bde| |dge 'dun rnams ni mthun pa bde/ /mthun pa rnams kyi dka' thub bde/ /tshul khrims ldan pa mthong ba bde/ /mang du thos pa mthong ba bde/ /yang srid rnam
370a3(mdo sde): par grol ba yi/ /dgra bcom pa dag mthong ba bde/ /'jug ngogs bde ba'i chu klung bde/ /chos kyis rgyal ba'i skye bo bde/ /shes rab thob par gyur pa bde/ /nga 'o nga rgyal
370a4(mdo sde): zad pa bde/ /'phags pa rnams ni mthong ba bde/ /dam pa dag dang 'grogs pa bde/ /byis pa rnams ni ma mthong na/ /rtag tu bde ba nyid du 'gyur/ /rnam pa kun tu
370a5(mdo sde): dgra 'dra ba'i/ /byis dang 'grogs pa sdug bsngal zhing / /byis pa dag dang 'grogs byed pa/ /yun ring rjes su 'gyod par 'gyur/ /skyes bu cang shes dkon pa ste/ /
370a6(mdo sde): de dag kun tu 'byung ma yin/ /brtan pa rnams dang 'grogs pa dag /gnyen dang phrad pa lta bur bde/ /gang du brtan pa de skyes pa/ /de yi rigs kyis bde ba 'thob/ /bram
370a7(mdo sde): ze mya ngan 'das pa dag/ rnam pa kun tu bde bar 'jug /gang zhig 'dod pas ma gos shing / /zag med rab tu rnam grol ba/ /sred pa thams cad gtubs pa dag /
370b1(mdo sde): snying las rims nad rnam par bsal/ /sems kyis zhi ba thob pa rnams/ /nye bar zhi zhing bde bar 'jug /gang zhig bde ba yangs 'dod cing / /bde ba chung du gtong 'dod pa'i//
370b2(mdo sde): brtan pas bde chung spang byas na/ /bde ba yangs pa legs pa mthong / /'jig rten 'dod bde gang yin dang / /lha yul bde ba gang yin pas/ /sred pa zad pa'i bde ba de'i/ /bcu
370b3(mdo sde): drug char yang mi phod do/ /khur gyis sdug bsngal blangs pas na/ /khur bor na ni bde bar 'gyur/ /lci ba'i khur dag nges bor na/ /phyi nas gzhan dag len mi 'gyur/ /kun sbyor
370b4(mdo sde): thams cad zad bya'i phyir/ /sred pa thams cad rab tu spongs/ /phung po thams cad yongs shes na/ /srid pa phyi mar 'gro ba med/ /don rnams bskrun pa la ni grogs ldan bde/ /
370b5(mdo sde): srog dag rab tu gtugs la bsod nams bde/ /ngan ngon tsam gyis legs par chog shes bde/ /sdug bsngal thams cad nges par nub pa bde/ /'di na me ni 'bar ba la/ /
370b6(mdo sde): lcags kyi tho bas brgyab pa yis/ /rim gyis nye bar zhi 'gyur te/ /ji ltar song ba mi shes ltar/ /'dod pa'i 'dam rdzab chu brgal cing / /go 'phang mi g.yo thob pa dang / /legs
370b7(mdo sde): par rnam par grol rnams kyi/ /'gro ba gdags su med pa yin/ /gang zhig khong na 'khrug pa med pa dang / /gang zhig sred dang sred min las log pa/ /de dag 'jigs bral
371a1(mdo sde): bde zhing mya ngan med/ /lhas kyang blta zhing bsam du med par 'gyur/ /'di na gang dag chos mang thos pa dang / /rtogs shing ci yang med pa kye re bde/ /
371a2(mdo sde): skye bo skye bo'i sems la rab chags shing / /cung zad yod pa brlag par gyur la ltos/ /'di na gang dag chos mang thos pa dang / /rtogs shing ci yang med pa kye re bde/ /skye bo

371a6(mdo sde): pas brlag par zad/ /zhen par gyur pa'i mi nang na/ /zhen pa med par gnas pa dang / /zhen pa'i nang na ma zhen pa/ /kye ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho/ /nad kyis thebs pa'i
371a7(mdo sde): mi nang na/ /nad med par ni gnas pa dang / /nad pa'i nang na nad med pa/ /kye ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho/ /'tshe ba can gyi mi nang na/ /'tshe ba med par gnas pa dang / /
371b1(mdo sde): 'tshe ba'i nang na 'tshe med pa/ /kye ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho/ /gnod sems can gyi mi nang na/ /gnod sems med par gnas pa dang / /gnod sems can nang gnod med pa/ /kye
371b2(mdo sde): ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho/ /sha khon can gyi mi nang na/ /sha khon med par gnas pa dang / /sha khon can nang 'khon med pa/ /kye ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho/ /mi thi la dag rab
371b3(mdo sde): bsregs kyang / /nga la ci yang tshig pa med/ /nga la gang dag ci med pas/ /kye ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho/ /nga la ci yang med mod kyi/ /dga' ba za bar byed pas na/ /'od gsal
371b4(mdo sde): gyi ni lha bzhin du/ /kye ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho/ /'jig tshogs la ni mi rten pas/ /nga la ci yang med mod kyi/ /dga' ba za bar byed pas na/ /kye ma'o shin tu bde bar
371b5(mdo sde): 'tsho| |len pa'i rkyen gyis phrad cing reg 'gyur gyi/ /len med ci dang phrad cing reg med pas/ /bdag dang gzhan gyis bskyed pa'i bde sdug gis/ /dgon pa'am grong du reg
371b6(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten 'di na bde dang sdug bsngal gyis/ /skyes bu dam pa mtho dman mi 'gyur zhing / /brtan rnams 'dod pa'i rgyu yis mi 'khyal bar/ /skyes bu dam
371b7(mdo sde): pa kun tu 'gro bar byed/ /bde ba'i tshoms te sum cu pa'o// //ched du brjod pa'i tshoms/ bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma/ gzung bar dka' zhing yang ba dang //
372a1(mdo sde): gang du dga' bar 'gro ba yis/ /sems dul ba ni legs pa ste/ /sems dul ba yis bde ba 'dren/ /bdud kyi gzhi dag spong ba na/ /chu bo'i gnas
372a2(mdo sde): nas rab bton te/ /thang la bor ba'i nya lta bur/ /bdag gi sems ni yongs su g.yo/ /nyi ma las ni 'od zer ltar/ /bdag gi sems ni so sor rgyug/ de dag mkhas pas
372a3(mdo sde): des bzlog ste/ /lcags kyu yis ni glang chen bzhin/ /nga la don med spyod pa dang / /bltar med snying po med pa de/ /rtag tu gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/ /sems de la ni nga smra'o/ /
372a4(mdo sde): sems 'di sngon chad ji ltar 'dod pa dang / /dga' dgur spyod cing rgyu bar byed pa dag/ glang chen myos la mi yis lcags kyu ltar/ /de ni tshul bzhin bya bas de bzung ngo / /
372a5(mdo sde): khang khyim byed pa 'di yis ni/ /yang yang skye ba'i sdug bsngal can/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba du ma zhig/ da ltar phan chad khyod kyi phyung / /khang khyim byed pa khyod mthong bas/ /
372a6(mdo sde): khyim gyi gdung chen rnams bcom la/ /phyam rnams thams cad bcag nas su/ /phyin chad khyim byed mi gzhug go/ sems ni 'du byed dang bral nas/ /'di nyid la

372b1(mdo sde): zhig lus med phug na gnas/ /gcig pu rgyu zhing ring 'gro ba'i/ /sems de 'dul bar byed pa ni/ /'jigs pa che las thar bar 'gyur/ /log pa'i smon ldan sems gang gis/ /
372b2(mdo sde): bdag nyid sdug bsngal byed 'gyur ba'i/ /de ltar 'khon gyis 'khon can dang / /dgra bos dgra la'ang byed mi 'gyur/ /yang dag smon ldan sems gang gis/ /bdag nyid bde bar byed
372b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba/ /de ltar pha dang ma dag dang / /gnyen gzhan gyis kyang byed mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yogs nyes na/ /char pa yongs su 'dzag pa ltar/ /de bzhin sems ni ma bsgoms
372b4(mdo sde): pa| |'dod chags rnams kyis yongs su bcom/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yogs legs na/ /char pa rnam par mi 'dzag pa/ /de bzhin legs par bsgoms pa'i sems/ /'dod chags
372b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis yong mi choms/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yogs nyes na/ /char pa yongs su 'dzag pa ltar/ /de bzhin sems ni ma bsgoms pa/ /zhe sdang rnams kyis yongs su bcom/ /ji
372b6(mdo sde): ltar khang steng g.yogs legs na/ /char pa rnam par mi 'dzag pa/ /de bzhin legs par bsgom pa'i sems/ /zhe sdang rnams kyis yong mi choms/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yogs
372b7(mdo sde): nyes na| |char pa yongs su 'dzag pa ltar/ /de bzhin sems ni ma bsgoms pa/ /gti mug rnams kyis yongs su bcom/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yogs legs na/ /char pa
373a1(mdo sde): rnam par mi 'dzag par/ /de bzhin legs par bsgoms pa'i sems/ /gti mug rnams kyis yong mi choms/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yogs nyes na/ /
373a2(mdo sde): char pa yongs su 'dzag pa ltar/ /de bzhin sems ni ma bsgoms pa/ /nga rgyal rnams kyis yongs su bcom/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yogs legs na/ /char pa rnam par mi
373a3(mdo sde): 'dzag pa/ /de bzhin legs par bsgoms pa'i sems/ /nga rgyal rnams kyis yong mi choms/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yogs nyes pa/ /char pa yongs su 'dzag pa ltar/ /de bzhin
373a4(mdo sde): sems ni ma bsgoms pa/ /chags pa rnams kyis yongs su bcom/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yogs legs na/ /char pa rnam par mi 'dzag pa/ /de bzhin legs par bsgoms
373a5(mdo sde): pa'i sems/ /chags pa rnams kyis yong mi choms/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yogs nyes na/ /char pa yongs su 'dzag pa ltar/ /de bzhin sems ni ma bsgoms pa/ /sred pa rnams
373a6(mdo sde): kyis yongs su bcom/ /ji ltar khang steng g.yogs legs na/ /char pa rnam par mi 'dzag pa/ /de bzhin legs par bsgoms pa'i sems/ /sred pa rnams kyis yong mi
373a7(mdo sde): choms/ /chos kyi sngon du yid 'gro ste/ /yid mgyogs yid ni gtso bo yin/ /gal te yid rab gdug pa yis/ /smras sam yang na byas kyang rung / /de yis de ni sdug
373b1(mdo sde): bsngal 'thob/ /'khor los mgo bo bcad pa bzhin/ /chos kyi sngon du yid 'gro ste/ /yid mgyogs yid ni gtso bo yin/ /gal te yid rab dang pa yis/ /smras sam yang na byas kyang
373b2(mdo sde): rung / /de yi de ni bde ba 'thob/ /grib ma rjes su 'brang ba bzhin/ /brtsad pa ched cher 'dzin pa dang / /sems ni nyon mongs gyur pa yis/ /glags skabs tshol bar byed pa yis/ /legs
373b3(mdo sde): bshad legs par mi shes so/ /sdang ba'am yang na 'khrug pa'am/ /dad pa med pa'i sems dag gis/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yi/ /dam chos kun shes mi nus so/ /
373b4(mdo sde): gang gis bag med sems dang ni/ /khro ba rnam par btul ba dang / /'di na gnod sems rab spangs pa/ /des ni legs par bshad pa shes/ /sems kyi brtan pa med pa yis/ /
373b5(mdo sde): dam chos rnam par shes mi 'gyur/ /dad pa 'gyur ldog byed pa yi/ /shes rab yongs su rdzogs mi 'gyur/ /kun rtog la chums rten pa yi/ /lha ngan sum cu rtsa drug gi/ chu bo'i
373b6(mdo sde): rgyun ni gang yin pa/ /yid kyi rgyun las rab tu 'bab/ /dga' sems dbang po phal pa dang / /sems kyi rjes 'brang zhan pa yi/ /mi de'i grags 'grib 'bras lhags pa'i/ /ljon
373b7(mdo sde): shing la ni bya bzhin no/ /sems khyod phung khrol 'dod la dga' ma byed/ /brtson sems bag yod pa la gnas par gyis/ /bag med byas pas dmyal bar btsos pa dang / /lcags
374a1(mdo sde): gong mid pas khyod ni ma du zhig/ ldang ba'i dus tshe 'dug par byed pa dang / /lang tsho stobs ldan mi 'bad khyim 'dug dang / /bsam pa rdzogs tshe le lo
374a2(mdo sde): byed pa yi/ /mi yi shes rab lam rtogs mi 'gyur ro/ /phran tshegs rnam rtog zhib mor rnam rtog pas/ /nang na gnas pa'i yid ni g.yen yang spyo/ /yid kyi rnam rtog de
374a3(mdo sde): dag ma shes na/ /'khrul sems yang dang yang du rgyug par byed/ /gang zhig dran ldan rnam 'byed brtson pa dang / /rnam par rtog la mkhas pas de shes na/ /nang na gnas
374a4(mdo sde): pa'i yid ni g.yen spyo ba/ /thams cad ma lus blo yis rab tu spong / /lus 'di bum pa 'dra bar rtogs byas shing / /grong khyer 'dra ba'i sems kyis sran btsugs nas/ /
374a5(mdo sde): shes rab mtshon gyis bdud dang g.yul sprang de/ /btul nas gnas med par ni bsrung bar bya/ /'jig rten 'di dag bum pa 'drar rtogs shing / /de bzhin chos rnams
374a6(mdo sde): smig rgyu 'drar shes nas/ /shes rab mtshon gyis bdud dang g.yul sprad de/ /btul nas gnas med par ni bsrung bar bya/ /lus 'di dbu ba 'dra bar rtogs byas shing //
374a7(mdo sde): grong khyer 'dra ba'i sems kyis sran btsugs nas/ /shes rab mtshon gyis bdud dang g.yul sprad de/ /btul nas gnas med par ni bsrung bar bya/ /'jig rten 'di dag
374b1(mdo sde): dbu ba 'drar rtogs shing / /grong khyer 'dra ba'i sems kyis sran btsugs nas/ /shes rab mtshon gyis bdud dang g.yul sprad de/ /btul nas gnas med par ni bsrung bar bya/ /gang
374b2(mdo sde): gis byang chub yan lag bdun/ /sems kyis legs par bsgoms pa dang / /gang zhig len la mi dga' zhing / /len pa rab tu spangs pa dang / /zag zad skyon rnams bsal ba de/ /
374b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten dag na mya ngan 'das/ /gang zhig g.yag rnga'i rtse mo ltar/ /rang gi sems ni rjes srung zhing / /'byung po rnams la brtser ldan pa/ /de yi bde ba yongs mi nyams/ /gang
374b4(mdo sde): phyir glang po'i glang po che/ /mche ba bzang po'i glang chen dang / /sems dang sems mi mnyam pas na/ /de phyir gcig pu nags su dgyes/ /gang gi yid la gnod med cing / /
374b5(mdo sde): 'byung po kun la brtse ba dang / /'byung po rnams la byams byed pa/ /de la nam yang 'khon mi 'byung / /gang la gnod pa'i sems med cing / /'byung po kun la brtse ba dang //
374b6(mdo sde): srog chags kun la byams byed pa/ /de la nam yang 'khon mi 'byung / /gang la gnod pa'i sems med cing / /'byung po rnams la brtse ba dang / /sems can kun la byams
374b7(mdo sde): byed pa/ /de la nam yang 'khon mi 'gyur/ /mdza' bshes kun dang grogs kun dang / /'byung po kun la brtse ba dang / /byams pa'i sems ni bsgom byas na/ /bde ba shin tu
375a1(mdo sde): 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gal te gang zhig srog chags 'ga' la'ang sdang med sems/ /byams par byed na de yis de ni dge ba yin/ /sems can
375a2(mdo sde): thams cad la ni yid kyis brtse byas na/ /bsod nams phal cher 'phags pas rab tu bsgrub par 'gyur/ /mi gang dga' ba'i sems dang ni/ /zhum pa med pa'i yid
375a3(mdo sde): kyis su/ /dge ba'i chos la sgom byed pa/ /grub pa dang ni bde ba 'thob/ /yang dag shes pas rnam grol zhing / /skyo ba nye bar zhi gyur pa/ /de yi yid ni zhi gyur cing / /lus
375a4(mdo sde): dang ngag gi las kyang zhi/ /ji ltar rtse gcig sems kyis ni/ /chos rnams legs par mthong ba ltar/ /sil snyan yan lag lnga pas kyang / /de ltar dga' ba byed mi
375a5(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /gang yid ting 'dzin la dga' ba/ /de dag 'dod pas rtse mi byed/ /gang zhig cung zad gdung med pa'i/ /skyob pa bde bar nyal bar 'gyur/ /gang yid ting
375a6(mdo sde): 'dzin la dga' ba/ /de dag 'dod pas rtsen mi byed/ /gang zhig cung zad gdung med pa'i/ /thub pa kye ma'o dga' bar 'gyur/ /gang gi sems ni brag lta bur/ /rab
375a7(mdo sde): tu g.yo ba med 'dug pa/ /chags pa'i gnas la mi chags te/ /khro ba'i gnas la 'khrug med par/ /gang yid de ltar gyur pa de/ /sdug bsngal thob par ga la
375b1(mdo sde): 'gyur| |skur ba mi gdab gnod mi bya/ /so sor thar pas bsdam par bya/ /zas kyi tshod kyang shes par bya/ /bas mtha' dgon par gnas bya zhing / /lhag pa'i sems la rnal 'byor
375b2(mdo sde): bya| |'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin/ /sems kyi rtags la mkhas pa dang / /rab tu dben pa'i ro rnyed dang / /rab drang sems pa'i 'grus skyong can/ /zang zing med pa'i dga' ba myong /
375b3(mdo sde): gang zhig yid gzhungs dben dga' dben gnas pas/ /rtag tu rang gi lus kyis spyod lam dang / /smra dang yid ni srung bar byed pa de/ /mya ngan spong zhing sdug bsngal 'thob mi
375b4(mdo sde): 'gyur| |ma bsrungs pa yi sems dang ni/ /log par lta bas bcom pa dang / /gnyid dang rmugs pas zil non pa/ /bdud kyi dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de bas sems ni bsrung
375b5(mdo sde): byas te| |yang dag lta bas mdun bdar cing / /yang dag kun rtog spyod yul can/ /yang dag skye dang 'jig pa shes/ /gnyid dang rmugs pa zil gnon pa'i/ /dge slong sdug
375b6(mdo sde): bsngal zad pa 'thob/ /bag yod sems ni srung ba dang / /sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde/ /skye dgu sems kyis bslus pa dag /gcig tu sems can dmyal bar 'tshed/ /
375b7(mdo sde): bag yod sems ni srung ba dang / /sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde/ /skye dgu sems kyis bslus pa dag /gcig tu dud 'gro rnams su 'tshed/ /bag yod sems ni srung ba
376a1(mdo sde): dang / /sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde/ /skye dgu sems kyis bslus pa dag/ gcig tu yi dwags rnams su 'tshed/ /bag yod sems ni srung ba dang / /
376a2(mdo sde): sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde/ /skye dgu sems ni bsrung ba dag / gcig tu mi yi nang du dga'/ /bag yod sems ni srung ba dang / /sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde/ /
376a3(mdo sde): skye dgu sems ni bsrung ba dag/ gcig tu mtho ris rnams su dga'/ /bag yod sems ni srung ba dang / /sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde/ /skye dgu sems ni bsrung ba
376a4(mdo sde): dag / gcig tu mya ngan 'das pa 'thob/ /sems kyi tshoms te sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// //dge slong bsod snyoms byed pa bdag rang tsam/ /'drangs par
376a5(mdo sde): byed kyi gzhan dag mi gso ba/ /rtag tu nyer zhi dran dang ldan pa yi/ /skyob pa de la lha rnams dga' bar byed/ /dge slong bsod snyoms byed pa bdag rang tsam/ /'drangs par
376a6(mdo sde): byed kyi gzhan dag mi gso ba/ /skyob pa de la lha rnams dga' byed kyi/ /bkur sti nor dang grags 'dod rnams la min/ /dge slong 'dod pa kun spangs shing / /mdun
376a7(mdo sde): na gnas pa'i rdul bsal ba/ /bdag med thub pa brtan pa yis/ /gzhan la smra bar bya mi dgos/ /skye bo ma bsdams tshig gis gnod byed pa/ /mi bzad rjod pa'i
376b1(mdo sde): tshig de thos gyur kyang / /dge slong sdang sems bral la ji mi snyam/ /g.yul ngor glang chen mda' yis bsnun pa bzhin/ /skye bo ma bsdams tshig gis gnod byed pa/ /mi bzad rjod
376b2(mdo sde): pa'i tshig de thos gyur kyang / /dge slong yid legs bzhag la ji mi snyam/ /g.yul ngor glang chen mda' yis bsnun pa bzhin/ /bzo yis mi 'tsho yang zhing bdag la dga'/ /
376b3(mdo sde): dbang po dul zhing kun las rnam grol zhing / /khyim la ma chags bag med 'dod sred spangs/ /gcig pu spyod byed de ni dge slong yin/ /'tsho gtsang snyom las med pa yi/ /grogs
376b4(mdo sde): po mthun pa bsten bya zhing / /so sor mgo bsha' bya ba dang / /spyod yul cho ga mkhas par bya/ /lag pa legs bsdams rkang pa legs bsdams dang / /tshig rnams legs
376b5(mdo sde): bsdams dbang po legs bsdams shing / /gcig pu nang du mnyam par 'jog la dga'/ /chog shes de ni dge slong yin zhes gsung / /dge slong chos la kun dga' zhing / /
376b6(mdo sde): chos dga' chos la sems pa dang / /chos la rjes su dran pa dag/ chos las yongs su nyams mi 'gyur/ /dge slong khang stong zhugs nas su/ /nang la lta bar byed pa dang //
376b7(mdo sde): chos rnams legs par mthong ba dag/ lha yi dga' dang ldan par 'gyur/ /ji lta ji ltar phung po la/ /skye dang 'jig par legs rtogs pa/ /de lta de ltar de yis ni/ /
377a1(mdo sde): dga' dang mgu ba nyid kyang 'thob/ /dge slong dga' ba mang po yis/ /sdug bsngal zad par thob par 'gyur/ /ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag/ rlung gis
377a2(mdo sde): rab tu mi g.yos ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong 'dod chags dag /zad pa kun tu rab mi g.yo/ /ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag /rlung gis rab tu mi g.yos ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong
377a3(mdo sde): zhe sdang dag/ zad pa kun tu rab mi g.yo/ /ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag /rlung gis rab tu mi g.yos ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong gti mug dag/ zad pa kun tu rab mi g.yo/ /ji
377a4(mdo sde): ltar brag gi ri bo dag/ rlung gis rab tu mi g.yos ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong nga rgyal dag/ zad pa kun tu rab mi g.yo/ /ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag/ rlung gi rab tu mi g.yos
377a5(mdo sde): ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong chags pa dag /zad pa kun tu rab mi g.yo/ /ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag/ rlung gis rab tu mi g.yos ltar/ /de bzhin dge slong sred pa dag/ zad
377a6(mdo sde): pa kun tu rab mi g.yo/ /gang la kun tu gsog med cing / /gang la bdag gir byed med pa/ /gang dag med na'ang mi gdung ba/ /de ni dge slong zhes brjod do/ /re zhig
377a7(mdo sde): gzhan la slong ba tsam/ /ji ga dge slong min pa snyam/ /grong ba'i chos ni 'dzin byed pa/ /jig dge slong min pa snyam/ /gang zhig dge dang sdig pa dag/ rab spangs tshangs
377b1(mdo sde): par spyod ldan zhing / /sde tshogs spangs nas spyod byed pa/ /de ni dge slong zhes brjod do/ /dge slong gang zhig byams gnas shing / /sangs rgyas bstan la rab dad pa/ /des ni blta
377b2(mdo sde): bas mi ngoms pa'i/ /zhi ba'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /dge slong gang zhig byams gnas shing / /sangs rgyas bstan la rab dad de/ /'du byed nyer zhi zhi ba yi/ /zhi ba'i go 'phang
377b3(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur/ /dge slong gang zhig byams gnas shing / /sangs rgyas bstan la rab dad pa/ /des ni kun sbyor kun zad pa/ /rim gyis mngon sum byed par 'gyur/ /dge slong
377b4(mdo sde): gang zhig byams gnas shing / /sangs rgyas bstan la rab dad pas/ /bdag nyid ngan 'gro las 'dren te/ /'dam rdzab las ni glang chen bzhin/ /dge slong gang zhig byams
377b5(mdo sde): gnas shing / /sangs rgyas bstan la rab dad pas/ /sdig pa'i chos rnams sprug byed de/ /rlung gis ljon shing lom bzhin/ /dge slong gang zhig byams gnas shing / /sangs
377b6(mdo sde): rgyas bstan la rab dad pas/ /mya ngan 'das dang nye ba'i phyir/ /yongs su nyams 'gyur mi srid do/ /sems dga' yid ni bzang ba dang / /dga' dang mi dga' zil gnon pa'i/ /
377b7(mdo sde): dge slong dga' ba mang po yis/ /sdug bsngal zad pa thob par 'gyur/ /lus zhi ngag ni zhi ba dang / /sems zhi legs par mnyam bzhag cing / /'jig rten zang zing spangs pa
378a1(mdo sde): yi| |dge slong nyer zhi yin zhes brjod/ /ting 'dzin med la shes rab med/ /shes rab med la ting 'dzin med/ /shes rab ting 'dzin ldan pa de/ /
378a2(mdo sde): dge slong yin zhes brjod par bya/ /de bas ting 'dzin shes rab la/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis 'jug bya ste/ /de bzhin shes rab dge slong de'i/ /dang por bya ba 'di yin no/ /
378a3(mdo sde): chog shes dbang po bsdam bya zhing / /so sor thar pas bsdam par bya/ /zas kyi tshod kyang shes par bya/ /bas mtha' dgon par gnas bya zhing / /lhag pa'i sems la rnal
378a4(mdo sde): 'byor bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin/ /gang gi lus dang ngag dang ni/ /yid la nyes byas med gyur pa/ /de ni dge ba'i tshul khrims can/ /ngo tsha'i yid ldan dge slong
378a5(mdo sde): yin| |gang gis rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi/ /phyogs kyi chos bdun legs bsgom pa/ /de ni dge ba'i chos can de/ /mnyam gzhag dge slong yin zhes gsung / /'di na
378a6(mdo sde): gang zhig bdag nyid kyi/ /sdug bsngal zad pa rab shes la/ /dge zhing shes rab ldan pa de/ /zag med dge slong yin zhes gsung / /zag pa zad pa ma thob na/ /tshul
378a7(mdo sde): khrims brtul zhugs tsam dag gam/ /yang na thos pa mang po'am/ /dben pa dag tu gnas kyang rung / /ting 'dzin thob par gyur kyang ngal/ /rdeng drod chod pa'i dge
378b1(mdo sde): slong min/ /phung po la ni bdag zer ba'i/ /'jig rten 'di dag gdung ba ste/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde ba ni/ /'phags pas bsten pa mngon du bya/ /ji lta ji ltar bsam byas pa/ /
378b2(mdo sde): de lta de ltar gzhan du 'gyur/ /gzhan du 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten 'di/ /sred pa la chags srid la dga'/ /srid la mngon chags srid la dga'/ /srid pa nyid la mngon par dga'//
378b3(mdo sde): dga' bya gang yin de sdug bsngal/ /spyi g.ya' gang yin de bde bas/ /srid pa rab tu spangs pa'i phyir/ /'di na tshangs par spyod pa ste/ /dge sbyong bram ze ji snyed pa/ /srid pas
378b4(mdo sde): srid las nges 'byung zer/ /de dag thams cad srid pa las/ /nges 'byung min zhes brjod par bya/ /dge sbyong bram ze ji snyed pa/ /srid pas srid las nges byung zer/ /de dag thams
378b5(mdo sde): cad srid pa las/ /rnam grol min zhes brjod par bya/ /len pa'i rkyen gyis sdug bsngal byung / /sdug bsngal las ni len pa byung / /len pa thams cad yongs zad na/ /sdug
378b6(mdo sde): bsngal rab tu 'byung ba med/ /len pa thams cad na srid pa'i rnam pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can yin no
378b7(mdo sde): zhes de ltar de dag la yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du mthong na/ /sred pa'i sred pa rab tu spong bar 'gyur zhing / /srid pa med pas mngon par mi dga' bar
379a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i dge slong skyob pa ni gzhan du len pa med cing yang srid med par 'gyur te/ bdud zil gyis non pa dang /
379a2(mdo sde): g.yul las rgyal ba dang / srid pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa 'di lta bu 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no/ /dge slong dngos po bcad pa dang / /nye bar zhi zhing
379a3(mdo sde): sems zhi ba/ /de ni yang srid med par 'gyur/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rnam par spangs/ /dge slong dngos po bcad pa dang / /nye bar zhi zhing sems zhi ba/ /de ni bdud kyi 'ching
379a4(mdo sde): las grol/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rnam par spangs/ /dge slong dngos po bcad pa dang / /sems ni zag pa med gyur pa/ /de ni yang srid med pa ste/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rnam
379a5(mdo sde): par spangs/ /dge slong dngos po bcad pa dang / /sems ni zag pa med gyur pa/ /de ni bdud kyi 'ching las grol/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rnam par spangs/ /dge slong dngos
379a6(mdo sde): po bcad pa dang / /srid pa'i sred pa gtubs gyur pa/ /de ni yang srid med par 'gyur/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rnam par spangs/ /dge slong dngos po bcad pa dang / /srid pa'i
379a7(mdo sde): sred pa bcad gyur pa/ /de ni bdud kyi 'ching las grol/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rnam par spangs/ /gang zhig 'dam rdzab legs brgal cing / /grong gi tsher ma bkrugs pa
379b1(mdo sde): pa dang / /'dod chags zad pa rjes thob pa/ /de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod/ /gang zhig 'dam rdzab legs brgal cing / /grong gi tsher ma dkrugs pa dang / /zhe sdang zad pa rjes thob
379b2(mdo sde): pa| |de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod/ /gang zhig 'dam rdzab legs brgal cing / /grong gi tsher ma dkrugs pa dang / /gti mug zad pa rjes thob pa/ /de ni dge slong yin zhes
379b3(mdo sde): brjod| |gang zhig 'dam rdzab legs brgal cing / /grong gi tsher ma dkrugs pa dang / /nga rgyal zad pa rjes thob pa/ /de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod/ /gang zhig 'dam rdzab legs
379b4(mdo sde): brgal cing / /grong gi tsher ma dkrugs pa dang / /chags pa zad pa rjes thob pa/ /de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod/ /gang zhig 'dab rdzab legs brgal cing / /grong gi tsher ma
379b5(mdo sde): dkrugs pa dang / /sred pa zad pa rjes thob pa/ /de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod/ /gang zhig gshe ba dang ni gsod pa dang / /'ching dang grong gi tsher ma thul ba dang / /gang zhig
379b6(mdo sde): ri bo bzhin gnas mi bkri zhing / /sdug des mi g.yo de ni dge slong yin/ /skur pa mi 'debs sgro 'dogs mi byed cing / /'jig rten 'di kun rdzun rtogs dge slong gang / /de ni
379b7(mdo sde): pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /sbrul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/ /'dod chags langs pa 'dul ba'i dge slong gang / /
380a1(mdo sde): de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sprul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /sbrul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/ /zhe sdang langs pa 'dul ba'i
380a2(mdo sde): dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /sprul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/ /gti mug langs pa 'dul ba'i
380a3(mdo sde): dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sprul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /sbrul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/ /nga rgyal langs pa 'dul ba'i dge
380a4(mdo sde): slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /sbrul gyis dug btang pa la sman bzhin du/ /chags pa langs pa 'dul ba'i
380a5(mdo sde): dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /sbrul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/ /khro ba langs pa 'dul ba'i
380a6(mdo sde): dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /sbrul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du/ /sred pa langs pa 'dul ba'i
380a7(mdo sde): dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung chen ltar/ /'dod chags ma lus drungs
380b1(mdo sde): 'byin dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung chen ltar/ /zhe sdang ma lus drungs 'byin
380b2(mdo sde): dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung chen ltar/ /gti mug ma lus drungs 'byin
380b3(mdo sde): dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung chen ltar/ /nga rgyal ma lus drungs 'byin dge
380b4(mdo sde): slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung chen ltar/ /chags pa ma lus drungs 'byin dge
380b5(mdo sde): slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung chen ltar/ /sred pa ma lus drungs 'byin dge
380b6(mdo sde): slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad spong byed cing / /'dod sbyor 'ching ba rnams
380b7(mdo sde): bsal dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /sgrib pa thams cad spangs shing sdig med pa/ /yid gnyis zug rngu
381a1(mdo sde): bcad pa'i dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /rtog pa rnam bsal nang gi ma lus la/ /
381a2(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pa med pa'i dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /nags sbyor byed pa 'ga' med mi dge ba'i/ /rtsa
381a3(mdo sde): ba legs par drungs phyung dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /rims nad bcas pa 'ga' med mi dge ba'i/ /
381a4(mdo sde): rtsa ba legs par drungs phyung dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /bags la nyal ba 'ga' med mi dge ba'i/ /rtsa
381a5(mdo sde): ba legs par drungs phyung dge slong gang / /de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po/ /spong ste sbrul rgas pags rnying rje ba bzhin/ /khrims ldan gang yin dge slong de/ /stong nyid
381a6(mdo sde): gang ldan bsam gtan de/ /rtag tu byed gang rnal 'byor de/ /mya ngan 'das gang bde ba de/ /dge slong dga' dang mi dgas mi brjod cing / /bas mtha'i gnas mal
381a7(mdo sde): dag tu sten pa dang / /de ni bag yod gnas shing sred pa yi/ /'dod chags phra rgyas legs par 'byin par byed/ /dge slong gi tshoms te sum cu gnyis pa'o// //
381b1(mdo sde): gang zhig brgyan kyang chos spyod dul ba dang / /zhi zhing yang dag sdom la tshangs bar spyod/ /'byung po kun la chad pas mi gcod de/ /bram ze dge sbyong de yin dge slong de/ /gcer
381b2(mdo sde): bur spyod pas ma yin ral bas ma yin rdzab kyis min/ /kha zas mi za ba yis ma yin thang la nyal ba'am/ /rdul dang dri mas ma yin tsog pur 'dug la 'bad pa yis/ /mi rnams
381b3(mdo sde): dag par mi 'gyur som nyi rnams las rgal mi 'gyur/ /dge sbyong bram ze gang yang rung / /de dag nyid la chags byed pa/ /zag pa zad pa ma thob par/ /bar ma dor ni rnam
381b4(mdo sde): par nyams/ /dge sbyong bram ze gang yang rung / /de dag nyid la chags byed pa/ /tshor ba zad pa ma thob par/ /bar ma dor ni rnam par nyams/ /dge sbyong bram ze gang yang
381b5(mdo sde): rung / /de dag nyid la chags byed cing / /byis pa mtha' gcig la lta ba/ /bar ma dor ni rnam par nyams/ /dge sbyong bram ze gang yang rung / /de dag nyid la chags byed pa//
381b6(mdo sde): byis pa'i skye bo blo ngan rnams/ /bar ma dor ni rnam par nyams/ /dge sbyong bram ze gang yang rung / /de dag nyid la chags byed pa/ /go 'phang dam pa ma thob par/ /bar ma
381b7(mdo sde): dor ni rnam par nyams/ /blo ngan na khyod kyi ral pa ci/ /khyod kyi g.yang gzhi gyon pa ci/ /khyod nang thibs por 'dug bzhin du/ /phyi rol legs par byi dor byed/ /blo ngan khyod
382a1(mdo sde): kyi ral pa ci/ /khyod kyi g.yang gzhi gyon pa ci/ /khyod nang dri ma ldan bzhin du/ /phyi rol legs par byi dor byed/ /rigs kyis bram zer 'gyur ma yin/ /
382a2(mdo sde): ral bas ma yin rus kyis min/ /gang zhig bden pa'i chos ldan pa/ /gtsang ma de yin bram ze yin/ /rigs kyis bram zer 'gyur ma yin/ /ral pas ma yin
382a3(mdo sde): rus kyis min/ /gang zhig sdig pa che chung rnams/ /thams cad spong bar byed pa dag/ sdig ba rnams ni spangs phyir de/ /bram ze yin zhes nges par brjod/ /mgo bo bregs
382a4(mdo sde): tsam dge sbyong min/ /oM zhes zer ba bram zer min/ /gang zhig dge ba'i chos ldan pa/ /gtsang ma de yin bram ze de/ /mgo bo bregs tsam dge sbyong min/ /oM zhes
382a5(mdo sde): zer ba bram ze min/ /gang zhig sdig pa che chung rnams/ /thams cad spong bar byed pa dag /sdig pa rnams ni spangs phyir te/ /dge sbyong bram ze de yin no/ /skye bo phal cher
382a6(mdo sde): 'dir 'khru ba/ /chu yis dag par mi 'gyur te/ /gang zhig sdig pa che chung rnams/ /thams cad spong bar byed pa dag/ sdig pa rnams ni spangs phyir de/ /dge sbyong
382a7(mdo sde): bram ze de yin no/ /gang zhig sdig chos rab spangs shing / /rtag tu dran ldan spyod byed pa/ /kun sbyor zad pa'i sangs rgyas de/ /'jig rten dag na bram ze yin/ /bram ze
382b1(mdo sde): gang zhig sdig pa'i chos spangs shing / /bdag nyid tshul 'chos med cing rnyog med gnas/ /rig byed mthar phyin tshangs par spyod pa spyad/ /dus su smra byed de ni tshangs pa smra/ /
382b2(mdo sde): gang zhig rgyu la mi gnas nga rgyal med/ /gang zhig chags med bdag med re ba med/ /'khrug bcom bdag nyid mya ngan 'das phyogs te/ /bram ze dge sbyong de yin dge slong
382b3(mdo sde): de| |gang zhig ma yi mngal skyes nas/ /gal te 'dzin pa dang bcas nas/ /de ming bu zhes smra bar bstan/ /bram ze yin par nga mi smra/ /yongs su 'dzin med len med de/ /
382b4(mdo sde): bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig lus dang ngag dang ni/ /yid kyis nyes byas mi byed cing / /gang zhig gnas gsum legs bsdams de/ /bram ze yin par
382b5(mdo sde): ngas gsungs so/ /gang gi tshig dag mi rtsub cing / /go byed yid 'ong smra ba dang / /gang gis nyon mongs mi skyed de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig gsod
382b6(mdo sde): 'ching gshe ba dang / /sdang ba min la bzod byed de/ /bzod pa'i brtul zhugs stobs tshogs can/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /khro ba med cing tshul khrims can//
382b7(mdo sde): brtul zhugs ldan zhing sems khral med/ /dul zhing lus mthar gnas pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig rab byung khyim pa dang / /de bzhin gnyis kar
383a1(mdo sde): mi 'dre zhing / /'dod chung khyim nas ma byung de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /ma 'ongs pa la mngon mi dga'/ /'das pa rnams la gdung med
383a2(mdo sde): pa| |'khrig pa'i sbyor bral g.yul rgyal de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /ma 'ongs pa la mngon mi dga'/ /'das la gdung med rdul bral zhing / /zhi ba mya ngan
383a3(mdo sde): med pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig 'dod chung gzhan mi gso/ /dul zhing snying por rab gnas la/ /zag zad skyon rnams bsal ba de/ /bram ze
383a4(mdo sde): yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig pha rol tshu rol dang / /pha rol tshu rol gnyis med cing / /chos rnams kun gyi mthar phyin de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang
383a5(mdo sde): zhig pha rol tshu rol dang / /pha rol tshu rol gnyis med cing / /gang zhig gnas gsum ma chags de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig thung dang ring ba dang //
383a6(mdo sde): phra spom dge dang mi dge dang / /'jig rten cung zad mi len de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig 'di nyid rab shes shing / /rang gi sdug bsngal zad pa dang //
383a7(mdo sde): 'dod chags bral zhing mi ldan de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig dge dang sdig pa dang / /gnyis ka yis kyang mi gos pa/ /gos med rdul bral zhi
383b1(mdo sde): pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig dge dang sdig pa'i las/ /chags gang yin de rab 'das shing / /chags las rab 'das rnam grol de/ /bram ze yin par
383b2(mdo sde): ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig sngon dang phyi ma dang / /dbus kyang yod pa ma yin pa/ /rdul bral 'ching ba las grol te/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /pad+ma'i 'dab la chu
383b3(mdo sde): ltar dang / /smyung bu'i rtse la yungs kar ltar/ /gang zhig sdig la mi gnas de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /pad+ma'i 'dab la chu ltar dang / /smyung bu'i rtse la yungs kar
383b4(mdo sde): ltar/ /gang zhig 'dod la mi gnas te/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /pad+ma'i 'dab la chu ltar dang / /smyung bu'i rtse la yungs kar ltar/ /srid la dga' ba yongs spangs
383b5(mdo sde): de| |bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /zla ba dag cing dri med la/ /skyon bral rab tu dad pa ltar/ /gang zhig sdig pas mi gos de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /
383b6(mdo sde): zla ba dag cing dri med la/ /skyon bral rab tu dad pa ltar/ /gang zhig 'dod pas mi gos te/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /zla ba dag cing dri med la/ /skyon bral rab tu dad
383b7(mdo sde): pa ltar/ /sred la dga' ba yongs spangs te/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /'dam rdzab kyis ni mkha' ltar dang / /rdul gyis zla ba ji lta bar/ /gang zhig sdig pas mi
384a1(mdo sde): gos de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /'dam rdzab kyis ni mkha' ltar dang / /rdul gyis zla ba ji lta bar/ /gang zhig 'dod pas mi gos de//
384a2(mdo sde): bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /'dam rdzab kyis ni mkha' ltar dang / /rdul gyis zla ba ji lta bar/ /srid la dga' ba yongs spangs te/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs
384a3(mdo sde): so| |gang zhig 'dug nas rdul bral ba/ /sems shing zag zad bya ba byas/ /dul zhing lus mthar gnas pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /shes rab zab cing
384a4(mdo sde): yid gzhungs la/ /lam dang lam min rnams la mkhas/ /gang zhig don mchog rjes thob de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /mi ni gang yang rung ba dag/ slong mo
384a5(mdo sde): tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang / /bdag med su la'ang gnod mi byed/ /brtan ldan tshangs par spyod pa can/ /kun shes spyad phyir chos ston de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so//
384a6(mdo sde): gang zhig 'dod pa legs spangs shing / /khyim med par ni rab byung ste/ /'dod pa'i zag pa yongs zad de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /'gro ba dang ni gnas pa
384a7(mdo sde): yig 'byung po chad pas mi gcod cing / /gsod med gsod du mi 'jug de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig mi mthun mthun byed cing / /chad pas
384b1(mdo sde): gcod pa dang du len/ /'byung po rnams la brtse phan de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /smyung bu'i rtse la yungs kar ltar/ /gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang dang / /nga rgyal 'chang
384b2(mdo sde): bar 'joms pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig sred pa'i rdzong 'di dang / /'khor ba'i klung las rab brgal cing / /rgal nas pha rol 'gro bar sems/ /yid nyid
384b3(mdo sde): kyis ni mi bkri zhing / /gang zhig len pa las log de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig 'jig rten 'di dang ni/ /pha rol na yang sred med cing / /sred pa'i sred pa
384b4(mdo sde): yongs zad de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig 'jig rten 'di dang ni/ /pha rol la yang chags med cing / /chags med rnam par bral ba de/ /bram ze yin
384b5(mdo sde): par ngas gsungs so/ /dga' dang mi dga' spangs pa dang / /bsil bar gyur cing zag pa med/ /'jig rten kun zil gnon brtan de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /mi
384b6(mdo sde): yi sbyor ba spangs nas su/ /lha yi sbyor ba rab 'das shing / /sbyor ba kun dang rnam bral de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig lha dang dri za dang / /mi yi 'gro ba mi
384b7(mdo sde): shes shing / /zhi ba 'gro ba mi shes de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang gis chos rnams mi shes pa'am/ /ma mthong ba ni med gyur la/ /shes bya mtha' yas lta ba
385a1(mdo sde): de| |bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang gis sngon gyi gnas rtogs shing / /mtho ris ngan song mthong ba dang / /de nas skye ba zad thob pa'i/ /thub pa
385a2(mdo sde): mngon shes la brtson pa/ /sdug bsngal tha ma rab shes de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /sems kyi rnam grol shes pa dang / /'dod chags kun las grol ba dang / /rig
385a3(mdo sde): pa gsum dang ldan pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang gis sems can 'chi 'pho dang / /skye ba thams cad rtogs gyur pa/ /thogs med spyan ldan sangs rgyas de//
385a4(mdo sde): bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig kun sbyor kun 'das shing / /yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / /dga' med dran ldan ston pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so//
385a5(mdo sde): thub pa rnam rgyal drang srong che/ /khyu mchog rab mchog glang po che/ /bkrir med khrus byas sangs rgyas de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig srid 'das kun zil
385a6(mdo sde): gnon| |chu bo las brgal rnam par 'dren/ /rnam grol pha rol phyin pa de/ /bram ze yin pas ngas gsungs so/ /sdig can rnam par mi sems shing / /mi sgom smra bar mi
385a7(mdo sde): byed par/ /'dug nas rdul bral sems pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig phyag dar khrod 'chang zhing / /ngo tsha shes shing 'dod mi lta/ /shing drung dag tu
385b1(mdo sde): gnas pa de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig sdug bsngal kun spangs phyir/ /zhi ba 'phags lam yan lag brgyad/ /drang po sgom par byed pa de/ /bram ze yin par
385b2(mdo sde): ngas gsungs so/ /gang la cung zad gnas med cing / /kun shes yid gnyis zug rdu med/ /'chi med go 'phang mthong ba de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig lus
385b3(mdo sde): med phug na gnas/ /gcig pu rgyu zhing ring du 'gro/ gdul par dka' ba'i sems 'dul de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang zhig gzugs med pa ltar
385b4(mdo sde): med mtha' yas la/ /shin tu bltar med phra zhing gzhi mngon rtogs/ /rtag dran kun sbyor zad rgyu sangs rgyas pa/ /'jig rten 'di na de ni bram ze yin/ /gang gis sog mig
385b5(mdo sde): 'ching gtubs te/ /chings ma rgyang thag bcad nas su/ /yongs su gdung spangs sangs rgyas de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /gang gis rnyed 'dod sdig can dang / /sog
385b6(mdo sde): mig chings ma gtubs gyur cing / /sred pa rtsar bcas drungs phyung de/ /bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so/ /brtson pas chu bo'i rgyun bcad cing / /'dod pa thams cad rab
385b7(mdo sde): bcom dang / /'du byed rnams kyi zad shes pa/ /sdig med gang yin bram ze yin/ /pha dang ma ni bsad byas shing / /rgyal po gtsang sgra can gnyis dang / /yul 'khor 'khor
386a1(mdo sde): dang bcas bcom pa/ /sdig med gang yin bram ze yin/ /pha dang ma ni bsad byas shing / /rgyal po gtsang sbra can gnyis dang / /mi bzad pa yi stag
386a2(mdo sde): bsad pa/ /sdig med gang yin bram ze yin/ /gang zhig bram ze rdeg pa blun/ /skrod par byed pa de ngan pas/ /bram ze rnams la brdeg mi bya/ /bram ze bskrad bar mi bya'o/ /gang
386a3(mdo sde): zhig chos rnams rnam shes na/ /rgan nam yang na gzhon yang rung / /de la bkur zhing phyag bya ste/ /bram ze gtsang mas me bzhin no/ /gang zhig chos rnams rnam shes na/ /
386a4(mdo sde): rgan nam yang na gzhon yang rung / /de la bkur zhing bsnyen bkur te/ /bram ze gtsang mas me bzhin no/ /gang zhig rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /bstan pa'i chos rnams
386a5(mdo sde): rnam shes na/ /de la bkur zhing phyag byas ste/ /bram ze gtsang mas me bzhin no/ /gang zhig rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /bstan pa'i chos rnams rnam shes na/ /de la
386a6(mdo sde): bkur zhing bsnyen bkur te/ /bram ze gtsang mas me bzhin no/ /gang tshe bram ze chos rnams kyi/ /pha rol phyin par gyur pa na/ /de tshe sha za ba ku la/ /gcig po las kyang shin
386a7(mdo sde): tu 'das/ /gang tshe bram ze chos rnams kyi/ /pha rol phyin par gyur pa na/ /de tshe des mthong tshor ba rnams/ /thams cad nub pa nyid du 'gyur/ /gang tshe bram ze chos rnams
386b1(mdo sde): kyi| |pha rol phyin par gyur pa na/ /de tshe de yis mthong bas na/ /rkyen rnams thams cad nub par gyur/ /gang tshe bram ze chos rnams kyi/ /pha rol tu phyin par gyur pa na/ /de tshe de yis
386b2(mdo sde): mthong bas na/ /kun sbyor thams cad nub par gyur/ /gang tshe bram ze chos rnams kyis/ /pha rol phyin par gyur pa na/ /de tshe skye dang rga ba dang / /'chi ba rnams las shin tu 'das/ /
386b3(mdo sde): nyin mo nyi ma gsal bar byed/ /mtshan mo zla ba snang ba ltar/ /rgyal rigs go chas chas pa gsal/ /bram ze sems par byed na gsal/ /nyin mo nyi ma gsal bar byed/ /
386b4(mdo sde): mtshan mo zla ba snang byed ltar/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas gzi brjid can/ /nyin dang mtshan du gsal bar byed/ /ji ltar mi sdug pa las yid ldog pa/ /de 'dra bram ze rnams la cung
386b5(mdo sde): zad med/ /ji lta ji ltar de yi yid ldog pa/ /de lta de ltar kun rdzob bden par zad/ /gang tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na/ /gang gis chos rnams rgyur bcas rab shes
386b6(mdo sde): pa| |chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung 'gyur te/ /de tshe de yi som nyi ma lus spong / /gang tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na/ /gang gis sdug bsngal rgyur bcas rab
386b7(mdo sde): shes pa/ /chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung 'gyur te/ /de tshe de yi som nyi ma lus spong / /gang tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na/ /gang gis tshor ba zad pa 'thob
387a1(mdo sde): 'gyur pa/ /chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung 'gyur te/ /de tshe de yi som nyi ma lus spong / /gang tshe bram ze brtson pas 'bad pa na/ /gang gis
387a2(mdo sde): rkyen rnams zad par 'thob 'gyur ba/ /chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung 'gyur te/ /de tshe de yi som nyi ma lus spong / /gang tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na/ /gang gis
387a3(mdo sde): zag pa dad pa 'thob 'gyur ba/ /chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung 'gyur te/ /de tshe de yi som nyi ma lus spong / /gang tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na/ /ji ltar mkha'
387a4(mdo sde): la nyi ma shar ba ltar/ /'jig rten thams cad snang byed 'dug 'gyur ba/ /chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gang tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na/ /blo
387a5(mdo sde): yis kun sbyor rnams las rab grol te/ /bdud sdo rnam par bsal nas 'dug 'gyur ba/ /chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bram ze'i tshoms te sum
387a6(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum pa'o/ / //sdom la/ de bzhin gshegs dang thos dang bdag/ bsgre dang mdza' bshes lnga pa'o/ /mya ngan 'das dang mthong ba dang / /sdig
387a7(mdo sde): dang phrugs dang bde ba dang / /sems dang dge slong cho mas dag dang / /bram ze yang ni tha ma yin/ /ched du brjod pa'i tshoms dgra bcom pa chos skyob kyis bsdus pa
387b1(mdo sde): rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA pra b+ha ka ra dang / lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur/ zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus nas
387b2(mdo sde): gtan la phab pa/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya sa dzA na pu ru Sha sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa skyes bu dam pa'i mdo/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
387b3(mdo sde): pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
387b4(mdo sde): te| de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ lnga po 'di dag ni skyes bu dam pa'i sbyin pa dag yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dge slong dag /
387b5(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa ni dad pas sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa yin/ gus par byas te rang gi lag pa nas dang / dus su gzhan dag la mi gnod par sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa yin no/ /dge slong
387b6(mdo sde): dag/ dad pas sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'dod par bya ba gang zhe na/ dad pas sbyin pa byin pas phyug por 'gyur ba yin/ nor mang ba dang / longs spyod che ba yin/
387b7(mdo sde): nor gyi yo byad mang ba yin/ bdag dbang pa'i slong che ba yin/ nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / mdzed dang / bde ba'i tshogs mang ba yin/ bran dang / bran mo
388a1(mdo sde): dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba mang ba yin/ mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams mang ba yin te/ dge slong dag/
388a2(mdo sde): dad pas sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de lta bu 'dod par bya'o/ /dge slong dag/ gus par byas te sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'dod par bya ba gang
388a3(mdo sde): zhe na/ /gus par byas te sbyin pa byin pas phyug por 'gyur ba yin/ mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams mang ba yin pa'i bar snga ma bzhin no/

388a5(mdo sde): byas par 'gyur ba yin te/ dge slong dag/ gus par byas te sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de lta bu 'dod par bya'o/ /dge slong dag/ rang gi lag pa nas sbyin/
388a6(mdo sde): pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'dod par bya ba gang zhe na/ rang gi lag pa nas sbyin pa byin pas phyug por gyur pa nas mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag
388a7(mdo sde): gi gnyen mtshams mang ba yin pa'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de'i khyim gyi longs spyod rgya chen po dag la'ang sems 'jug pa yin/ zas kyi longs spyod rgya chen po dag dang /
388b1(mdo sde): theg pa'i longs spyod rgya chen po dag dang / gos kyi longs spyod rgya chen po dag dang / mal cha'i longs spyod rgya chen po dag dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rgya

388b5(mdo sde): par smin pa de lta bu 'dod par bya'o/ /dge slong dag/ gzhan la mi gnod par sbyin pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'dod par bya ba gang zhe na/ gzhan la mi gnod par

388b7(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtsams pas thob pa lags/ mthus bsgrubs pa rdul zhing dri ma chags chags su bsgrubs pa/ chos dang ldan pa chos kyis thob pa de dag la'ang rgyal po'am/

389a2(mdo sde): pa byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di la 'dod par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas 'di skad ces gsungs nas/ 'di

394a1(mdo sde): zhig lags/ /'di na mtshon du ci rno lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag gis gang byin zin pa yin/ /khyim du gang bzhag 'dir
394a2(mdo sde): bor yin/ /mi shigs go cha bzod pa yin/ /'di na mtshon du shes rab rno/ /lhas gsol pa/ chom rkun zhes bgyi de gang lags/ /dam pa rnams kyi nor gang lags/ /

394a6(mdo sde): par bya/ /chog shes dbang phyug dam pa yin/ /khrims ldan rtag tu rnam par brgyan/ /tshul khrims nyams pa mtho ba tsams yin/ /lhas gsol pa/ rtsa lag mnyes
394a7(mdo sde): gshin de gang lags/ /bsam pa sdang ba'i dgra gang lags/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad de gang lags/ /mchog tu bde ba de gang lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
394b1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ /rtsa lag mnyes gshin bsod nams yin/ /sdig pa bsam pa sdang ba'i dkra/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ /phung po med pa'i bde ba'i mchog /lhas gsol
394b2(mdo sde): pa| sdug la mi phan de gang lags/ /phan yang mi sdug gang zhig lags/ /gnod pa bgyid pa'i nad gang lags/ /sman pa'i mchog gcig de gang lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
394b3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ /'dod pa sdug kyang mi phan pa/ /thar pa phan mi sdug pa/ /'dod chags gnod pa med pa'i nad/ /sman pa'i mchog gcig sangs rgyas yin/ /lha sa gsol
394b4(mdo sde): ba| gang gis 'jig rten 'di bsgribs lags/ /gang gis 'jig rten dbang du bgyis/ /gang gis mdza' bshes 'byed par bgyid/ /gang gis mtho ris mchi mi 'gyur/ /

394b6(mdo sde): mtho ris 'gro mi 'gyur/ /lhas gsol pa/ gang gis mdza' bshes 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gang gis dgra rnams zhi bar bgyid/ /gang gis mtho ris 'thob par bgyid//
394b7(mdo sde): gang gis thar par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gtong bas mdza' bshes 'phel bar 'gyur/ /byams pas dgra rnams zhi bar byed/ /tshul
395a1(mdo sde): khrims kyis ni mtho ris thob/ shes pas thar par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /lha sa gsol pa/ rgyal po dang ni chom rkun gyis/ /shin tu bsgrim pa bgyis
395a2(mdo sde): gyur na| |skyes pa'am bud med gang gi'ang rung / /dbrog par mi tshugs ci zhig lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po dang ni chom rkun gyis/ /shin
395a3(mdo sde): tu bsgrib pa byas gyur kyang / /skyes pa'am bud med gang gi'ang rung / /dbrog par mi tshugs tshul khrims so/ /lha sa gsol pa/ 'jig rten 'di ni gang gis 'ching / /gang
395a4(mdo sde): gis 'jig rten rnam par grol/ /gang zhig rnam par spangs pas na/ /mya ngan 'das zhes bgyi bar bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /'dod pas 'jig rten

395a6(mdo sde): shing / /zhugs kyis mi 'tshig de ci lags/ /dog sa gtam par bgyid pa yi/ /chab kyis mi 'drul ci zhig lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rlung
395a7(mdo sde): dmar gyis kyang mi shigs shing / /mes kyang mi 'tshig bsod nams yin/ /sa rnams khebs par byed pa yi/ /chus kyang mi 'drul bsod nams so/ /lha sa gsol pa/
395b1(mdo sde): su zhig shin tu bslus gyur nas/ /'jig rten 'di nas pha rol mchis/ /da dung bdag gi dogs pa 'di/ /khyod kyis bsal bar mdzad pa'i rigs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
